scn abdxKateScript
; General purpose companion script ; ; Based on combining elements of the following scripts: ; 1. RoseofSharonCassidyScript ; 2. VNPCFollowersQuestSCRIPT ; ; This script is self contained: all companion-specific references from ; VNPCFollowersQuestSCRIPT are moved here so this script does not ; have to reference any other quest or object.
;---------- Script Version Management ----------
int iScriptVersion ; Allows feature upgrades, more than just a simple Do-Once
;---------- Companion Wheel Variables ----------
; From RoseofSharonCassidyScript ; Used by game engine to remember companion wheel settings ; Also used in some AI packages
int CombatStyleMelee int CombatStyleRanged int FollowerSwitchAggressive int IsFollowingDefault int IsFollowingLong int Waiting
;---------- Companion Status Variables ----------
; Copied from VNPCFollowersQuestSCRIPT and RoseofSharonCassidyScript
int bAvailable; Can be hired? int bDead; Dead? int bFired; Fired? int bHired; Hired? (i.e. in party) int bJoinedPartyOnce; Ever join party? int bL38; Fired to Lucky 38? int bLibrary; Fired to Boulder Dome Library. int bQuit; Ever quit party?
;---------- Companion Timer and Warping Variables ----------
; Timers and warping are handled in the Companion Quest script, ; but variables are kept here on a per-companion basis.
float fTimerDeath; ; Cleanup corpse in 24 hours if companion dies float fTimerWait; ; Default is 7 days
; Warping is handled in Companion Quest Script, but variables are kept here
int bWarpInitialized; Player has been outside at least once int iWarpCountdown; Wait before warping, companion may catch up int iWarpCooldown; Wait after warping before allowing it again
;---------- Advanced Tactics Dialogue (Player Configurable) ----------
int bTacticsAlert; Draw weapon when player does - CUT int bTacticsWaitSandbox; Sandbox while waiting int bTacticsWarpOn; Use warping - CUT (used all the time) int bTacticsStowArmor; Non-playable companion armor int bTacticsStowWeapons; Non-playable companion weapons -CUT int bTacticsCheating; Ignored banned locations & items -CUT
;---------- Non-Playable Companion Weapon Holdout Flags ----------
int bMeleeHoldout int bMeleeImprovedHoldout int bRangedHoldout int bRangedImprovedHoldout
;---------- Follow Restrictions ----------
; Companion auto-waits if player enters a restricted area
int bAutoWait; Companion is auto-waiting
; Variables track the specific scenario
int bAutoWaitBoydRoom; Carrie Boyd's Interrogation Room int bAutoWaitFortArena; Fort Arena when player fights int bAutoWaitFortSummit; Caesar's Tent int bAutoWaitL38; Lucky 38 Penthouse, etc. int bAutoWaitL38Open; Lucky 38, all areas open to companions
;---------- Equipment Restrictions ----------
int bBanItems; Companion banned items are removed
; Variables track the specific scenario
int bBanItemsFort; Banned item patdown int bBanItemsGomorrah; Weapon patdown int bBanItemsSilverRush; No weapons allowed int bBanItemsTops; Weapon patdown int bBanItemsUltraLuxe; Weapon patdown
;---------- Self-Healing Variables ----------
; Misc. working variables
float fHealth; Health percentage int bCrippled; 1=Crippled, 0=Not int bPoisoned; 1=Poisoned, 0=Not int bUnconscious; 1=Knocked out or unconscious
; Heal Type ; 0=None (not needed, or none available) ; 10=Healing Powder: 36 health ; 20=Stimpak: 60 health ; 30=Super Stimpak: 120 health ; ; All healing amounts are based on 50 medicine skill ; Modders are free to add their own types
int iHealType int nHealHealth; Points of health restored int nHealCondition; Per cent of limb healed (max 100)
; Medical supplies item counts int nAntivenom int nHealingPowder int nStimpaks int nSuperStimpaks int nDoctorBags
; Warn player once if companion runs out of medicine int bWarnAntivenom int bWarnHealingPowder int bWarnStimpaks int bWarnSuperStimpaks int bWarnDoctorBags
;----------------------------------------------------------------------
Begin OnLoad
;=========Bug fix for old save - Kaz 8/24/12
if getquestrunning abdxKateQuest == 0 startquest abdxKateQuest endif
END
Begin OnCombatEND
; Free cure poison, health and limb restoration
Dispel BarkScorpionPoison Dispel CazadorPoison Dispel DeathClawPoison Dispel DLC03FeralGhoulPoison Dispel DLC03RadScorpion3Poison Dispel NightstalkerPoison Dispel RadScorpion1Poison Dispel RadScorpion2Poison
resethealth
restoreav perceptioncondition 100 restoreav endurancecondition 100 restoreav leftattackcondition 100 restoreav leftmobilitycondition 100 restoreav rightattackcondition 100 restoreav rightmobilitycondition 100
End
;----------------------------------------------------------------------
Begin OnDeath
ShowMessage abdxKateMesgDeath SetStage abdxKateQuest 30 Set abdxKateRef.bDead to 1 Set abdxKateRef.fTimerDeath to ( GameDaysPassed + 1.0 ) SetStage abdxKateQuest 31 SetStage abdxKateQuest 255 SetStage abNovaQuest 140 ; 05/07/12 MoBurma - Added to fail nova quest if the player kills Kate.
End
;----------------------------------------------------------------------
Begin GameMode
;---------- PLUGIN INITIALIZATION / UPGRADE ----------
if iScriptVersion < 1 Set iScriptVersion to 1
;---------- Follow and Combat Style Defaults ----------
Set IsFollowingLong to 0 Set IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set CombatStyleMelee to 0 Set CombatStyleRanged to 1 SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged Set FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0 SetAV Aggression 0
;---------- Advanced Tactics ----------
; Configure these to how you want your starting setup to be Set bTacticsAlert to 0 Set bTacticsWaitSandbox to 0 Set bTacticsWarpOn to 1
;---------- Medicine Warnings (Don't warn when first hired) ----------
Set bWarnAntivenom to 1 Set bWarnHealingPowder to 1 Set bWarnStimpaks to 1 Set bWarnSuperStimpaks to 1 Set bWarnDoctorBags to 1
endif
; If dead or unconscious, companion can't do anything
if GetDisabled Return endif
if bDead == 1 Return endif
if GetAV Health < 1 || GetUnconscious || GetKnockedState == 1 if bUnconscious == 0 Set bUnconscious to 1 endif Return elseif bUnconscious == 1 Set bUnconscious to 0 endif
;---------- SELF-HEALING ----------
;---------- Medical Supply Warnings ----------
; If companion runs out of a primary medicine, warn the player once ; Disable the warning until companion has restocks that medicine ; Individual warnings for each type of primary medical supply
Set nAntivenom to abdxKateRef.GetItemCount NVAntivenom Set nHealingPowder to abdxKateRef.GetItemCount NVHealingPowder Set nStimpaks to abdxKateRef.GetItemCount Stimpak Set nSuperStimpaks to abdxKateRef.GetItemCount NVSuperStimpak Set nDoctorBags to abdxKateRef.GetItemCount NVDoctorBag
; Warnings are only given to player if companion hired and following
if bHired == 1 && Waiting == 0
if bWarnAntivenom == 0 if nAntivenom == 0 ShowMessage abdxKateMesgWarnAntivenom Set bWarnAntivenom to 1 endif else if nAntivenom > 0 Set bWarnAntivenom to 0 endif endif
if bWarnHealingPowder == 0 if nHealingPowder == 0 ShowMessage abdxKateMesgWarnHealingPowder Set bWarnHealingPowder to 1 endif else if nHealingPowder > 0 Set bWarnHealingPowder to 0 endif endif
if bWarnStimpaks == 0 if nStimpaks == 0 ShowMessage abdxKateMesgWarnStimpaks Set bWarnStimpaks to 1 endif else if nStimpaks > 0 Set bWarnStimpaks to 0 endif endif
if bWarnSuperStimpaks == 0 if nSuperStimpaks == 0 ShowMessage abdxKateMesgWarnSuperStimpaks Set bWarnSuperStimpaks to 1 endif else if nSuperStimpaks > 0 Set bWarnSuperStimpaks to 0 endif endif
if bWarnDoctorBags == 0 if nDoctorBags == 0 ShowMessage abdxKateMesgWarnDoctorBags Set bWarnDoctorBags to 1 endif else if nDoctorBags > 0 Set bWarnDoctorBags to 0 endif endif
endif
; Companion always heals self regardless of hired / following status
;---------- Doctor Bag Use ----------
if nDoctorBags > 0
if GetAV EnduranceCondition && GetAV PerceptionCondition && GetAV LeftAttackCondition && GetAV RightAttackCondition && GetAV LeftMobilityCondition && GetAV RightMobilityCondition Set bCrippled to 0 else Set bCrippled to 1 endif
if bCrippled RemoveItem NVDoctorBag 1 restoreAV EnduranceCondition 100 restoreAV PerceptionCondition 100 restoreAV LeftAttackCondition 100 restoreAV RightAttackCondition 100 restoreAV LeftMobilityCondition 100 restoreAV RightMobilityCondition 100 Set bCrippled to 0 endif
endif
;---------- Antivenom Use ----------
; References: AntivenomEffectSCRIPT ; http://geck.bethsoft.com/index.php/Dispel ; http://geck.bethsoft.com/index.php/IsSpellTarget
if ( nAntivenom > 0 ) && ( GetHealthPercentage < 0.67 )
Set bPoisoned to 0
if IsSpellTarget BarkScorpionPoison == 1 Set bPoisoned to 1 elseif IsSpellTarget CazadorPoison ==1 Set bPoisoned to 1 elseif IsSpellTarget DeathClawPoison ==1 Set bPoisoned to 1 elseif IsSpellTarget DLC03FeralGhoulPoison ==1 Set bPoisoned to 1 elseif IsSpellTarget DLC03RadScorpion3Poison ==1 Set bPoisoned to 1 elseif IsSpellTarget NightstalkerPoison ==1 Set bPoisoned to 1 elseif IsSpellTarget RadScorpion1Poison ==1 Set bPoisoned to 1 elseif IsSpellTarget RadScorpion2Poison ==1 Set bPoisoned to 1 endif
if bPoisoned == 1 RemoveItem NVAntivenom 1 Set nAntivenom to ( nAntivenom - 1 ) Dispel BarkScorpionPoison Dispel CazadorPoison Dispel DeathClawPoison Dispel DLC03FeralGhoulPoison Dispel DLC03RadScorpion3Poison Dispel NightstalkerPoison Dispel RadScorpion1Poison Dispel RadScorpion2Poison Set bPoisoned to 0 endif
endif
;---------- Healing Meds Use (Stimpak etc...) ----------
if ( nHealingPowder > 0) || ( nStimpaks > 0 || nSuperStimpaks > 0 )
; Determine if healing is needed, and if so the best method
Set fHealth to GetHealthPercentage if fHealth < 0.33 ; Major Injury: Super Stimpak -> Stimpak -> Healing Powder if nSuperStimpaks > 0 Set iHealType to 30 Set nHealHealth to 120 Set nHealCondition to 100 RemoveItem NVSuperStimpak 1 Set nSuperStimpaks to ( nSuperStimpaks - 1 ) elseif nStimpaks > 0 Set iHealType to 20 Set nHealHealth to 60 Set nHealCondition to 60 RemoveItem Stimpak 1 Set nStimpaks to ( nStimpaks - 1 ) elseif nHealingPowder > 0 Set iHealType to 10 Set nHealHealth to 36 Set nHealCondition to 36 RemoveItem NVHealingPowder 1 Set nHealingPowder to ( nHealingPowder - 1 ) else Set iHealType to 0 endif elseif fHealth < 0.67 ; Minor Injury: Healing Powder -> Stimpak -> Super Stimpak if nHealingPowder > 0 Set iHealType to 10 Set nHealHealth to 36 Set nHealCondition to 36 RemoveItem NVHealingPowder 1 Set nHealingPowder to ( nHealingPowder - 1 ) elseif nStimpaks > 0 Set iHealType to 20 Set nHealHealth to 60 Set nHealCondition to 60 RemoveItem Stimpak 1 Set nStimpaks to ( nStimpaks - 1 ) elseif nSuperStimpaks > 0 Set iHealType to 30 Set nHealHealth to 120 Set nHealCondition to 100 RemoveItem NVSuperStimpak 1 Set nSuperStimpaks to ( nSuperStimpaks - 1 ) else Set iHealType to 0 endif else Set iHealType to 0 endif
; Heal the companion if needed and a method is available
if iHealType > 0 restoreAv Health nHealHealth Set iHealType to 0 endif
endif
;---------- INITIATE AUTO-WAIT ----------
if bAutoWait == 0 && bHired == 1 && Waiting == 0
; Boyd's interrogation room at Camp McCarran if VFreeformMcCarran2.bPlayerInInterrogationRoom == 1 SetStage abdxKateQuest 50 Set bAutoWait to 1 Set bAutoWaitBoydRoom to 1 Return endif
; Fort Arena (During a duel) if VMS34.ArenaDuelEnabled == 1 SetStage abdxKateQuest 50 Set bAutoWait to 1 Set bAutoWaitFortArena to 1 Return endif
; Fort Summit (Caesar's Tent) if Player.GetInWorldspace TheFortWorld if ( Player.GetInSameCell FortCaesarRef ) || ( Player.GetInSameCell FortLuciusRef ) if ( FortPraetorianTentGuardRef.GetDead == 0 ) && ( GetStageDone VMQ02 110 == 0 ) SetStage abdxKateQuest 50 Set bAutoWait to 1 Set bAutoWaitFortSummit to 1 Return endif endif endif
; Lucky 38 (Various restricted areas) if bAutoWaitL38Open == 0 if ( Player.GetInWorldspace Lucky38World ) || ( Player.GetInCell Lucky38BasementFloorB2 ) || ( Player.GetInCell Lucky38ControlRoom ) SetStage abdxKateQuest 60 ; Check/Set bAutoWaitL38Open if bAutoWaitL38Open == 0 SetStage abdxKateQuest 50 Set bAutoWait to 1 Set bAutoWaitL38 to 1 Return endif endif endif
endif
;---------- CONDITIONS CLEANUP ----------
; Cleanup leftover conditions for unhired or waiting companion
if ( bHired == 0 ) || ( Waiting == 1 ) if IsSneaking == 1 SetForceSneak 0 endif if IsWeaponOut == 1 && IsInCombat == 0 SetAlert 0 endif Return; Not hired, or waiting, don't continue script endif
;---------- INITIATE EQUIPMENT RESTRICTIONS (Casino, Fort, etc...) ----------
if bBanItems == 0 && bHired == 1 && Waiting == 0
; Fort (Main gate and weather station) if FortEquipmentConfiscationQuest.bFortEquipmentStored == 1 SetStage abdxKateQuest 43 SetStage abdxKateQuest 44 Set bBanItems to 1 Set bBanItemsFort to 1 endif
; Gomorrah if vDialogueGomorrah.iInGomorrah == 1 SetStage abdxKateQuest 43 Set bBanItems to 1 Set bBanItemsGomorrah to 1 Return endif
; Silver Rush if VFSSimonREF.SimonSearched == 1 SetStage abdxKateQuest 42 Set bBanItems to 1 Set bBanItemsSilverRush to 1 Return endif
; Tops if vDialogueTops.PlayerFrisked == 1 && ( VMQTops.bSwankGuns == 0 ) SetStage abdxKateQuest 43 Set bBanItems to 1 Set bBanItemsTops to 1 Return endif
; Ultra Luxe if VMS18.bPlayerFrisked == 1 SetStage abdxKateQuest 43 Set bBanItems to 1 Set bBanItemsUltraLuxe to 1 Return endif
endif
;---------- HIRED and FOLLOWING (Misc) ----------
; Misc. things done if companion is hired and following, not waiting
;---------- Ready weapon when player does (from NCCS) ----------
if bTacticsAlert == 1 if IsWeaponOut == 0 && Player.IsWeaponOut == 1 SetAlert 1 elseif IsWeaponOut == 1 && IsInCombat == 0 && Player.IsWeaponOut == 0 SetAlert 0 endif endif
End

scn BDDPanBarkBoulderPearlScript
int DoOnce
begin OnTriggerEnter player
if (BDDPanRef.bHired == 1) && (BDDPanRef.Waiting == 0) && (Player.IsInCombat != 1) if (DoOnce == 0) BDDPanREF.Sayto player, DPanBoulderBarkPearlSt set DoOnce to 1 Disable MarkForDelete endif endif
end

scn abdxKateQuestScript
;---------- Version Management ----------
short iScriptVersion int abKateActive
;---------- Misc. Variables ----------
int bFlag; General variable for whatever is needed float fAngle; For setting angles of moved objects float fWarpDistance; Dynamic based on follow distance and combat
Begin GameMode
;;;StopQuest abdxKateQuest ;;;RETURN ; disable for now
;---------- SCRIPT INITIALIZATION / UPGRADE ----------
if iScriptVersion < 1
Set iScriptVersion to 1
;---------- Master Quest Variables ----------
Set abdxMasterQuest.bTravelColorado to 1 ;;;Set abdxMasterQuest.bTravelMojave to 1 ;;; for Testing
;---------- Add holdout/improved holdout weapons to form lists ----------
; The following 4 flags control holdout companion weapons ; Set them according to weapon types and the rest of the plugin works
Set AbdxKateRef.bMeleeHoldout to 1 Set AbdxKateRef.bMeleeImprovedHoldout to 1 Set AbdxKateRef.bRangedHoldout to 0 Set AbdxKateRef.bRangedImprovedHoldout to 1
if AbdxKateRef.bMeleeHoldout AddFormToFormList NVHoldoutWeapons AbdxKateWeapMelee endif if AbdxKateRef.bMeleeImprovedHoldout AddFormToFormList NVImprovedHoldoutWeapons AbdxKateWeapMelee endif
if AbdxKateRef.bRangedHoldout AddFormToFormList NVHoldoutWeapons AbdxKateWeapRanged endif if AbdxKateRef.bRangedImprovedHoldout AddFormToFormList NVImprovedHoldoutWeapons AbdxKateWeapRanged endif
;---------- The companion/half-ghoul Kate starts in Colorado ----------
; TESTING ;;;;abdxKateRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade abdxKateIdleMarkerHomeRef ;;;;abdxKateRef.EVP
endif
;---------- COMPANION REFERENCE DEAD OR DISABLED ----------
if abdxKateRef.GetDisabled == 1 Return endif
;---------- PLAYER REFERENCE OBJECT CHECKS ----------
; If player acquired companion items due to game glitch, remove them
if Player.GetItemCount AmmoCompanion > 0 Player.RemoveItem AmmoCompanion 100 1 endif if Player.GetItemCount AbdxKateArmor > 0 Player.RemoveItem AbdxKateArmor 100 1 endif if Player.GetItemCount AbdxKateWeapMelee > 0 Player.RemoveItem AbdxKateWeapMelee 100 1 endif if Player.GetItemCount AbdxKateWeapRanged > 0 Player.RemoveItem AbdxKateWeapRanged 100 1 endif
;---------- INITIALIZE WARPING ----------
; Companion warping is not initialized until player has been in an ; exterior cell at least once. This ensures GetDistance works correctly.
if abdxKateRef.bWarpInitialized == 0 if Player.IsInInterior == 0 Set abdxKateRef.bWarpInitialized to 1 endif endif
;---------- DEATH TIMER (Remove corpse in 24 hours) ----------
if abdxKateRef.bDead == 1 if GameDaysPassed > abdxKateRef.fTimerDeath abdxKateRef.disable 2 abdxKateRef.MarkForDelete StopQuest abdxKateQuest endif Return endif
;---------- UNCONSCIOUS ----------
if abdxKateRef.bUnconscious == 1 Return Endif
;---------- COMPANION GEAR MAINTENANCE ----------
; Auto-restore non-playable lost companion equipment ; Don't auto-restore items if we are under a ban, or if they are stowed
if AbdxKateRef.bBanItems == 0
if AbdxKateRef.bTacticsStowWeapons == 0 if AbdxKateRef.GetItemCount AmmoCompanion == 0 AbdxKateRef.AddItem AmmoCompanion 1 endif if AbdxKateRef.GetItemCount AbdxKateWeapMelee == 0 AbdxKateRef.AddItem AbdxKateWeapMelee 1 endif if AbdxKateRef.GetItemCount AbdxKateWeapRanged == 0 AbdxKateRef.AddItem AbdxKateWeapRanged 1 endif else if AbdxKateRef.GetItemCount AbdxKateWeapMelee > 0 AbdxKateRef.RemoveItem AbdxKateWeapMelee 100 endif if AbdxKateRef.GetItemCount AbdxKateWeapRanged > 0 AbdxKateRef.RemoveItem AbdxKateWeapRanged 100 endif endif
if AbdxKateRef.bTacticsStowArmor == 0 if AbdxKateRef.GetItemCount AbdxKateArmor == 0 AbdxKateRef.AddItem AbdxKateArmor 1 endif else if AbdxKateRef.GetItemCount AbdxKateArmor > 0 AbdxKateRef.RemoveItem AbdxKateArmor 100 endif endif
endif
;---------- TERMINATE AUTO-WAIT ----------
; If companion is auto-waiting, auto-rejoin party when conditions are right
if abdxKateRef.bAutoWait == 1
; Boyd's interrogation room at Camp McCarran if abdxKateRef.bAutoWaitBoydRoom == 1 if VFreeformMcCarran2.bPlayerInInterrogationRoom == 0 SetStage abdxKateQuest 51 Set abdxKateRef.bAutoWait to 0 Set abdxKateRef.bAutoWaitBoydRoom to 0 endif endif
; Fort Arena if abdxKateRef.bAutoWaitFortArena == 1 if VMS34.ArenaDuelEnabled == 0 SetStage abdxKateQuest 51 Set abdxKateRef.bAutoWait to 0 Set abdxKateRef.bAutoWaitFortArena to 0 endif endif
; Fort Summit (Caesar's Tent) if abdxKateRef.bAutoWaitFortSummit == 1 Set bFlag to 1 if Player.GetInWorldspace TheFortWorld if ( Player.GetInSameCell FortCaesarRef ) || ( Player.GetInSameCell FortLuciusRef ) if ( FortPraetorianTentGuardRef.GetDead == 0 ) && ( GetStageDone VMQ02 110 == 0 ) ; We still need to auto-wait so clear flag Set bFlag to 0 endif endif endif if bFlag == 1 SetStage abdxKateQuest 51 Set abdxKateRef.bAutoWait to 0 Set abdxKateRef.bAutoWaitFortSummit to 0 endif endif
; Lucky 38 (Various restricted areas) if abdxKateRef.bAutoWaitL38 == 1 SetStage abdxKateQuest 60 ; Check/Set bAutoWaitL38Open if ( abdxKateRef.bAutoWaitL38Open == 1 ) || ( ( Player.GetInWorldspace Lucky38World == 0 ) && ( Player.GetInCell Lucky38BasementFloorB2 == 0 ) && ( Player.GetInCell Lucky38ControlRoom == 0 ) ) SetStage abdxKateQuest 51 Set abdxKateRef.bAutoWait to 0 Set abdxKateRef.bAutoWaitL38 to 0 endif endif
endif
;---------- NORMAL WAITING (Quit and go home after timer expires) ----- -----
if abdxKateRef.Waiting == 1 if GameDaysPassed > abdxKateRef.fTimerWait ;ShowMessage abdxKateMesgQuit this is vague and non-standard. Added specific message boxes --KAZ 11/19/12 SetStage abdxKateQuest 30 Set abdxKateRef.bQuit to 1 SetStage abdxKateQuest 31 if abdxMasterQuest.bTravelMojave abdxKateRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade abdxKateIdleMarkerHomeRef showmessage abdxKateMesgFired else abdxKateRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade abdxKateIdleMarkerLibraryRef showmessage abdxKateMesgFiredBoulder endif abdxKateRef.ResetAI endif Return endif
;---------- RESTORE CONFISCATED ITEMS, IF APPROPRIATE ----------
; Only check individual scenarios if a ban is currently in place
if abdxKateRef.bBanItems
; Companion got fired if abdxKateRef.bHired == 0 SetStage abdxKateQuest 40 Set abdxKateRef.bBanItems to 0 Set abdxKateRef.bBanItemsFort to 0 Set abdxKateRef.bBanItemsGomorrah to 0 Set abdxKateRef.bBanItemsSilverRush to 0 Set abdxKateRef.bBanItemsTops to 0 Set abdxKateRef.bBanItemsUltraLuxe to 0 Return endif
; Fort (Main gate and weather station) if abdxKateRef.bBanItemsFort == 1 if FortEquipmentConfiscationQuest.bFortEquipmentStored == 0 SetStage abdxKateQuest 40 Set abdxKateRef.bBanItems to 0 Set abdxKateRef.bBanItemsFort to 0 Return endif endif
; Gomorrah if abdxKateRef.bBanItemsGomorrah == 1 if vDialogueGomorrah.iInGomorrah == 0 SetStage abdxKateQuest 40 Set abdxKateRef.bBanItems to 0 Set abdxKateRef.bBanItemsGomorrah to 0 Return endif endif
; Silver Rush if abdxKateRef.bBanItemsSilverRush == 1 if VFSSimonREF.SimonSearched == 0 SetStage abdxKateQuest 40 Set abdxKateRef.bBanItems to 0 Set abdxKateRef.bBanItemsSilverRush to 0 Return endif endif
; Tops if abdxKateRef.bBanItemsTops == 1 if ( vDialogueTops.PlayerFrisked == 0 ) || ( VMQTops.bSwankGuns ) SetStage abdxKateQuest 40 Set abdxKateRef.bBanItems to 0 Set abdxKateRef.bBanItemsTops to 0 Return endif endif
; Ultra Luxe if abdxKateRef.bBanItemsUltraLuxe == 1 if VMS18.bPlayerFrisked == 0 SetStage abdxKateQuest 40 Set abdxKateRef.bBanItems to 0 Set abdxKateRef.bBanItemsUltraLuxe to 0 Return endif endif
endif
;---------- 'BREADCRUMB' DYNAMIC WARPING SYSTEM ----------
; Check status to ensure warping is allowed
if ( abdxKateRef.bWarpInitialized == 0 ) || ( abdxKateRef.bTacticsWarpOn == 0 ) || ( abdxKateRef.bHired == 0 ) || ( abdxKateRef.Waiting == 1 ) if abdxKateRef.iWarpCountdown > 0 Set abdxKateRef.iWarpCountdown to 0 endif if abdxKateRef.iWarpCooldown > 0 Set abdxKateRef.iWarpCooldown to 0 endif Return; Don't allow warping endif
; If companion is out of range, player leaves a breadcrumb trail ; Warp companion to breadcrumb if distance not closed before time is up ; Cooldown period before initiating another warp timer sequence ; Companion won't get lost, but won't warp too often either
;---------- Dynamic warp range based on follow distance and combat ----------
if abdxKateRef.IsFollowingLong == 1 ; On follow long our radius twice as wide before warping if abdxKateRef.IsInCombat == 1 Set fWarpDistance to ( 2304.0 ); +50% radius in combat else Set fWarpDistance to ( 1536.0 ) endif else ; On follow default our radius is smaller before warping if abdxKateRef.IsInCombat == 1 Set fWarpDistance to ( 1152.0 ); + 50% radius in combat else Set fWarpDistance to ( 768.0 ) endif endif
;---------- Warp timer is running ----------
if abdxKateRef.iWarpCountdown > 0 if abdxKateRef.GetDistance Player <= fWarpDistance ; Cancel pending warp Set abdxKateRef.iWarpCountdown to 0 Set abdxKateRef.iWarpCooldown to 3 else Set abdxKateRef.iWarpCountdown to ( abdxKateRef.iWarpCountdown - 1 ) if abdxKateRef.iWarpCountdown == 0 abdxKateRef.EVP abdxKateRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade abdxKateIdleMarkerWarpRef Set abdxKateRef.iWarpCooldown to 3 else ; Breadcrumb follows player abdxKateIdleMarkerWarpRef.MoveTo Player Set fAngle to Player.GetAngle Z abdxKateIdleMarkerWarpRef.SetAngle Z fAngle endif endif endif
;---------- Cooldown / Start New Warp Timer ----------
if abdxKateRef.iWarpCooldown > 0 Set abdxKateRef.iWarpCooldown to ( abdxKateRef.iWarpCooldown - 1) elseif abdxKateRef.iWarpCountdown == 0 if abdxKateRef.GetDistance Player > fWarpDistance ;---------- Start new warp timer ---------- Set abdxKateRef.iWarpCountdown to 2 abdxKateIdleMarkerWarpRef.MoveTo Player Set fAngle to Player.GetAngle Z abdxKateIdleMarkerWarpRef.SetAngle Z fAngle endif endif
;=====================FEROCIOUS LOYALTY EFFECT==============================
if player.HasPerk FerociousLoyalty if Player.GetHealthPercentage < 0.5 If (abdxKateRef.bHired) == 1 && abKateActive == 0 abdxKateREF.AddSpell FerociousLoyaltyEffect Set abKateActive to 1 EndIf endif
if Player.GetHealthPercentage >= 0.5 if (abdxKateRef.bHired) == 1 && abKateActive == 1 abdxKateREF.RemoveSpell FerociousLoyaltyEffect Set abKateActive to 0 EndIf EndIf Endif
End

scn abLesterChat1SCR
Begin ontrigger player
playsound abLesterChat1 disable
END

scn abLesterChat2SCR
Begin ontrigger player
playsound abLesterChat2 disable
END

scn abLesterChat3SCR
Begin ontrigger player
playsound abLesterChat3 disable
END

scn abLesterChat4SCR
short doonce
Begin onadd player
if doonce == 0 playsound abLesterChat4 set doonce to 1 endif
END

scn abLesterLockSCR
Begin ontrigger player
abZAXdoorREF.setopenstate 0 abZAXdoorREF.lock 255 disable
END

scn BDDPanBarkBoulderRogueCampScript
int DoOnce
begin OnTriggerEnter player

scn abNovaRepairSCR ; 07/07/12 MoBurma - rewrote bits of this to fix bugs. Needed OR instead of ANDS. Some genius had also used getPERMav instead of GetActorValue. short abGenRepairDone
Begin onactivate player

If abSergeantTalkQ.abNovaFixQStarted ==1 && abGenRepairDone == 0 && player.GetActorValue repair >= 70 set abSergeantTalkQ.abNovaRepairDone to 1 showmessage abNoveRepairMSG3 setstage abNovaQuest 80 set abGenRepairDone to 1 endif
If abSergeantTalkQ.abNovaFixQStarted ==1 && abGenRepairDone == 0 && player.GetActorValue repair && < 70 player.getitemcount abNovaGenParts < 1 || player.getitemcount abNovaGenParts2 < 1 || player.getitemcount abNovaGenParts3 < 1 showmessage abNoveRepair2MSG setstage abNovaQuest 60 setstage abNovaQuest 70 endif
END

scn abIAAlbinoAntPoisonEffectScript

begin ScriptEffectStart
set myself to GetSelf
if myself == player float randomTime set randomTime to 5.0 + 20.0/99.0 * GetRandomPercent set timerEffect to randomTime ShowMessage FixerDizzyMsg PlaySound FXPoisonStinger endif
end

set myself to GetSelf
if myself == player if timerEffect <= 0 PlaySound FXPoisonStinger ;ApplyImageSpaceModifier BarkScorpionPoisonISFX set timerEffect to 5.0 + 20/99.0 *GetRandomPercent else set timerEffect to (timerEffect - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
end

scn abFrankoSaySCR
short doonce short doonce2 short abFrankoSpeak short abtimerOn float abtimer
Begin ontrigger player
if CricketRef.GetDead == 1 ; no point in scene if PC kills her on way - KAZ 8/14/12 disable markfordelete return endif
if doonce == 0 abFrankoREF.sayto abYoungREF abFrankoSayto set doonce to 1 endif
if getstage abCricketsQuest == 40 && doonce2 == 0
setstage BDCricketmudialogue 30 ; Trash the lab! KAZ 8/14/12
if BDDpanREF.bhired == 1 BDDpanREF.disable BDDpanREF.moveto abCompanionWaitMarker BDDpanREF.enable Set BDDPanRef.Waiting to 1 Set BDDPanRef.fTimerWait to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) BDDPanRef.EVP endif
if LenoreREF.bhired == 1 LenoreREF.disable LenoreREF.moveto abCompanionWaitMarker LenoreREF.enable Set LenoreRef.Waiting to 1 Set LenoreRef.fTimerWait to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) LenoreRef.EVP endif
if abdxKateRef.bhired == 1 abdxKateRef.disable abdxKateRef.moveto abCompanionWaitMarker abdxKateRef.enable Set abdxKateRef.Waiting to 1 Set abdxKateRef.fTimerWait to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) abdxKateRef.EVP endif
setstage abCricketsQuest 50 set abGuileTalkQ.abpacks to 1 player.moveto abplayermarker disableplayercontrols abFrankoREF.disable abFrankoREF.moveto abFrankoMarker abFrankoREF.enable abYoungRef.disable abYoungRef.moveto abYoungMarker abYoungRef.enable abFrankoREF.addscriptpackage abFrankoScene1 abYoungREF.addscriptpackage abYoungScene1 MuREF.disable MuREF.moveto abMuMarker MuREF.enable MuREF.addscriptpackage abMuScene1 MuREF.setrestrained 1 CricketREF.removescriptpackage BDCricketMuWork CricketREF.removescriptpackage BDCricketMuSleep CricketREF.removescriptpackage abCricketFollowPlayerClose CricketREF.disable CricketREF.moveto abCricketMarker CricketREF.enable CricketREF.addscriptpackage abCricketScene1 CricketREF.look abFrankoRef set abFrankoSpeak to 1 set doonce2 to 1 endif
END
Begin gamemode
if GetStage abcricketsquest >= 90 ;Clean up. 90 is failure, 95 is Franko dead, 100 is complete. KAZ 8/16/12 disable markfordelete return
endif
if abtimerOn < 10 && abFrankoSpeak == 1 set abtimer to abtimer + getsecondspassed endif
if abtimer > 3 && abtimerOn == 0 abFrankoREF.sayto CricketREF abFrankoCricket1 set abtimerOn to 1 endif
if abtimer > 13 && abtimerOn == 1 CricketREF.stoplook CricketREF.look MuREF CricketREF.sayto MuREF CriMuKOed MuREF.damageav perceptioncondition 1000 MuREF.damageav health 1000 playsound WPNRifleSniperFire3D set abtimerOn to 2 endif
if abtimer > 14 && abtimerOn == 2 set abtimerOn to 3 endif
if abtimer > 16 && abtimeron == 3 CricketREF.sayto MuREF Murder CricketRef.pms GlowingOneFXShader abFrankoREF.additem WeapPowerFist 1 abFrankoREF.equipitem WeapPowerFist 1 set abtimeron to 4 endif
if abtimer > 18 && abtimerOn == 4 abFrankoREF.playidle VATSH2HAttackPowerMidSection set abtimerOn to 6 endif
if abtimer > 19.5 && abtimerOn == 6 CricketREF.stoplook CricketRef.Look abFrankoRef CricketREF.playidle LooseMQ11SarahLyonsDeath ;CricketREF.setunconscious 1 set abtimerOn to 7 endif
if abtimer > 23 && abtimerOn == 7 abFrankoREF.sayto CricketREF abFrankoCricket2 set abtimerOn to 8 endif
if abtimer > 47 && abtimerOn == 8 imod fadetoblackandbackquickisfx set abtimeron to 9 endif
if abtimer > 49 && abtimeron == 9 set abGuileTalkQ.abFrankoMet to 1 CricketREF.disable abFrankoREF.setrestrained 0 abFrankoREF.disable abFrankoREF.unequipitem WeapPowerFist abFrankoREF.removeitem WeapPowerFist 1 abFrankoREF.moveto abFrankoMarker2 abFrankoREF.enable abYoungREF.setrestrained 0 abYoungREF.disable abYoungREF.moveto abYoungMarker2 abYoungREF.enable abFrankoREF.evp abYoungREF.evp enableplayercontrols ;set abGuileTalkQ.abFrankoStage to 3 ;set abGuileTalkQ.abYoungStage to 3 setstage abCricketsQuest 100 set abtimerOn to 11 set abFrankoSpeak to 0 set abGuileTalkQ.abpacks to 0 Player.AddItem caps001 300 ; Since he rewards the player for other methods, I figure he'd do it for this. KAZ 8/16/12
if LenoreREF.bhired == 1 set LenoreRef.Waiting to 0 LenoreRef.EVP endif
if BDDpanREF.bhired == 1 set BDDPanRef.Waiting to 0 BDDPanRef.EVP BDDPanRef.SayTo Player DPanBoulderBarkFrankoMurder ;DP comments on murder endif
if abdxKateRef.bhired == 1 set abdxKateRef.Waiting to 0 abdxKateRef.EVP endif
disable markfordelete
endif
END

if getisid abFranko == 1 || getisid abYoung == 1 if BDCricketMuDialogue.FrankoCanDie == 0 ; Once PC hears Cricket's side, quest can be finished by killing Franko - KAZ 8/16/12 setstage abCricketsQuest 90 else setstage abCricketsQuest 24 endif if GetObjectiveDisplayed abCricketsQuest 40 == 1 ; Cricket being lured, doesn't know Franko is enemy BobGhoulRef.RemoveFromFaction BDCricketFaction ; Bob is too far away to be witness SetEnemy BDCricketFaction PlayerFaction ; Cricket mistakes PC for enemy SetStage BDCricketMuDialogue 30 ; BOS has trashed lab setstage abCricketsQuest 90 ; Fail quest endif endif

ScriptName abdxKate3QuestScript
; Kate3, Human, Cameo appearance at Old Mormon Fort, Freeside ; She appears if player enters Fort before heading to Airplane Graveyard.
short bOnce int iTravel; 0=waiting for player, 1=walking, 2=running float fTimer
Begin GameMode
; Kate3 is her earliest incarnation so get her setup in Old Mormon Fort if ( bOnce == 0 ) Set bOnce to 1 abdxKate3Ref.Enable abdxKate3Ref.MoveToMarkerWithFade abdxKateIdleMarkerHomeRef abdxKate3Ref.AddScriptPackage abdxKate3PackageWait abdxKate3Ref.EVP endif
; If the Player does not visit Old Mormon Fort before the Airplane Graveyard, ; remove Kate3 from the scene and skip this quest. if ( abdxMasterQuest.bGraveyardPlayerArrived ) abdxKate3Ref.Disable abdxKate3Ref.MarkForDelete StopQuest abdxKate3Quest Return endif
; Kate died or was attacked by player? if ( abdxMasterQuest.bCameoKateDied || abdxMasterQuest.bCameoKateAttacked ) if ( abdxMasterQuest.bCameoKateDied ) SetObjectiveDisplayed abdxKate3Quest 20 0 SetStage abdxKate3Quest 255 StopQuest abdxKate3Quest Return endif if ( abdxKate3Ref.GetUnconscious || abdxKate3Ref.GetKnockedState ) Return endif if abdxKate3Ref.IsInCombat Return endif abdxKate3Ref.Disable 1 abdxKate3Ref.MarkForDelete SetStage abdxKate3Quest 255 StopQuest abdxKate3Quest Return endif
; Begin cameo appearance/travel package, if player enters Old Mormon Fort if ( iTravel == 0 ) && ( abdxKate3Ref.GetInSameCell Player ) Set iTravel to 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed abdxKate3Quest 10 1 Set abdxMasterQuest.bCameoStarted to 1 abdxKate3Ref.RemoveScriptPackage abdxKate3PackageWait abdxKate3Ref.AddScriptPackage abdxKate3PackageTravelWalk abdxKate3Ref.EVP Set fTimer to GameDaysPassed Return endif
; Check if unconscious or in combat. if ( abdxKate3Ref.GetUnconscious || abdxKate3Ref.GetKnockedState ) Return endif if abdxKate3Ref.IsInCombat Return endif
; If Kate and the player meet and she's not busy, she says, "Excuse me, pardon me," etc. ; The player can also invoke the greeting by trying to talk to her. if ( iTravel > 0 ) && ( abdxKate3Ref.GetDistance Player < 330 ) && ( abdxMasterQuest.nCameoGreetings < 3 ) abdxKate3Ref.SayTo abdxKate3Ref GREETING endif
; Switch from walking to running after a short time. if ( iTravel == 1 ) && ( GameDaysPassed > ( fTimer + 0.014 ) ) Set iTravel to 2 abdxKate3Ref.RemoveScriptPackage abdxKate3PackageTravelWalk abdxKate3Ref.AddScriptPackage abdxKate3PackageTravelRun abdxKate3Ref.EVP Return endif
; Fade out sequence.
if ( iTravel == 2 ) && ( GameDaysPassed > ( fTimer + 0.015 ) ) Set iTravel to 3 SetObjectiveCompleted abdxKate3Quest 10 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed abdxKate3Quest 20 1 Return endif
if ( iTravel == 3 ) SetObjectiveCompleted abdxKate3Quest 20 1 abdxKate3Ref.Disable 1 abdxKate3Ref.MarkForDelete SetStage abdxKate3Quest 250 StopQuest abdxKate3Quest Return endif
End

ScriptName abdxMasterQuestScript
; This script has the control variables that track the progress of Kate's quests.
; Where you see the initials RJH, the variable needs to be set externally ; after Kate's plugin is merged with the main Boulder Dome plugin.
; Set variables according to Player progress in the Boulder Dome main quest, ; where required.
;----- Freeside Kate Cameo Appearance (Do not touch) -----
short bCameoStarted ; Player triggered cameo by entering Old Mormon Fort short bCameoKateAttacked ; Player attacked Kate short bCameoKateDied ; Kate died int nCameoGreetings ; Number of times Kate's cameo GREETING is spoken.
;----- Airplane Graveyard Kate (RJH: set these when merging) -----
short bGraveyardPlayerArrived ; RJH set to 1 when Player arrives in the Airplane Graveyard
short bGraveyardPlayerDeparted ; RJH set to 1 after Player departs the Airplane Graveyard
;----- Airplane Graveyard Kate (Do not touch) -----
short bGraveyardKateFreed ; Player freed Kate from jail short bGraveyardKateEscorted ; Player escorted Kate out of the area short bGraveyardKateDenied ; Player said no to getting her freed short bGraveyardKateTaunted ; Player taunted Kate while she was in in jail short bGraveyardKateAttacked ; Player attacked Kate short bGraveyardKateDied ; Kate died
;----- Colorado/Companion Kate (RJH: set these when merging) -----
short bTravelColorado ; RJH: 1=Player can fire Kate to Colorado, 0=cannot ; RJH: Only change it if required by the main quest. ; The default is 1. ; You might not need to change it at all.
short bTravelMojave ; RJH: 1=Player can fire Kate to Mojave locations, 0=cannot ; RJH: The default is 0, it must be set to 1 when Mojave travel is avaiable.
;----- Colorado/Companion Kate (Do not touch) -----
short bLightHeart ; Kate's light heart restored
int nBooks ; Number of pre-war books Kate has read

ScriptName abdxKate2QuestScript
short bPlayerIsHelping short bFollowingPlayer short bFollowingGuard short bWaiting
int iSelfExit
Begin GameMode
;; if bFollowingPlayer ;; if abdxKate2Ref.GetDistance abdxKate2DestinationRef < 512 ;; abdxKate2Ref.SayTo abdxKate2Ref abdxKate2Stage21A ;; Set bFollowingPlayer to 0 ;; Set bWaiting to 1 ;; abdxKate2Ref.ResetAI ;; abdxKate2GuardRef.Disable 1 ;; abdxKate2GuardRef.MarkForDelete ;; SetStage abdxKate2Quest 21 ;;;moved to abKateDestinationSCR ;; endif ;; endif
;;;;;if abdxMasterQuest.bGraveyardPlayerDeparted ;;;;;entries disabled here by RJH, apr3 ;;;;if bFollowingPlayer || bWaiting ;;;;SetStage abdxKate2Quest 21 ; Ends quest ;;;;Return ;;;;else ;;;;SetStage abdxKate2Quest 255 ; Ends quest ;;;;Return ;;;;endif ;;;;;endif
; Kate makes her own way out. if iSelfExit > 0 ; Give Kate time to finish her speech to the guard if iSelfExit == 2 ; say if i only had a brain Set bFollowingGuard to 1 abdxKate2Ref.EVP abdxKate2GuardRef.EVP elseif iSelfExit == 3 abdxKate2Ref.SayTo abdxKate2Ref abdxKate2Stage30C elseif iSelfExit == 4 SetStage abdxKate2Quest 31 ; Ends quest Return endif Set iSelfExit to iSelfExit + 1 endif
End

; For story immersion, Kate can die and be looted. ; For appearance, Kate does not wear her C.A.T. goggles, she wears eyeglasses. ; If she dies, the Inert C.A.T. goggles get added. ; The eyeglasses prevent Kate equipping the goggles if she dies.

scn MHBoulderDoorSwapSCRIPT
short DoOnce short Button
Begin OnActivate If IsActionRef Player == 1 && DoOnce == 0 Activate Set DoOnce to 1 ShowMessage MHBoulderDoorActivatorMSG EndIf End
Begin GameMode If DoOnce == 1 Set Button to GetButtonPressed
If Button == 0 StartQuest MHBoulderDomeDoorTimer ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlack9sISFX PlaySound MHBoulderDomeDestroyDoor
Set DoOnce to 2 ElseIf Button == 1 Set DoOnce to 0 EndIf EndIf End

scn MHBoulderDomeDoorTimerQuestScript
float timer float fQuestDelayTime
short doOnce
begin gamemode set fQuestDelayTime to 0.001
if ( doOnce ) return elseif( timer > 5 ) set doOnce to 1 MHBoulderDoorSwap.enable StopQuest MHBoulderDomeDoorTimer else set timer to timer + getSecondsPassed endif end

scn MHBoulderTwinsFirstContactQUESTScript
short DoOnce Float timer
Begin GameMode
If DoOnce == 0 Set DoOnce to 1 PlaySound MHBoulderToyStoreIntro01 ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX
EndIf
If timer < 1 && DoOnce == 1 Set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed else ApplyIMageSpaceModifier vault106HallucinationISFX MHBoulderTwinsEnable.enable Set DoOnce to 2 StopQuest MHBoulderTwinsFirstContact
EndIf End

scn MHBoulderTwinsFirstExitQUESTScript
short DoOnce Float timer
Begin GameMode
If DoOnce == 0 Set DoOnce to 1 PlaySound MHBoulderToyStoreIntro02 ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickISFX MHBoulderTwinLisaREF.AddScriptPackage MHBoulderLisaGoToMarker MHBoulderTwinLouiseREF.AddScriptPackage MHBoulderLouiseGoToMarker
EndIf
If timer < 2 && DoOnce == 1 Set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed else RemoveImageSpaceModifier vault106HallucinationISFX EnablePlayerControls MHBoulderTwinsEnable.disable Set DoOnce to 2 StopQuest MHBoulderTwinsFirstExitQUEST
SetObjectiveDisplayed MHBoulderTwinsDialog 10 1
EndIf End

scn abBlakeDeathSCR
short abFightStarted
Begin onhit player
if getstage abMonsterBQ2 < 30
setenemy abBOSfaction playerfaction startcombat player
if getstage abMonsterBloodQ < 90 setstage abMonsterBloodQ 90 endif
if getstage abMonsterBQ2 < 90 setstage abMonsterBQ2 95 endif
if getstage abBurntRubber < 90 setstage abBurntRubber 90 endif
endif
if abFightstarted == 0 && getstage abMonsterBQ2 > 10 startcombat player setenemy abBlakeFaction playerfaction set abFightstarted to 1 endif
END

END

scn abPennyTableSCR
float abtimer int isactivated
Begin OnActivate
if IsActionRef player if isactivated == 0 && abPennyREF.getincell abBosHallStairs == 1 imod FadeToBlackandBackQuickISFX set isactivated to 1 else showmessage abPennyTableNOmsg endif endif
END
Begin GameMode
If isactivated == 1 if abtimer < 2 set abtimer to abtimer + getsecondspassed else showmessage abPennyHealMSG player.resethealth ;abPennyREF.sayto player WillHealYouTopic set isactivated to 0 set abtimer to 0 endif endif
END

scn MHAndroidElevatorSCRIPT
; Elevator position (0 = up, 1 = down) short position
; the switch ref self
;The elevator ref linkedRef
begin onactivate
;setup set self to getself set linkedRef to getlinkedref
;checks the elevators position so it plays the correct animation and makes sure its not allready moving if position == 0 && linkedRef.isanimplaying == 0
;changes the light on the switch self.setopenstate 1
;set position to 1 so that the script knows the elevator is down set position to 1
; If sound refuses to play using the animation, uncoment the next line to force it with the script playsound MHAndroidElevatorActivate
;starts the elevator moving linkedRef.playgroup forward 1
elseif position == 1 && linkedRef.isanimplaying == 0
self.setopenstate 0 set position to 0 ; If sound refuses to play using the animation, uncoment the next line to force it with the script playsound MHAndroidElevatorActivate linkedRef.playgroup backward 1
endif
end

scn MHBoulderGlowingOneSCRIPT
int iDead float iTimer float iTimer2 short DoOnce
begin GameMode
if getdead == 0
if iTimer2 > 1
RestoreActorValue Health 2 set iTimer2 to 0 else set iTimer2 to iTimer2 + GetSecondsPassed
endif
if iTimer > 3 set iTimer to 0 PlaceAtMe vGlowingOneRadiationAuraExplosion else set iTimer to iTimer + GetSecondsPassed endif endif
if getdead == 1 && DoOnce == 0 StartQuest MHBoulderGhoul01ExitQuest
Set DoOnce to 1 endif
end

scn abLift1SCR
float abtimer short abGM short abGM2 short abDown
Begin onactivate
if abDown == 0 && abElevator1REF.isanimplaying backward == 0 abLiftControlREF.playgroup left 1 abElevator1REF.playgroup forward 1 abLiftDoorTop.disable playsound abElevatorSound set abGM to 1 set abDown to 1
elseif abDown == 1 && abElevator1REF.isanimplaying forward == 0 abLiftControlREF.playgroup backward 1 abElevator1REF.playgroup backward 1 abLiftDoorBottom.disable playsound abElevatorSound set abGM2 to 1 set abDown to 0 endif
END
Begin Gamemode
if abGM == 1 set abtimer to abtimer + getsecondspassed endif
if abtimer > 16 && abGM == 1 abLiftDoorBottom.enable set abtimer to 0 set abGM to 0 endif
if abGM2 == 1 set abtimer to abtimer + getsecondspassed endif
if abtimer >16 && abGM2 == 1 abLiftDoorTop.enable set abtimer to 0 set abGM2 to 0 endif
END

EndIf End

scn abChimpGas1SCR
short doonce
Begin onactivate player
if doonce == 0 && player.getitemcount abChimpGas > 0 && abChimp1.getdead == 0 abChimp1.killactor abChimp1.setunconscious 1 endif
if doonce == 0 && player.getitemcount abChimpGas > 0 && abChimp3.getdead == 0 abChimp3.killactor abChimp3.setunconscious 1 endif
if doonce == 0 && player.getitemcount abChimpGas > 0 && abChimp4.getdead == 0 abChimp4.killactor abChimp4.setunconscious 1 endif
if doonce == 0 && player.getitemcount abChimpGas > 0 && abChimp5.getdead == 0 abChimp5.killactor abChimp5.setunconscious 1 endif
if doonce == 0 && player.getitemcount abChimpGas > 0 && abChimp6.getdead == 0 abChimp6.killactor abChimp6.setunconscious 1 endif

END

scn abChimpProdScript
Begin OnHit
Ref ChimpProdTarget Set ChimpProdTarget to GetOwnerLastTarget
If ChimpProdTarget.GetIsID abEvilChimpBare == 1 && abChimpVariablesQ.abChimpStunTime == 0 && ChimpProdTarget.getdead == 0 ChimpProdTarget.killactor set abChimpVariablesQ.abChimpStunned to 1 elseIf ChimpProdTarget.GetIsID abEvilChimpBrain == 1 && abChimpVariablesQ.abChimpStunTime == 0 && ChimpProdTarget.getdead == 0 ChimpProdTarget.killactor set abChimpVariablesQ.abChimpStunned to 1 ElseIf ChimpProdTarget.GetIsID abEvilChimpPower == 1 && abChimpVariablesQ.abChimpStunTime == 0 && ChimpProdTarget.getdead == 0 ChimpProdTarget.killactor set abChimpVariablesQ.abChimpStunned to 1 EndIf
End

scn abChimpDeathStunSCR
Begin ondeath
if abChimpVariablesQ.abChimpStunned == 1 setunconscious 1 set abChimpVariablesQ.abChimpStunned to 0 endif
if getdeadcount abEvilChimpBare >= 10 && getdeadcount abEvilChimpBrain >= 6 && getdeadcount abEvilChimpPower >= 7 set abchimpvariablesq.abbreetalk to 2
if abchimp1.getdead == 1 && abchimp2.getdead == 1 && abchimp3.getdead == 1 && abchimp4.getdead == 1 && abchimp5.getdead == 1 && abchimp6.getdead == 1 && abchimp7.getdead == 1 && abchimp8.getdead == 1 && abchimp9.getdead == 1 && abchimp10.getdead == 1 && abchimp11.getdead == 1 && abchimp12.getdead == 1 && abchimp13.getdead == 1 && abchimp14.getdead == 1 && abchimp15.getdead == 1 && abchimp16.getdead == 1 && abchimp17.getdead == 1 && abchimp18.getdead == 1 && abchimp19.getdead == 1 && abchimp20.getdead == 1 && abchimp21.getdead == 1 && abchimp22.getdead == 1 && abchimp23.getdead == 1
showmessage abChimpsDeadMSG setstage abLesterQuest 40 set abGuileTalkQ.abLesterEndStage to 1 abHarold2REF.disable abHaroldRoomDoorREF.lock 255 ;;showmessage abChimpTestKillMSG ;;;DELETE THIS set abChimpVariablesQ.abChimpStunTime to 1
else
abChimpEXTgate.unlock set abChimpVariablesQ.abGateTime to 1
setstage abLesterQuest 31
set abChimpVariablesQ.abChimpStunTime to 1
endif endif
END

if doonce == 0 && player.getitemcount abChimpGas > 0 && abChimp23.getdead == 0 abChimp23.killactor abChimp23.setunconscious 1 endif
if doonce == 0 && player.getitemcount abChimpGas > 0 playsound abFablerGasLeak abChimpSmokeB1.enable abChimpSmokeB2.enable abChimpSmokeB3.enable abChimpSmokeB4.enable abChimpSmokeB5.enable player.removeitem abChimpGas 1 set doonce to 1 showmessage abChimpGas1MSG set abGuileTalkQ.abCGas3 to 1 endif

scn abChimpLeaveQuestSCR
float chimptimer short abStage1 short abstage2 short abstage3 short abstage4 short abstage5 short abstage6 short abstage7 short abstage8 short abendstage
Begin gamemode
;;don't do 15, 16 or 17, as these have already been told to leave
set chimptimer to chimptimer + getsecondspassed
if abstage1 == 0 if abchimp1.getunconscious == 1 abchimp1.disable ab2chimp1.enable endif if abchimp2.getunconscious == 1 abchimp2.disable ab2chimp2.enable endif set abstage1 to 1 endif
if chimptimer > 5 && abstage2 == 0 if abchimp3.getunconscious == 1 abchimp3.disable ab2chimp3.enable endif if abchimp4.getunconscious == 1 abchimp4.disable ab2chimp4.enable endif if abchimp5.getunconscious == 1 abchimp5.disable ab2chimp5.enable endif if abchimp6.getunconscious == 1 abchimp6.disable ab2chimp6.enable endif set abstage2 to 1 endif
if chimptimer > 10 && abstage3 == 0 if abchimp7.getunconscious == 1 abchimp7.disable ab2chimp7.enable endif if abchimp8.getunconscious == 1 abchimp8.disable ab2chimp8.enable endif set abstage3 to 1 endif
if chimptimer > 15 && abstage4 == 0 if abchimp9.getunconscious == 1 abchimp9.disable ab2chimp9.enable endif if abchimp10.getunconscious == 1 abchimp10.disable ab2chimp10.enable endif if abchimp11.getunconscious == 1 abchimp11.disable ab2chimp11.enable endif set abstage4 to 1 endif
if chimptimer > 20 && abstage5 == 0 if abchimp12.getunconscious == 1 abchimp12.disable ab2chimp12.enable endif if abchimp13.getunconscious == 1 abchimp13.disable ab2chimp13.enable endif if abchimp14.getunconscious == 1 abchimp14.disable ab2chimp14.enable endif set abstage5 to 1 endif
if chimptimer > 25 && abstage6 == 0 if abchimp18.getunconscious == 1 abchimp18.disable ab2chimp18.enable endif if abchimp19.getunconscious == 1 abchimp19.disable ab2chimp19.enable endif set abstage6 to 1 endif
if chimptimer > 30 && abstage7 == 0 if abchimp20.getunconscious == 1 abchimp20.disable ab2chimp20.enable endif if abchimp21.getunconscious == 1 abchimp21.disable ab2chimp21.enable endif if abchimp22.getunconscious == 1 abchimp22.disable ab2chimp22.enable endif set abstage7 to 1 endif
if chimptimer > 35 && abstage8 == 0 if abchimp23.getunconscious == 1 abchimp23.disable ab2chimp23.enable endif set abstage8 to 1 endif
if chimptimer > 50 && abstage8 == 1 set abendstage to 1 set abstage8 to 2 endif
if abendstage == 1 abChimpEXTgate.setopenstate 0 abChimpEXTgate.lock 255 abBrainEXTcollmarker.enable enableplayercontrols stopquest abChimpLeaveQuest setstage abLesterQuest 40 set abGuileTalkQ.abLesterEndStage to 2 abHarold2REF.disable abHaroldRoomDoorREF.lock 255 set abendstage to 0 endif
END

scn abWaitBattleSCR
short doonce short doonce2

elseif abWakeTimer > 3 abPodGlassREF.disable abSarahStaticREF.disable
if BDDpanREF.bhired == 1 BDDpanREF.disable BDDpanREF.moveto abDeadpanStayFinal BDDpanREF.enable Set BDDPanRef.Waiting to 1 Set BDDPanRef.fTimerWait to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) BDDPanRef.EVP endif

if abdxKateRef.bhired == 1 abdxKateRef.disable abdxKateRef.moveto abKateStayFinal abdxKateRef.enable Set abdxKateRef.Waiting to 1 Set abdxKateRef.fTimerWait to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) abdxKateRef.EVP endif
player.moveto abPlayerWait2Marker DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 0 0 1 abGhoulHaroldREF.disable set abGuileTalkQ.abHaroldStand to 4 abGhoulHaroldREF.moveto abHaroldWakeStand abGhoulHaroldREF.enable abSarahREF.moveto abSarahWakeStand abSarahREF.enable abGhoulHaroldREF.evp abGhoulHaroldREF.setrestrained 1 endif
END

scn abHaroldsBattleSCR
short doonce5 short doonce1 short doonce2 short doonce3 short doonce4 short stoptime float timer
Begin gamemode
if doonce1 == 0 && abHGB1.getdead == 1 && abHGB2.getdead == 1 abHGB6.enable abHGB7.enable set doonce1 to 1 endif
if doonce5 == 0 && abHGB3.getdead == 1 && abHGB4.getdead == 1 && abHGB5.getdead == 1 && abHGB1a.getdead == 1 && abHGB2b.getdead == 1 abHGB8.enable abHGB9.enable abHGB10.enable abHGB11.enable abHGB12.enable abHGB13.enable abHGB14.enable set doonce5 to 1 endif
if doonce2 == 0 && abHGB8.getdead == 1 && abHGB9.getdead == 1 && abHGB10.getdead == 1 && abHGB11.getdead == 1 && abHGB12.getdead == 1 && abHGB13.getdead == 1 && abHGB14.getdead == 1 abHGB15.enable abHGB16.enable abHGB17.enable abHGB18.enable abHGB19.enable abHGB20.enable abHGB21.enable abHGB22.enable abHGB23.enable set doonce2 to 2 endif
if doonce3 == 0 && abHGB15.getdead == 1 && abHGB16.getdead == 1 && abHGB17.getdead == 1 && abHGB18.getdead == 1 && abHGB19.getdead == 1 && abHGB20.getdead == 1 && abHGB21.getdead == 1 && abHGB22.getdead == 1 && abHGB23.getdead == 1 abHGB24.enable abHGB25.enable abHGB26.enable abHGB27.enable abHGB28.enable abHGB29.enable abHGB30.enable set doonce3 to 1 endif
if doonce4 == 0 && getdeadcount abHaroldsBattleTroops == 23 && getdeadcount abHaroldsFerals == 9 imod fadetoblackandbackquickisfx abDespot3REF.disable abDespotREF.disable abDespot4REF.enable setstage abHaroldsQuest 50 set doonce4 to 1 endif
if stoptime == 1 set timer to timer + getsecondspassed endif
if stoptime == 1 && timer > 10 player.moveto abplayerendmarker2 enableplayercontrols setstage abHaroldsQuest 55 abGHarold3REF.enable abSarah2REF.enable abKillSarahREF.enable set abGuileTalkQ.Harold3Time to 1 set stoptime to 0 stopquest abDespotEndq endif
if stoptime == 1 && timer > 5 imod fadetoblackpermanent endif
END

scn abNovaQuestScript ; 05/0712 MoBurma - Added this as I really needed a gamemode for ending Kate's rescue.
Begin Gamemode

if GetObjectiveDisplayed abNovaQuest 105 == 1 && player.getitemcount abKateDFkey ; Tell player to get key off dead Renato SetObjectiveCompleted abNovaQuest 105 1 setstage abNovaQuest 110 endif
if Player.getitemcount abNovaGenParts > 0 && Player.getitemcount abNovaGenParts2 > 0 && Player.getitemcount abNovaGenParts3 > 0 && getobjectivedisplayed abNovaQuest 60 == 1 ; check player has all parts on them. This gets around them having them BEFORE quest started and getting stuck. SetObjectiveCompleted abNovaQuest 60 1 setstage abNovaQuest 70 endif end

scn BDBoulderSimpleLightScript
ref Me
Begin GameMode
set Me to GetSelf
if (Me.GetDisabled == 1) && (GetCurrentTime >= 7) && (GetCurrentTime < 23) Me.Enable 4
elseif (Me.GetDisabled == 0) && (GetCurrentTime >= 23) || (GetCurrentTime < 7) Me.Disable 4 endif
End

scn BDProjectorActScript
int iButton int DoOnce ; prevents PC from getting two points from projector
begin OnActivate if (IsActionRef Player) && (GetQuestRunning BDBoulderGremlin) showMessage BDProjectorActMesgMenu endif End
begin GameMode
If Player.GetInCell abiaBoulderMain != 1 Return
Else set iButton to GetButtonPressed if iButton == 0 Return elseif iButton == 1 if Player.getAv Perception < 7 showMessage BDProjectorActMesgFiberLow else showMessage BDProjectorActMesgFiber set BDBoulderGremlin.Fiber to 1 SetObjectiveCompleted BDBoulderGremlin 20 1 ; optional to check projector endif elseif iButton == 2 if Player.getAv Repair < 40 showMessage BDProjectorActMesgTamperLow else showMessage BDProjectorActMesgTamper set BDBoulderGremlin.CheckProj to 1 if DoOnce == 0 set DoOnce to 1 SetObjectiveCompleted BDBoulderGremlin 20 1 if BDBoulderGremlin.JackieGremtalk || BDBoulderGremlin.NickyGremtalk ; talk to either plus investgate projector SetObjectiveCompleted BDBoulderGremlin 10 1 if GetObjectiveCompleted BDBoulderGremlin 15 SetStage BDBoulderGremlin 10 endif endif endif endif set iButton to -1 endif
endif End

scn BDGremlinEggNestScript

begin OnActivate if (IsActionRef Player) && (GetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderGremlin 40) showMessage BDGremlinEggNestMenu endif End
begin GameMode
If Player.GetInCell abDeathClawCave != 1 Return Else set iButton to GetButtonPressed if iButton == 0 Return elseif iButton == 1 Player.AddItem BDGremlinEggs 1 SetObjectiveCompleted BDBoulderGremlin 40 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderGremlin 50 1 NormBarrel.Disable GremBarrel.Enable endif endif
End

elseif SamGRef.GetInCell abGhoulDinerCell == 0 && HasLunch == 1 SamGRef.RemoveItem WaterPurified 1 SamGRef.RemoveItem SalisburySteak 1 Set HasLunch to 0

endif

scn BDAndreScript
int HasLunch int bDoOnce ; Used to reset his scriptpackage once Connie is gone as I don't think follow packages have a finish state. int bAndreGave ; 24/06/12 MoBurma - new var to tidy up quest objectives nicely. Lets us know when player got book as reward rather than stole. float DeathTimer
begin GameMode
if AndreRef.GetDead == 1 if (DeathTimer > 0) && (GameDaysPassed > DeathTimer) if Player.GetItemCount BDAndreKey == 0 ; if PC doesn't get to corpse on time, key can be picked up off his desk. DeadAndreKeyRef.Enable DeadAndreHatRef.Enable endif disable 2 MarkForDelete endif endif endif
if Player.GetInCell abiabouldermain == 1 && (AndreRef.GetRestrained == 1) AndreRef.SetRestrained 0 endif
if AndreRef.GetInCell abGhoulDinerCell == 1 && HasLunch == 0 AndreRef.AddItem WaterPurified 1 AndreRef.AddItem SalisburySteak 1 Set HasLunch to 1
elseif AndreRef.GetInCell abGhoulDinerCell == 0 && HasLunch == 1 AndreRef.RemoveItem WaterPurified 1 AndreRef.RemoveItem SalisburySteak 1 Set HasLunch to 0
endif
if BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.GremlinCaught && bDoOnce == 0 ; 24/06/12 MoBurma - clean up the Connie exile scene and set him back to normal behaviour. removescriptpackage evp set bDoOnce to 1 endif
if BDBoulderEnterDome.bExilebegin && ConnieRef.getdead ; 24/06/12 MoBurma - if the player kills Connie as she leaves, reset Andre onactivate state as he won't aggro as Connie no longer in faction. set BDBoulderEnterDome.bExilebegin to 0 endif
END
begin OnActivate
if BDBoulderEnterDome.bExilebegin && getdead == 0 return else activate endif
END
begin OnDeath
SetStage BDBoulderCodesQuest 20 if getquestrunning BDCarolineTrade == 0 SetStage BDCarolineTrade 255 endif
Set DeathTimer to (GameDaysPassed+1) set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderDeath to 1 if GetFactionRelation Player == 1 setstage BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric 50 endif
endif
End

scn BDConnieScript
int DoOnce int HasLunch
begin OnActivate ; 24/06/12 MoBurma - used to stop the player interrupting exile scene
if BDBoulderEnterDome.bExilebegin && Getdead == 0 return else activate endif end
begin OnDeath
stopquest BDConnieQuest
set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderDeath to 1 ConnieRef.RemoveItem BDConnieGremlinAnimationBear 5
if getobjectivedisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 50 && getobjectivecompleted BDBoulderCodesQuest 50 == 0 && getitemcount BDDomeLogBook == 0 ; 24/06/12 MoBurma - added here as well in case companion/deathclaw kills her. additem BDDomeLogBook 1 setobjectivedisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 55 1 endif
if GetFactionRelation Player == 1 setstage BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric 50 endif
return
END
begin MenuMode
if (GameHour < 2) || (GameHour > 4) if DoOnce == 1 set DoOnce to 0 endif endif
if IsPCSleeping == 1 if (GetStage BDBoulderGremlin == 20) && (Player.GetItemCount BDConnieEvidence > 0) Player.RemoveItem BDConnieEvidence 5 1 set BDBoulderGremlin.Stolen to 1 endif endif
END
begin GameMode
if ConnieRef.GetInCell abGhoulDinerCell == 1 && HasLunch == 0 ConnieRef.AddItem WaterPurified 1 ConnieRef.AddItem SalisburySteak 1 Set HasLunch to 1
elseif ConnieRef.GetInCell abGhoulDinerCell == 0 && HasLunch == 1 ConnieRef.RemoveItem WaterPurified 1 ConnieRef.RemoveItem SalisburySteak 1 Set HasLunch to 0 endif ;==============================GREMLIN QUEST=========================
If BDBoulderGremlin.PCDetected == 1 return endif
if GetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderGremlin 25 if (Gamehour >= 2) && (Gamehour <= 4) if DoOnce == 0 && (ConnieRef.GetDetected Player == 0) && (Player.GetInCell abiaBoulderIntLibrary == 0) && (BDBoulderGremlin.PCDetected == 0) set BDBoulderGremlin.ConnieOut to 1 ConnieRef.AddScriptPackage BDConnieGremlinPkg set DoOnce to 1 endif elseif (GameHour < 2) || (GameHour > 4) if DoOnce == 1 set DoOnce to 0 endif endif endif
if (ConnieRef.GetIsCurrentPackage BDConnieGremlinPkg) && (ConnieRef.GetDetected Player == 1) ConnieRef.RemoveScriptPackage BDConnieGremlinPkg ConnieRef.AddScriptPackage BDConnieGremlinConfront endif
if (ConnieRef.GetIsCurrentPackage BDConnieGremlinExile) && (Player.GetDistance ConnieRef < 100) ConnieRef.Sayto Player Greeting endif
if ConnieRef.GetInCell abiaBoulderIntLibrary && BDBoulderGremlin.ConnieOut == 1 set BDBoulderGremlin.ConnieOut to 0 FireflyRef.EVP endif
if ConnieRef.GetItemCount BDConnieGremlinAnimationBear > 0 if BDBoulderGremlin.ConnieDetected == 1 || ConnieRef.IsIdlePlaying == 0 ConnieRef.RemoveItem BDConnieGremlinAnimationBear 5 endif endif
if ConnieRef.GetItemCount BDConnieGremlinAnimationBear > 0 if Player.GetLOS ConnieRef set BDBoulderGremlin.ConnieDetected to 1 ; showmessage BDConnieBearTestDetect endif endif
END

Lucia2Ref.MoveTo LuciaHomeMarker NickyRef.MoveTo WorkshopMarker 100 0 0 JackieRef.MoveTo WorkshopMarker 50 0 0 PeteyRef.MoveTo WorkshopMarker AndreRef.MoveTo GigiClinicWaitMarker AndreaRef.MoveTo GigiClinicWaitMarker 0 30 0 GigiRef.MoveTo GigiHome ;ConnieRef.MoveTo GremlinAppearRef
Lucia2Ref.EVP NickyRef.EVP JackieRef.EVP PeteyRef.EVP AndreRef.EVP AndreaRef.EVP GigiRef.EVP ; ConnieRef.EVP this interferres with add script for gremlin tamper
if GetStage BDBoulderGremlin 10 && BDBoulderGremlin.ConnieOut == 1 if (Gamehour >= 2) && (Gamehour <= 4) FireflyRef.MoveTo ParkSandboxRef FireflyRef.EVP endif endif set DoOnce to 1 endif else if DoOnce == 1 set DoOnce to 0 endif
endif
End

int DoOnce int SelfDefense ; 1 = PC was attacked and can kill FF to end Dullahan quest float Timer ; Gives 10 sec retaliation window for Player if Firefly starts fight first. Prevents town from attacking PC. int aggrocount ; 26/06/12 Moburma give the player one more change to reason with Firefly before he kicks off. Can be used in future to increase the number of retries. by setting in dialogue
Begin OnDeath

if getitemcount BDFireflyHead == 0 AddItem BDFireflyHead 1 ; 26/06/12 Moburma - Moved from Fingers quest. Removed all conditions for this - his head will now ALWAYS be spawned so the quest can be completed. set BDFingersBountyQuest.AddFFlyHead to 1 endif

elseif SelfDefense == 1 if GetQuestRunning BDDullahanQuest SetStage BDDullahanQuest 150 endif endif

Controls story if PC has not heard whole thing.

scn BDLenoreScript
; General purpose companion script ; ; Based on combining elements of the following scripts: ; 1. RoseofSharonCassidyScript ; 2. VNPCFollowersQuestSCRIPT ; ; This script is self contained: all companion-specific references from ; VNPCFollowersQuestSCRIPT are moved here so this script does not ; have to reference any other quest or object.
;---------- Script Version Management ----------
int iScriptVersion ; Allows feature upgrades, more than just a simple Do-Once
;---------- Companion Wheel Variables ----------
; From RoseofSharonCassidyScript ; Used by game engine to remember companion wheel settings ; Also used in some AI packages
int CombatStyleMelee int CombatStyleRanged int FollowerSwitchAggressive int IsFollowingDefault int IsFollowingLong int Waiting ;=======================SPECIAL LENORE VARIABLES======================
ref MyHealth ; used for altering Lenore's base health when DP is also hired, since modAV isn't working right
;---------- Companion Status Variables ----------
; Copied from VNPCFollowersQuestSCRIPT and RoseofSharonCassidyScript
int bAvailable; Can be hired? int bDead; Dead? ; int bFired; Fired? - Replaced with bBoulder and bJacobstown - KAZ int bHired; Hired? (i.e. in party) int bJoinedPartyOnce; Ever join party? int bL38; Fired to Lucky 38? int bBoulder; Fired to Boulder. int bJacobstown; Fired to Jacobstown int bQuit; Ever quit party?
;---------- Companion Timer and Warping Variables ----------
; Timers and warping are handled in the Companion Quest script, ; but variables are kept here on a per-companion basis.
float fTimerDeath; ; Cleanup corpse in 24 hours if companion dies float fTimerWait; ; Default is 7 days
; Warping is handled in Companion Quest Script, but variables are kept here
int bWarpInitialized; Player has been outside at least once int iWarpCountdown; Wait before warping, companion may catch up int iWarpCooldown; Wait after warping before allowing it again
;---------- Non-Playable Companion Weapon Holdout Flags ----------
int bMeleeHoldout int bMeleeImprovedHoldout int bRangedHoldout int bRangedImprovedHoldout
;---------- Advanced Tactics Dialogue (Player Configurable) ----------
int bTacticsAlert; Draw weapon when player does - CUT int bTacticsWaitSandbox; Sandbox while waiting int bTacticsWarpOn; Use warping - CUT (used all the time) int bTacticsStowArmor; Non-playable companion armor int bTacticsStowWeapons; Non-playable companion weapons -CUT int bTacticsCheating; Ignored banned locations & items -CUT
;---------- Follow Restrictions ----------
; Companion auto-waits if player enters a restricted area
int bAutoWait; Companion is auto-waiting
; Variables track the specific scenario
int bAutoWaitBoydRoom; Carrie Boyd's Interrogation Room int bAutoWaitFortArena; Fort Arena when player fights int bAutoWaitFortSummit; Caesar's Tent int bAutoWaitL38; Lucky 38 Penthouse, etc. int bAutoWaitL38Open; Lucky 38, all areas open to companions
;---------- Equipment Restrictions ----------
int bBanItems; Companion banned items are removed
; Variables track the specific scenario
int bBanItemsFort; Banned item patdown int bBanItemsGomorrah; Weapon patdown int bBanItemsSilverRush; No weapons allowed int bBanItemsTops; Weapon patdown int bBanItemsUltraLuxe; Weapon patdown
;---------- Self-Healing Variables ----------
; Misc. working variables
float fHealth; Health percentage int bCrippled; 1=Crippled, 0=Not int bPoisoned; 1=Poisoned, 0=Not int bUnconscious; 1=Knocked out or unconscious
int iHealType int nHealHealth; Points of health restored int nHealCondition; Per cent of limb healed (max 100)
;---------- Personal Quest Variables ----------
short bTravelMojave; Can fast travel to Mojave?
Begin OnActivate
If GetStage BDLenoreQuest < 10 If Player.GetAv Intelligence > 3 showmessage BDLenoreInspect elseif Player.GetAv Intelligence <= 3 showmessage BDLenoreInspect2 endif SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDPanLenoreQuest 10 1 set BDDPanLenoreQuest.LiveCat to 1 LenoreRef.SayTo Player Hello else Activate endif END
Begin OnCombatEND
; Free cure poison, health and limb restoration
Dispel BarkScorpionPoison Dispel CazadorPoison Dispel DeathClawPoison Dispel DLC03FeralGhoulPoison Dispel DLC03RadScorpion3Poison Dispel NightstalkerPoison Dispel RadScorpion1Poison Dispel RadScorpion2Poison
resethealth
restoreav perceptioncondition 100 restoreav endurancecondition 100 restoreav leftattackcondition 100 restoreav leftmobilitycondition 100 restoreav rightattackcondition 100 restoreav rightmobilitycondition 100
END
Begin OnDeath If LenoreRef.bHired == 1 ShowMessage BDLenoreMesgDeath SetStage BDLenoreQuest 30 SetStage BDLenoreQuest 31 endif
SetStage BDDpanLenoreQuest 30 Set LenoreRef.bDead to 1 Set LenoreRef.fTimerDeath to ( GameDaysPassed + 1.0 ) SetStage BDLenoreQuest 255
End
;----------------------------------------------------------------------
Begin GameMode
;---------- PLUGIN INITIALIZATION / UPGRADE ----------
if iScriptVersion < 1
if iScriptVersion < 1 Set iScriptVersion to 1
;---------- Follow and Combat Style Defaults ----------
Set IsFollowingLong to 0 Set IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set CombatStyleMelee to 1 SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee Set FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0 SetAV Aggression 0 Set bTacticsWarpOn to 1
endif
endif
; If dead or unconscious, companion can't do anything
if GetDisabled Return endif
if bDead == 1 Return endif
if GetAV Health < 1 || GetUnconscious || (GetKnockedState == 1) if bUnconscious == 0 Set bUnconscious to 1 endif Return elseif bUnconscious == 1 Set bUnconscious to 0 endif
;---------- INITIATE AUTO-WAIT ----------
if bAutoWait == 0 && bhired == 1 && Waiting == 0
; Boyd's interrogation room at Camp McCarran if VFreeformMcCarran2.bPlayerInInterrogationRoom SetStage BDLenoreQuest 50 Set bAutoWait to 1 Set bAutoWaitBoydRoom to 1 Return endif
; Fort Arena (During a duel) if VMS34.ArenaDuelEnabled SetStage BDLenoreQuest 50 Set bAutoWait to 1 Set bAutoWaitFortArena to 1 Return endif
; Fort Summit (Caesar's Tent) if Player.GetInWorldspace TheFortWorld if ( Player.GetInSameCell FortCaesarRef ) || ( Player.GetInSameCell FortLuciusRef ) if ( FortPraetorianTentGuardRef.GetDead == 0 ) && ( GetStageDone VMQ02 110 == 0 ) SetStage BDLenoreQuest 50 Set bAutoWait to 1 Set bAutoWaitFortSummit to 1 Return endif endif endif
; Lucky 38 (Various restricted areas) if bAutoWaitL38Open == 0 if ( Player.GetInWorldspace Lucky38World ) || ( Player.GetInCell Lucky38BasementFloorB2 ) || ( Player.GetInCell Lucky38ControlRoom ) SetStage BDLenoreQuest 60 ; Check/Set bAutoWaitL38Open if bAutoWaitL38Open == 0 SetStage BDLenoreQuest 50 Set bAutoWait to 1 Set bAutoWaitL38 to 1 Return endif endif endif
endif
;---------- CONDITIONS CLEANUP ----------
; Cleanup leftover conditions for unhired or waiting companion
if ( bHired == 0 ) || ( Waiting == 1 ) if IsSneaking == 1 SetForceSneak 0 endif if IsWeaponOut == 1 && IsInCombat == 0 SetAlert 0 endif Return; Not hired, or waiting, don't continue script endif
;---------- INITIATE EQUIPMENT RESTRICTIONS (Casino, Fort, etc...) ----------
if bTacticsCheating == 0 && bBanItems == 0 && bHired == 1 && Waiting == 0
; Fort (Main gate and weather station) if FortEquipmentConfiscationQuest.bFortEquipmentStored SetStage BDLenoreQuest 43 SetStage BDLenoreQuest 44 Set bBanItems to 1 Set bBanItemsFort to 1 endif
; Gomorrah if vDialogueGomorrah.iInGomorrah SetStage BDLenoreQuest 43 Set bBanItems to 1 Set bBanItemsGomorrah to 1 Return endif
; Silver Rush if VFSSimonREF.SimonSearched SetStage BDLenoreQuest 42 Set bBanItems to 1 Set bBanItemsSilverRush to 1 Return endif
; Tops if vDialogueTops.PlayerFrisked && ( VMQTops.bSwankGuns == 0 ) SetStage BDLenoreQuest 43 Set bBanItems to 1 Set bBanItemsTops to 1 Return endif
; Ultra Luxe if VMS18.bPlayerFrisked SetStage BDLenoreQuest 43 Set bBanItems to 1 Set bBanItemsUltraLuxe to 1 Return endif
endif
End

scn BDLenoreTrainQuestScript
int Train ; 1 == abominations, 2 == animals, 3 == bugs, 4 == humanoid int StartTrain int doOnce
int TimerA int TimerB int TimerC
begin GameMode
if (LenoreRef.bDead == 1) || (BDDPanRef.bDead == 1) StopQuest BDLenoreTrainQuest return endif
if StartTrain == 1&& DoOnce == 0
set TimerB to GameDaysPassed set TimerC to (TimerB - TimerA) if TimerC >= 3 if Train == 1 LenoreRef.AddPerk BDLenorePerkAbo showmessage BDLenoreMesgPerkAbo elseif Train == 2 LenoreRef.AddPerk BDLenorePerkAni ShowMessage BDLenoreMesgPerkAni elseif Train == 3 LenoreRef.AddPerk BDLenorePerkBug ShowMessage BDLenoreMesgPerkBug elseif Train == 4 LenoreRef.AddPerk BDLenorePerkHum Showmessage BDLenoreMesgPerkHum endif
if BDDPanRef.bTravelMojave == 1 SetStage BDLenoreTrainQuest 70
elseif BDDPanRef.bTravelMojave == 0 SetStage BDLenoreTrainQuest 60
set doOnce to 1 endif endif endif
END

scn BDCricketMuDialogueScript
int GhoulsHome ; 1 = Mu is getting ferals, 2 = Mu is escorting ferals, 3 = ferals have made it home, 4 = Mu home int DoOnce int EnableOnce int QuestDone ; Cricket made a decision about ferals, blocks questions. int CatBalls ; allows PC to ask about Tom's sex (for "Cat's in the Crater" quest) int FrankoSuggestsFakeMeeting int FrankoCanDie ; if he's killed, quest won't fail int NoStop ; prevents player from interrupting conversation int Teleports ; counts Mu and Ferals teleporting to Feral home float MuTimer ; send Mu back to lab after freeing ferals since packages are so damn glitchy

scn BDDPanSexBarkScript
; dummied out Easter egg. I thought it was funny how companions just stay there for sex scenes w/o so much as a snarky a comment.
int SexBark
begin GameMode
if BDDPanRef.bHired == 1 && BDDPanRef.GetInSameCell Player
;This covers Benny, Fisto, Beatrix, Santiago, Red Lucy, Joana, Sarah, Sweetie, Maude, or Jimmy ; Could't find scripts for Old Ben.
; Benny
if GetQuestRunning vBennySexTimer == 1 && SexBark == 0 set SexBark to 1 elseif GetQuestRunning vBennySexTimer == 0 && SexBark == 1 BDDPanRef.SayTo Player DPanBarkSex endif
;Fisto
if GetQuestRunning FistoFX == 1 && SexBark == 0 ; PC forgot to dismiss DP before sex, lol set SexBark to 1 elseif GetQuestRunning FistoFX == 0 && SexBark == 1 ; PC is done screwing BDDPanRef.SayTo Player DPanBarkSex endif
;Beatrix
if GetQuestRunning BeatrixFX == 1 && SexBark == 0 set SexBark to 1 elseif GetQuestRunning BeatrixFX == 0 && SexBark == 1 BDDPanRef.SayTo Player DPanBarkSex endif
;Santiago
if GetQuestRunning SantiagoFX == 1 && SexBark == 0 set SexBark to 1 BDDPanRef.SayTo Player DPanBarkSex ;TEST!!! FIX LATER!!! elseif GetQuestRunning SantiagoFX == 0 && SexBark == 1 ;BDDPanRef.SayTo Player DPanBarkSex endif
;Red Lucy
if VMS38RedLucyRoomCodeBox.bSex==1 && SexBark == 0 set SexBark to 1 elseif VMS38RedLucyRoomCodeBox.bSex == 0 && SexBark == 1 BDDPanRef.SayTo Player DPanBarkSex endif
;Joana
if VMS21JoanaRoomCodeBox.bSexScene == 1 && SexBark == 0 set SexBark to 1 elseif VMS21JoanaRoomCodeBox.bSexScene == 0 && SexBark == 1 BDDPanRef.SayTo Player DPanBarkSex endif
;Sarah
if VSarahSexCodeBox.bSexScene == 1 && SexBark == 0 set SexBark to 1 elseif VSarahSexCodeBox.bSexScene == 0 && SexBark == 1 BDDPanRef.SayTo Player DPanBarkSex endif
;Sweetie, Maude, or Jimmy (Casa Madrid)
if Player.GetInSameCell MaudeRef || Player.GetInSameCell SweetieRef || Player.GetInSameCell JimmyRef if IsImageSpaceActive FadeToBlack4sISFX && SexBark == 0 Set Sexbark to 1 elseif IsImageSpaceActive FadeToBlack4sISFX == 0 && SexBark == 1 BDDPanRef.SayTo Player DPanBarkSex endif endif
endif
End
