scn BDBoulderGhoulsGenericScript
int MarkBand ; heard his band name int MindyBand ; heard her band name int Dream ; Used to cycle through Petey's dream greetings int RepairKit ; Player recieved weapon repair kit from Gofer Gang int BoxyTalk ; PC has talked to Boxy and realizes that she only says "Meow." int GremlinCaught int GoferGang ; PC heard about the Gofer Gang at least once (to streamline conversation) int BoulderDeath ; Someone died int BoulderRep ; tracks reputation, 0 being neutral int GigiGameTalk ; asked Gigi if she knows games. Controls dialog for playing Caravan.
int Invasion ; PC has found out about invasion. Commence countdown. int CountdownA int CountdownB int CountdownC int doonce int TownGone ; Toggles whether invader bodies disappear. If whole town is gone, corpses stay
int MapGone ; PC has stolen map of Boulder from squad int LuciaOkay ; Lucia feels better after getting photo back.
int ConnieDecode ; Connie will translate the book. Has to be this quest, since Gremlin gets stopped int DecodeA ; timer int DecodeB int DecodeC int DecodeDone
begin GameMode
;====================CONNIE DECODE LOG=============================
if ConnieDecode == 1 && (DecodeDone == 0) set DecodeB to GameDaysPassed set DecodeC to (DecodeB - DecodeA) if (DecodeC >= 1) set DecodeDone to 1 endif endif
;=====================ENABLE DS INVADERS============================
if Invasion == 0 return endif
if Invasion == 1 && doOnce == 0 set CountdownB to GameDaysPassed set CountdownC to (CountdownB - CountdownA) if (CountdownC >= 2) if Player.HasPerk WildWasteland == 1 MamasBoyRef.Enable else DSInvader10.Enable endif if (Player.GetInCell abiabouldermain == 1) && (DoOnce == 0) DSInvader1.Enable DSInvader2.Enable DSInvader3.Enable DSInvader4.Enable DSInvader5.Enable DSInvader6.Enable DSInvader7.Enable DSInvader8.Enable DSInvader9.Enable set doOnce to 1 endif endif endif
END

ScriptName BDBoulderDoctorHealSCRIPT
int HasLunch
;--------------------------COPIED FROM DoctorTemplateSCRIPT--------------------------------------------------------- short DoOnce ;Script blocker float Timer ;Timer used for animation control
;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
begin OnDeath
set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderDeath to 1 if GetFactionRelation Player == 1 setstage BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric 50 endif return
End
BEGIN GameMode
if AndreaRef.GetInCell abGhoulDinerCell == 1 && HasLunch == 0 AndreaRef.AddItem WaterPurified 1 AndreaRef.AddItem SalisburySteak 1 Set HasLunch to 1
elseif AndreaRef.GetInCell abGhoulDinerCell == 0 && HasLunch == 1 AndreaRef.RemoveItem WaterPurified 1 AndreaRef.RemoveItem SalisburySteak 1 Set HasLunch to 0 endif
;=======DOCTOR STUFF=====================================
; When set to 1, plays medical animations for eight seconds then restarts conversation with the player
if GetAV Variable01 == 1 if ( DoOnce== 0 ) setrestrained 1 disablePlayerControls sayto player BDMedHealing set Timer to 8 set DoOnce to 1 PlayIdle LooseDoctorHealPlayer endif
set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed )
if ( Timer <= 6 ) && ( DoOnce == 1 ) IMod FadeToBlackISFX set DoOnce to 2 endif
if ( Timer <= 0 ) && ( IsImagespaceActive FadeToBlackISFX == 0 ) setstage BDBoulderDoctor 10 setrestrained 0 enablePlayerControls if GetAV Variable01 == 1 SetAv Variable01 0 endif Set DoOnce to 0 StartConversation player BDMedHealed endif
endif
;When set to 1, plays medical animations for eight seconds then restarts conversation with the player
if ( GetAV Variable01 == 2 ) if ( DoOnce== 0 ) disablePlayerControls sayto player BDMedHealing set Timer to 8 set DoOnce to 1 PlayIdle LooseDoctorHealPlayer endif
set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed )
if ( Timer <= 6 ) && ( DoOnce == 1 ) IMod FadeToBlackISFX set DoOnce to 2 endif
if ( Timer <= 0 ) && ( IsImagespaceActive FadeToBlackISFX == 0 ) setstage BDBoulderDoctor 20 enablePlayerControls SetAv Variable01 3 Set DoOnce to 0 StartConversation player BDMedHealed endif
endif
END

scn BDLenoreQuestScript
;---------- Version Management ----------
int iVersion ; Format = abbccdd ; a.bb = New Vegas Version ; cc.dd = Plugin Version ; e.g. 1040300 = version 1.4.3.0 (New Vegas v1.4, Plugin v3.0) ; Allows feature upgrades, more than just a simple Do-Once
int bTestMode ; 1=Enable to display additional test messages ; Set dynamically through Advanced Tactics dialogue
;---------- Misc. Variables ----------
int bFlag; General variable for whatever is needed float fAngle; For setting angles of moved objects float fWarpDistance; Dynamic based on follow distance and combat
int FLLenoreActive ; ALLOWS LENORE TO USE FEROCIOUS LOYALTY
Begin GameMode
;---------- SET TEST MODE ----------
; Test mode can also be set through dialogue ; Normally this line is commented out to default to 0 ; During development it can be uncommented to start in test mode
;;;;; Set bTestMode to 1
;---------- QUEST SCRIPT INITIALIZATION / UPGRADE ----------
if iVersion < 1040300
if iVersion < 1040300 Set iVersion to 1040300
;---------- Add holdout/improved holdout weapons to form lists ----------
; The following 4 flags control holdout companion weapons ; Set them according to weapon types and the rest of the plugin works
Set LenoreRef.bMeleeHoldout to 1 ;Set LenoreRef.bMeleeImprovedHoldout to 1
if LenoreRef.bMeleeHoldout ; AddFormToFormList NVHoldoutWeapons BDLenoreWeapMelee endif if LenoreRef.bMeleeImprovedHoldout ; AddFormToFormList NVImprovedHoldoutWeapons BDLenoreWeapMelee endif
;---------- Companion begins underground, move to home at start ----------
LenoreRef.ResetAI
endif
if iVersion < 1040301 Set iVersion to 1040301 endif
; Put this message last so the version number is properly updated first if bTestMode ;ShowMessage BDLenoreMesgTestModeEnabled iVersion endif
endif
;---------- PLAYER REFERENCE OBJECT CHECKS ----------
; If player acquired companion items due to game glitch, remove them
if Player.GetItemCount AmmoCompanion > 0 Player.RemoveItem AmmoCompanion 100 1 endif ;if Player.GetItemCount BDLenoreWeapMelee > 0 ; Player.RemoveItem BDLenoreWeapMelee 100 1 ;endif
;---------- INITIALIZE WARPING ----------
; Companion warping is not initialized until player has been in an ; exterior cell at least once. This ensures GetDistance works correctly.
if LenoreRef.bWarpInitialized == 0 if Player.IsInInterior == 0 Set LenoreRef.bWarpInitialized to 1 if bTestMode ;ShowMessage BDLenoreMesgWarpInitialized if LenoreRef.bTacticsWarpOn ; ShowMessage BDLenoreMesgWarpON else ; ShowMessage BDLenoreMesgWarpOFF endif endif endif endif
;---------- DEATH TIMER (Remove corpse in 24 hours) ----------
if LenoreRef.bDead if GameDaysPassed > LenoreRef.fTimerDeath LenoreRef.disable 2 LenoreRef.MarkForDelete StopQuest BDLenoreQuest endif Return; Don't continue script endif
;---------- UNCONSCIOUS ----------
if LenoreRef.bUnconscious if bTestMode ; ShowMessage BDLenoreMesgUnconscious endif Return; Don't continue script endif
;---------- COMPANION GEAR MAINTENANCE ----------
; Auto-restore non-playable lost companion equipment ; Don't auto-restore items if we are under a ban, or if they are stowed
if LenoreRef.bBanItems == 0
if LenoreRef.bTacticsStowWeapons == 0 ; if LenoreRef.GetItemCount BDLenoreWeapMelee == 0 ; LenoreRef.AddItem BDLenoreWeapMelee 1 ; endif else ; if LenoreRef.GetItemCount BDLenoreWeapMelee > 0 ; LenoreRef.RemoveItem BDLenoreWeapMelee 100 ; endif endif endif
;---------- TERMINATE AUTO-WAIT ----------
; If companion is auto-waiting, auto-rejoin party when conditions are right
if LenoreRef.bAutoWait
; Boyd's interrogation room at Camp McCarran if LenoreRef.bAutoWaitBoydRoom if VFreeformMcCarran2.bPlayerInInterrogationRoom == 0 SetStage BDLenoreQuest 51 Set LenoreRef.bAutoWait to 0 Set LenoreRef.bAutoWaitBoydRoom to 0 endif endif
; Fort Arena if LenoreRef.bAutoWaitFortArena if VMS34.ArenaDuelEnabled == 0 SetStage BDLenoreQuest 51 Set LenoreRef.bAutoWait to 0 Set LenoreRef.bAutoWaitFortArena to 0 endif endif
; Fort Summit (Caesar's Tent) if LenoreRef.bAutoWaitFortSummit Set bFlag to 1 if Player.GetInWorldspace TheFortWorld if ( Player.GetInSameCell FortCaesarRef ) || ( Player.GetInSameCell FortLuciusRef ) if ( FortPraetorianTentGuardRef.GetDead == 0 ) && ( GetStageDone VMQ02 110 == 0 ) ; We still need to auto-wait so clear flag Set bFlag to 0 endif endif endif if bFlag SetStage BDLenoreQuest 51 Set LenoreRef.bAutoWait to 0 Set LenoreRef.bAutoWaitFortSummit to 0 endif endif
; Lucky 38 (Various restricted areas) if LenoreRef.bAutoWaitL38 SetStage BDLenoreQuest 60 ; Check/Set bAutoWaitL38Open if ( LenoreRef.bAutoWaitL38Open ) || ( ( Player.GetInWorldspace Lucky38World == 0 ) && ( Player.GetInCell Lucky38BasementFloorB2 == 0 ) && ( Player.GetInCell Lucky38ControlRoom == 0 ) ) SetStage BDLenoreQuest 51 Set LenoreRef.bAutoWait to 0 Set LenoreRef.bAutoWaitL38 to 0 endif endif
endif
;---------- NORMAL WAITING (Quit and go home after timer expires) ----- -----
if LenoreRef.Waiting if GameDaysPassed > LenoreRef.fTimerWait if LenoreRef.bTravelMojave == 0 ShowMessage BDLenoreMesgFired LenoreRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade BDDPanIdleMarkerHomeRef else ShowMessage BDLenoreMesgFiredMojave LenoreRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade BDDpanIdleMarkerJacobstownRef endif SetStage BDLenoreQuest 30 Set LenoreRef.bQuit to 1 SetStage BDLenoreQuest 31 LenoreRef.ResetAI endif Return; Don't continue script if companion is waiting endif
;---------- RESTORE CONFISCATED ITEMS, IF APPROPRIATE ----------
; Only check individual scenarios if a ban is currently in place
if LenoreRef.bBanItems
; Companion got fired if LenoreRef.bHired == 0 SetStage BDLenoreQuest 40 Set LenoreRef.bBanItems to 0 Set LenoreRef.bBanItemsFort to 0 Set LenoreRef.bBanItemsGomorrah to 0 Set LenoreRef.bBanItemsSilverRush to 0 Set LenoreRef.bBanItemsTops to 0 Set LenoreRef.bBanItemsUltraLuxe to 0 Return endif
; Fort (Main gate and weather station) if LenoreRef.bBanItemsFort if FortEquipmentConfiscationQuest.bFortEquipmentStored == 0 SetStage BDLenoreQuest 40 Set LenoreRef.bBanItems to 0 Set LenoreRef.bBanItemsFort to 0 Return endif endif
; Gomorrah if LenoreRef.bBanItemsGomorrah if vDialogueGomorrah.iInGomorrah == 0 SetStage BDLenoreQuest 40 Set LenoreRef.bBanItems to 0 Set LenoreRef.bBanItemsGomorrah to 0 Return endif endif
; Silver Rush if LenoreRef.bBanItemsSilverRush if VFSSimonREF.SimonSearched == 0 SetStage BDLenoreQuest 40 Set LenoreRef.bBanItems to 0 Set LenoreRef.bBanItemsSilverRush to 0 Return endif endif
; Tops if LenoreRef.bBanItemsTops if ( vDialogueTops.PlayerFrisked == 0 ) || ( VMQTops.bSwankGuns ) SetStage BDLenoreQuest 40 Set LenoreRef.bBanItems to 0 Set LenoreRef.bBanItemsTops to 0 Return endif endif
; Ultra Luxe if LenoreRef.bBanItemsUltraLuxe if VMS18.bPlayerFrisked == 0 SetStage BDLenoreQuest 40 Set LenoreRef.bBanItems to 0 Set LenoreRef.bBanItemsUltraLuxe to 0 Return endif endif
endif
;---------- 'BREADCRUMB' DYNAMIC WARPING SYSTEM ----------
; Check status to ensure warping is allowed
if ( LenoreRef.bWarpInitialized == 0 ) || ( LenoreRef.bTacticsWarpOn == 0 ) || ( LenoreRef.bHired == 0 ) || ( LenoreRef.Waiting == 1 ) if LenoreRef.iWarpCountdown > 0 Set LenoreRef.iWarpCountdown to 0 endif if LenoreRef.iWarpCooldown > 0 Set LenoreRef.iWarpCooldown to 0 endif Return; Don't allow warping endif
; If companion is out of range, player leaves a breadcrumb trail ; Warp companion to breadcrumb if distance not closed before time is up ; Cooldown period before initiating another warp timer sequence ; Companion won't get lost, but won't warp too often either
;---------- Dynamic warp range based on follow distance and combat ----------
if LenoreRef.IsFollowingLong ; On follow long our radius twice as wide before warping if LenoreRef.IsInCombat Set fWarpDistance to ( 2304.0 ); +50% radius in combat else Set fWarpDistance to ( 1536.0 ) endif else ; On follow default our radius is smaller before warping if LenoreRef.IsInCombat Set fWarpDistance to ( 1152.0 ); + 50% radius in combat else Set fWarpDistance to ( 768.0 ) endif endif
;---------- Warp timer is running ----------
if LenoreRef.iWarpCountdown > 0 if LenoreRef.GetDistance Player <= fWarpDistance ; Cancel pending warp Set LenoreRef.iWarpCountdown to 0 Set LenoreRef.iWarpCooldown to 3 if bTestMode ; ShowMessage BDLenoreMesgWarpCancel endif else Set LenoreRef.iWarpCountdown to ( LenoreRef.iWarpCountdown - 1 ) if LenoreRef.iWarpCountdown == 0 LenoreRef.EVP LenoreRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade BDLenoreIdleMarkerWarpRef Set LenoreRef.iWarpCooldown to 3 if bTestMode ; ShowMessage BDLenoreMesgWarped endif else ; Breadcrumb follows player BDLenoreIdleMarkerWarpRef.MoveTo Player Set fAngle to Player.GetAngle Z BDLenoreIdleMarkerWarpRef.SetAngle Z fAngle endif endif endif
;---------- Cooldown / Start New Warp Timer ----------
if LenoreRef.iWarpCooldown > 0 Set LenoreRef.iWarpCooldown to ( LenoreRef.iWarpCooldown - 1) elseif LenoreRef.iWarpCountdown == 0 if LenoreRef.GetDistance Player > fWarpDistance ;---------- Start new warp timer ---------- Set LenoreRef.iWarpCountdown to 2 BDLenoreIdleMarkerWarpRef.MoveTo Player Set fAngle to Player.GetAngle Z BDLenoreIdleMarkerWarpRef.SetAngle Z fAngle if bTestMode ; ShowMessage BDLenoreMesgWarpTimer endif endif endif
;=====================FEROCIOUS LOYALTY EFFECT==============================
if player.HasPerk FerociousLoyalty if Player.GetHealthPercentage < 0.5 If (LenoreRef.bHired) == 1 && FLLenoreActive == 0 LenoreREF.AddSpell FerociousLoyaltyEffect Set FLLenoreActive to 1 EndIf endif
if Player.GetHealthPercentage >= 0.5 if (LenoreRef.bHired) == 1 && FLLenoreActive == 1 LenoreREF.RemoveSpell FerociousLoyaltyEffect Set FLLenoreActive to 0 EndIf EndIf Endif
END

scn BDStorkShrineActScript
; 23/06/12 MoBurma - Lots of this script now moved to ShrineC4Script and BDStorkShrineTimerREF activator to enhance this sequence.
short Button short Push short DoOnce
BEGIN onActivate
if IsActionRef player ShowMessage BDShrineMesg set Push to 1 endif
END
begin GameMode
if Push == 1 set Button to GetButtonPressed if (Button == 0) set Push to 0 return elseif (Button == 1)
if (player.GetAV Explosives < 30) ShowMessage BDShrineMesgLowSkill set Push to 0 return endif
if Player.GetItemCount WeapNVC4PlasticExplosive == 0 showmessage BDShrineMesgNoC4 set Push to 0 return endif
if Player.GetItemCount WeapNVC4PlasticExplosive > 0 Player.RemoveItem WeapNVC4PlasticExplosive 1 DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 set BDStorkShrineTimerREF.iStage to 1 endif endif endif END

scn BDBoulderSleepTimerScript
Begin GameMode
if GameHour < 7 && BDBoulderEnterDome.Mob == 0 ; move them directly if player skips ahead to some crazy early hour instead of making them do the sleep pkg
if MarkRef.GetInCell BDDPanGreenRoom == 0 MarkRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade MarkMindyBedRef endif
if MindyRef.GetInCell BDDPanGreenRoom == 0 MindyRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade MarkMindyBedRef endif
if BoxyRef.GetInCell BDDPanGreenRoom == 0 BoxyRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade BoxyBedRef endif
; if SamGRef.GetInCell BDDPanGreenRoom == 0 && BDBoulderEnterDome.PCEnter == 1 ; if PC finds him at night, he'll disappear ; SamGRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade SamGBedRef ; endif endif
if GameHour > 7 && GameHour < 23
if MarkRef.GetInCell BDDPanGreenRoom MarkRef.SetRestrained 0 MarkRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade MarkMindySleepRef 4 endif
if MindyRef.GetInCell BDDPanGreenRoom MindyRef.SetRestrained 0 MindyRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade MarkMindySleepRef 4 endif
if SamGRef.GetInCell BDDPanGreenRoom SamGRef.SetRestrained 0 SamGRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade SamGSleepRef 4 endif
if BoxyRef.GetInCell BDDPanGreenRoom BoxyRef.SetRestrained 0 BoxyRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade BoxySleepRef 4 endif
endif
END

scn BDConnieQuestScript
;Connie's book quest variables ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
int BooksVari; Used as countdown int TalkToConnie ;1=currently talking to Connie about books, 2=chose a skill book
ref BookPW ;Variables for Connie's quest. Accounts for various Prewar Books. ref BookPW1 ref BookPW2 ref BookPW3 ref BookPW4 ref BookPW5 ref BookPW6 ref BookPW7 ref BookPW8
Begin MenuMode
if TalkToConnie != 1 return
elseif TalkToConnie == 1
set BDConnieQuest.TalkToConnie to 2 ; this prevents looping and removing all prewar books
set BookPW to Player.GetItemCount PrewarBook set BookPW1 to Player.GetItemCount BookGeneric01 set BookPW2 to Player.GetItemCount BookGeneric02b set BookPW3 to Player.GetItemCount BookGeneric03b set BookPW4 to Player.GetItemCount BookGeneric04b set BookPW5 to Player.GetItemCount BookGeneric05b set BookPW6 to Player.GetItemCount BookGeneric06b set BookPW7 to Player.GetItemCount BookGeneric07b set BookPW8 to Player.GetItemCount BookGeneric08b
if BookPW1 >= 10 Player.removeitem BookGeneric01 10 return
elseif BookPW1 < 10 ; ex. 6 books set BooksVari to (10 - BookPW1) ; = 4 more books Player.removeitem BookGeneric01 BookPW1 ; remove 6
endif
if BookPW2 >= BooksVari ; >= 4 books Player.removeitem BookGeneric02b BooksVari ; remove 4 books, return return
elseif BookPW2 < BooksVari ; ex. 2 books set BooksVari to (BooksVari - BookPW2) ; 4 - 2 = 2 more books Player.removeitem BookGeneric02b BookPW2 ; remove 2 books
endif
if BookPW3 >= BooksVari Player.removeitem BookGeneric03b BooksVari return
elseif BookPW3 < BooksVari set BooksVari to (BooksVari - BookPW3) Player.removeitem BookGeneric03b BookPW3
endif
if BookPW4 >= BooksVari Player.removeitem BookGeneric04b BooksVari return
elseif BookPW4 < BooksVari set BooksVari to (BooksVari - BookPW4) Player.removeitem BookGeneric04b BookPW4
endif
if BookPW5 >= BooksVari Player.removeitem BookGeneric05b BooksVari return
elseif BookPW5 < BooksVari set BooksVari to (BooksVari - BookPW5) Player.removeitem BookGeneric05b BookPW5
endif
if BookPW6 >= BooksVari Player.removeitem BookGeneric06b BooksVari return
elseif BookPW6 < BooksVari set BooksVari to (BooksVari - BookPW6) Player.removeitem BookGeneric06b BookPW6
endif
if BookPW7 >= BooksVari Player.removeitem BookGeneric07b BooksVari return
elseif BookPW7 < BooksVari set BooksVari to (BooksVari - BookPW7) Player.removeitem BookGeneric07b BookPW7
endif
if BookPW8 >= BooksVari Player.removeitem BookGeneric08b BooksVari return
elseif BookPW8 < BooksVari set BooksVari to (BooksVari - BookPW8) Player.removeitem BookGeneric08b BookPW8
endif
if BookPW >= BooksVari Player.removeitem PrewarBook BooksVari return
elseif BookPW < BooksVari set BooksVari to (BooksVari - BookPW) Player.removeitem PrewarBook BookPW
endif
endif
END

scn BDBoulderMurderGeneric
ref Myself int HasLunch
begin OnDeath
set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderDeath to 1 if GetFactionRelation Player == 1 setstage BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric 50 endif
return
End
begin GameMode
; adds food to NPCs so they'll use eating animations in diner set Myself to GetSelf
if Myself.GetInCell abGhoulDinerCell == 1 && HasLunch == 0 Myself.AddItem WaterPurified 1 Myself.AddItem SalisburySteak 1 Set HasLunch to 1 if Myself == BoxyRef Myself.RemoveItem BDBoxHat 1 elseif Myself == WhiskersRef Myself.RemoveItem BDCatMask 1 endif
elseif Myself.GetInCell abGhoulDinerCell == 0 && HasLunch == 1 Myself.RemoveItem WaterPurified 1 Myself.RemoveItem SalisburySteak 1 Set HasLunch to 0 if Myself == BoxyRef Myself.AddItem BDBoxHat 1 elseif Myself == WhiskersRef Myself.AddItem BDCatMask 1 endif endif
if (Myself == JeffRef) && (JeffRef.GetDead == 0) if JeffRef.getitemcount BDJeffPatch == 0 JeffRef.additem BDJeffPatch 1 endif endif
END

scn BDBoulderCodesQuestScript ;MoBurma 22/06/12
int bHasLogBook ; The player has obtained the encrypted log book. 0 = No, 1 = Yes int bHasCodes ; The player has decrypted the log book and has the codes. 0 = No, 1 = Yes
begin GameMode
if IngridRef.Getdead && GetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 15 SetObjectiveCompleted BDBoulderCodesQuest 15 0 endif
if GetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 35 && ConnieREF.getdead ; Below in case the player is in state to get their help and then gets triggerhappy. SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 35 0 endif
if GetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 40 && IngridRef.getdead && ConnieREF.getdead SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 40 0 endif
if GetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 55 && player.GetItemCount BDDomeLogBook SetObjectiveCompleted BDBoulderCodesQuest 55 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 30 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 50 0 IngridRef.getdead == 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 40 1 endif endif
end

scn BDTorchTurnOffScript
;int DoOncePC ;script block that resets once PC leaves cell to allow setting of torches
int OnceNight ;script block which gets renewed after ref On ref LinkOff
Begin GameMode
;------------------------------------------------Time Switch--------------------------------
set On to GetSelf set LinkOff to On.GetLinkedRef
if GameHour > 23 || GameHour < 7 if OnceNight == 0 LinkOff.Enable 4 On.Disable 4 set OnceNight to 1 endif else if OnceNight == 1 set OnceNight to 0 endif endif
;----------------------------------------------Initial Torch Settings when PC enters----------------
;if Player.GetInCell abiaBoulderMain == 0 && DoOncePC == 1 ; set DoOncePC to 0 ; return ; elseif Player.GetInCell abiaBoulderMain == 1 && DoOncePC == 0 ; if GetCurrentTime <= 7 || GetCurrentTime >= 23.25 ; set On to GetSelf ; set LinkOff to On.GetLinkedRef ; LinkOff.Enable 4 ; On.Disable 4 ; Set DoOncePC to 1 ; endif ;endif
END
begin OnActivate
LinkOff.Enable 4 On.Disable 4
End

scn BDTorchTurnOnScript
ref Off ref LinkOn ; int DoOncePC ;script block that resets once PC leaves cell to allow setting of torches int OnceDay
Begin GameMode
set Off to GetSelf set LinkOn to Off.GetLinkedRef
if GameHour > 7 && GameHour < 23 if OnceDay == 0 LinkOn.Enable 4 Off.Disable 4 set OnceDay to 1 endif else if OnceDay == 1 set OnceDay to 0 endif endif
;-----------------------------Initial Torch Settings when PC enters----------------
; if Player.GetInCell abiaBoulderMain == 0 && DoOncePC == 1 ; set DoOncePC to 0 ; return ; ; elseif Player.GetInCell abiaBoulderMain == 1 && DoOncePC == 0 ; if GetCurrentTime >= 7.25 && GetCurrentTime <= 23.0 ; LinkOn.Enable 4 ; Off.Disable 4 ; Set DoOncePC to 1 ; endif ; endif
END
begin OnActivate
LinkOn.Enable 4 Off.Disable 4
End

END

if GetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 10 == 0 ;setstage BDBoulderCodesQuest 5 ; Moved to Enter Dome dialog -Kaz Setessential BDSamGhoul 0 Set BDBoulderEnterDome.PCEnter to 1
BDDPanRef.MoveToFade DPPlayerGreet ; Kaz - 7/20/12 add forcegreet so players know DP is recruitable BDDPanRef.AddScriptPackage BDDPanForceGreet
disable MarkForDelete endif
END

scn ShrineC4Script ; 23/06/12 MoBurma - created this as I needed a timer to enhance the C4 effects sequence. It's a bit messy. Sorry!
int iStage float timer
Begin Gamemode
if Istage == 0 return endif
if istage == 1 ApplyImageSpaceModifier DLC03FadeToBlackISFX set iStage to 2 endif
if iStage == 2 set timer to timer + getsecondspassed if timer < 10 set timer to timer + getsecondspassed else set iStage to 3 endif if iStage == 3 Player.MoveTo ShrineExplodeMarkerPC set iStage to 4 if BDDPanRef.bhired == 1 && BDDPanRef.Waiting == 0 BDDPanRef.MoveTo ShrineExplodeMarkerComp BDDPanRef.PlayIdle MS11ShieldsEyes endif if LenoreRef.bhired == 1 && LenoreRef.Waiting == 0 LenoreRef.MoveTo ShrineExplodeMarkerComp endif
if abdxKateRef.bhired == 1 && abdxKateRef.Waiting == 0 abdxKateRef.MoveTo ShrineExplodeMarkerComp abdxKateRef.PlayIdle MS11ShieldsEyes endif
EnablePlayerControls ShrineC4ExplosionMarker.placeatme C4Explosion IMOD ExplosionInFace PlaySound FXExplosionImpactMetal BarrierFire1.disable BarrierFire2.disable ShrineActRef.disable ShrinePileRef.Enable
endif endif if iStage == 4 disable endif
end

scn BDConnieLockBoxScript ; 24/06/12 Moburma - new script to give a player a hint to keep looking if they can't open the chest

Begin OnActivate
if bChecked == 0 set bChecked to 1 activate else activate endif end

if ConnieBox.bChecked == 1 && player.getitemcount BDConnieEvidence == 0 && getobjectivedisplayed BDBoulderGremlin 30 == 0 setobjectivedisplayed BDBoulderGremlin 28 1 disable endif
end

scn BDCarolineEmporiumScript
int MoveOnce ; in case player is using old save, this will move Caroline to the right new spot.
int JobOffer ; Caroline mentioned a job int BoulderDeal ; unlocks extra services in Boulder after making a deal with Caroline int BoulderTalk ; PC knows Caroline wants to trade with Boulder. int ToyStore ; PC heard about store, and now Caroline will pay good money for its quest items int CaseyActivated ; PC attempted to talk to Casey
int ToysBarter ; PC has bartered for better pay int BoulderBarter ; PC has bartered for better discount int ToysDone ; counts number of toys returned. int BoulderTrade ; tracks trade deal and extra services
begin GameMode
if MoveOnce == 0
CarolineRef.MoveToFade CarolineMoveRef LightningRef.MoveToFade CarolineMoveRef CaseyRef.MoveToFade CarolineMoveRef set MoveOnce to 1
endif
if CarolineRef.getdead setstage BDCarolineTrade 255 stopquest BDCarolineEmporium endif
END

scn BDBoulderPerformancesScript
int Rehearsing int PlayS1Start ; 1 = scene has started, 2 = first line has been said int LastScene int Break1 ; stops rehearsals from repeating too much (morning) int Break2 ; afternoon
int MarkPerforming int bMarkDone ; MoBurma 23/06/12 - new var to know when mark is finished for the day to prevent package firing again. int iSongNumber ; MoBurma 23/06/12 - new var used to know what song is playing to adjust the timer. Set in Radio dialogue. int iMarkPerformStage ; MoBurma 23/06/12 - new var to prevent previous stages of perform sequence from running again. int iSongsPlayed ; MoBurma 23/06/12 - new var to know how many songs Mark has performed so we can shut him up when he's done enough. int OnStage ; Used by trigger to declare Mark is on stage. int bBoxyReady int bWhiskersReady
int iLastSong1 int iLastSong2 int iLastSong3
begin GameMode
if BoxyRef.GetDead || WhiskersRef.GetDead return endif
if Break1 == 0 && Rehearsing == 0 && GameHour > 8 && GameHour < 11
set Break2 to 0 WhiskersRef.AddScriptPackage BDWhiskersAct BoxyRef.AddScriptPackage BDBoxyAct
if boxyref.getdistance boxymarker < 40 && whiskersref.getdistance whiskersmarker < 40 ; make sure they are both in position to perform WhiskersRef.startconversation BoxyRef Hello set Rehearsing to 1 endif
endif
;***setting breaks and last scene is done at last line in speech, so if a fight interrupts rehearsal, they'll go back to it until scene is finished.
if Break2 == 0 && Rehearsing == 0 && GameHour > 13 && GameHour < 17
set Break1 to 0 WhiskersRef.AddScriptPackage BDWhiskersAct BoxyRef.AddScriptPackage BDBoxyAct if boxyref.getdistance boxymarker < 40 && whiskersref.getdistance whiskersmarker < 40 ; make sure they are both in position to perform WhiskersRef.startconversation BoxyRef Hello set Rehearsing to 1 endif endif
if Rehearsing == 1 && GameHour >= 11 && GameHour < 13 ; Some cleanup if the player fast travels without seeing the whole dialogue set Rehearsing to 0 set break1 to 1 endif
if Rehearsing == 1 && GameHour >= 17 ; Some cleanup if the player fast travels without seeing the whole dialogue set Rehearsing to 0 set break2 to 1 endif
END

scn BDKeepOutACTScript
int DoOnce
begin OnTriggerEnter player
if (DoOnce == 0) set BDGigiDialogue.KeepOut to 1 set DoOnce to 1 Disable MarkForDelete endif
end

scn BDBoxyScript ; 27/06/12 Moburma - Added to give Boxy some specific functions. Based on BDBoulderMurderGeneric
ref Myself int HasLunch
begin OnDeath
set BDBoulderPerformances.Rehearsing to 0 ; so the player can still talk to other actor set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderDeath to 1
if GetFactionRelation Player == 1 setstage BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric 50 endif return
End
begin OnActivate
if BDBoulderPerformances.Rehearsing return else activate endif end
Begin OnHit
setrestrained 0 WhiskersRef.setrestrained 0 if BDBoulderPerformances.Rehearsing set BDBoulderPerformances.Rehearsing to 0 endif
end
begin GameMode
; adds food to NPCs so they'll use eating animations in diner set Myself to GetSelf
if Myself.GetInCell abGhoulDinerCell == 1 && HasLunch == 0 Myself.AddItem WaterPurified 1 Myself.AddItem SalisburySteak 1 Set HasLunch to 1 if Myself == BoxyRef Myself.RemoveItem BDBoxHat 1 elseif Myself == WhiskersRef Myself.RemoveItem BDCatMask 1 endif
elseif Myself.GetInCell abGhoulDinerCell == 0 && HasLunch == 1 Myself.RemoveItem WaterPurified 1 Myself.RemoveItem SalisburySteak 1 Set HasLunch to 0 if Myself == BoxyRef Myself.AddItem BDBoxHat 1 elseif Myself == WhiskersRef Myself.AddItem BDCatMask 1 endif
endif
END

scn BDWhiskersScript ; 27/06/12 Moburma - Added to give whiskers some specific functions. Based on BDBoulderMurderGeneric
ref Myself int HasLunch
begin OnDeath
set BDBoulderPerformances.Rehearsing to 0 ; so the player can still talk to other actor set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderDeath to 1
if GetFactionRelation Player == 1 setstage BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric 50 endif return
End
begin OnActivate
if BDBoulderPerformances.Rehearsing return else activate endif END
Begin OnHit
setrestrained 0 BoxyRef.setrestrained 0 if BDBoulderPerformances.Rehearsing set BDBoulderPerformances.Rehearsing to 0 endif
end
begin GameMode
; adds food to NPCs so they'll use eating animations in diner set Myself to GetSelf
if Myself.GetInCell abGhoulDinerCell == 1 && HasLunch == 0 Myself.AddItem WaterPurified 1 Myself.AddItem SalisburySteak 1 Set HasLunch to 1 if Myself == BoxyRef Myself.RemoveItem BDBoxHat 1 elseif Myself == WhiskersRef Myself.RemoveItem BDCatMask 1 endif
elseif Myself.GetInCell abGhoulDinerCell == 0 && HasLunch == 1 Myself.RemoveItem WaterPurified 1 Myself.RemoveItem SalisburySteak 1 Set HasLunch to 0 if Myself == BoxyRef Myself.AddItem BDBoxHat 1 elseif Myself == WhiskersRef Myself.AddItem BDCatMask 1 endif
endif
END

scn BDDPanQuestScript
;---------- Version Management ----------
int iVersion ; Format = abbccdd ; a.bb = New Vegas Version ; cc.dd = Plugin Version ; e.g. 1040300 = version 1.4.3.0 (New Vegas v1.4, Plugin v3.0) ; Allows feature upgrades, more than just a simple Do-Once
int bTestMode ; 1=Enable to display additional test messages
;---------- Misc. Variables ----------
int bFlag; General variable for whatever is needed float fAngle; For setting angles of moved objects float fWarpDistance; Dynamic based on follow distance and combat
;==================DEADPAN VARIABLES==================================
int FLDPanActive ; Allows DP to be affected by Ferocious Loyalty perk int SpecialHat ; 1=subject of special hat came up, unlocks question int PencilQuest ; 0=not started, 1=refused, 2=accepted, 3=completed, 4=decided on hat, 5=decide later int BedPan ; 1 if PC talks about pooping in it, allows bad karma "Salisbury steak" option. int PerkUpgrade ; has Show Must Go On upgrade int Conflict ; PC has picked fight with Boulder resident, and DP won't fight either side
int KnockBlock ; prevents stacking of knockback attacks. 0 = can use, 1 = attack in progress int QuitPerm ; permanent quit int Train ; mentioned training Lenore int Mustache ; DP has tried on a mustache, and will no longer talk about itchy beards int HouseWho ; commented about not knowing who House is int RetortKhan ; said Khan retort int RetortFiends int CliveBaseball ; Clive asked about baseball game while DP present
;=======================================================================
Begin GameMode
;---------- SET TEST MODE ----------
; Test mode can also be set through dialogue ; Normally this line is commented out to default to 0 ; During development it can be uncommented to start in test mode
;;;;; Set bTestMode to 1
;---------- QUEST SCRIPT INITIALIZATION / UPGRADE ----------
if iVersion < 1040300
if iVersion < 1040300 Set iVersion to 1040300
;---------- Add holdout/improved holdout weapons to form lists ----------
; The following 4 flags control holdout companion weapons ; Set them according to weapon types and the rest of the plugin works
Set BDDPanRef.bMeleeHoldout to 1 Set BDDPanRef.bMeleeImprovedHoldout to 1 Set BDDPanRef.bRangedHoldout to 0 Set BDDPanRef.bRangedImprovedHoldout to 1
if BDDPanRef.bMeleeHoldout AddFormToFormList NVHoldoutWeapons BDDPanWeapMelee endif if BDDPanRef.bMeleeImprovedHoldout AddFormToFormList NVImprovedHoldoutWeapons BDDPanWeapMelee endif
if BDDPanRef.bRangedHoldout AddFormToFormList NVHoldoutWeapons BDDPanWeapRanged endif if BDDPanRef.bRangedImprovedHoldout AddFormToFormList NVImprovedHoldoutWeapons BDDPanWeapRanged endif
;---------- Companion begins underground, move to home at start ----------
BDDPanRef.ResetAI
endif
if iVersion < 1040301 Set iVersion to 1040301 endif
; Put this message last so the version number is properly updated first if bTestMode ShowMessage BDDPanMesgTestModeEnabled iVersion endif
endif
;---------- PLAYER REFERENCE OBJECT CHECKS ----------
; If player acquired companion items due to game glitch, remove them
if Player.GetItemCount AmmoCompanion > 0 Player.RemoveItem AmmoCompanion 100 1 endif if Player.GetItemCount BDDPanArmor > 0 Player.RemoveItem BDDPanArmor 100 1 endif if Player.GetItemCount BDDPanWeapMelee > 0 Player.RemoveItem BDDPanWeapMelee 100 1 endif if Player.GetItemCount BDDPanWeapRanged > 0 Player.RemoveItem BDDPanWeapRanged 100 1 endif
;---------- INITIALIZE WARPING ----------
; Companion warping is not initialized until player has been in an ; exterior cell at least once. This ensures GetDistance works correctly.
if BDDPanRef.bWarpInitialized == 0 if Player.IsInInterior == 0 Set BDDPanRef.bWarpInitialized to 1 if bTestMode ShowMessage BDDPanMesgWarpInitialized if BDDPanRef.bTacticsWarpOn ShowMessage BDDPanMesgWarpON else ShowMessage BDDPanMesgWarpOFF endif endif endif endif
;---------- DEATH TIMER (Remove corpse in 24 hours) ----------
if BDDPanRef.bDead if GameDaysPassed > BDDPanRef.fTimerDeath BDDPanRef.disable 2 BDDPanRef.MarkForDelete StopQuest BDDPanQuest endif Return; Don't continue script endif
;---------- UNCONSCIOUS ----------
if BDDPanRef.bUnconscious if bTestMode ShowMessage BDDPanMesgUnconscious endif Return; Don't continue script endif
;---------- COMPANION GEAR MAINTENANCE ----------
; Auto-restore non-playable lost companion equipment ; Don't auto-restore items if we are under a ban, or if they are stowed
if BDDPanRef.bBanItems == 0
if BDDPanRef.bTacticsStowWeapons == 0 if BDDPanRef.GetItemCount AmmoCompanion == 0 BDDPanRef.AddItem AmmoCompanion 1 endif if BDDPanRef.GetItemCount BDDPanWeapMelee == 0 BDDPanRef.AddItem BDDPanWeapMelee 1 endif if BDDPanRef.GetItemCount BDDPanWeapRanged == 0 BDDPanRef.AddItem BDDPanWeapRanged 1 endif else if BDDPanRef.GetItemCount BDDPanWeapMelee > 0 BDDPanRef.RemoveItem BDDPanWeapMelee 100 endif if BDDPanRef.GetItemCount BDDPanWeapRanged > 0 BDDPanRef.RemoveItem BDDPanWeapRanged 100 endif endif
if BDDPanRef.bTacticsStowArmor == 0 if BDDPanRef.GetItemCount BDDPanArmor == 0 BDDPanRef.AddItem BDDPanArmor 1 endif else if BDDPanRef.GetItemCount BDDPanArmor > 0 BDDPanRef.RemoveItem BDDPanArmor 100 endif endif
endif
;---------- TERMINATE AUTO-WAIT ----------
; If companion is auto-waiting, auto-rejoin party when conditions are right
if BDDPanRef.bAutoWait
; Boyd's interrogation room at Camp McCarran if BDDPanRef.bAutoWaitBoydRoom if VFreeformMcCarran2.bPlayerInInterrogationRoom == 0 SetStage BDDPanQuest 51 Set BDDPanRef.bAutoWait to 0 Set BDDPanRef.bAutoWaitBoydRoom to 0 endif endif
; Fort Arena if BDDPanRef.bAutoWaitFortArena if VMS34.ArenaDuelEnabled == 0 SetStage BDDPanQuest 51 Set BDDPanRef.bAutoWait to 0 Set BDDPanRef.bAutoWaitFortArena to 0 endif endif
; Fort Summit (Caesar's Tent) if BDDPanRef.bAutoWaitFortSummit Set bFlag to 1 if Player.GetInWorldspace TheFortWorld if ( Player.GetInSameCell FortCaesarRef ) || ( Player.GetInSameCell FortLuciusRef ) if ( FortPraetorianTentGuardRef.GetDead == 0 ) && ( GetStageDone VMQ02 110 == 0 ) ; We still need to auto-wait so clear flag Set bFlag to 0 endif endif endif if bFlag SetStage BDDPanQuest 51 Set BDDPanRef.bAutoWait to 0 Set BDDPanRef.bAutoWaitFortSummit to 0 endif endif
; Lucky 38 (Various restricted areas) if BDDPanRef.bAutoWaitL38 SetStage BDDPanQuest 60 ; Check/Set bAutoWaitL38Open if ( BDDPanRef.bAutoWaitL38Open ) || ( ( Player.GetInWorldspace Lucky38World == 0 ) && ( Player.GetInCell Lucky38BasementFloorB2 == 0 ) && ( Player.GetInCell Lucky38ControlRoom == 0 ) ) SetStage BDDPanQuest 51 Set BDDPanRef.bAutoWait to 0 Set BDDPanRef.bAutoWaitL38 to 0 endif endif
endif
;---------- NORMAL WAITING (Quit and go home after timer expires) ----- -----
if BDDPanRef.Waiting
if GameDaysPassed > BDDPanRef.fTimerWait if BDDPanRef.bTravelMojave == 0 ShowMessage BDDPanMesgFired BDDPanRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade BDDPanIdleMarkerHomeRef else ShowMessage BDDPanMesgFiredMojave BDDPanRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade BDDPanIdleMarkerJacobstownRef endif SetStage BDDPanQuest 30 Set BDDPanRef.bQuit to 1 SetStage BDDPanQuest 31 BDDPanRef.ResetAI
;elseif GameDaysPassed < BDDPanRef.fTimerWait ; ShowMessage BDDPanMesgScriptEnd ;****************************TEST DELETE!!!!!!!!!!!!!********************** endif Return; Don't continue script if companion is waiting endif
;---------- RESTORE CONFISCATED ITEMS, IF APPROPRIATE ----------
; Only check individual scenarios if a ban is currently in place
if BDDPanRef.bBanItems
; Companion got fired if BDDPanRef.bHired == 0 SetStage BDDPanQuest 40 Set BDDPanRef.bBanItems to 0 Set BDDPanRef.bBanItemsFort to 0 Set BDDPanRef.bBanItemsGomorrah to 0 Set BDDPanRef.bBanItemsSilverRush to 0 Set BDDPanRef.bBanItemsTops to 0 Set BDDPanRef.bBanItemsUltraLuxe to 0 Return endif
; Fort (Main gate and weather station) if BDDPanRef.bBanItemsFort if FortEquipmentConfiscationQuest.bFortEquipmentStored == 0 SetStage BDDPanQuest 40 Set BDDPanRef.bBanItems to 0 Set BDDPanRef.bBanItemsFort to 0 Return endif endif
; Gomorrah if BDDPanRef.bBanItemsGomorrah if vDialogueGomorrah.iInGomorrah == 0 SetStage BDDPanQuest 40 Set BDDPanRef.bBanItems to 0 Set BDDPanRef.bBanItemsGomorrah to 0 Return endif endif
; Silver Rush if BDDPanRef.bBanItemsSilverRush if VFSSimonREF.SimonSearched == 0 SetStage BDDPanQuest 40 Set BDDPanRef.bBanItems to 0 Set BDDPanRef.bBanItemsSilverRush to 0 Return endif endif
; Tops if BDDPanRef.bBanItemsTops if ( vDialogueTops.PlayerFrisked == 0 ) || ( VMQTops.bSwankGuns ) SetStage BDDPanQuest 40 Set BDDPanRef.bBanItems to 0 Set BDDPanRef.bBanItemsTops to 0 Return endif endif
; Ultra Luxe if BDDPanRef.bBanItemsUltraLuxe if VMS18.bPlayerFrisked == 0 SetStage BDDPanQuest 40 Set BDDPanRef.bBanItems to 0 Set BDDPanRef.bBanItemsUltraLuxe to 0 Return endif endif
endif
;---------- 'BREADCRUMB' DYNAMIC WARPING SYSTEM ----------
; Check status to ensure warping is allowed
if ( BDDPanRef.bWarpInitialized == 0 ) || ( BDDPanRef.bTacticsWarpOn == 0 ) || ( BDDPanRef.bHired == 0 ) || ( BDDPanRef.Waiting == 1 ) if BDDPanRef.iWarpCountdown > 0 Set BDDPanRef.iWarpCountdown to 0 endif if BDDPanRef.iWarpCooldown > 0 Set BDDPanRef.iWarpCooldown to 0 endif Return; Don't allow warping endif
; If companion is out of range, player leaves a breadcrumb trail ; Warp companion to breadcrumb if distance not closed before time is up ; Cooldown period before initiating another warp timer sequence ; Companion won't get lost, but won't warp too often either
;---------- Dynamic warp range based on follow distance and combat ----------
if BDDPanRef.IsFollowingLong ; On follow long our radius twice as wide before warping if BDDPanRef.IsInCombat Set fWarpDistance to ( 2304.0 ); +50% radius in combat else Set fWarpDistance to ( 1536.0 ) endif else ; On follow default our radius is smaller before warping if BDDPanRef.IsInCombat Set fWarpDistance to ( 1152.0 ); + 50% radius in combat else Set fWarpDistance to ( 768.0 ) endif endif
;---------- Warp timer is running ----------
if BDDPanRef.iWarpCountdown > 0 if BDDPanRef.GetDistance Player <= fWarpDistance ; Cancel pending warp Set BDDPanRef.iWarpCountdown to 0 Set BDDPanRef.iWarpCooldown to 3 if bTestMode ShowMessage BDDPanMesgWarpCancel endif else Set BDDPanRef.iWarpCountdown to ( BDDPanRef.iWarpCountdown - 1 ) if BDDPanRef.iWarpCountdown == 0 BDDPanRef.EVP BDDPanRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade BDDPanIdleMarkerWarpRef Set BDDPanRef.iWarpCooldown to 3 if bTestMode ShowMessage BDDPanMesgWarped endif else ; Breadcrumb follows player BDDPanIdleMarkerWarpRef.MoveTo Player Set fAngle to Player.GetAngle Z BDDPanIdleMarkerWarpRef.SetAngle Z fAngle endif endif endif
;---------- Cooldown / Start New Warp Timer ----------
if BDDPanRef.iWarpCooldown > 0 Set BDDPanRef.iWarpCooldown to ( BDDPanRef.iWarpCooldown - 1) elseif BDDPanRef.iWarpCountdown == 0 if BDDPanRef.GetDistance Player > fWarpDistance ;---------- Start new warp timer ---------- Set BDDPanRef.iWarpCountdown to 2 BDDPanIdleMarkerWarpRef.MoveTo Player Set fAngle to Player.GetAngle Z BDDPanIdleMarkerWarpRef.SetAngle Z fAngle if bTestMode ShowMessage BDDPanMesgWarpTimer endif endif endif
;=====================FEROCIOUS LOYALTY EFFECT==============================
if player.HasPerk FerociousLoyalty if Player.GetHealthPercentage < 0.5 If (BDDPanRef.bHired) == 1 && FLDPanActive == 0 BDDPanREF.AddSpell FerociousLoyaltyEffect Set FLDPanActive to 1 EndIf endif
if Player.GetHealthPercentage >= 0.5 if (BDDPanRef.bHired) == 1 && FLDPanActive == 1 BDDPanREF.RemoveSpell FerociousLoyaltyEffect Set FLDPanActive to 0 EndIf EndIf Endif
END

scn BDDPanScript
; General purpose companion script ; ; Based on combining elements of the following scripts: ; 1. RoseofSharonCassidyScript ; 2. VNPCFollowersQuestSCRIPT ; ; This script is self contained: all companion-specific references from ; VNPCFollowersQuestSCRIPT are moved here so this script does not ; have to reference any other quest or object.
;---------- Script Version Management ----------
int iScriptVersion ; Allows feature upgrades, more than just a simple Do-Once
;---------- Companion Wheel Variables ----------
; From RoseofSharonCassidyScript ; Used by game engine to remember companion wheel settings ; Also used in some AI packages
int CombatStyleMelee int CombatStyleRanged int FollowerSwitchAggressive int IsFollowingDefault int IsFollowingLong int Waiting
;===============DEADPAN EXTRA VARIABLES==================================
int Hero ; DP has sacrificed himself once during combat and won't do it again until next fight ref MyHealth ; Helps change DP's health when Lenore is hired since modAV isn't working
;---------- Companion Status Variables ----------
; Copied from VNPCFollowersQuestSCRIPT and RoseofSharonCassidyScript
int bAvailable; Can be hired? int bDead; Dead? ; int bFired; Fired? - Replaced with bBoulder and bJacobstown - KAZ int bHired; Hired? (i.e. in party) int bJoinedPartyOnce; Ever join party? int bL38; Fired to Lucky 38? int bBoulder; Fired to Boulder. int bJacobstown; Fired to Jacobstown int bQuit; Ever quit party?
;---------- Companion Timer and Warping Variables ----------
; Timers and warping are handled in the Companion Quest script, ; but variables are kept here on a per-companion basis.
float fTimerDeath; ; Cleanup corpse in 24 hours if companion dies float fTimerWait; ; Default is 7 days
; Warping is handled in Companion Quest Script, but variables are kept here
int bWarpInitialized; Player has been outside at least once int iWarpCountdown; Wait before warping, companion may catch up int iWarpCooldown; Wait after warping before allowing it again
;---------- Non-Playable Companion Weapon Holdout Flags ----------
int bMeleeHoldout int bMeleeImprovedHoldout int bRangedHoldout int bRangedImprovedHoldout
;---------- Advanced Tactics Dialogue (Player Configurable) ----------
int bTacticsAlert; Draw weapon when player does - CUT int bTacticsWaitSandbox; Sandbox while waiting int bTacticsWarpOn; Use warping - CUT (used all the time) int bTacticsStowArmor; Non-playable companion armor int bTacticsStowWeapons; Non-playable companion weapons -CUT int bTacticsCheating; Ignored banned locations & items -CUT
;---------- Follow Restrictions ----------
; Companion auto-waits if player enters a restricted area
int bAutoWait; Companion is auto-waiting
; Variables track the specific scenario
int bAutoWaitBoydRoom; Carrie Boyd's Interrogation Room int bAutoWaitFortArena; Fort Arena when player fights int bAutoWaitFortSummit; Caesar's Tent int bAutoWaitL38; Lucky 38 Penthouse, etc. int bAutoWaitL38Open; Lucky 38, all areas open to companions
;---------- Equipment Restrictions ----------
int bBanItems; Companion banned items are removed
; Variables track the specific scenario
int bBanItemsFort; Banned item patdown int bBanItemsGomorrah; Weapon patdown int bBanItemsSilverRush; No weapons allowed int bBanItemsTops; Weapon patdown int bBanItemsUltraLuxe; Weapon patdown
;---------- Self-Healing Variables ----------
; Misc. working variables
float fHealth; Health percentage int bCrippled; 1=Crippled, 0=Not int bPoisoned; 1=Poisoned, 0=Not int bUnconscious; 1=Knocked out or unconscious
int iHealType int nHealHealth; Points of health restored int nHealCondition; Per cent of limb healed (max 100)
; Medical supplies item counts int nAntivenom int nHealingPowder int nStimpaks int nSuperStimpaks int nDoctorBags
; Warn player once if companion runs out of medicine int bWarnAntivenom int bWarnHealingPowder int bWarnStimpaks int bWarnSuperStimpaks int bWarnDoctorBags
;---------- Personal Quest Variables ----------
; short bTravelColorado; Can fast travel to Colorado? NOT NEEDED -Kaz short bTravelMojave; Can fast travel to Mojave?
;===============DEADPAN PERK CONTROL==================================
Begin OnSTARTCombat
if Player.HasPerk BDDPanPerk if Player.IsInCombat == 1 || BDDPanRef.IsInCombat == 1 ; redundancy to prevent glitch when moving to new worldspaces after combat. AddSpell BDDPanPerkAbility endif endif
END
Begin OnCombatEND
Dispel BDDPanPerkAbility Set Hero to 0
;===============END PERK CONTROL==================================
; Free cure poison, health and limb restoration
Dispel BarkScorpionPoison Dispel CazadorPoison Dispel DeathClawPoison Dispel DLC03FeralGhoulPoison Dispel DLC03RadScorpion3Poison Dispel NightstalkerPoison Dispel RadScorpion1Poison Dispel RadScorpion2Poison
resethealth
restoreav perceptioncondition 100 restoreav endurancecondition 100 restoreav leftattackcondition 100 restoreav leftmobilitycondition 100 restoreav rightattackcondition 100 restoreav rightmobilitycondition 100
END
Begin OnDeath
If BDDPanRef.bHired == 1 if Player.HasPerk WildWasteland showmessage BDDPanMesgDeath else ShowMessage BDDPanMesgDeath2 endif SetStage BDDPanQuest 30 SetStage BDDPanQuest 31 endif
Set BDDPanRef.bDead to 1 Set BDDPanRef.fTimerDeath to ( GameDaysPassed + 1.0 ) SetStage BDDPanQuest 255 SetStage BDDPanFistoQuest 255 SetStage BDDPanLenoreQuest 30
;================MAKE DP'S HAT PLAYABLE IF NOT ALREADY==========================
if BDDPanRef.getitemcount BDDeadpanHat > 0 BDDPanRef.additem BDDeadpanHatPC 1 endif
; script to eliminate non-playable version is attached to PC version of hat
;===============================================================================
End
;----------------------------------------------------------------------
Begin GameMode
;---------- PLUGIN INITIALIZATION / UPGRADE ----------
if iScriptVersion < 1
if iScriptVersion < 1 Set iScriptVersion to 1
;---------- Follow and Combat Style Defaults ----------
Set IsFollowingLong to 0 Set IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set CombatStyleMelee to 1 Set CombatStyleRanged to 0 SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee Set FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0 SetAV Aggression 0
;---------- Advanced Tactics ----------
; Configure these to how you want your starting setup to be ;Set bTacticsAlert to 0 Set bTacticsWaitSandbox to 0 Set bTacticsWarpOn to 1 Set bTacticsStowArmor to 0 ;Set bTacticsStowWeapons to 0 ;Set bTacticsCheating to 0
;---------- Medicine Warnings (Don't warn when first hired) ----------
Set bWarnAntivenom to 1 Set bWarnHealingPowder to 1 Set bWarnStimpaks to 1 Set bWarnSuperStimpaks to 1 Set bWarnDoctorBags to 1
endif
endif
; If dead or unconscious, companion can't do anything
if GetDisabled Return endif
if bDead == 1 Return endif
if GetAV Health < 1 || GetUnconscious || (GetKnockedState == 1) if bUnconscious == 0 Set bUnconscious to 1 endif Return elseif bUnconscious == 1 Set bUnconscious to 0 endif
;==================DEADPAN RESET CONFIDENCE LEVEL=============== dummied out for simplicity/bugs
; fix DP's stats after fleeing from player fighting with resident
;if BDDPanQuest.Conflict == 1 ; if Player.IsInCombat == 0 && ; BDDPanRef.SetAV Confidence 3 ;Brave ; set BDDPanQuest.Conflict to 0 ; endif ; if BDDPanQuest.QuitPerm == 1 ; BDDPanRef.SetAV Confidence 4 ;Foolhardy ; set BDDPanQuest.Conflict to 0 ; endif ;endif
;---------- SELF-HEALING ----------
;---------- Medical Supply Warnings ----------
; If companion runs out of a primary medicine, warn the player once ; Disable the warning until companion has restocks that medicine ; Individual warnings for each type of primary medical supply
Set nAntivenom to BDDPanRef.GetItemCount NVAntivenom Set nHealingPowder to BDDPanRef.GetItemCount NVHealingPowder Set nStimpaks to BDDPanRef.GetItemCount Stimpak Set nSuperStimpaks to BDDPanRef.GetItemCount NVSuperStimpak Set nDoctorBags to BDDPanRef.GetItemCount NVDoctorBag
; Warnings are only given to player if companion hired and following
if bHired == 1 && Waiting == 0
if bWarnAntivenom == 0 if nAntivenom == 0 BDDPanRef.Say MedDPanAntivenom 1 ShowMessage BDDPanMesgWarnAntivenom Set bWarnAntivenom to 1 endif else if nAntivenom > 0 Set bWarnAntivenom to 0 endif endif
if bWarnHealingPowder == 0 if nHealingPowder == 0 BDDPanRef.Say MedDPanPowder 1 ShowMessage BDDPanMesgWarnHealingPowder Set bWarnHealingPowder to 1 endif else if nHealingPowder > 0 Set bWarnHealingPowder to 0 endif endif
if bWarnStimpaks == 0 if nStimpaks == 0 BDDPanRef.Say MedDPanStimpak 1 ShowMessage BDDPanMesgWarnStimpaks Set bWarnStimpaks to 1 endif else if nStimpaks > 0 Set bWarnStimpaks to 0 endif endif
if bWarnSuperStimpaks == 0 if nSuperStimpaks == 0 BDDPanRef.Say MedDPanSuperStim 1 ShowMessage BDDPanMesgWarnSuperStimpaks Set bWarnSuperStimpaks to 1 endif else if nSuperStimpaks > 0 Set bWarnSuperStimpaks to 0 endif endif
if bWarnDoctorBags == 0 if nDoctorBags == 0 BDDPanRef.Say MedDPanDoctorBag 1 ShowMessage BDDPanMesgWarnDoctorBags Set bWarnDoctorBags to 1 endif else if nDoctorBags > 0 Set bWarnDoctorBags to 0 endif endif
endif
; Companion always heals self regardless of hired / following status
;---------- Doctor Bag Use ----------
if nDoctorBags > 0 if (GetAV EnduranceCondition > 0) && (GetAV PerceptionCondition > 0) && (GetAV LeftAttackCondition > 0) && (GetAV RightAttackCondition > 0) && (GetAV LeftMobilityCondition > 0) && (GetAV RightMobilityCondition > 0) Set bCrippled to 0 else if GetStage BDDPanFistoQuest != 40 ; SPECIAL DP VARIABLE. PREVENTS BAG USE WHEN DP IS TEMPORARILY CRIPPLED FOR FISTO QUEST Set bCrippled to 1 endif endif
if bCrippled RemoveItem NVDoctorBag 1 restoreAV EnduranceCondition 100 restoreAV PerceptionCondition 100 restoreAV LeftAttackCondition 100 restoreAV RightAttackCondition 100 restoreAV LeftMobilityCondition 100 restoreAV RightMobilityCondition 100 Set bCrippled to 0 endif
endif
;---------- Antivenom Use ----------
; References: AntivenomEffectSCRIPT ; http://geck.bethsoft.com/index.php/Dispel ; http://geck.bethsoft.com/index.php/IsSpellTarget
if ( nAntivenom > 0 ) && ( GetHealthPercentage < 0.67 )
Set bPoisoned to 0
if IsSpellTarget BarkScorpionPoison == 1 Set bPoisoned to 1 elseif IsSpellTarget CazadorPoison ==1 Set bPoisoned to 1 elseif IsSpellTarget DeathClawPoison ==1 Set bPoisoned to 1 elseif IsSpellTarget DLC03FeralGhoulPoison ==1 Set bPoisoned to 1 elseif IsSpellTarget DLC03RadScorpion3Poison ==1 Set bPoisoned to 1 elseif IsSpellTarget NightstalkerPoison ==1 Set bPoisoned to 1 elseif IsSpellTarget RadScorpion1Poison ==1 Set bPoisoned to 1 elseif IsSpellTarget RadScorpion2Poison ==1 Set bPoisoned to 1 endif
if bPoisoned == 1 RemoveItem NVAntivenom 1 Set nAntivenom to ( nAntivenom - 1 ) Dispel BarkScorpionPoison Dispel CazadorPoison Dispel DeathClawPoison Dispel DLC03FeralGhoulPoison Dispel DLC03RadScorpion3Poison Dispel NightstalkerPoison Dispel RadScorpion1Poison Dispel RadScorpion2Poison Set bPoisoned to 0 endif
endif
;---------- Healing Meds Use (Stimpak etc...) ----------
if ( nHealingPowder > 0) || ( nStimpaks > 0 || nSuperStimpaks > 0 )
; Determine if healing is needed, and if so the best method
Set fHealth to GetHealthPercentage if fHealth < 0.33 ; Major Injury: Super Stimpak -> Stimpak -> Healing Powder if nSuperStimpaks > 0 Set iHealType to 30 Set nHealHealth to 120 Set nHealCondition to 100 RemoveItem NVSuperStimpak 1 Set nSuperStimpaks to ( nSuperStimpaks - 1 ) elseif nStimpaks > 0 Set iHealType to 20 Set nHealHealth to 60 Set nHealCondition to 60 RemoveItem Stimpak 1 Set nStimpaks to ( nStimpaks - 1 ) elseif nHealingPowder > 0 Set iHealType to 10 Set nHealHealth to 36 Set nHealCondition to 36 RemoveItem NVHealingPowder 1 Set nHealingPowder to ( nHealingPowder - 1 ) else Set iHealType to 0 endif elseif fHealth < 0.67 ; Minor Injury: Healing Powder -> Stimpak -> Super Stimpak if nHealingPowder > 0 Set iHealType to 10 Set nHealHealth to 36 Set nHealCondition to 36 RemoveItem NVHealingPowder 1 Set nHealingPowder to ( nHealingPowder - 1 ) elseif nStimpaks > 0 Set iHealType to 20 Set nHealHealth to 60 Set nHealCondition to 60 RemoveItem Stimpak 1 Set nStimpaks to ( nStimpaks - 1 ) elseif nSuperStimpaks > 0 Set iHealType to 30 Set nHealHealth to 120 Set nHealCondition to 100 RemoveItem NVSuperStimpak 1 Set nSuperStimpaks to ( nSuperStimpaks - 1 ) else Set iHealType to 0 endif else Set iHealType to 0 endif
; Heal the companion if needed and a method is available
if iHealType > 0 restoreAv Health nHealHealth Set iHealType to 0 endif
endif
;---------- INITIATE AUTO-WAIT ----------
if bAutoWait == 0 && bhired == 1 && Waiting == 0
; Boyd's interrogation room at Camp McCarran if VFreeformMcCarran2.bPlayerInInterrogationRoom SetStage BDDPanQuest 50 Set bAutoWait to 1 Set bAutoWaitBoydRoom to 1 Return endif
; Fort Arena (During a duel) if VMS34.ArenaDuelEnabled SetStage BDDPanQuest 50 Set bAutoWait to 1 Set bAutoWaitFortArena to 1 Return endif
; Fort Summit (Caesar's Tent) if Player.GetInWorldspace TheFortWorld if ( Player.GetInSameCell FortCaesarRef ) || ( Player.GetInSameCell FortLuciusRef ) if ( FortPraetorianTentGuardRef.GetDead == 0 ) && ( GetStageDone VMQ02 110 == 0 ) SetStage BDDPanQuest 50 Set bAutoWait to 1 Set bAutoWaitFortSummit to 1 Return endif endif endif
; Lucky 38 (Various restricted areas) if bAutoWaitL38Open == 0 if ( Player.GetInWorldspace Lucky38World ) || ( Player.GetInCell Lucky38BasementFloorB2 ) || ( Player.GetInCell Lucky38ControlRoom ) SetStage BDDPanQuest 60 ; Check/Set bAutoWaitL38Open if bAutoWaitL38Open == 0 SetStage BDDPanQuest 50 Set bAutoWait to 1 Set bAutoWaitL38 to 1 Return endif endif endif
endif
;---------- CONDITIONS CLEANUP ----------
; Cleanup leftover conditions for unhired or waiting companion
if ( bHired == 0 ) || ( Waiting == 1 ) if IsSneaking == 1 SetForceSneak 0 endif if IsWeaponOut == 1 && IsInCombat == 0 SetAlert 0 endif Return; Not hired, or waiting, don't continue script endif
;---------- INITIATE EQUIPMENT RESTRICTIONS (Casino, Fort, etc...) ----------
if bTacticsCheating == 0 && bBanItems == 0 && bHired == 1 && Waiting == 0
; Fort (Main gate and weather station) if FortEquipmentConfiscationQuest.bFortEquipmentStored SetStage BDDPanQuest 43 SetStage BDDPanQuest 44 Set bBanItems to 1 Set bBanItemsFort to 1 endif
; Gomorrah if vDialogueGomorrah.iInGomorrah SetStage BDDPanQuest 43 Set bBanItems to 1 Set bBanItemsGomorrah to 1 Return endif
; Silver Rush if VFSSimonREF.SimonSearched SetStage BDDPanQuest 42 Set bBanItems to 1 Set bBanItemsSilverRush to 1 Return endif
; Tops if vDialogueTops.PlayerFrisked && ( VMQTops.bSwankGuns == 0 ) SetStage BDDPanQuest 43 Set bBanItems to 1 Set bBanItemsTops to 1 Return endif
; Ultra Luxe if VMS18.bPlayerFrisked SetStage BDDPanQuest 43 Set bBanItems to 1 Set bBanItemsUltraLuxe to 1 Return endif
endif
;---------- HIRED and FOLLOWING (Misc) ----------
; Misc. things done if companion is hired and following, not waiting
;---------- Ready weapon when player does (from NCCS) ----------
;if bTacticsAlert ; if IsWeaponOut == 0 && Player.IsWeaponOut == 1 ; SetAlert 1 ; elseif IsWeaponOut == 1 && IsInCombat == 0 && Player.IsWeaponOut == 0 ; SetAlert 0 ; endif ;endif
;===============DEADPAN SPECIAL GLASSES EQUIP==============
If (BDDPanRef.getitemcount BDDPanGlasses > 0) && (BDDPanRef.getitemcount BDDPanEyewearList > 0) BDDPanRef.RemoveItem BDDPanGlasses 1 if BDDPanRef.getequipped BDDPanEyewearStrapList > 0 ; items with straps or that cover head BDDPanRef.RemoveItem BDGlassesStrap 1 endif
Elseif BDDPanRef.getitemcount BDDPanEyewearList == 0 if BDDPanRef.getitemcount BDGlassesStrap == 0 BDDPanRef.AddItem BDGlassesStrap 1 BDDPanRef.EquipItem BDGlassesStrap endif if (BDDPanRef.GetItemCount BDDPanGlasses == 0) BDDPanRef.AddItem BDDPanGlasses 1 BDDPanRef.EquipItem BDDPanGlasses endif
endif
;===============DEADPAN APPAREL BARKS==========================
if BDDPanRef.GetEquipped RepairNVCLArmor BDDpanRef.Say DPanBarkSkirt endif
if BDDPanRef.GetEquipped BDDPanSkimpyArmor Look Player BDDpanRef.Say DPanBarkSkimpy StopLook endif
if BDDPanRef.GetEquipped OutfitBennySuit BDDpanRef.Say DPanBarkBennySuit endif
if BDDPanRef.GetEquipped BDDPanEyewearList BDDpanRef.Say DPanBarkGlasses endif
End

scn BDDPanFistoQuestScript
int DPExcuse ; makes sure DP's other packages don't run when they shouldn't int UsingRentedRoom ; 0 = using PC room, 1 = using rented room int DoOnce1 ; only run first package once int DoOnceRun ; makes sure run package is added once int FistoWork ; 1 = Start, 2 = Initializes first timer int Garret ; which one DP will talk to after excuse dialog, 1 = James, 2 = Francine int Heal
float Timer
Begin GameMode
if VFSFistoRef.GetDead && GetStage BDDPanFistoQuest < 40 ;right in the middle of the quest due to player cruelty! Oh noes! SetStage BDDPanFistoQuest 255 return endif
if (DoOnce1 == 0) && VFSJamesGarretRef.GetDead || VFSFrancineGarretRef.GetDead SetStage BDDPanFistoQuest 255 return endif
; DP excuses himself to talk to Garrets==========================================
if (Player.GetinCell FreesideAtomicWrangler == 1) && (BDDPanRef.Waiting == 0) && (BDDPanRef.GetinCell FreesideAtomicWrangler) if DoOnce1 == 0 ;if VFSJamesGarretREF.GetIsCurrentPackage VFSJamesGarretWorkPackage if (GameHour >= 12) || (GameHour <= 6) set Garret to 1 BDDPanRef.AddScriptPackage BDDPanFistoExcuseMe SetStage BDDPanFistoQuest 5 endif if VFSFrancineGarretRef.GetDead == 0 if (GameHour >= 6) && (GameHour <= 24) set Garret to 2 BDDPanRef.AddScriptPackage BDDPanFistoExcuseMe SetStage BDDPanFistoQuest 5 endif endif endif endif
; Get the party started! ==================================================
if FistoWork == 1 set timer to timer + getsecondspassed endif
if DoOnceRun == 0 if Timer > 30 setstage BDDPanFistoQuest 40 BDDPanRef.AddScriptPackage BDDPanFistoRunAway set timer to 0 ;resets it for limping set DoOnceRun to 1 endif endif
; That's a wrap!=======================================================
If GetStage BDDPanFistoQuest == 40 if Heal == 0 set Timer to (Timer + GetSecondsPassed ) if ( Timer > 25 ) BDDPanRef.SetActorValue LeftMobilityCondition 100 BDDPanRef.SetActorValue RightMobilityCondition 100 set Heal to 1 endif endif if BDDPanRef.Waiting == 0 ; PC picked him up SetStage BDDPanFistoQuest 255 endif endif
END

scn BDDPanSparScript
int spar ;PC has started sparring ref PCHealth ;PC's health ref DPHealth
Begin GameMode
if spar == 5
return
elseif spar == 1 if (Player.GetHealthPercentage <= 0.5) || (BDDPanRef.GetHealthPercentage <= 0.5) || (BDDPanRef.bUnconscious == 1) set PCHealth to Player.GetHealthPercentage set DPHealth to BDDPanRef.GetHealthPercentage BDDPanRef.RemoveScriptPackage BDDPanSparPackage
if (DPHealth < PCHealth) || (BDDPanRef.bUnconscious == 1) set spar to 3 elseif (DPHealth >= PCHealth) set spar to 4 endif endif
elseif Spar == 3 || Spar == 4 BDDPanRef.AddScriptPackage BDDPanStopSpar Disable MarkForDelete
endif
END

scn BDDPanPoisonEffectScript
; uses a trimmed-down MissFortuneGunSpellScript - Kaz ; after testing, remove messages (or conditionalize for show test message variable) and ; add poison sounds and IS modifiers if UnluckyDude == Player
Ref UnluckyDude Short Fortune Short Cripples
Begin ScriptEffectStart
Set UnluckyDude to GetSelf Set Fortune to GetRandomPercent
If Fortune <= 75 Return
Elseif Fortune > 75 && Fortune <= 85 if BDDPanQuest.KnockBlock == 0 UnluckyDude.CIOS BDDPanKnockdownSpell endif
Elseif Fortune > 85 if BDDPanQuest.bTestMode == 1 ShowMessage BDDPanMesgPoison ; TEST MESG endif Set Cripples to GetRandomPercent If Cripples <= 10 && UnluckyDude.GetActorValue PerceptionCondition > 0 UnluckyDude.DamageActorValue PerceptionCondition 100 Elseif Cripples > 10 && Cripples <= 25 && UnluckyDude.GetActorValue LeftAttackCondition > 0 UnluckyDude.DamageActorValue LeftAttackCondition 100 Elseif Cripples > 25 && Cripples <= 40 && UnluckyDude.GetActorValue RightAttackCondition > 0 UnluckyDude.DamageActorValue RightAttackCondition 100 Elseif Cripples > 40 && Cripples <= 55 && UnluckyDude.GetActorValue LeftMobilityCondition > 0 UnluckyDude.DamageActorValue LeftMobilityCondition 100 Elseif Cripples > 55 && Cripples <= 70 && UnluckyDude.GetActorValue RightMobilityCondition > 0 UnluckyDude.DamageActorValue RightMobilityCondition 100 Elseif Cripples > 70 && UnluckyDude.GetActorValue EnduranceCondition > 0 UnluckyDude.DamageActorValue EnduranceCondition 100 endif endif End

Scn BDDPanPerkScript
int PlayerBase ; stores player base health int HealthOffset ; stores health that DP will lose and PC will gain int HealthOffsetUp ; stores health the PC will gain if DP has upgraded perk int HealthLossUp ; stores health DP will lose if DP has upgraded perk int doOnce ; Script blocker for shader effect
Begin ScriptEffectStart
if BDDPanQuest.bTestMode == 1 showmessage BDDPanMesgScriptStart endif
End
Begin ScriptEffectUpdate
if BDDPanQuest.bTestMode == 1 showmessage BDDPanMesgScriptUpdate endif
End
Begin ScriptEffectFinish
if BDDPanQuest.bTestMode == 1 showmessage BDDPanMesgScriptEnd endif
sms BDDPanPerkShader
End
Begin GameMode
if BDDPanRef.bUnconscious == 1 || BDDPanRef.bDead == 1 || BDDPanRef.Hero == 1 || Player.IsInCombat != 1 || BDDPanQuest.QuitPerm > 0 Dispel BDDPanPerkAbility return endif
if (BDDPanRef.GetDistance player < 300) && (BDDPanRef.GetKnockedState == 0)
if DoOnce == 0 pms BDDPanPerkShader set DoOnce to 1 endif
if Player.GetHealthPercentage <= 0.25
; Ability is turned on and off for battle via DPan's object script.
showmessage BDDPanMesgPerkFunction PlaySound BDDPanPerkShout ; Must be SFX. Using "Say" fails due to speed of knock back BDDPanRef.Say DPanSaveYourself Set PlayerBase to Player.GetBaseActorValue Health ; stores player's base health
if BDDPanQuest.PerkUpgrade == 1 Set HealthOffsetUp to (PlayerBase*0.75) Set HealthLossUp to (PlayerBase*0.25) Player.RestoreActorValue Health HealthOffsetUp ; restores 3/4 of player's base health BDDPanRef.DamageActorValue Health HealthLossUp ; deducts 1/4 PC's base from DP's health else Set HealthOffset to (PlayerBase*0.5) ; half of player's base Player.RestoreActorValue Health HealthOffset ; restores half of player's base health BDDPanRef.DamageActorValue Health HealthOffset endif Player.PushActorAway BDDPanRef 10 ; he gets knocked back to simulate impact Set BDDPanRef.Hero to 1 ; script blocker so he can only do this once per fight endif
else if DoOnce == 1 sms BDDPanPerkShader set DoOnce to 0 endif endif
End

Scn BDDpanKnockdownScript ; adapted from Miss Fortune script with script blockers added to prevent stacking.
Ref Self
Begin ScriptEffectStart
set BDDPanQuest.KnockBlock to 1
If Self.HasPerk Stonewall != 1 Set Self to GetSelf BDDPanRef.PushActorAway Self 7 Else ShowMessage StonewallMessage EndIf
set BDDPanQuest.KnockBlock to 0
End

scn BDBoulderEnterDomeScript
int SamTrig ; 09/07/12 Moburma - Has Sam enounter been triggered. If so, do NOT let the other trigger fire it again. int HelpSam ; 1 = PC tried to help Sam fight guys at entrance int SquadKills ; How many of Sam's enemies are dead int ThreatBye ; Heard Andre's jail threat int Code ; Asked about code int Kids ; Asked about kids int BookTalk ; asked about book int Where ; asked where scientist went int Want ; asked what Andre wants (fight monsters) int Mob ; overrides sleep packages if PC blows up shrine at night int PCEnter ; PC has entered town at least once (this is so Sam can lead PC to the town if asked again if he gets stuck). This blocks it once done
int ConnieBanished int bExilebegin ; 24/06/12 MoBurma - new toggleble var to know when exile scene is going on to block activate. Otherwise player can mess up connie in particular. int FireflyTipOff int SquadPurpose ; player has heard about squad plans int FFBounty
int HourNow int CodeHint ; PC has gotten hints about code to lower Science requirement int Tunnel ; PC heard from Ingrid about tunnel int TunnelPass ; PC has done enough to earn Andre's permission to remove shrine
begin GameMode
if (GetQuestCompleted BDMonsterQuest) && TunnelPass == 0 if (GetQuestCompleted BDBoulderGremlin) && (GetQuestCompleted BDDullahanQuest) set TunnelPass to 1 elseif (GetQuestCompleted BDBoulderGremlin) || (GetQuestCompleted BDDullahanQuest) if BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep >= 2 set TunnelPass to 1 endif endif endif
END

scn BDSamEnemyScript
; reputation subtraction for failing to help Sam is handled in Andre's greeting
begin OnHit Player
set BDBoulderEnterDome.HelpSam to 1
END
begin OnDeath
set BDBoulderEnterDome.SquadKills to (BDBoulderEnterDome.SquadKills + 1)
if IsKiller Player set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep to 1 endif
END

end

scn BDMonsterCatScript

SetObjectiveCompleted BDMonsterQuest 10 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDMonsterQuest 15 1
if AndreRef.getdead == 0 ;27/06/12 MoBurma - moved items to here from death items list. This way we can check if Andre is already dead or not to prevent player additem BDMonsterCatMeat 3 ; being stuck with quest items. endif

scn BDMonsterQuestScript
int CatMeat int FoxMeat int Extra ; PC gave extra meat
int CatMeatType ; 0 = not enough or has 2 bulk meats, 1 = PC has 1 bulk and 10 normal meats, 2 = PC has 20 normal meats int FoxMeatType int NumCat int NumFox int CatOnce int FoxOnce
; SIMPLIFIED QUEST TO ONLY USE QUEST ITEM MEAT. IGNORE THIS FOR NOW
begin Menumode
if Player.GetitemCount BDMonsterCatMeat > 0 ; 27/06/12 MoBurma - New lines to make fake quest item having weight.
if CatOnce == 0 set NumCat to Player.GetitemCount BDMonsterCatMeat Player.additem BDmeatweighttoken Numcat 1 set CatOnce to 1 endif endif
if Player.GetitemCount BDMonsterCatMeat > Numcat Player.removeitem BDmeatweighttoken Numcat 1 ; Player has picked up more meat. Remove all old tokens, and run loop again to add new correct amount. set CatOnce to 0 endif
if Player.GetitemCount BDMonsterFoxMeat > 0 ; 27/06/12 MoBurma - New lines to make fake quest item having weight.
if FoxOnce == 0 set NumFox to Player.GetitemCount BDMonsterFoxMeat Player.additem BDmeatweighttoken NumFox 1 set FoxOnce to 1 endif endif
if Player.GetitemCount BDMonsterFoxMeat > NumFox Player.removeitem BDmeatweighttoken NumFox 1 ; Player has picked up more meat. Remove all old tokens, and run loop again to add new correct amount. set FoxOnce to 0 endif
end
begin GameMode
if AndreRef.GetDead SetStage BDMonsterQuest 110 endif
if (Player.GetItemCount BDMonsterCatmeat ==1) && (Player.GetItemCount BDCatmeat >=10) set CatMeatType to 1
elseif (Player.GetItemCount BDMonsterCatmeat ==0) && (Player.GetItemCount BDCatMeat >= 20) set CatMeatType to 2
else set CatMeatType to 0
endif
if (Player.GetItemCount BDMonsterFoxmeat ==1) && (Player.GetItemCount BDFoxmeat >=10) set FoxMeatType to 1
elseif (Player.GetItemCount BDMonsterFoxmeat ==0) && (Player.GetItemCount BDFoxMeat >= 20) set FoxMeatType to 2
else set FoxMeatType to 0
endif
END

scn BDMarkScript
int playonce float timer int HasLunch int bBeginRadio
begin OnDeath
set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderDeath to 1 if GetFactionRelation Player == 1 setstage BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric 50 endif return
End
Begin OnActivate
if BDBoulderPerformances.MarkPerforming == 0 Activate endif
END
BEGIN OnHit
if BDBoulderPerformances.MarkPerforming == 1 ; MoBurma 23/06/12 - Changed vars here for new perform behaviour. We now call a silent dummy line ;MarkRadioREF.Disable ; on hit, as disabling the TA won't stop already playing songs. MarkRadioREF.StartRadioConversation MarkRadioKill setrestrained 0 set BDBoulderPerformances.MarkPerforming to 0 set BDBoulderPerformances.iMarkPerformStage to 6 evp endif
END
BEGIN OnStartCombat
if BDBoulderPerformances.MarkPerforming == 1 ;MarkRadioREF.Disable MarkRadioREF.StartRadioConversation MarkRadioKill setrestrained 0 set BDBoulderPerformances.MarkPerforming to 0 set BDBoulderPerformances.iMarkPerformStage to 6 evp endif
END
Begin MenuMode ; 23/06/12 MoBurma - Keep Mark's performance timer going if the player is in a menu. I'm not actually sure you can call getsecondspassed this way though..
if player.getincell abIABoulderMain && BDBoulderPerformances.iMarkPerformStage set timer to (timer + getSecondsPassed) endif end
Begin GameMode
if MarkRef.GetInCell abGhoulDinerCell == 1 && HasLunch == 0 MarkRef.AddItem WaterPurified 1 MarkRef.AddItem SalisburySteak 1 Set HasLunch to 1
elseif MarkRef.GetInCell abGhoulDinerCell == 0 && HasLunch == 1 MarkRef.RemoveItem WaterPurified 1 MarkRef.RemoveItem SalisburySteak 1 Set HasLunch to 0 endif
; -----------------------------------------MoBurma Mark Performance edits 23/06/12-------------------------------------------------------------------- ;Changed how Mark performing works now. I initially went with a radio conversation, but it doesn't work well, so I went for a rigid timer instead using the ;existing framework below. Songs are just played as Say commands from the TA. Timer settings will therefore have to be hand adjusted for song length.
if BDBoulderPerformances.MarkPerforming && player.getincell abIABoulderMain
if BDBoulderPerformances.iMarkPerformStage == 0 && BDBoulderPerformances.bMarkdone == 0 setrestrained 1 set BDBoulderPerformances.iMarkPerformStage to 1 set timer to 0 set BDBoulderPerformances.iSongsPlayed to 0 ; Reset number of songs played from potential previous day. MarkRadioREF.say MarkRadioIntro MarkRef.say BDMarkRadioIntroDummy ; 30/06/12 MoBurma - Added this so his mouth moves. Might be redundant, although the TA broadcasts further than speech. endif set timer to (timer + getSecondsPassed)
if BDBoulderPerformances.iMarkPerformStage == 1 && Timer > 10 ;This if plays every song. Random flag in dialogue is used to randomise the actual song. PlayIdle SpecialIdleNVGuitar MarkRadioREF.StartRadioConversation RadioHello set BDBoulderPerformances.iSongsPlayed to BDBoulderPerformances.iSongsPlayed + 1 set BDBoulderPerformances.iMarkPerformStage to 2 endif
if BDBoulderPerformances.iMarkPerformStage == 2 ;set end of song timer. We ALWAYS end at 180 seconds, so we adjust timer here to make up for song length. if BDBoulderPerformances.iSongNumber == 1 set timer to 140 ; Adjust these timer values to change the song length. e.g. if the song is 150 seconds long, make the timer 30 (180 - 150 = 30, duh!) Elseif BDBoulderPerformances.iSongNumber == 2 set timer to 106 Elseif BDBoulderPerformances.iSongNumber == 3 set timer to 45 Elseif BDBoulderPerformances.iSongNumber == 4 set timer to 82 Elseif BDBoulderPerformances.iSongNumber == 5 set timer to 34 Elseif BDBoulderPerformances.iSongNumber == 6 set timer to 145 Elseif BDBoulderPerformances.iSongNumber == 7 set timer to 60 endif set BDBoulderPerformances.iMarkPerformStage to 3 endif
if BDBoulderPerformances.iMarkPerformStage == 3 && Timer >= 180 ; Song end timer Addscriptpackage BDMarkThanksAndGoodnight ; basically a dummy package to break him out of his guitar idle for sure. set Timer to 5 ; short pause before next song if BDBoulderPerformances.iSongsPlayed < 0 ;Change this value to make him play more songs. At the moment set to fail so he only does 1. set BDBoulderPerformances.iMarkPerformStage to 1 ; Start a new random song else set BDBoulderPerformances.iMarkPerformStage to 4 ; Mark has played enough songs today, make him end his show. set timer to 0 endif endif
if BDBoulderPerformances.iMarkPerformStage == 4 ; setrestrained 0 Addscriptpackage BDMarkThanksAndGoodnight ; basically a dummy package to break him out of his guitar idle for sure. set BDBoulderPerformances.iMarkPerformStage to 5 set timer to 0 Elseif BDBoulderPerformances.iMarkPerformStage == 5 MarkRadioREF.say MarkShowEnd ; end of performance setup stuff handled in this dialogue script MarkREF.say BDMarkShowEndDummy set BDBoulderPerformances.iMarkPerformStage to 6 set BDBoulderPerformances.bMarkdone to 1 ; stops package from running again. Cleared in sleep package. endif
if BDBoulderPerformances.MarkPerforming && Gamehour >= 21 || Gamehour < 19 ; Force cleanup if the player has been in another cell or waited while Mark was performing and he's gone over time. MarkRadioREF.StartRadioConversation MarkRadioKill setrestrained 0 set BDBoulderPerformances.iMarkPerformStage to 6 set BDBoulderPerformances.bMarkdone to 1 set BDBoulderPerformances.MarkPerforming to 0 if Gamehour < 22 addscriptpackage BDConcert else addscriptpackage BDSleepMarkMindy endif endif
if BDBoulderPerformances.MarkPerforming && BDBoulderPerformances.OnStage == 0 ; Force onstage if the player changed cell and naughty mark ignored his serestrained state. MovetoMarker MarkStageMarker endif
; ------------------------------------ old timing stuff kept just in case ------------------------------------ ;if (BDBoulderPerformances.iLastSong1 == 1) && (timer >= 42) ; setrestrained 0 ; set BDBoulderPerformances.MarkPerforming to 0 ; Set BDBoulderPerformances.OnStage to 0 ; set playonce to 0 ; evp ;elseif (BDBoulderPerformances.iLastSong1 == 2) && (timer >= 78) ; setrestrained 0 ; set BDBoulderPerformances.MarkPerforming to 0 ; Set BDBoulderPerformances.OnStage to 0 ; set playonce to 0 ; evp ;elseif (BDBoulderPerformances.iLastSong1 == 3) && (timer >= 39) ; setrestrained 0 ; set BDBoulderPerformances.MarkPerforming to 0 ; Set BDBoulderPerformances.OnStage to 0 ; set playonce to 0 ; evp ;elseif (timer >= 35) && (BDBoulderPerformances.iLastSong1 == 5) || (BDBoulderPerformances.iLastSong1 == 6) ; setrestrained 0 ; set BDBoulderPerformances.MarkPerforming to 0 ; Set BDBoulderPerformances.OnStage to 0 ; set playonce to 0 ; evp ;elseif (BDBoulderPerformances.iLastSong1 == 7) && (timer >= 27) ; setrestrained 0 ; set BDBoulderPerformances.MarkPerforming to 0 ; Set BDBoulderPerformances.OnStage to 0 ; set playonce to 0 ; evp ;elseif (BDBoulderPerformances.iLastSong1 == 8) && (timer >= 98) ; setrestrained 0 ; set BDBoulderPerformances.MarkPerforming to 0 ; Set BDBoulderPerformances.OnStage to 0 ; set playonce to 0 ; evp ;endif
endif
END

scn BDBoulderNightWatchScript
int OnceDay ;script block which gets renewed after int OnceNight
;DUMMIED OUT FOR TESTING PURPOSES. MAY REINSTATE LATER
Begin GameMode
;if player.getincell abiabouldermain == 0 return
else
if (BDGigiDialogue.GreetPC == 2) || (GigiRef.GetDead == 1) if GetCurrentTime >= 7 && GetCurrentTime < 23 if OnceDay == 0 setpublic abIABoulderMain 1 set OnceDay to 1 set OnceNight to 0 endif endif
if GetCurrentTime >= 23 || GetCurrentTime < 7 if OnceNight == 0 setpublic abIABoulderMain 0 set OnceNight to 1 set OnceDay to 0 endif endif
endif endif
End

scn abBoulderZaxWALLSCR

scn abZaxVictim1SCR
short doonce short doonce2 short doonce3 short abstopspark float abtimer
Begin onload
if doonce == 0 playsound abLesterBark1 set abstopspark to 1 set doonce to 1 endif
END
Begin gamemode
if abstopspark == 1 set abtimer to abtimer + getsecondspassed endif
if abstopspark == 1 && abtimer > 12 abZaxShockREF1.disable set abstopspark to 2 set abtimer to 0 endif
if doonce2 == 0 && abstopspark == 1 && abtimer > 10 ;abZaxShockREF1.enable abZaxTerm1REF.playsound3d abWPNchimpProd3d abZaxTerm1REF.pushactoraway abZaxVictim1REF 10 abZaxVictim1REF.damageav health 1000 set doonce2 to 1 endif
if doonce3 == 0 && abstopspark == 1 && abtimer > 9 abZaxShockREF1.enable set doonce3 to 1 endif
END

scn abZaxKill1SCR
Begin ontrigger player
abLester3REF.sayto abZaxVictim1REF, abLesterShock1 disable
END

scn BDDPanCannDoSpiritScript
; this is in a seperate quest in case anything goes wrong, it can easily be targetted and fixed. ; DP's cannibal actions are attached in his NPC script in a Combat block
ref CorpseStat ; to trigger cannibal barks int CorpseStatBlock ; freezes reference once collected int CannDo ; 1 = said first bark, 2 = DP learned to cannibalise, 3 = PC told him to not cannibalise int DoOnce ; 3rd comment blocker float CannTimer ; timer for 3rd cannibal bark
int testDoOnce ;DELETE LATER int testDoOnce2 ;DELETE LATER
Begin GameMode
;=======================RESET SCRIPT BLOCKER=========================== ; PC has no AI, so there's no way to use the cannibal animation as condition to trigger DP's barks. "Corpses Eaten" stat must be used. ; It has to be reset so DP's barks only work while he's present when the Corpse stat changes. KAZ
if CorpseStatBlock == 1
if testDoOnce2 == 0 ; showmessage BDDPanMesgWarped ; TEST DELETE set testDoOnce2 to 1 endif
if (BDDPanRef.Waiting == 1) || (BDDPanRef.bHired == 0) set CorpseStatBlock to 0 return endif endif
;========================COMMENT TRACKING=============================
if (BDDPanRef.Waiting == 0) && (BDDPanRef.bHired == 1)
if CorpseStatBlock == 0 set CorpseStat to GetPCMiscStat "Corpses Eaten"
;DELETE TEST MESSAGE LATER if testDoOnce == 0 ; showmessage BDDPanMesgCannibal set testDoOnce to 1 endif
set CorpseStatBlock to 1 endif endif
END
