ESP.ORIGINAL:
Weapons Tester Wanted!
The risk is minor, but the rewards are great. Will pay in food and caps. To apply, report to Doctor Fabler, in the labs of the old Mobile Base Crawler in the Nellis Airplane Graveyard.
Enter the graveyard through the drainage tunnels, and avoid the locals.
ESP.TRADUIT:
招聘武器测试员！
风险很小，但回报很大。会用食物和瓶盖支付。
如需申请，请向旧移动基地爬行器实验室的法布勒博士报告。
在内利斯飞机墓地。
通过排水隧道进入墓地，避开当地人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lester Report #1
ESP.TRADUIT: 测试报告 #1

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This is my first report upon Subject #1, our chimp who after much failure and many, many dead chimps... appears to be our first success. I've called him Lester! We are a little behind schedule, Lester has shown no interest in my tests, or intelligence games that I've given him. Is it possible that our initial readings of his intelligence were false and he isn't intelligent at all?
When I show him my colour matching, at first he seems receptive, but after seven hours, he gets bored and now when I take them out, he walks away. Somewhat upsetting. On a tangent, it seems I may fill a report to the supervisor, it seems those hooligans outside are harassing me again. I told the supervisor, and he said 'You are a grown man and they are kids' but I don't think he's appreciating how bad it has got.
It seems they have found out my credit card number and my lab, because just the other day, a banana pizza was delivered to my lab. Everyone laughed at me! I was so humilated! Who would order a banana pizza? Exactly. At least Lester enjoyed it. Stupid monkey.
Regarding my fellow scientists, Bree seems the least interested in our success. Despite initial disappointments, there is no question, this is unprecedented in genetic science. From the moment, I seemed to have cracked the right genetics, after she had been slaving away from weeks, unfortunately costing the lives of so many monkeys, she has given me the cold shoulder.
What could it be? Maybe, she just can't digest our success yet? But despite her not showing a reaction, she still works away, thinks she can do it again. That's why I married her, even if she is having trouble she can still work away!
Maybe the lovely dear will succeed and create her own intelligent monkey. A girl monkey to mate with Lester. Won't that be romantic. Maybe they can teach us a thing or two. I've gone on too much.
Phillip signing off.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这是我关于1号实验对象的第一份报告，我们的黑猩猩在经历了许多失败和许多死去的黑猩猩之后...似乎是我们的第一次成功。我叫他莱斯特！我们的进度有点落后了。莱斯特对我给他做的测试和智力游戏毫无兴趣。有没有可能我们最初对他智力的解读是错误的，他根本就不聪明？
当我给他看我的颜色配对时，起初他似乎很容易接受，但七个小时后，他就觉得很无聊，现在当我把它们拿出来时，他就走开了。有点令人沮丧。顺带一提，我可能要向主管提交一份报告，看来外面的流氓又来骚扰我了。我告诉了主管，他说'你是个成年人了，他们是孩子'，但我认为他没有意识到情况有多糟糕。
他们似乎已经知道了我的信用卡号和我的实验室，因为就在前几天，一个香蕉披萨送到了我的实验室。每个人都嘲笑我！我感到非常丢脸！谁会点香蕉披萨？没错，至少莱斯特喜欢，愚蠢的猴子。
关于我的科学家同事，布莉似乎对我们的成功最不感兴趣。尽管最初令人失望，但毫无疑问，这在基因科学领域是前所未有的。从我似乎破解了正确的基因的那一刻起，她就对我冷眼相待，因为在此之前，她已经苦干了数周(不幸地夺走了许多猴子的生命)。
会是什么原因呢？也许她还不能接受我们的成功？但尽管她没有表现出任何反应，她仍然努力工作，认为她可以再做一次。这就是为什么我娶了她，即使她有困难，她仍然可以努力工作！
也许可爱的宝贝会成功，创造出她自己的智能猴子，一只雌性猴子和莱斯特交配，这不是很浪漫吗？也许他们能教我们一两招。我说得太多了。
菲利普完毕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lester Report #2
ESP.TRADUIT: 测试报告 #2

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This is my second report on Subject #1, I just like to apologize on record for the lateness of this report and I understand my personal life is no excuse to cease my work. I'm sorry again. While Lester has shown improvement in the intelligence tests, in fact, I've now find out, Lester took my credit card and not only bought five banana pizzas a day, but when I gave him some testing equipment, I turned up the next morning and he'd bought a whole new set.
Seemed the old stuff wasn't good enough. I always liked it. Ha. I guess he doesn't know better. But I was going to use what was left on there to buy a necklace for Bree. You know to win her back? I know you look over these honey? I can change? Please?
Moving on. So true, while Lester has performed, well, above average in our expectations of his intelligence, it seems the only other way of us, ahem, replicating his gifts, seems to have hit a snag. Female chimps appear to find Lester more unattractive, than they did before the experiment. It seems the female chimps don't want gifted, lovingly awkward males and just want males who are unintelligent.
You know chimps who are absolutely obscene. Chimps that already have wives, but want something on the side! Chimps that take recreational drugs and don't care who knows it. Chimps that listen to jazz at high volume! Chimps who are underqualified! Chimps that tie your shoelaces together and so that you trip, while they are screwing your wife, and you... someone gets real angry, and they say 'lighten up, Charlie Chaplin, it's a joke you know?!'
At least that's what I imagine.
Tests to attempt to breed Lester will continue, I guess. Jeez, if I make no headway with Lester, we'll have to sell him to the zoo.
Phillip signing off.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这是我关于课题1的第二次报告。我只想为这份报告的迟到郑重道歉，我明白我的个人生活并不是停止工作的借口，我再次表示歉意。虽然莱斯特在智力测试中表现出了进步，但事实上，我现在发现莱斯特拿着我的信用卡，不仅每天买了五个香蕉披萨，而且当我给他一些测试设备时，第二天早上我转身一看，他又买了一整套新设备。
看来旧的东西还不够好，我一直喜欢。哈，我猜他还不太清楚。但我打算用剩下的钱给布莉买条项链，你懂的，为了赢回她的心？我知道你看了这些宝贝？我能改变吗？求你了？
继续。没错，虽然莱斯特的表现，嗯，超过了我们对他智力的期望值，但我们复制他天赋的唯一方法，似乎遇到了障碍。雌性黑猩猩似乎觉得莱斯特比实验前更没有吸引力了，雌性黑猩猩似乎不想要天赋异禀、笨拙可爱的雄性，而只想要不聪明的雄性。
你知道的，就是那些非常猥琐的黑猩猩，已经有了妻子，但还想要外遇的黑猩猩!吸食娱乐性毒品根本不在乎谁知道的黑猩猩，用大音量听爵士乐的黑猩猩！不合格的黑猩猩！黑猩猩把你的鞋带绑在一起，让你绊倒，而他们正在搞你的妻子，而你...有人非常生气，他们说："放松，查理·卓别林，这是个笑话，你知道吗？！“
至少我是这样想象的。
莱斯特的繁殖试验还会继续，我猜。天啊，如果莱斯特的事没进展，我们就得把他卖给动物园了。
菲利普完毕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: E-mail from the supervisor
ESP.TRADUIT: 主管的电子邮件

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Tardiness
A warning
I've just heard of your recent troubles with your wife and how she is sleeping with another man. Well, the only thing I can say about that is that I must fire you. Can you imagine the bad publicity we will get with science's most notorious couple on the rocks?
I'm sorry, this must not continue, I had to let one of you go, a clean break. Especially since you have not got today's report to me yet! I heard you are just sitting in your office, in a ball, crying. If you thought you keep this from you are wrong! I have the sly dog himself here actually. Clive told me! We are actually play golf together in my office (He's winning, but not for long,) but once I beat him, I'm coming over there to fire your ass. We are all about family here.
Supervisor Poulsen
P.S. Clive says you've kept a bottle of whisky out for your tenth anniversary. Can you open it and pour it into two shotglasses for us, it's not like you need it, that'd be great, before you go.
RE: A warning
Dear Supervisor Poulsen
I understand you are the Alpha Male of this unit, and therefore it will be in my best interests to defer to you. Obviously, the very handsome, very virile Lester takes priority over my mate and her selection of another mate. If his exploits are true, it is unlikely they will produce capable offspring, if at all. I want to tell you, that since you are the Alpha Male of this unit, I, Phillip Sternim, followed your conditions,
It is within your power to fire me. But please relent as I mentor my chimp, Lester, his intelligence has grown beyond all expectations. I thought it was one thing to regularly beat me at chess, something I secretly envy him for, dumb human I am, but that he is also nearing the discovery of perpetual motion and writing down the first notes of faster than light travel.
You became the Alpha Male of this tribe, most likely taking advantage of the newest tools to help your fellow humans.
But I must say, despite all these wonderful things that Lester will most definitely achieve, my mentoring of him is essential and it is unlikely anyone can achieve the same results. If these things are discovered, it is most likely that such a lowly male as myself can't take the credit and an Alpha male like yourself will take yet more females, and yet more praise and yet more share of the sustinence.
But if you wish to fire me at these crucial moment, then do so.
Phillip Dawnbreaker.
RE: RE: A warning.
Hey, maybe I was a little hasty in my actions. You are saying the chimp is close to discovering all these things, if that is the case. The brain centre's prestige wil grow beyond all measurement. The funding from the government will be endless and not only that, I could finally leave this shithole?! Get a real job in the Pentagon.
Cliive is telling me otherwise 'that you are a mook, and a pansy with a wet stem' but this Supervisor makes his own decisions. I like to postpone my suspending of you, Dr. Sternim, until we see some results by November at the earliest. This has made me very pleased indeed, I thought I was going to sit in this office forever, but I think I need a little more challenge in my golf game, if you know what I mean? Oh, and if you run into the two of them again, tell him he owe's me ten bucks.
ESP.TRADUIT:
拖拉
警告
我刚刚听说了你和你妻子最近的矛盾以及她和另一个男人上床的事。嗯，我唯一能说的就是我必须解雇你。你能想象这对科学界最臭名昭著的夫妻婚姻破裂会给我们带来多大的负面影响吗？
我很抱歉，但不能再这样下去了，我不得不让你们中的一个离开，彻底分手。特别是你还没有把今天的报告交给我！你知道吗？我听说你只是坐在办公室里，蜷成一团，哭个不停。如果你认为你可以隐瞒这些，那你就错了！其实我把狡猾的家伙也叫来了，克莱夫告诉我的！我们实际上是在我的办公室里一起打高尔夫（他赢了，但赢不了多久），一旦我打败他，我就会过来炒你的鱿鱼。在这里，我们都是一家人。
- 鲍尔森主管
PS：克莱夫说你为结婚十周年准备了一瓶威士忌。你能在走之前把它打开，倒进两个小酒杯里吗？你又不需要，那就太好了。
回复: 警告
亲爱的鲍尔森主管
我知道你是这个小组的老大，所以我最好听从你的意见。显然，非常英俊，非常有男子气概的莱斯特比我的伴侣和她选择的另一个伴侣更重要。如果他的事迹是真的，那么他们也不太可能产生有能力的后代。我想告诉你，既然你是这个小组的头头，我，菲利普·斯特尼姆，会遵从你的条件。
你有权力解雇我。但请你在我指导我的黑猩猩莱斯特时放宽心，因为他的智力增长已经超出了所有预期。我以为下棋经常赢我是一回事，我暗自羡慕他，我是个愚蠢的人，但他即将发现永动机，写下比光速还快的第一个音符。
你成为了这个部落的大哥大，很可能是利用最新的工具来帮助你的人类同胞。
但我必须说，尽管莱斯特肯定会取得这些成就，但我对他的指导是必不可少的，任何人都不可能取得同样的成绩。如果这些事情被发现了，很可能像我这样地位低下的雄性不能独占功劳，而像你这样的雄性领袖会得到更多的雌性，更多的赞美，更多的食物。
但如果你想在这个关键时刻解雇我，随你便
- 破晓者菲利普
回复: 回复: 警告
嘿，也许我的行动有点草率了。你是说黑猩猩已经接近发现所有这些东西了，如果是这样的话，神经研究中心的声望将增长到无法衡量的程度，来自政府的资金将是无穷无尽的。不仅如此，我终于可以离开这个鬼地方了！去五角大楼找份真正的工作。
克莱夫告诉我的不是这样。说你是'一个笨蛋和一个带着潮湿下体的娘娘腔'，但这个主管自己做决定。我想推迟对你的停职，斯特尼姆博士，直到我们最早在11月看到一些结果。这确实让我非常高兴。我以为我会永远坐在这间办公室里，我以为我会永远坐在这个办公室里，但我觉得我的高尔夫球技需要更多的挑战，你懂我的意思吗？对了，如果你再碰到他们俩，告诉他还欠我十块钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: final testlog
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后的测试日志

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This will be my final entry on Lester. It was touch and go there for a second. I almost didn't think I would do this. Either I could have been fired or Lester could have been sold to a Zoo, But no, the government have reviewed these entries and the test results and will be taking Lester to a bright, new world... in a dark room beneath the Boulder Dome. I will shed many tears when I lose him. At least having Bree back will stem the grief.
I will sign the papers just after I finish this last test report. All tests were immensely positive, except the second last one. He failed in his image acuity test. I left my image cards at home, so I stopped by the general store to buy a couple of newspapers.
I've mentioned the test before, where I ask Lester to identify a human female, a human male, a child, a dog and so on. But instead of pointing them out in the newspaper pictures. He grew incerasingly agitated, and started jumping down the lab in a fury. Banging at the door..
Eventually, he calmed down and was able to perform to his usual best in the illustration test. He sought out extra approval for these, kept hitting me, telling me to look at his drawings. I said 'they were very good', even though I thought they were certainly not his best.
It was a drawing of a mushroom, over and over. Well, I don't think the Government will have him do much drawing where he is going, unless the President is looking for a new portrait artist or something.
I can't wait to tell Bree that one. Oh, it's so good to have her back. I just know she's laughing on the inside.
When Lester is gone, we can be finished with this and move on. I handed in mine and Bree's resignation notices to the Supervisor this morning. Bree says she wants to work, but I think after all that happens, she definitely needs a break. I think we can go on holiday to Tahiti after this war is over. Far away from any trouble or bad influences like Clive.
Yes, honey, Tahiti! Surprise!
In conclusion, Lester is healthy and fine and this report is ready to be processed by the U.S. Department of Defence at its earliest opportunity (Bye buddy!)
ESP.TRADUIT:
这将是我关于莱斯特的最后一篇记录。有那么一瞬间，我感觉很危险，我几乎没想到我会这样做。要么我被解雇，要么莱斯特可能被卖给动物园。但是没有，政府已经审查了这些条目和测试结果，并将带莱斯特去一个明亮的新世界...在博尔德巨蛋下的一间黑屋子里。当我失去他时，我会流很多眼泪的，至少布莉回来会止住悲伤。
等我完成最后一份测试报告后，我就会在文件上签字。所有测试都非常积极，除了倒数第二项，他的图像敏锐度测试失败了。我把图像卡落在了家里，所以我顺便去杂货店买了几份报纸。
我之前提到过这个测试，我让莱斯特识别一个人类女性，一个人类男性，一个孩子，一条狗等等，但不是在报纸的照片上指出他们。他变得越来越激动，开始愤怒地从实验室里跳下来，砰砰地敲着门。
最终，他平静下来，在插图测试中能够发挥出他一贯的最佳水平。他为这些画寻求额外的批准，不停地拍我，让我看看他的画。我说'这非常好'，尽管我认为这些肯定不是他最好的。
那是一幅蘑菇的图画，一遍又一遍。好吧，我不认为政府会让他在他要去的地方画很多画，除非总统在找一个新的肖像画家或什么的。（再见，哥们儿！）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Out Of Luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 运气不好！

ESP.ORIGINAL: To any who would dare browse my personal files, while I'm in cryo-stasis, you are out of luck! I took the precaution of wiping the hard-drive before I went in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有人胆敢在我冻滞的时候浏览我的个人文件，那你就倒霉了！我做了个预防措施，进去之前把硬盘里的东西都擦除干净了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Experiments are a go ahead - Bree Sternim
ESP.TRADUIT: 实验正在进行中 - 布莉·斯特尼姆

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Experiments are a go ahead
from Bree Sternim
I'm going to do the experiments tonight. We are going to run the treatments across the whole batch. I'll need you to monitor the results and readings once we are successful. Phillip is out of town tonight, so I'll need your physical assistance as well.
I don't know why the rest of the team regards subject #1 as such a success, if anything, he is only the beginning of our work. One smart chimp is a novelty, twenty four smart chimps is a bomb disposal team. I just don't know why they don't see it. Anyway, we'll do the experiments tonight, oh and keep it to yourself.
Bree.
RE: Experiments are a go ahead
Uhh, yeah, sure, my daughter's play was tonight, but do you know how hard it is get through a bunch of second graders doing some shitty play? I was high as a kite last year and even then it made me trip bad, all those fucking pilgrims... and the small pox... horrible. So, yeah, I'll just tell the wife that I have to work. Wait a second.
Nevermind. Just you and me? Yeah, baby, sure. Wait? Phillip is out of town, sweetheart. I know the guy is a mook, but i thought out of you two, he had all the brains to make it all happen. Hey! Unless, the experiment is you and me, baby and we don't need that schmuck. Unless, you know you are into that? I'm game for anything.
Even I'm surprised, baby, that we got one chimp cracking the sums! Even flipped me off right back!
RE: RE: Experiments are a go ahead.
Me and you? Don't be absurd! I should have you fired right now! I can have anyone fired! Including my husband! Because I don't need him. I've never needed him. The cute scientist couple thing, you are smart enough to realize it's to get us into journals, to get us to this moment.
So he made one chimp smart? Tomorrow morning, it will be a footnote, where you and me would have created twenty four chimp supersoldiers. But all the greatest discoveries are done in secret... that's why I don't want you to tell anyone, especially Phillip. Be at the lab, 12 sharp, tonight!
Bree
P.S. Delete this e-mail!
ESP.TRADUIT:
实验正在进行
来自布莉·斯特尼姆
我今晚要做实验，我们将对整个批次进行处理。一旦我们成功，我需要你监测结果和读数。菲利普今晚不在城里，所以我也需要你的身体协助。
我不知道为什么团队的其他成员认为1号实验对象如此成功。如果有什么区别的话，他只是我们工作的开始。一只聪明的黑猩猩是新奇的，二十四只聪明的黑猩猩是一个拆弹小组。我只是不知道为什么他们没有看到这一点。总之，我们今晚就做实验。哦，别告诉别人。
- 布莉
回复: 实验正在进行
呃，是的，当然，我女儿的演出是在今晚，但你知道要看完一群二年级学生的烂戏有多难吗？去年我嗑药嗑得像风筝一样高，即使那样我也很难受，那些该死的朝圣者...还有天花...太可怕了。所以，是的，我就告诉妻子，我必须工作。等一下。
别介意。就你和我？是的，宝贝，当然。等等？菲利普出城了，亲爱的。我知道那家伙是个笨蛋，但我认为在你们两个人中，他有足够的头脑来实现这一切。嘿！除非，实验是你和我，宝贝，我们不需要那个笨蛋。除非，除非，你知道你喜欢那个？我愿意做任何事.
连我都很惊讶，宝贝，竟然有一只黑猩猩破解了这些数字！甚至还对我竖中指！
回复: 回复: 实验正在进行
我和你？别傻了！我现在就该解雇你！我可以解雇任何人！包括我丈夫！因为我不需要他，我从来都不需要他。可爱的科学家夫妇，你很聪明，应该知道这是为了让我们上期刊，让我们进入这里。
所以他让一只黑猩猩变聪明了？明天早上，它将成为一个注脚，你和我将在那里创造24个黑猩猩超级士兵。但所有最伟大的发现都是秘密完成的，所以我不想让你告诉任何人，尤其是菲利普。今晚12点准时到实验室！
- 布莉
PS：删掉这些邮件！

ESP.ORIGINAL: An Important Message.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一条重要的消息。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I no longer desire you as a mate. I regret to inform that your hips are too narrow and your range of habits would only be detrimental to our hypothetical offspring. I can only imagine when the time comes to pick each other's nits, I would pick more of yours, than you would of mine.
Therefore, I've decided to seek a mate with wider hips, much more maternal behaviour and is willing to pick far more nits from my back, than I would hers. Being a human, it is far easier to pick nits from a bare back, than one from a mat of hair, say from... a chimp. Not that I'd know anything about them, since I am an ignorant human.
At this point you are likely thinking about going into a cave and dieing from your grief from your inability to find a mate, but this is not the case. I have ascertained that your former mate, Phillip, would be an excellent match for you. By complete accident, I caught him attempting to improve his positives as a mate.
Only a few hours ago, he tried to lift two weights. He made it almost half-way. Before dropping them and crying until he fell asleep. Even sparring against other males. When delivering the daily banana pizzas, the Pizza delivery man raised the rate and Phillip was furious about it! I'm sure, next time the delivery man comes, Phillip might say something about it. Might.
To conclude, Phillip is the better mate for you, and I am a level above you in attraction and power. Now I must get back to my human hobbies of torturing animals, eating meat and endangering the Earth blindly.
From Clive.
RE: An Important Message.
Clive! I had you all wrong! Just when I thought I was going to dump you, you get all "tribal" on me. This is a whole other side to you. I thought you were a hedonistic quasi-drug addict who only cared about himself. This shows you taking charge. You sound almost... brainy.
Seriously... I thought, you know, we'd have our fun and I'd go back to Phillip, and he'd be like... grateful. I have to rethink a few things. But I now know, that I don't want to be with Phillip at all. The person I want to be with is you. Just think, together, we can produce an army of super-intelligent apes!
Phillip can go to hell, and that little pet hairball, he calls a success. You and me, we don't have to accept mediocrity like people like Phillip does!
I know I said I was busy later, but... come round. I'll slip out from this labcoat into something more comfortable. You, however, will be slipping into something uncomfortable.
Bree.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我不再需要你做我的伴侣了。我很遗憾地告诉你，你的臀部太窄，你的各种习惯只会对我们假想的后代有害。我只能想象，当我们要互相扒虱子的时候，我会扒更多你的，而不是你扒我的。
因此，我决定寻找一个臀部更宽、更有母性、愿意从我背上摘更多虱子的伴侣。作为一个人，从裸露的背上挑虱子要比从一堆毛发上(比如从黑猩猩身上)挑虱子容易得多。我对他们一无所知，因为我是一个无知的人类。
在这个时候，你可能会想去洞穴里，因为找不到伴侣而悲伤而死，但事实并非如此。我已经确定，你的前伴侣菲利普将是你的最佳伴侣。完全出于偶然，我发现他试图改善他作为伴侣的积极态度。
就在几个小时前，他还试着举起两个重物。他几乎做到了一半，然后就把它们丢了，哭到睡着了。他甚至在与其他雄性动物打架。在送每天的香蕉披萨时，送披萨的人提高了费率，菲利普为此大发雷霆！我相信下次送外卖的人来的时候，菲利普可能会说些什么。也许吧。
总而言之，菲利普是更适合你的伴侣，因为我在吸引力和力量方面比你高一个层次。现在我必须回到我的人类爱好中去，折磨动物，吃肉，盲目地危害地球。
来自克莱夫。
回复：一条重要的信息
克莱夫！我完全误会你了！就在我想甩了你的时候，你对我说了一堆"种族"话。这完全是你的另一面，我以为你是一个只关心自己的享乐主义的准瘾君子。这表明你在掌控一切，你听起来几乎...很有头脑。
说真的，我想，你知道，我们会玩得很开心，然后我会回到菲利普身边，他会很...感激的样子。我得重新考虑几件事，但我现在知道，我根本不想和菲利普在一起，我想要的人是你，想想看，我们可以一起制造一支超级聪明的猿类军队！
菲利普可以带着他所谓的成功的小宠物毛球去死了。你和我，我们不需要像菲利普那样接受平庸的生活！
我知道我说过我稍后很忙，但是...过来吧。我要脱掉这件工作服，换上更舒服的衣服，而你，则要换上不舒服的衣服。
- 布莉

ESP.ORIGINAL: Letter from Bree
ESP.TRADUIT: 布莉的来信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
That's it! We are over! I frankly don't want to see you ever again!
All that time we spent together?! Ofcourse, it all makes sense! You weren't with me, because of me, you were with me to steal my research. Oh, you are so very clever! Hours where it seemed like you were immersed in a drug-fueled stupor, you were in fact observing my research. I should have been more on guard. Kept you at a distance. But you seemed like such a moron, I thought, ironically, I could trust you.
Don't think you can convince me otherwise in what you were up to. The supervisor got an e-mail from you. So you act like an idiot all around us, but you have secret, indepth e-mails with the supervisor. How could you come up with an idea like that, when it took me months to even get close to the solution? How can a 'psychologist' come up with an idea like that?
I was trying to solve all the world's problems by giving it super-intelligent ultra-strong monkey soldiers and you go and give the Supervisor the cure to cancer, via our monkey research, for the sake of your own vanity! Well, the shoe is on the other foot, because I told the supervisor what happened to his prized Petunias. Yes, that you smoked them away faster than Chicago.
You have two days notice. On October 24th 2077, you won't be working here anymore, Clive.
Bree 'It wasn't that good anyway' Sternim.
ESP.TRADUIT:
就这样了！我们结束了！坦白说，我再也不想见到你了！
我们一起度过的所有时光？！当然，这一切都是有意义的！你和我在一起不是因为我，你和我在一起是为了偷我的研究。哦，你真是太聪明了！在你看似沉浸在毒品的诱惑下的几个小时里，你实际上是在观察我的研究。我应该更加警惕的，让你保持距离。但你看起来像个白痴，我想，讽刺的是，我以为可以信任你。
别以为你能说服我你的目的，主管收到了你的电子邮件。所以你在我们面前表现得像个白痴一样，但你和主管有秘密的、深入的邮件往来？我花了几个月的时间才接近解决方案，你怎么能想出这样的主意？一个'心理学家'怎么能想出这样的主意？
我正试图通过给它提供超级智能的超强猴兵来解决世界上所有的问题，而你却为了自己的虚荣心，通过我们的猴子研究，去给主管提供治疗癌症的方法！可现在情况不一样了，因为我告诉了主管他心爱的矮牵牛花的下落。是的，说你把抽它们的速度比芝加哥还快。
提前两天通知你。2077年10月24日，你就不在这里工作了，克莱夫。
- 布莉'反正也没那么好'斯特尼姆。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clive's personal log 20/8/77
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱夫的个人日志 - 2077年8月20日

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I just need somewhere to write this down! Usually I'd say i'd write something down and I'd forget it by the morning and inhaling three pounds of coke doesn't seem to help . I want to write that I might be in love for the first time in my life!
My dumb-ass shrink thinks I'm incapable of loving, and what a mook I was for believing him! Problem is, I think I am in love with the head scientist.. Bree, I think her name is? God, i'm remembering people's names. Ever since she popped out of her mother I can't even remember my daughter's name half the time.
When did she pop out of her mother? Memo to self: find out daughter's age.
Anyway, love! It must have all started in the lab, we were doing experiments on these animal things and when we made our first experiments to one of the specimens. God, everyone's dick was half way inside them when doing it, except Bree. Oh, but it didn't start until that thing got out of it's cage, fucked up on drugs and genetic hoop-las, throwing sharp instruments and feces alike.
Everyone was shitting themselves except me, including her pansy-ass husband, Phillip, I was... judging the situation... you know like I always do, but Bree.. oh, Bree, her hand shot out and grabbed that fucking rat thing's coat, threw it down in the table and fired a tranqualizer into his ass-cheek, that left me... aroused.
I remember the whimpering of that thing as it fell asleep. This scientist is no ordinary chick, she is a goddess. Even with the money, I thought this assignment would be a drag, but I can't wait until tomorrow until we do more tests and watch more of her in action. If only she wasn't married.
P.S I think they are called monkeys, i'm sure they are called monkeys. Also buy more milk.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我只是需要找个地方把这个写下来! 通常我说我要写下一些东西，到了早上我就会忘记，而且吸食三磅可卡因似乎也没有帮助. 我想写的是，我可能是有生以来第一次恋爱了！
我的傻逼心理医生认为我没有能力去爱，而我相信他的说法，真是个笨蛋！问题是，我认为我已经爱上了。问题是，我想我爱上了首席科学家，我想她的名字是布莉？天啊，我记起别人的名字了。自从她从她妈妈肚子里蹦出来以后，有一半的时间我甚至记不起我女儿的名字。
她什么时候从她妈妈肚子里出来的？给自己的备忘录:查一下女儿的年龄。
不管怎么说，爱！这一定是在实验室里开始的，我们用这些动物做实验，当我们第一次用其中一个标本做实验时。天啊，做的时候每个人的小弟弟都有一半在他们体内，除了布莉。但直到那东西出了笼子，搞砸了药物和基因环，扔了锋利的器具和粪便之类的东西才开始。
除了我，所有人都吓得尿裤子了，包括她的娘娘腔老公菲利普。我正在...判断情况，你懂的，就像我一直做的那样，但是布瑞...哦，布莉，她突然伸出手伸来，抓住了那只该死的老鼠的外套，扔在桌子上然后给他的屁股打了镇定剂。这让我...兴奋不已。
我记得那东西睡着时发出的呜咽声。这个科学家不是普通的姑娘，她是个女神。就算有了钱，我也觉得这个任务会很累人，但我等不及明天做更多的测试，看她更多的表演。要是她没结婚就好了。
P.S：我想他们叫猴子，我确定他们叫猴子。还要多买些牛奶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clive's personal log 10/9/77
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱夫的个人日志 - 2077年10月9日

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Oh god, I need to write this somewhere before I delete it. If anything they could use this as evidence against me, you know?! I can't believe what happened in the lab. This has been quite a standard couple of weeks, I thought I could control myself, you know sexually, when Bree will hurt a monkey, I figure I just stand behind a tall desk and no one will be the wiser.
But this? Jeez? This is one for the books. I walk in there batched with excuses, they were good, I needed them, I was late for work again. I'm sure Bree would fire me. I was terrified... and aroused by that for some reason, but something very different happened when I walked in. All over the place lay the monkeys. At first, I thought they were sleeping, even remembering making the funniest joke ever
'Looks like one good party' I said, Bree didn't laugh, instead stared at me as she dragged one of them into a box. She told me. All the monkeys were dead.
I asked if that was meant to happen. Bree asked me if I was going to tell anybody. If I was going to tell the Feds? Tell them what, I asked. Oh, that reminds me, Ronald needs to give me back my comb. Yeah, anyway, she came up to me and before I knew it, we were kissing against the table, she pulled back and said 'you wont tell anyone' over and over.
I know we both got wife and kids, but I think sleeping with Clive would be something you'd shout from the rooftops. God, it's like nothing else, fucking somebody surrounded by dead monkeys. After, we got a new batch and she said to be real quiet. This is hot.
P.S. I guess I have to do some work now. I'll take a shot of Med-X first, that'll loosen me up, then i'll delete this and get on with my work.
ESP.TRADUIT:
噢，上帝，我需要在删掉之前把它写在某个地方。如果有的话，他们会用这个作为对我不利的证据，你知道吗？！我不敢相信实验室里发生的事。这几周很正常，我以为布莉伤害猴子的时候，我能控制自己的性行为。我想我只要站在一张高桌子后面就没人会知道了。
但这？天啊？这是个大问题。我带着一堆借口走进去，它们很好，我需要它们，我上班又迟到了，我确信布莉会解雇我。我吓坏了...但出于某种原因，我的性欲被唤起了，但当我走进去的时候，发生了完全不同的事情，到处都躺着猴子。起初，我以为它们在睡觉，甚至记得我说了一个有史以来最有趣的笑话。
“看来是个不错的聚会。”我说。布莉没有笑，而是盯着我，把其中一个拖进一个箱子里。她告诉我，所有猴子都死了。
我问这是否注定会发生。布里问我是否会告诉别人。是不是打算告诉联邦政府的人？“告诉他们什么，”我问。哦，这倒提醒了我，罗纳德需要把我的梳子还给我。是的，不管怎样，她走到我面前，我还没反应过来，我们就靠着桌子接吻了，她后退了一下，一遍又一遍地说“你不能告诉任何人”。
我知道我们都有妻子和孩子，但我认为和克莱夫上床会是你从屋顶上喊出来的事情。天啊，跟一个被死猴子包围的人做爱，真是太爽了。之后，我们又买了一批，她说要安静。这很性感。
P.S：我想我现在得做点工作了。我要先打一针注射剂-X，那会让我放松下来，然后我会删掉这个，继续我的工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Letter of Apology from Henry
ESP.TRADUIT: 亨利的道歉信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear Hueng,
Please accept my most sincere apologies for shooting you. If you are not dead and are reading this message, please give me your forgiveness. I've never shot anyone before and I really didn't mean to!
I mean, hey, I love Chinese food!
Sincerely,
Henry from the other side
ESP.TRADUIT:
亲爱的王,
请接受我对开枪射你最真诚的道歉。如果你还没死，正在阅读这条信息，请原谅我。我从来没朝任何人开枪过，我真的不是故意的！
我是说，嘿，我喜欢中国菜！
真诚地,
另一边的亨利

ESP.ORIGINAL: Urgent Message from Sentinel Grant!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来自尖兵格兰特的紧急信息！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
There's been a situation here. Come at once. I'm in need of your services once more.
Grant
ESP.TRADUIT:
这里出了点状况。马上来，我再次需要你的帮助。
- 格兰特

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unknown Radio Transmission
ESP.TRADUIT: 未知无线电信号

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The transmission contains coordinate data, and the following message:
If you're still alive out there, my name is Kate. I was captured by Doctor Fabler, and brought with you on the same truck to Colorado. I'm so sorry I left you there, asleep in your cryo chamber. Some creepy looking tin-men were coming, with some serious fire-power, and I had to get out of there.
Looks like I've got myself into some serious trouble this time. I'm being held in the dead factory. Use the coordinate data to track me on your pip-boy. Just be careful though, there are some creepy ghouls here.
Kate
ESP.TRADUIT:
信号包含坐标数据和以下消息:
如果你还活着，我叫凯特。我被法布勒博士抓住了，和你一起用同一辆卡车运到了科罗拉多。我很抱歉把你留在那里，让你在冷冻室里睡着。一些令人毛骨悚然的铁皮人来了，带着强大的火力，我不得不离开那里。
看来这次我给自己惹上大麻烦了，我被关在死亡工厂里。使用坐标数据来追踪我和你的Pip-boy。不过要小心，这里有一些恐怖的食尸鬼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Check on Derek
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看德里克

ESP.ORIGINAL: A man called Keith, who is living in a shack, has asked me to check on Derek, in the other small shack. He'll give me some food and water for my effort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 住在小棚子里的一个叫基思的人叫我去看看德里克，他住在另一个小棚子里。他会给我一些食物和水作为我努力的回报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Message from Stu
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯图的留言

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey Mickey, glad you found this message okay. I knew you'd look here. Had some trouble from Metalheads coming back into Colorado, had to take an alternate route in. Turned out to be a dead end, and I'm out of gas. Had to leave the truck.
I'll tell you how to find it. Near that old military bunker where we saw the white ants, where the smoking pits are, out in the wastes, there's a path leading to a bay and a junk trader's yard. I think you know the guy. You'll have to swim through the cave tunnel there, and you'll find your truck.
Sorry to leave you on your own, pal, but I gotta take another line of work. Those damn Metalheads shot my leg to shit anyway. Gonna cut this short. I'm heading up to the Pioneer Cafe in the city, if you wanna catch up.
Stay sharp, my friend.
Stu
ESP.TRADUIT:
嘿，米奇，很高兴你能找到这条信息，我就知道你会看这里。在回科罗拉多的路上遇到了金属头的麻烦，不得不换了条路。结果是一条死路，我没油了，只能离开货车。
我告诉你怎么找到它。在我们看到白蚂蚁的那个旧军事碉堡附近，也就是冒烟的坑附近，在外面的荒地上，有一条小路通向一个海湾和一个垃圾商人的院子。我想你认识那个人。你必须游过那里的洞穴隧道，然后你就会找到你的卡车。
对抱歉把你一个人留下，伙计，但我得换份工作了，那些该死的金属头还是把我的腿打得稀巴烂。我就长话短说，我要去城里的先锋咖啡馆，如果你想聊聊的话。
保持警惕，我的朋友。
- 斯图

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Finally got the bomb shelter completed and I'm going to do a few practice drills with my wife, Louise, and our daughter, Dawn. I want us to be extremely familiar with each step we'll take if the sirens do go off. I figure if we do these drills enough times before the bombs drop, it will be done in a calm, orderly fashion and nothing of importance will be forgotten once that dreaded day does come.
I don't know how true this pending nuclear war is. The Government has lied so much before, so it's rather pointless to believe them now, right?
Right?
ESP.TRADUIT:
终于建好了防空洞，我打算和我的妻子路易丝以及我们的女儿道恩做一些演习，我希望大家对警报响起后要采取的每一步都非常熟悉。我想，如果我们在核弹落下之前进行足够多的演习，演习就会以一种平静、有序的方式进行，一旦可怕的那一天到来，任何重要的事情都不会被遗忘。
我不知道这场即将到来的核战争的真实性如何。政府以前撒了那么多谎，所以现在相信他们毫无意义，对吧？
对吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Can NOT believe this happened. There is no way out of this mess either. I fully blame Louise, too.
A simple practice drill - and I told Louise and Dawn to leave the door alone. It could close, yes, but as long as no one pressed any buttons, one could reopen it easily. Now the goddamn security code is fucked and we're stuck inside this tomb, and the goddamn reset manual and instructions are upstairs.
Louise, why did you have to let your curious nature out? Figures... Of course no one can hear us yelling for help - we're locked behind tons of concrete and lead. I could strangle her right now.
I need to figure a way out of here. Thank goodness we have air to breathe and plenty of food and water to last about a month - maybe longer if we ration it. Good thing I stocked way more that those idiots recommended.
Surely someone will notice we're missing and come to check before... No! Can't think like that. I know someone will come. Won't they?
ESP.TRADUIT:
不敢相信会发生这种情况，也没有办法摆脱这一困境，我也全部归咎于路易丝。
一个简单的练习演习。我告诉路易丝和道恩不要去管那扇门。它可以关闭，是的，但只要没有人按任何按钮，就可以很容易地重新打开它。现在该死的安全密码被毁了，我们被困在这个坟墓里，该死的重置手册和指令都在楼上。
路易丝，你为什么要释放你好奇的天性？很正常...当然，没有人能听到我们的呼救，我们被锁在成吨的混凝土和铅后面。我现在就可以掐死她。
我得想办法离开这里。谢天谢地，我们还有空气可以呼吸，还有足够的食物和水可以维持大约一个月...如果我们限量配给，可能会更长。幸好我的存货比那些白痴推荐的要多。
肯定有人会注意到我们失踪了，然后过来检查...不！不能这么想，我知道会有人来的，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Don’t know what to do. bombs dropping everywhere. has it been a few days? Weeks maybe? we're so scared. the entire vault sh@^es every time one falls. ---@% (wr{^%t$$) ---#^ feels like one hit only a mile away! if one hits us will we survive? so scared.
Dawn is sobbing as well as Louise. I'm trying to be brave. I'm trying. This only link to the world - this terminal - may be the only thing keeping us sane. It goes in and out with each bomb that hits. I fear it may permanently go out one of these ---&^. I h^#r ano^&Er shriek of A@ incomi..bomb.. 2$@ azse#^^(33se) --------------------#@ ---------------
bomb fel .(#%) close here. tooclose...did dust fall inside the shelter? are we being radiated? stop screaming! must think what to do.
Dawn is screaming. Louise is screaming. makeitstop make it stop make it stop ~~)(^^%---6^^
ESP.TRADUIT:
不知道该怎么办，核弹到处都在落，有几天了？我们很害怕，每当有核弹落下，整个地下室都会吓一跳。--@% (wr{^%t$$) --#^感觉就像一英里外就有一个核弹！如果有一枚核弹击中我们，我们能活下来吗？
道恩和路易丝一样在抽泣，我在努力让自己变得勇敢起来，我在努力。这个与世界的唯一联系...这个终端...可能是让我们保持清醒的唯一东西。它随着每颗核弹的袭击时好时坏，我担心它可能会永久熄火在这些---&^。我^#听^&尖叫一@ 核弹2$@ azse#^^(33se) --------------------#@ ---------------
核弹落下...(#%)离这里很近，太近了...灰尘落在防空洞里了吗？我们被辐射了吗？别叫了！必须想想该怎么办了。
道恩在尖叫，路易丝在尖叫，让它停下，让它停下。 让它停下来 ~~)(^^%--6^^

ESP.ORIGINAL:
don't knoe the day right now, how long?
Not much food left. maybe a few days? week? maybe - not more than that tho
stopped eating so dawn can eat. hungry but dawn mustlive. Almost out of retions and warte. cant drink from sink ro tiolet..rads
Shelter is so small. one room. is everyone still alive outside? will theyfind us? hehe like hide and go seek, hehehe. play with me....don't let wife see this...feel funny..but good! Alive!
ESP.TRADUIT:
不知道现在是哪一天，多长时间？
剩余的食物不多了，也许几天？一周？也许吧...不过不会超过这个时间。
不吃东西了，好让道恩吃。饥饿，但道恩必须活着。几乎没有食物和水了，不能喝水槽里的水。
庇护所太小了，只有一个房间。外面的人都还活着吗？他们会找到我们吗？呵呵，就像捉迷藏一样，嗬嗬嗬。和我一起玩...别让妻子看到这个...感觉很好笑，但很好！活着!

ESP.ORIGINAL:
louise says i rock. back and forth, back and forth i dont rock. shes just stupid.
i think they talk about me, the girl stares at me likeshe is scared of me.stare...scare... scared. you dont know what fear is, little girl....
ESP.TRADUIT:
露易丝说我很摇滚。来来回回，来来回回 我不摇滚。 她就是太笨了。
我想他们在谈论我，那个女孩盯着我，好像她很害怕我。 害怕。 你不知道什么是恐惧，小姑娘...

ESP.ORIGINAL:
have new shelter frend. name is jody. Jody helps. he tellsstories. good stories. hehe i like jody. lady and child keep crying and asking me to come back. Jody says they must go. must go. are eating the food n cant have that no. no. no eat food. need silence. too loud for jody and me. too loud.
they must go. yes they must go...soon! jody says...
ESP.TRADUIT:
我有一个新的庇护所朋友，叫裘迪。裘迪帮忙，他讲故事，好故事，嘿嘿，我喜欢裘迪。女人和孩子一直在哭，叫我回来。裘迪说他们必须走，必须走，他们在吃东西，不能吃，不能吃，要安静，对裘迪和我来说太吵了，太吵了。
他们必须走。是的，他们必须走...很快！裘迪说...

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Soquiet. peace. jody ishappytoo. i like quiet. ilike this. last can ofpears butjody says its fine.itsfinefinefinefinefine
thewoman and child dont talk. they sleep. sleep. hehehe the child spilled reddrink on her and the woman. dirtychild.
ESP.TRADUIT:
好安静，平和，裘迪也很高兴。我 喜欢安静，我喜欢这个，最后一罐梨 但是乔迪说没事，没事，没事，没事
女人和孩子不说话了。 他们睡觉了。 睡着了。 呵呵，孩子把红色饮料洒在她和那个女人身上。肮脏的孩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I...feel.. what have I done? insanity? I must have gone insane.... Gods help me I killed my wife and child...
I... no. This isn't real. Just a dream. Think I'll go lie by Louise and Dawn and sleep too.
Have no sleep aid but this 9mm should work just fine.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我...感觉... 我做了什么？ 精神错乱？ 我一定是疯了... 上帝保佑我 我杀了我的妻子和孩子... 我...不，这不是真的。 只是一个梦。 我还是去路易丝和道恩旁边躺着吧 还有睡觉。
没有助眠剂 但这把9毫米口径的应该没问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Laser Beam
ESP.TRADUIT: 脉冲束

ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great news! Now that we have a real economy, you can pay in caps!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好消息！现在我们有了实体经济，你可以用瓶盖付钱了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {maintains friendly, casual greeting throughout}How are you? Terrible? Horrible? Nauseous?
ESP.TRADUIT: {maintains friendly, casual greeting throughout}你还好吗？糟透了？可怕？恶心？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {concerned}Your skin looks so tight. Are you stressed? In pain?
ESP.TRADUIT: {concerned}你的皮肤看起来很紧绷，你压力大吗？痛苦吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {earned book}I heard about Firefly attacking you. He was obviously messed up, but his actions were inexcusable. I pray that Sam isn't next.
ESP.TRADUIT: {earned book}我听说萤火虫攻击了你，他显然是搞砸了，但他的行为是不可原谅的。我祈祷萨姆不是下一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can take all the precautions in the world, but something about being in that super radiation too long really screws people up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以采取世界上所有的预防措施，但在超级辐射中呆太久真的会让人崩溃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've certainly earned this. Boulder thanks you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你应得的，博尔德感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddItem BDDomeLogBook 1 AndresBox.RemoveItem BDDomeLogBook 5
{gremlin not caught}I heard about Firefly attacking you. He was obviously messed up, but his actions were inexcusable. I pray that Sam isn't next.
ESP.TRADUIT: {gremlin not caught}我听说了萤火虫攻击你的事，他显然是搞砸了，但他的行为是不可原谅的。我祈祷萨姆不会是下一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can take all the precautions in the world, but something about being in that super radiation too long really screws people up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以采取世界上所有的预防措施，但在超级辐射中呆太久真的会让人崩溃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get inside before anyone else spots us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在别人发现我们之前快进去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [0108373E] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: SamGRef.Addscriptpackage BDSamRun abBoulderFrontDoorREF.Unlock AndreRef.Enable AndreRef.setrestrained 1
{suspicious of PC}State your business.
ESP.TRADUIT: {suspicious of PC}陈述你的情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {firm praise}I heard you did fine work out there. What brings you to Boulder?
ESP.TRADUIT: {firm praise}我听说你在那里干得不错，什么风把你吹到博尔德来了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {disgust}What's a coward like you doing in a place like this if you can't even be bothered to help a man fight for his life?
ESP.TRADUIT: {disgust}像你这样连帮助一个人保命都懒得做的懦夫在这种地方能做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowMessage BDBoulderInfamy set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep to -1
{monster hit}Have you made any progress?
ESP.TRADUIT: {monster hit}你有什么进展吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you made any progress?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么进展吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you made any progress?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么进展吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {annoyed}I won't help you until you give me my book!
ESP.TRADUIT: {annoyed}除非你把书给我，否则我不会帮你的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

{taunting}You look different! Have you lost weight?
ESP.TRADUIT: {taunting}你看起来不一样了！你减肥了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: If (BDDPanRef.bHired == 1) && (BDBoulderGremlin.DPPissed == 0) && (BDDPanRef.waiting == 0) BDDPanRef.AddScriptPackage BDDPanGremlinConfront Set BDBoulderGremlin.DPPissed to 1 endif
Talk to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: If (BDDPanRef.bHired == 1) && (BDBoulderGremlin.DPPissed == 0) && (BDDPanRef.waiting == 0) BDDPanRef.AddScriptPackage BDDPanGremlinConfront Set BDBoulderGremlin.DPPissed to 1 endif
So, you're the gremlin!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你就是小魔怪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDBoulderGremlin.PCDetected to 1 ;MoBurma 23/06/12 - complete projector obj SetObjectiveCompleted BDBoulderGremlin 27 1
I'll give you five seconds to get the fuck out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你五秒钟，给我滚出去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quest not accepted. Aims gun, disgust tinged with empathy}What the hell did you do that makes you so eager to die?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Quest not accepted. Aims gun, disgust tinged with empathy}你到底做了什么，使你如此渴望死亡？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: set FireflyRef.SelfDefense to 0
{quest not accepted, aims gun, extra angry}I'm done with you! Another word and I'll shoot!
ESP.TRADUIT: {quest not accepted, aims gun, extra angry}我受够你了！再说一个字，我就开枪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set FireflyRef.aggrocount to FireflyRef.aggrocount + 1 if FireflyRef.aggrocount == 2 set FireflyRef.SelfDefense to 0 endif
{quest in progress. no longer aims gun, mocking}Giving up so soon, badass?
ESP.TRADUIT: {quest in progress. no longer aims gun, mocking}这么快就放弃了，坏蛋？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're still in one piece. Did something go wrong?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还完好无损。出了什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you know you died when you walked through that door. Everyone in here is already dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你知道，当你走进那扇门的时候，你已经死了。这里的每个人都已经死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.squadpurpose to 1

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I'll be damned. I thought we were gonna have to go in there ourselves and clean it up. You saved me a lot of time and resources.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真见鬼了。我以为我们得自己进去把它清理干净，你为我节省了大量的时间和资源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess you want your woman back now. I don’t know if you saw her on your way down there, but she's half ghoul now. Maybe you're into that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你现在想要回你的女人。我不知道你在去的路上有没有看到她，但她现在有一半是食尸鬼了，也许你喜欢这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want her still, she's yours. You didn’t happen to see whats wrong with the generator, while you were down there did you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还想要她，她就是你的了。你在下面的时候，没有碰巧看到发电机出了什么问题吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abSergeantTalkQ.abSendEngineer to 0

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright you got your girl. Now give me the fucking password before I torture it out of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，你找到你的女孩了。在我折磨你之前把密码给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw you coming a mile away, and pulled up a chair to enjoy your death. Pity you let me down.. though I have another use for you now. Come find me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看见你从一英里外走来，就拉了把椅子，享受你的死亡。可惜你让我失望了，不过我现在对你还有别的用处，来找我吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [010569DD] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No one will attack you inside the factory, but I can't control what happens outside these walls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在工厂里没人会攻击你，但我控制不了墙外会发生什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [010569DD] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols
set abSergeantTalkQ.abIntercomStage to 10

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Knolls [01004D79] (mod) Quest : ([01004D7B]abEngineerTalkQ) 01004D7B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope your know this is a suicide mission he is sending you on. Ever since he took his, he's been fond of forcing others to do it too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你知道他派你去执行的是自杀任务。自从他自己承担了这种任务之后，他就喜欢强迫别人也这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Knolls [01004D79] (mod) Quest : ([01004D7B]abEngineerTalkQ) 01004D7B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did it! You got the power back on. But for some reason the power isn’t coming through to the machines. Did you fuck something up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做到了！电力恢复了。但由于某种原因，电力无法输送到机器上。有什么搞砸了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Knolls [01004D79] (mod) Quest : ([01004D7B]abEngineerTalkQ) 01004D7B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Private Knolls [01004D79] (mod) Quest : ([01004D7B]abEngineerTalkQ) 01004D7B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gotta get me out of here man! They are going to put me in that machine and turn me into one of them. I don’t wanna die. Not like this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得把我弄出去，老兄！他们要把我放进那台机器，把我变成他们的一员。我不想死，不能这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry [01007909] (mod) Quest : ([01008252]abSoldierCell1TalkQ) 01008252 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can still hear the others screaming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还能听到其他人的尖叫声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry [01007909] (mod) Quest : ([01008252]abSoldierCell1TalkQ) 01008252 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you the one who’s going to fix this thing so I can get out of this cell. I am going stir crazy in here. I just wanna get it over with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你来解决这个问题好让我离开这个牢房吗。我在这里快疯了，我只想快点结束这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis [0100825F] (mod) Quest : ([01008267]abSoldierCell2TalkQ) 01008267 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just wanna do it now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想现在就干。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis [0100825F] (mod) Quest : ([01008267]abSoldierCell2TalkQ) 01008267 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You! You’re the one who wants to take my Jenny away from me! I won’t let you. I finally got her back, and here you come to steal her away again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你！是你想把我的珍妮从我身边夺走！我不会让你得逞的。我终于把她找回来了，而你又来把她偷走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bliven [01008276] (mod) Quest : ([01008717]abBlivenTalkQ) 01008717 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be watching you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会盯着你的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bliven [01008276] (mod) Quest : ([01008717]abBlivenTalkQ) 01008717 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why? You took Jenny! She was all I loved in the world. I have nothing else to live for. You might as well kill me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么？你带走了珍妮！她是我在这世上唯一的爱，我没有别的活下去的理由，你还不如杀了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bliven [01008276] (mod) Quest : ([01008717]abBlivenTalkQ) 01008717 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;removefromfaction abDeathSquadFaction
;startcombat player ; 09/07/12 Moburma - Made Bliven now fight the player if Kate is saved. Removed for now
Move along wanderer. I don’t know how you survived this far, but you won’t much longer if you stay here. I’m not even authorized to talk to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续前行吧，流浪者。我不知道你是怎么活到现在的，但如果你留在这里，你活不了多久了，我甚至无权和你说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pvt. Scylla [0100874A] (mod) Quest : ([01008753]abScyllaTalkQ) 01008753 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: abNovaMainDoor.disable
How did you get inside here? Do you speak English? I am armed. Do you understand. Armed? Careful, everyone. It's likely here looking for food.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么进来的？你会说英语吗？我有武器，你明白吗？武器？大家小心点，它可能在这里觅食。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Phillip, if you grab that chair and Clive you grab that coffee table we can take him out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 菲利普，你去拿那把椅子，克莱夫你去拿那张咖啡桌，我们可以干掉他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abChimpVariablesQ.abBreeGreet to 2
I won't answer you until you are done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你说完之前我不会回答你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You couldn't have done that quicker could you? Well? Don't look at me like you are waiting for civilization to come back. I'll get right on that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能再快点是吧？嗯？别这么看着我，好像你在等待文明的回归。我马上就去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I assure you. Here's a reward. Don't eat it! Phillip has a key for the room. Don't 'relieve' yourself in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我向你保证。这是奖励，别吃了！菲利普有房间的钥匙，不要在里面“解手”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abChimpVariablesQ.abBreeTalk to 3 set abchimpvariablesq.abphiliptalk to 1 player.additem prewarmoney 100
Do you mind not touching anything else?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能不能别碰其他东西！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, hey, did you know the human mind has 12 million times more neural pathways than a ZAX computer: and that's the forefront of computer technology.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，嘿，你知道人类大脑的神经通路是ZAX计算机的1200万倍吗？而这正是计算机技术的最前沿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: The potentials of the human mind is seldom thought about where I am from.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我的家乡，人们很少想到人类思维的潜能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Phillip, shut up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 菲利普，闭嘴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I guess that's not important right now.. or ever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想这现在不重要...或者永远不重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, monkeys are dead, huh. New apocalyptic nightmare. Might be just the thing my wife and I need to rekindle our romance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，猴子都死了，新的世界末日噩梦。也许这正是我和妻子重燃爱情之火所需要的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's that key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是钥匙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abChimpVariablesQ.abPhilipTalk to 0 player.additem abBrainStoreKey 1
Hello again! Good to see you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又见面了！很高兴见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't slip! Heheh heh! It can get a little gruesome out in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别滑倒！呵呵呵呵！这里可能会有点恐怖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I know you must be some sort of cannibal or no-shit-post-apoc-asshole, but do you happen to...I mean, come on...happen to like...baseball?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我知道你肯定是食人族或者是某种末日后的混球，但你是不是碰巧...我是说，拜托...碰巧喜欢...棒球？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak to Bree, sweetheart. There are enough bumbling idiots in this room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟布莉去说，亲爱的。这屋子里笨手笨脚的白痴已经够多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You didn't pick up anything in there a little long and oval...? Never mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没发现里面有什么长而椭圆形的东西吗？没关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0100A620]abSilentTalkQ) 0100A620 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey you! I need to talk to.. Oh wow.. what the hell is wrong with your face? Why are you all.. smooth like that? That's so.. wow that's really weird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你！我得跟你谈谈，噢哇哦，你的脸怎么？你们为什么都...这样光滑？这太...哇哦，真的很奇怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : US Remnant Trooper [0100AF37] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF3C]abPrisonG3TalkQ) 0100AF3C (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise
NPC : US Remnant Trooper [0100AF37] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF3C]abPrisonG3TalkQ) 0100AF3C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So.. you're the one from the outside that one of my scouts saw! Wandering around a war zone like some kind of damned fool! What were you thinking?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你就是我的一个侦察兵从外面看到的那个人！像个该死的傻瓜一样在战区游荡！你想什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: NEVERMIND! I don't have time to listen to a civilian's boring tale about wandering around! We've got a war to win and you're going to help us win it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了吧！！！我没时间听一个平民无聊的流浪故事！我们要赢得一场战争，而你要帮助我们赢得它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you know, we're at war with those Commie Reds the Chinese! We've been fighting them forever now and even when our planes crashed we kept at it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所知，我们在和中国的共产主义红色分子打仗！我们一直在与他们战斗，即使我们的飞机坠毁了，我们也一直在战斗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you see our faces and bodies? It must be some kind of trick from one of their Red experiments! Damned Chinese bastards.. We're going to get them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到我们的脸和身体了吗？这一定是他们的红色实验的某种诡计！该死的中国混蛋，我们一定要抓住他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's been utter and total hell out there! Why, just the other day I had to go out and kill TEN CHINESE ASSASSINS with nothing but my teeth and..
ESP.TRADUIT: 外面是彻头彻尾的地狱！为什么？就在前几天，我不得不出去杀了十个中国刺客，只用了我的牙齿和...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: disableplayercontrols 1 1 1 1 0 abUSRtrig1REF.disable abUSRtrig2REF.disable abUSRtrig3REF.disable abUSRtrig4REF.disable set abgraveyardvariables.abUStroops to 1
set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 1 abPierceREF.startconversation player, GREETING
END THIS CONFLICT?! This conflict isn't going to end until every last one of them is dead! I didn't crawl on my hands and knees in a minefield just..
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束这场冲突？！除非他们每个人都死掉，否则这场冲突不会结束！我可不是在雷区里手脚并用地爬来爬去，只是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 2 abPierceREF.startconversation player, GREETING
Well clearly your memory isn't working very well now is it, Pierce?! Did you forget when I used a sardine can to strangle one of them in seconds?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很明显你的记忆力现在不太好了，是吧，皮尔斯！你忘了我用沙丁鱼罐头在几秒钟内就勒死了其中一个吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: No one cares about what you think we should do, Pierce! Now stand down while I explain to this Outsider what I need him to do before he leaves us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人在乎你认为我们该做什么，皮尔斯！现在请退下，让我向这个外来者解释一下，在他离开我们之前，我需要他做什么！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, Outsider! I need your help with a.. delicate situation that I've got right now! Thanks to my heroism on the battlefield we managed to..
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，外来者！我现在有个棘手的问题需要你的帮助！多亏了我在战场上的英勇，我们成功地...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 4 abPierceREF.startconversation player, GREETING
WILL YOU SHUT UP, PIERCE?! I AM TRYING TO HAVE A DISCUSSION WITH THE OUTSIDER AND YOUR PRATTLING IS RUINING IT! NOW GO OVER THERE AND SHUT UP!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能闭嘴吗，皮尔斯？！！我正试图和外来者讨论，而你的闲言碎语毁了它！现在给我滚一边去，闭嘴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you can see, Outsider. Some of my men are.. less than dedicated to their country! I would have them all shot if I could but.. I need them alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所见，外来者，我的一些手下...对自己的国家不够忠诚！如果可以，我会把他们都枪毙，但我需要他们活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, because of my heroic deeds on the battlefield we were able to capture the slitty eyed leader of those Chinks during a raid!
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，由于我在战场上的英勇事迹，我们在一次突袭中抓住了那些中国佬的眯眯眼首领！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I see you've heard about my latest heroic exploit! News travels fast out here.. I'm not sure I like that! Loose lips sink ships you know!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你已经听说了我最近的英勇壮举！这里消息传得很快，我不确定我喜欢这样！你懂的，祸从口出！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: disableplayercontrols 1 1 1 1 0
set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 8 abPierceREF.startconversation player, GREETING
SPY FOR THE CHINESE COMMUNIST PIGS! I CAUGHT THAT BITCH SNOOPING AROUND OUR TENTS! She was even speaking that ching changy language that they do too!
ESP.TRADUIT: 为中国的共产主义猪当间谍！！！我抓到那个贱人在我们帐篷里鬼鬼祟祟的！她甚至说着他们也会说的那种蹩脚语言！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 9 abPierceREF.startconversation player, GREETING
SHE WAS CLEARLY SPEAKING IN A CHINGY CHANGY LANGUAGE AND I WILL NOT HAVE YOU ARGUE WITH ME ON THIS POINT, PIERCE! Honestly I wonder about you..
ESP.TRADUIT: 她说的很明显是一种中国式语言，我不会让你在这一点上和我争论，皮尔斯！！！说实话，我很怀疑你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever! What I need is for YOU to go and talk to her and see if she's of any danger to us! Make sure she doesn't slip into any chingy changy either!
ESP.TRADUIT: 管他呢！我需要的是你去和她谈谈，看看她对我们是否有危险！确保她也不会滑向任何中国佬！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage abdxKate2Quest 5
set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 11 abPierceREF.startconversation player, GREETING
Ah! So my scape go.. my wonderfully useful comrade has returned! Well? Have you decided what we need to do with him yet?! You want me to kill him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！我的替罪...我那非常有用的伙伴回来了！怎么样？你决定我们该怎么处置他了吗？！你想让我杀了他？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: disableplayercontrols 1 1 1 1 0
Are you questioning me, soldier?! Go and do as I say or I'll have you shot alongside the slitty eyed Commie bastard! How dare you question me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在质疑我吗，士兵？！照我说的去做不然我就把你和那个咪咪眼的共产党混蛋一起枪毙了！你怎么敢质疑我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 14 set abGraveyardVariables.abEliStage to 12 set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceLocation to 2 enableplayercontrols setstage abWarsFunnyThing 40

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did a good job, soldier! We need more money with the balls to do what's right! Here! A reward for doing the right thing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你干得很好，士兵！我们需要更多的钱和胆量来做正确的事情！给！奖励你做了正确的事！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Gunshot]
ESP.TRADUIT: [射击]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell is going on out there!? What the hell?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 外面到底发生了什么？搞什么鬼？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem abBaojiaSword 1
set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 15 abPierceREF.startconversation player, GREETING

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What.. what just happened?! Did.. did we win? Well uh.. well uh.. of.. OF COURSE WE WON! Haha! There wasn't a doubt in my mind that we would win!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么...刚刚发生了什么？！是不是...我们赢了？嗯呃...我们当然赢了！哈哈！我毫不怀疑我们会赢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pierce, we will have a serious discussion about your cowardly outburst during the battle! A good soldier should never question their superior..
ESP.TRADUIT: 皮尔斯，我们要认真讨论一下你在战斗中的懦弱表现！一个好的士兵永远不该质疑他的上级...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: disableplayercontrols 1 1 1 1 0
set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 17 abPierceREF.startconversation player, GREETING
Haha! That's just the adrenaline talking! You'll be right as rain in a few days while we try to get our radios working again, Pierce!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈！这只是肾上腺素在说话！再过几天你就会好起来了，我们要让无线电恢复工作，皮尔斯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 18 abPierceREF.startconversation player, GREETING

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um, sir? I don't really think that lying to our guest is going to help us with our rather delicate situation regarding ending this conflict easily..
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，长官？我真的不认为对我们的客人撒谎能帮助我们解决棘手的问题轻松结束这场冲突。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abEliStage to 1 abEliREF.startconversation player, GREETING
Sir, neither side has mines in their supplies, sir. You never crawled through a minefield on your hands and knees like that. I would remember that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 长官，双方的补给中都没有地雷，长官，你从来没有像那样手脚并用爬过雷区。我不会忘记的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abEliStage to 2 abEliREF.startconversation player, GREETING
Sir, I really think you need to tell this Outsider what you want to do before he gets annoyed and leaves this place. I for one think that we should..
ESP.TRADUIT: 长官，我真的认为你应该在这个外来者生气离开这里之前告诉他你想做什么。我个人认为我们应该...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abEliStage to 3 abEliREF.startconversation player, GREETING
Oh dear.. here we go again. Sir, it's not really heroic to strike a surrendering soldier in the head with the butt of your gun. Quite the opposite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，又来了。长官，用你的枪托打一个投降士兵的头可不是什么英雄行为，而是恰恰相反。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abEliStage to 4 abEliREF.startconversation player, GREETING
Finally! Now that the idiot "Hero" is gone.. we can talk like civilized human beings.. although I doubt I can count myself as one anymore now can I?
ESP.TRADUIT: 总算！现在那个白痴“英雄”没了，我们可以像文明人一样说话了，虽然我怀疑我现在还能能不能算文明人了，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: abPierceTalkTREF.disable

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abEliStage to 6 abEliREF.startconversation player, GREETING
What he's trying to say is that somehow he has gotten it into his head that a smooth skinned woman he ambushed and attacked is some kind of..
ESP.TRADUIT: 他想说的是，不知怎的，他突然觉得那个被他伏击并袭击的皮肤光滑的女人是某种...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abEliStage to 7 abEliREF.startconversation player, GREETING
Sir, you made her bite her tongue when you punched her and tried to make her explain herself while her tongue was bleeding. She was babbling in pain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 长官，你打她的时候让她咬住了自己的舌头，还在她舌头流血的时候试图让她解释，她痛得口齿不清。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abEliStage to 8 abEliREF.startconversation player, GREETING
To be perfectly honest with you; I wouldn't talk to anyone either after you attacked her and started screaming in her face like a savage animal, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟你说实话，我也不会和任何人说你袭击了她还像野兽一样对着她尖叫，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abEliStage to 9 abEliREF.startconversation player, GREETING
Just make sure she's not a threat to us so Eli here can calm down for once! If she's safe then she can leave. Just let the guard know, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 确保她不会对我们构成威胁这样伊莱就能冷静下来了！如果她安全了，她就可以离开。跟警卫说一声，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sir! This is not the right thing to do! We really should just listen to him and just find a way to work together with these people!
ESP.TRADUIT: 长官！这样做是不对的！我们真的应该听他的，想办法和这些人合作就好了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abEliStage to 11 abEliREF.startconversation player, GREETING

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told you, you idiot! We're under attack you stupid bastard! You useless mother..!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉过你，你这个白痴！我们被攻击了，你这个愚蠢的杂种！你没妈...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 16 set abGraveyardVariables.abEliStage to 14 set abGraveyardVariables.abChinaAttack to 1 abChinaREF9.enable abChinaREF10.enable abChinaREF11.enable abChinaREF12.enable setenemy abUSremnantFaction abChineseRemnantFaction setenemy playerfaction abChineseRemnantFaction setstage abWarsFunnyThing 50

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: With all due respect the only way you're my superior is by how completely inept you are in your ability to understand common fucking sense, Sir!
ESP.TRADUIT: 恕我直言你是我上司的唯一原因就是你他妈的完全不懂常识，长官！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abEliStage to 16 abEliREF.startconversation player, GREETING
Our radios will NEVER be able to work! They're completely broken and work on long dead frequencies that no one ever uses anymore! ARGH! Hopeless..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的无线电永远都不能用了！它们已经完全坏掉了，而且只能在长期没人用的死亡频率上工作！啊！没希望了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abEliStage to 17 set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 19 setstage abWarsFunnyThing 100 enableplayercontrols

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for your help, Outsider. I suppose making him think that he's a hero is better than him causing us problems, right? Here, this is for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的帮助，外来者。我想让他觉得自己是英雄总比他给我们惹麻烦强吧？给，这是给你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 21 set abGraveyardVariables.abEliStage to 17 set abGraveyardVariables.abBaojiaStage to 3 abBaojiaREF.disable abBaojiaREF.moveto abBaojiaMarker abBaojiaREF.enable player.additem stimpak 5 player.additem prewarmoney 10 set abGraveyardVariables.abUStroops to 3 set abGraveyardVariables.abChinaAttack to 3 enableplayercontrols setstage abWarsFunnyThing 100

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew that fool wouldn't let go of control quietly. I'm sorry that he caused you such problems but please, take this with my thanks for helping us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就知道那个傻瓜不会轻易放手的。我很抱歉他给你带来这样的麻烦，但请收下这个，谢谢你对我们的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 21 set abGraveyardVariables.abBaojiaStage to 4 abBaojiaREF.disable abBaojiaREF.moveto abBaojiaMarker abBaojiaREF.enable player.additem stimpak 5 player.additem prewarmoney 10 set abGraveyardVariables.abUStroops to 3 set abGraveyardVariables.abChinaAttack to 3 setstage abWarsFunnyThing 100
We were told not to let anyone speak to the prisoner, Outsider! Orders from the top and all that, you understand. Can't really do anything about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们被告知不要让任何人跟犯人说话，外来者！上级的命令之类的，你懂的，对此我无能为力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prison Guard [0100AAED] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF0]abPrisonG1TalkQ) 0100BBF0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry about this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对此很抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prison Guard [0100AAED] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF0]abPrisonG1TalkQ) 0100BBF0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: disableplayercontrols 1 1 1 1 0
set abGraveyardVariables.abPrisonG2Stage to 1 abPrisonG2REF.startconversation player, GREETING
I was just being polite! Manners don't cost anything you know! You could stand to use them more often in fact.. you're very rude sometimes to people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是出于礼貌！你知道的，礼貌不需要付出任何代价！事实上你可以更经常地使用它们，你有时对人很粗鲁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prison Guard [0100AAED] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF0]abPrisonG1TalkQ) 0100BBF0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Prison Guard [0100AAED] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF0]abPrisonG1TalkQ) 0100BBF0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Prison Guard [0100AAFB] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF1]abPrisonG2TalkQ) 0100BBF1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't need to apologize for doing your job to some weird looking outsider you know.. that weird looking guy should understand our position!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不需要为你的工作向一个长相怪异的外来者道歉，那个长相怪异的家伙应该理解我们的处境！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prison Guard [0100AAFB] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF1]abPrisonG2TalkQ) 0100BBF1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPrisonG1Stage to 1 abPrisonG1REF.startconversation player, GREETING

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prison Guard [0100AAFB] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF1]abPrisonG2TalkQ) 0100BBF1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Baojia Jingwei [0100AB00] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF6]abBaojiaTalkQ) 0100BBF6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So.. it seems that the angry American has found someone to do his dirty work for him, hm? It is strange.. you do not look like anyone else here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来这个愤怒的美国佬已经找到人替他干脏活了，是吧？真奇怪...你和这里的其他人都不一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Baojia Jingwei [0100AB00] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF6]abBaojiaTalkQ) 0100BBF6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Baojia Jingwei [0100AB00] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF6]abBaojiaTalkQ) 0100BBF6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am alive because of you. I wish to express my thanks to you. Maybe you will see our people out there in the real world. I look forward to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为你，我才活了下来，我要向你表达我的谢意。也许你会在现实世界中见到我们的人，我很期待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Baojia Jingwei [0100AB00] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF6]abBaojiaTalkQ) 0100BBF6 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abBaojiaStage to 10 abBaojiaREF.evp
Some men need to be put down to help protect others from their foolishness. Eli was such a man. I owe you my life and give you my thanks as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人需要被打倒才能保护别人免受他们的愚蠢之害，伊莱就是这样的人。我欠你一条命，也要感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Baojia Jingwei [0100AB00] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF6]abBaojiaTalkQ) 0100BBF6 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abBaojiaStage to 10 abBaojiaREF.evp

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Baojia Jingwei [0100AB00] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF6]abBaojiaTalkQ) 0100BBF6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0100CB39]abUSRemnantVoiceQ) 0100CB39 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Baojia is talking to Americans right now, Outsider! We are going to leave with them if all goes well, see? It will be all good soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保嘉现在正在和美国人说话，外来者！如果一切顺利，我们会和他们一起离开，明白吗？很快就会好起来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chinese Remnant Soldier [0100D9D0] (mod) Quest : ([0100E115]abChinaGhoulTalkQ) 0100E115 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL:
if abGraveyardvariables.abChinaTalk1 == 0 set abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk1 to 1 elseif abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk2 == 0 set abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk2 to 1 endif
if abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalkDone == 0 && abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk1 == 1 && abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk2 == 1 setobjectivecompleted abWarsFunnyThing 35 1 set abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalkDone to 1 endif
Americans will listen to Baojia for sure. We are leaving with them to explore new world! We're going to see lots of things out there together!
ESP.TRADUIT: 美国人肯定会听保嘉的。我们要和他们一起去探索新世界！我们要一起去外面看很多东西！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chinese Remnant Soldier [0100DD6E] (mod) Quest : ([0100E115]abChinaGhoulTalkQ) 0100E115 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL:
if abGraveyardvariables.abChinaTalk1 == 0 set abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk1 to 1 elseif abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk2 == 0 set abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk2 to 1 endif
if abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalkDone == 0 && abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk1 == 1 && abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk2 == 1 setobjectivecompleted abWarsFunnyThing 35 1 set abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalkDone to 1 endif
Are all Outsiders smooth like you, Outsider? Will be fun to see this when Americans listen to Baojia and come with us to leave! Will be so fun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 外面的人都像你一样光滑吗，外来者？等美国人听了保嘉的话跟我们一起离开的时候，这将是一件有趣的事！会很有趣的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chinese Remnant Soldier [0100DD79] (mod) Quest : ([0100E115]abChinaGhoulTalkQ) 0100E115 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL:
if abGraveyardvariables.abChinaTalk1 == 0 set abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk1 to 1 elseif abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk2 == 0 set abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk2 to 1 endif
if abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalkDone == 0 && abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk1 == 1 && abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk2 == 1 setobjectivecompleted abWarsFunnyThing 35 1 set abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalkDone to 1 endif
Your skin so smooth! Is so strange to see after seeing skin like ours so long! Are all Outsiders like that? I cannot wait to see when Baojia come.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的皮肤真光滑！看了这么久像我们这样的皮肤，还能看到你这种感觉很奇怪！外面的人都是这样的吗？我等不及要看保嘉什么时候来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chinese Remnant Soldier [0100E113] (mod) Quest : ([0100E115]abChinaGhoulTalkQ) 0100E115 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL:
if abGraveyardvariables.abChinaTalk1 == 0 set abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk1 to 1 elseif abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk2 == 0 set abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk2 to 1 endif
if abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalkDone == 0 && abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk1 == 1 && abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalk2 == 1 setobjectivecompleted abWarsFunnyThing 35 1 set abGraveyardVariables.abChinaTalkDone to 1 endif

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chinese Remnant Soldier [0100E113] (mod) Quest : ([0100E115]abChinaGhoulTalkQ) 0100E115 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know why I bother, sometimes. It can be frustrating, trying to educate the simple minded, like poor Mister Young here. Wet between the ears.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候我也不知道自己为什么要这么麻烦，想要教育像这位可怜的杨先生这样头脑简单的人是很令人沮丧的。乳臭未干。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I give him the smallest task, of simply monitoring a few docile ghouls, and his small mind couldn't handle it. One is missing.. yet again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给了他最简单的任务，只是监视几个温顺的食尸鬼，他那小小的脑子却应付不来。又丢了一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abYoungStage to 1 abYoungREF.evp
Nonsense! Who in their right mind would approach a feral?! If you'd been monitoring the frequencies, like I told you, this never would've happened!
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡说！哪个脑子正常的人会接近野性尸鬼！如果你按照我说的监控频率去做，就不会发生这种事！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Own up to it for once, boy! Stop whining and shaking all the time like a little baby, and be a man! Enter the code again, god damnit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就承认一次吧，小子！别像个小婴儿似的哭闹和发抖了，做个男子汉！再输一次密码，该死的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abFrankostage to 3 set abGuileTalkQ.abYoungstage to 3
Well, well, you've returned. Looks like someone is reliable. What do you think, Mister Young?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧，你回来了。看起来某人很可靠，你觉得呢，杨先生？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh...yes. Very reliable. That's good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，是的，非常可靠，这很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So tell me, what have you found out? Speak up now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以告诉我，你发现了什么？现在就说出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say it's good to be out in the fresh air, heh, though I'm sure you've noticed it doesn't quite smell the way it should. Too close to Boulder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说在外面呼吸新鲜空气很好，嘿，不过我相信你已经注意到那里的味道不太像它应该有的样子。太靠近博尔德了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before the war, there were better things a man could look at with binoculars. I do get tired of watching these ugly creatures all day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在战前，人们可以用双筒望远镜看到更好的东西。整天看这些丑陋的生物，我真的看腻了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it now? Suffering one idiot is more than enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在是什么？忍受一个白痴已经够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger
NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know I entered the right serial. The scanner shows it's not in the area. Someone must have taken him.
