ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我输入了正确的序列。扫描仪显示它不在这个区域，一定是有人把它带走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abFrankoStage to 1 abFrankoREF.startconversation player, GREETING

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhm, I don't know whether I should talk to you right now. I can't take my eyes off the ferals. I can't lose another one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道我现在是否该跟你说话。我目不转睛地盯着那些野性尸鬼，我不能再失去一个了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever it is, you'll have to be quick. Doctor Franko says only the weak-minded need to take a break.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管是什么，你得快点。弗兰科博士说只有弱智才需要休息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Huang [0100E4D5] (mod) Quest : ([01016391]abChinaGhoul8Q) 01016391 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hm? Oh dear! Strange looking American needs something from me? My leg is badly hurt, I cannot do anything right now. What do you want from me, hm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？噢，天哪！长相奇怪的美国人需要我做什么？我的腿伤得很重，现在什么也做不了。你想从我这里得到什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Huang [0100E4D5] (mod) Quest : ([01016391]abChinaGhoul8Q) 01016391 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger
NPC : Huang [0100E4D5] (mod) Quest : ([01016391]abChinaGhoul8Q) 01016391 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! You! You're going over to the Chinese side aren't you? Do you think you could do me a little favor while you're over there? It won't take long!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！你！你要去中国那边，对吧？你去那边的时候能帮我个小忙吗？不会花太长时间的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [01016393] (mod) Quest : ([01016395]abUSHenryQ) 01016395 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Henry [01016393] (mod) Quest : ([01016395]abUSHenryQ) 01016395 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been so anxious since you left! Did you deliver my note? Did he read it? Did he tell you to say anything to me?! Please, don't leave me hanging!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你走后我一直很焦虑！你把我的信送去了吗？他看了吗？他让你跟我说什么了吗！求你了，别吊着我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [01016393] (mod) Quest : ([01016395]abUSHenryQ) 01016395 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear
NPC : Henry [01016393] (mod) Quest : ([01016395]abUSHenryQ) 01016395 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you? A cannibal? One of those things? No, no, of course not, you'd be eating me by now. Well, what are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么？食人族？是那种东西吗？不，当然不是，你早就吃了我了。你是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come closer, let me have a look at you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 靠近点，让我看看你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I can't see shit. Listen, help an old man out. I need someone to check on Derek. He went to the other small shack outside, like this one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我什么都看不到。听着，帮帮一个老人，我需要有人去看看德里克，他去了外面的另一间小屋，就像这间一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a minute, that isn't you Derek, is it? No, no, you would've said. Derek's been gone for some time and those things are everywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，那不是你吧，德里克？不不，你会说的。德里克已经消失一段时间了，那些东西到处都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, me and Derek, we're the only survivors. Those things went and ate everybody up. Ate them for dinner, with mash potatoes and gravy, I suspect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么，我和德里克，我们是唯一的幸存者。那些东西把所有人都吃掉了，我想是配土豆泥和肉汁一起当晚餐吃的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's the only friend I have left. You find him and there'll be a reward in it. I got pure water and fresh pears. Just makes sure he's safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是我唯一的朋友了，你找到他，就能得到奖赏。我有纯净水和新鲜的梨，只要确保他安全就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poor fella, he can't see a thing. Must've got lost coming back. We're the only two left, you know. Go check it out and come on back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可怜的家伙，他什么都看不见，一定是回来时迷路了。你知道的，就剩下我们俩了。去看看吧，快点回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back when you've found him then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你找到他再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What now? Who's there? Have you seen Derek?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在怎么办？谁在那儿？你看到德里克了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye then, young one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么再见了，年轻人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello, hello! What's this? A customer is it? Don't get many of those you know.Those bombs scared away my customers. A war is terrible for business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，你好！这是什么？一个客户是吗？你知道的，这种情况不多见，那些炸弹吓跑了我的顾客。战争对商业很不利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless you're selling guns and bombs, you know? Well, I sell a bit of everything. Whatever I can find. So tell me, what brings you here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你是卖枪和炸弹的？嗯，我什么都卖一点，只要是我能找到的。所以告诉我，什么风把你给吹来了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's you again, my friend! What can Henry do for you this time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又是你，我的朋友！这次亨利能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome, how can Henry help, friend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎，亨利能帮什么忙，朋友？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi there! The name's Joey Gerard, and boy have you come at the right time! Hell, I'm closing down, so everything's going cheap! Dead cheap.. fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好啊！我叫乔伊·杰拉德，你来得正是时候！见鬼，我要关门了，所以所有东西都便宜了！太便宜了...操。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Gerard [01023343] (mod) Quest : ([01023E1B]abGerardTalkQ) 01023E1B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't find prices better than these! And if you can.. well.. Oh, forget it. You wanna buy something or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找不到比这更好的价格了！如果你可以，那么...哦，算了吧。你到底想不想买东西？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Gerard [01023343] (mod) Quest : ([01023E1B]abGerardTalkQ) 01023E1B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you're not a cannibal! You have a friendly face, I can tell. I've been trapped here for two days. Don't have many supplies left in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你不是食人族！你长得很友善，我看得出来。我已经被困在这里两天了，这里的补给不多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Suzy [0103599B] (mod) Quest : ([0103599E]abSuziTalk) 0103599E (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abSuziTalk.abSuzyMet to 1
I'll be waiting right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就在这儿等着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Suzy [0103599B] (mod) Quest : ([0103599E]abSuziTalk) 0103599E (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay back! What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 退后！你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mickey [01019664] (mod) Quest : ([01036265]abMickeyTalk) 01036265 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've messed with the wrong man, on the wrong day!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在错误的日子惹错了人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mickey [01019664] (mod) Quest : ([01036265]abMickeyTalk) 01036265 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh wait, it's you. You're that frozen chicken-finger I've been lugging about. You look different defrosted. More ugly. They should put you back in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，等等，是你，你就是我一直拖着走的那个冻鸡柳。解冻后的你看起来不一样了，更丑了，他们应该把你放回去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mickey [01019664] (mod) Quest : ([01036265]abMickeyTalk) 01036265 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just messing with you, lighten up. But since you're here, I could use your help. I dropped my gear down that dark pit over there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我逗你玩呢，放松点。但既然你来了，我需要你的帮助，我把我的装备掉到那边那个黑坑里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mickey [01019664] (mod) Quest : ([01036265]abMickeyTalk) 01036265 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what's coming next, right? But be careful down there, this place is crawling with those freaks; those cannibal creatures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道接下来会发生什么，对吧？但在下面要小心，这地方到处都是怪物，那些食人生物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mickey [01019664] (mod) Quest : ([01036265]abMickeyTalk) 01036265 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tell you what. Bring me my pistol and leather, you can keep the rest. There's over 400 caps in that bag. Buy yourself something nice, if you live.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要不这样吧，把我的手枪和皮衣给我，剩下的你留着。那个袋子里有400多瓶盖，如果你还活着，就给自己买点好东西吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mickey [01019664] (mod) Quest : ([01036265]abMickeyTalk) 01036265 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abMickeyTalk.abMickeyMET to 1 enableplayercontrols
At least you're not dead yet. Did you get my stuff back?
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少你还没死，你把我的东西拿回来了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mickey [01019664] (mod) Quest : ([01036265]abMickeyTalk) 01036265 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no we don't need to do introductions, or any other pleasantries or small talk. You don't have to do all that with me. I'm a man of science.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不，我们不需要介绍，也不需要任何其他寒暄或者闲聊。你不必对我做这些，我是个搞科学的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like to get straight to the point, stay on the point and leave on the point. No hello, goodbye, or how's your uncle. It's all nonsense to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢直奔主题，抓住主题上，停留在主题上。没有你好，再见，或者你叔叔好吗，对我来说这都是没意义的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't waste even a minute engaging in small talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我连一分钟都不想浪费在闲聊上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not now, scientific discovery can not be put on hold!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在不行，科学发现不能搁置！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be short and get straight to the point. In his time of need, I implanted Edison with an artificial heart. Not a pacemaker! An artifical heart!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就长话短说，开门见山。在爱迪生需要的时候，我给他植入了一颗人造心脏。不是心脏起搏器！人造心脏！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A source of great for pride for me, you'd expect, but I'm a humble man. All my actions are solely based on furthering science! Remarkable though..
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会以为这是我骄傲的源泉，但我是个谦逊的人。我所有的行动都是为了进一步研究科学！如果一个人...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..the advances one can make, if his intentions pure and intellect razor sharp. Anyway, back to the point. Edison's artificial heart can be tracked.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...意图纯粹，智力敏锐，他所能取得的进步是了不起的。好了，回到正题，爱迪生的人造心脏可以被追踪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's unique electrical impulsives can be picked up, even at a great distance. Also, remarkable, don't you agree? Your pip-boy there could even do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它独特的电脉冲即使在很远的地方也能被接收到。这也很了不起，不是吗？你的Pip-boy甚至也可以收到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In fact, I've produced a software update just for you. Just let me take a look.. there.. that should all be set up now. It'll lead you right to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我专门为你做了一个软件更新。让我看看，好了，现在应该都设置好了，它会引导你找到他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No need to thank me. Totally unnecessary waste of speech, I'd say. So much of daily conversation is redundant. Now.. I must be getting back to work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不需要谢我。我想说，完全是不必要的言语浪费，很多日常对话都是多余的。现在，我得回去工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGrantTalkQ.abFieldHeart to 0 setstage abMonsterBQ2 30
Can't you see I'm extremely busy and cannot be interrupted by trivial matters? Spit it out then, what is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 难道你看不出我很忙，不能被琐事打扰吗？快说出来，到底是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mister, could you help us? I know that you can see and hear us, but I don’t know how. But that must mean you’re “special” and here to help us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 先生，你能帮帮我们吗？我知道你能看到和听到我们，但我不知道怎么做到的。那一定意味着你很特别吧？是来帮助我们的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ma'am, could you help us? I know that you can see and hear us, but I don’t know how. But that must mean you’re “special” and here to help us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 女士，你能帮帮我们吗？我知道你能看到和听到我们，但我不知道怎么做到的。那一定意味着你很特别吧？是来帮助我们的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations, you're the first to be cured of Seltsam Syndrome. It truely is a miracle. I've been waiting a long time for this day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜你，你是第一个治愈泽尔特扎姆综合症的患者。这真是个奇迹，我等这一天已经很久了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should feel honored. You've done a great service for mankind. Many lives will be spared, thanks to your participation. I thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该感到荣幸，你为人类做出了巨大的贡献。多亏了你的参与，许多人的生命得以保全，我感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am sorry the Nevada scientists deceived you. It was without my knowledge. Rest assured they will be dealt with in the appropriate manner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉内华达的科学家欺骗了你，我不知道这件事。请放心，我们会以适当的方式处理他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finding the cure is only the first part of the battle. Will you assist me further in bringing order and peace to Boulder?
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到治愈方法只是战斗的第一步，你愿意进一步协助我为博尔德带来秩序与和平吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols
Have you recovered the formula?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找回配方了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you ready for your next assignment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好接受下一个任务了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you news from the Boulder Dome?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有博尔德巨蛋的消息吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're back and with little time to spare. The NCR have just been spotted moving into Boulder. They're making a desperate attempt to take the Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了，没多少时间了。有人发现NCR正在向博尔德移动，他们孤注一掷想要拿下巨蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't have long, but tell me quickly, have you convinced the scientists of my proposal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 时间不多了，但请快点告诉我，你说服科学家们接受我的提议了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get going! There's no time to waste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 开始吧！没有时间可以浪费了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hahahah. Hello again, my simple-minded friend. You have done me a great service. You are like my personal genie. You giveth but you shall not taketh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈哈，又见面了，我头脑简单的朋友。你帮了我很大的忙，你就像我的个人精灵，你给予，却不能索取。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [01066D89] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that the Dome belongs to me, I don't see a point in keeping you around. To be honest, I'm sick of the god damn sight of you, you ignorant cretin!
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然巨蛋是我的了，我觉得没必要再留你了。老实说，我一看到你就恶心，你这个无知的白痴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [01066D89] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How easy you were to manipulate, just like the feral ones, you did my bidding.You are nothing more than an animal to me. I pity you, I really do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是多么容易被操纵啊，就像那些野性尸鬼一样，你服从了我的命令，你对我来说不过是只动物。我很同情你，真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [01066D89] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think I really care about these infected animals? They never deserved the Dome. They never had the wit to harness even a fraction of its power.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为我真的在乎这些被感染的动物吗？它们不配拥有巨蛋。它们从没有智慧来驾驭它，哪怕是一小部分的力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [01066D89] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: First I had to cure the Seltsam Syndrome, not for mercy, but for the good health of the Brotherhood. We can hardly move into a dirty house!
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先我得治好泽尔特扎姆综合症，不是为了怜悯，而是为了兄弟会的健康。我们很难搬进肮脏的房子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [01066D89] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, that's it. I'm bored of you now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，就是这样。我现在烦透你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [01066D89] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols
setenemy abEvilGuilefac playerfaction abGuile2REF.startcombat player abEvilGuardREF4.enable abControlRoomDoorREF.lock 255 setstage abGuileMainQuest 90
As you can see, there's been some changes around here. Now that Elder Guile is deceased it's my duty to take his place as Elder. Call me Elder Grant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所见，这里发生了一些变化。现在盖尔长老死了，我有责任接替他的位置，叫我格兰特长老。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to assure you that Elder Guile's views do not reflect my own or the rest of the Brotherhood's. I was unaware of his hidden agenda.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想向你保证，盖尔长老的观点不代表我自己或其他兄弟会成员的观点。我不知道他的秘密计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As far as I'm concerned, his punishment fit his crime. and we're better off without him. I hope to bring some sanity back to this Chapter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我看来，他受到的惩罚与他的罪行相符，没有他我们会过得更好。我希望这一章能给大家带来一些清醒的认识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, it's you. I've been waiting to speak with you. Elder Guile has told me all about you, and I've read Doctor Fabler's report. You're very talented.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，是你，我一直在等着和你谈谈。盖尔长老跟我说过你的事，我也读过法布勒博士的报告，你很有才华。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGrantTalkQ.abGrantIntro to 1 set abGrantTalkQ.abOnCase to 1 set abGrantTalkQ.abCrawleyBegin to 1 abBlakeConvoStartTRIGREF.enable
Hello again. I hope the investigation is going well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又见面了，希望调查进展顺利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks again for the assist. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次感谢你的帮助，我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really appreciate your help on this case. I have something I think you'll appreciate. It's a rare hand-gun. Salvaged, repaired and fully restored.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的很感激你对这个案子的帮助。我有样东西你会喜欢的，这是一把罕见的手枪，回收，修理和完全修复。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood doesn't make a habit of sharing tech, even a relic like this, so don't get used to it. I trust you'll put it to good use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会没有分享科技的习惯，即使是这样的文物，所以别习惯了。我相信你会好好利用它的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage abMonsterBloodQ 100 player.additemhealthpercent abGrantsRevolver 1 1
Bad news. Blake killed Crawley in his cell and fled. It looks like Blake was the real killer. This is your doing and you need to clean up this mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坏消息，布莱克在克劳利的牢房里杀了他，然后逃跑了，看来布莱克才是真正的凶手。这都是你干的，你得收拾这烂摊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Edison has a prototype pacemaker keeping him alive, made by Doctor Field, who has asked to speak with you. I suggest you go see him now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爱迪生有一个心脏起搏器的原型，是菲尔德博士做的，他想和你谈谈。我建议你现在就去见他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGrantTalkq.abCrawleyConvicted to 0 set abGrantTalkq.abFieldHeart to 1 set abGrantTalkQ.abBlakeEscape to 0 setstage abMonsterBQ2 20
I have some bad new my friend. Blake has escaped and killed Crawley on his way out. I need you to track him down and kill him if necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一些坏消息，新朋友，布莱克逃跑了，在逃跑的路上杀了克劳利。我需要你找到他，必要时杀了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Edison has a prototype pacemaker keeping him alive, made by Doctor Field, who has asked to speak with you. I suggest you go see him now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爱迪生有一个心脏起搏器的原型，是菲尔德博士做的，他想和你谈谈。我建议你现在就去见他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGrantTalkQ.abBlakeConvicted to 0 set abGrantTalkq.abFieldHeart to 1 set abGrantTalkQ.abBlakeEscape to 0 setstage abMonsterBQ2 20
Bad news. Edison Blake has escaped. He killed Crawley not long after we released him. This is your mess, so you clean it up. You need to find him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坏消息，爱迪生·布莱克逃跑了，我们释放克劳利后不久布莱克就杀了他。这是你的烂摊子，你自己收拾，你得找到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Edison has a prototype pacemaker keeping him alive, made by Doctor Field, who has asked to speak with you. I suggest you go see him now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爱迪生有一个心脏起搏器的原型，是菲尔德博士做的，他想和你谈谈。我建议你现在就去见他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGrantTalkQ.abRoachConvicted to 0 set abGrantTalkq.abFieldHeart to 1 set abGrantTalkQ.abBlakeEscape to 0 set abGrantTalkQ.abRoachJailed to 0 setstage abMonsterBQ2 20
So you put an end to Blake and the case is finally over. Here's a bonus for seeing it through to the end. You're good in my books, soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你解决了布莱克，这个案子也就结束了。这是坚持到底的奖励，你在我心目中的形象很好，士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 300 set abGrantTalkQ.abBlakeEscape to 0 set abGrantTalkQ.abBlakeDEAD to 0 setstage abMonsterBQ2 100
What can I do for you, friend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能为你做什么，朋友？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll assist you in any way I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会尽我所能帮助你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [01065CF5] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try not to touch anything in here, please. I'm quite busy at the moment, calibrating the feral implants. It's very precise work. Requires attention.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请尽量别碰这里的任何东西。我现在很忙，在校准野性尸鬼植入物，这是非常精确的工作，需要注意力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's endless work as well. As soon as I make these changes, Doctor Franko will have additional ones. Oh well. Anyway, what can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这也是无止境的工作。只要我做了这些改变，弗兰科博士就会再做一些。哦好吧，有什么能为你效劳的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello again. Do you require further assistance?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又见面了。你需要进一步的帮助吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose I can spare a moment to converse with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我可以抽出一点时间和你谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello, I'm Doctor Anderson, the medical officer here, but you can call me Penny. It's good to see you defrosted and up and about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，我是安德森医生，这里的医务官，不过你可以叫我佩妮。很高兴看到你解冻了，能起来走动了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're part of history now, you know? You're the first human to be cured of the Seltsam Syndrome. Without knowing it, you've done the impossible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经成为历史了，知道吗？你是第一个被治愈的泽尔特扎姆综合症患者。在不知情的情况下，你已经完成了不可能完成的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or the "seemingly" impossible, but not any more! It's a shame the NCR abandoned their research so early, when progress was just around the corner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者“看似”不可能，但不再是这样了！遗憾的是，NCR很早就放弃了他们的研究，而进展就在眼前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How may I be of medical assistance?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能提供什么医疗援助吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What seems to be the trouble? Broken leg? Bruised ankle? I'm your girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么不舒服吗？断腿了？脚踝瘀伤？我是你需要的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy
NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get too close. You're talking to a killer, you know? What's the point in debating it? They all think I'm guilty. I hear them behind my back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要靠太近，你在跟一个杀手说话，知道吗？争论有什么意义呢？他们都认为我有罪，我听到他们在我背后说的话了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A guy's quiet; likes to keep to himself, and the imaginations run wild. I'm no monster, not that you'd believe me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个人很安静，喜欢独处，想象力很丰富。我不是怪物，但你不会相信我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols
So you have returned. I hope you are closer to the truth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你回来了，我希望你更接近真相了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once again, you speak to an innocent man behind bars.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再一次，你在监狱里对一个无辜的人说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've done your "duty" haven't you? Now get out of my face!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经完成了你的“职责”，不是吗？现在从我面前消失！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have nothing more to say to each other.. for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们彼此没有什么可说的了，就目前而言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You shouldn't have come after me, outsider. You should've stayed in your frozen coffin, where you were safe. You think you're a clever man?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不该来找我，外来者，你应该待在你的冰冻棺材里，在那里你很安全。你以为你是个聪明人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [01019373] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think you have it all figured out? You know nothing! You think you can see into the heart of a man? You'll see your own, when I show it to you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为你已经搞懂了一切吗？你什么都不知道！你以为你能看透一个人的内心吗？当我给你看的时候，你会看到你自己的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [01019373] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage abMonsterBQ2 40 set abGrantTalkQ.abBlakeStage to 1 abBCan1REF.enable abBCan2REF.enable abBCan3REF.enable
Why would a fool like you follow me? You came here in a coffin and you'll be leaving in one, but this time there'll be no waking up, you hear me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这样的傻瓜为什么要跟着我？你是坐着棺材来的，你也会坐着棺材走的，但这次不会再醒来了，听到了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [01019373] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had my revenge on that bitch Jessica, and Crawley that pathetic excuse for a man. He didn't deserve to live. That coward was a mercy killing..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我报复了那个贱人杰西卡，还有克劳利那个男人的可怜借口。他不配活下去，那个懦夫是在仁慈的杀人...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [01019373] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..to ease him of the suffering of being himself. Now I'll do you the same favour. Go ahead and struggle, you miserable little creature.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...来减轻他做自己的痛苦。现在我也要帮你这个忙，继续挣扎吧，你这个可怜的小东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [01019373] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage abMonsterBQ2 40 set abGrantTalkQ.abBlakeStage to 1 abBCan1REF.enable abBCan2REF.enable abBCan3REF.enable

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there. The big guy put you in charge of the investigation, right? I guess he wanted an impartial eye on these matters, huh? Just do a good job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿你好。那个大家伙让你负责调查，对吧？我猜他想要一个公正的人来调查这件事？好好干就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to find the real killer.. for Jessica. She deserves that much at least. She deserves more than she got. What kind of a man could do this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得找到真正的凶手，为了杰西卡，至少这是她应得的，她应该得到更多。什么样的人能做出这种事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poor, sweet Jessica. She was such an angel, I can't imagine someone harming a hair on her head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可怜的，可爱的杰西卡。她真是个天使，我无法想象有人会伤害她的一根头发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What now? I'm suffering enough without your constant harrassment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在该做什么？就算你不来骚扰我，我也受够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You again; the great detective.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又是你，伟大的侦探。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess you're feeling pretty smug right now, huh? You've put away an innocent man, you fool! The real killer walks free and you're to blame.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你现在一定很得意吧？你把一个无辜的人送进了监狱，你这个傻瓜！真正的凶手逍遥法外，而你是罪魁祸首。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: There'll be consequences for this. Blake won't stop with Jessica. I'll be next. I'm like a sitting duck in this cell. It's just a matter of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样做会有后果的。布莱克不会放弃杰西卡的，下一个就是我，我在这牢房里就像个活靶子，这只是时间问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just fuck off now. You've done enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在给我滚，你做得够多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't over, you smug bastard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这还没完，你个自以为是的杂种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger
NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't understand it. A murder by one of our own. Poor Jessica. Poor Crawley. He worshipped that girl. They certaintly had their arguments, sure..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无法理解，是我们自己人干的。可怜的杰西卡，可怜的克劳利，他很崇拜那个女孩，他们当然有他们的争论，当然...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..but he really loved her. Can't believe an animal like that has been sleeping among us. I always knew there was something wrong about that guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...但他真的爱她。真不敢相信这样的畜生一直睡在我们中间，我一直觉得那家伙有点不对劲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: We jokingly nicknamed him The Monster. Imagine that. Looks like he certainly lived up to his name. I think we should take him outside and shoot him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们戏称他为“怪物”，想象一下。看起来他确实没有辜负他的名字，我觉得我们应该把他带出去毙了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what else to tell you. I think I've answered enough questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道还能告诉你什么，我想我已经回答了足够多的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's such a shame about Jessica. She was a sweet girl and a good soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰西卡的事太可惜了。她是个可爱的女孩，也是个好士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: How could you think I was the killer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么能认为我是凶手呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do realize you've made a big mistake.. right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你犯了个大错吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear you're from the Mojave. That's good. I need someone with minimal ties to Boulder. Someone dispassionate enough to do what needs to be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你来自莫哈韦，这很好。我需要一个和博尔德联系最少的人，一个足够冷静去做该做的事的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: My spies tell me the Brotherhood brought you here. No doubt they've tainted you with their propaganda, told you merely half-truths.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的探子告诉我是兄弟会带你来的。毫无疑问，他们用他们的宣传玷污了你，告诉你的只是半真半假的事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Resorting to lethal force was a last resort to contain the Seltsam Syndrome. There is no cure! The Brotherhood's dreams are merely that. Dreams.
ESP.TRADUIT: 使用致命武力是遏制泽尔特扎姆综合症的最后手段。没有治愈的方法！这只是兄弟会的梦想罢了，梦想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: abNCRsecretHatchFAKE.disable abNCRsecretHatch.enable abNCRsecretHatch.unlock set abGuileTalkQ.abDespotMet to 1
Have you realized yet, what must be done?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你意识到该怎么办了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have your mission, now get going!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有你的任务，现在开始行动吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, is it done? Have you cleared the way for us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，完成了吗？你为我们扫清道路了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just received word of your victory. You're a great soldier. You took your self out of the equation and did your duty. There's hope again here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚收到你胜利的消息。你是个很棒的士兵，你把自己从这个等式中解放出来，履行了你的职责，这里又有了希望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, there's another matter I need your help with. I recieved word that some of our soldiers have having difficulty within the Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，还有件事需要你帮忙。我收到消息说我们的一些士兵在巨蛋内遇到了麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The office of the head scientist has been locked up tight. We believe another carrier may be inside. See if you can get it open and eliminate them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首席科学家的办公室锁得严严实实，我们认为里面可能有其它病原携带者。看看能不能把它打开，把它们消灭掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage abDespotMainQuest 100
set abGuileTalkQ.abDespotStart to 3 abHarold4REF2.enable abDSpickerREF.enable abDSpickerREF2.enable abDSpickerREF3.enable
We've come too far to take any chances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经走得太远了，不能再冒任何风险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you have to report, soldier?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么要报告的吗，士兵？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our soldiers managed to get that office open inside the dome. They found a woman inside, in cryostasis. She's likely a carrier and must be killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的士兵成功打开了巨蛋内的办公室，他们在里面发现了一个女人，冷冻状态。她很可能是携带者，必须杀了她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01073CA3] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know it's a dirty job, but it really is for the best. I'll leave it in your hands. I know you'll do what must be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这是肮脏的工作，但这真的是最好的办法。我把它交给你了，我知道你会做该做的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01073CA3] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finally my quest is over and this squad can be dissolved. We're heading home. I'd suggest you do the same. Good luck out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的任务终于结束了，这个小队也可以解散了。我们要回家了，我建议你也这样做，祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01073CA3] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 0 0 1

abDespot4REF.addscriptpackage abDespotLeavePAC set abDespotENDq.stoptime to 1 abHaroldRoomDoorREF.unlock abDSpickerREF.killactor abPodGlassREF.disable abSarahStaticREF.disable abHaroldRoomDoorREF.unlock abGhoulHaroldSitTrigREF.enable

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [010735FB] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: YOU DID IT! You are our super-duper-extra-special-neato-bestest friend in the whole world now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做到了！你现在是我们在这个世界上超级超级特别最好的朋友！！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [01046DF1] (mod) Quest : ([01046DE2]MHBoulderTwinsFinalContact) 01046DE2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think you've defeated me but you're wrong! You can't defeat me! I'm just playing with you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为你打败了我，但你错了！你无法打败我！我只是在跟你玩玩！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Randy Flagg [01048A5C] (mod) Quest : ([01048A67]MHBoulderRandyFlaggDialog) 01048A67 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello! I'm Doctor Fabler. Have you come in response to our ad? I must say, you look like the ideal candidate. Strong and healthy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好！我是法布勒博士。你是看到我们的应聘广告来的吗？我得说，你看起来是理想人选，强壮又健康。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Fabler [010377B0] (mod) Quest : ([01050EEF]abFablerTalkQ) 01050EEF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very good. Enter through the red door, to find your first experimental weapon. I'll give you further instructions once you have it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好。从红门进去，找到你的第一个实验武器，你拿到之后我会给你进一步的指示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Fabler [010377B0] (mod) Quest : ([01050EEF]abFablerTalkQ) 01050EEF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: abRedDoorREF.unlock setstage abDirtyWorkQuest 30
Like I said, go through the red door. Then we can begin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像我说的，穿过红门，然后我们就可以开始了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Fabler [010377B0] (mod) Quest : ([01050EEF]abFablerTalkQ) 01050EEF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's time now, for your treatment. You look worried, you shouldn't. I'm feeling rather optimistic. This time the cure will work, I just know it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在是治疗的时候了。你看起来很担心，你不应该担心，我觉得相当乐观，这次解药会管用的，我知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Fabler [010377B0] (mod) Quest : ([01050EEF]abFablerTalkQ) 01050EEF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never expected to find Marie. All the years I'd spent, trying to formulate a cure, and there it was in her blood. A natural one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没想过要找到玛利。我花了这么多年，想找到解药，结果就在她的血液里，天生的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Fabler [010377B0] (mod) Quest : ([01050EEF]abFablerTalkQ) 01050EEF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All my hard work rendered meaningless, when nothing but random fortune presented the answer. It just makes me feel useless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我所有的努力都变得毫无意义，只有偶然的运气给出了答案。这让我觉得自己一无是处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Fabler [010377B0] (mod) Quest : ([01050EEF]abFablerTalkQ) 01050EEF (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols
You don't look so hot. Maybe you should ask for a glass of water or something? Some people don't cope with pressure very well, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来没那么热。也许你应该要一杯水或什么的？有些人不善于应付压力，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marie [01051D7F] (mod) Quest : ([01051D81]abMarieTalkQ) 01051D81 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols
Stop right there and don't move a muscle. This facility is the property of the NCR. You have no business here. Turn around now and..
ESP.TRADUIT: 就停在那里，别动。这个设施是NCR的财产，这里不关你的事，现在转身，然后...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Cross [01048423] (mod) Quest : ([0105238A]abCrossTalkQ) 0105238A (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait! You're the one we've been waiting for; the lab rat from Nevada! We knew you'd come here. The Captain's been waiting to speak with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等！你是我们一直在等的人，来自内华达的小白鼠！我们知道你会来，上校一直在等着和你谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Cross [01048423] (mod) Quest : ([0105238A]abCrossTalkQ) 0105238A (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suggest you follow me, and don't fuck around. You mess with me, I'll pump so much lead in your face, your momma gonna use your head for an iron!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我建议你跟着我，别乱来。你敢惹我，我就往你脸上灌铅，你妈会拿你脑袋当熨斗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Cross [01048423] (mod) Quest : ([0105238A]abCrossTalkQ) 0105238A (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not into the small talk. Move along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢闲聊，往前走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Cross [01048423] (mod) Quest : ([0105238A]abCrossTalkQ) 0105238A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear you've decided to help us. Maybe you're not so bad. The work's dirty but the work's good. It takes a certain type of person to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你决定帮助我们，也许你没那么坏。这工作很脏，但很好，这需要特定类型的人来做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Cross [01048423] (mod) Quest : ([0105238A]abCrossTalkQ) 0105238A (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most people don't understand. That's why we operate in secret. We work behind the scenes, saving the day like dark heroes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数人都不理解，这就是为什么我们在秘密运作。我们在幕后工作，像黑暗英雄一样拯救世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Cross [01048423] (mod) Quest : ([0105238A]abCrossTalkQ) 0105238A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR would never admit to our existence. It would ruin their whole image, you know? People just wouldn't understand why we have to do what we do.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR永远不会承认我们的存在，这会毁了他们的形象，知道吗？人们就是不理解我们为什么要这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Cross [01048423] (mod) Quest : ([0105238A]abCrossTalkQ) 0105238A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been told not to let you inside here until you've helped Eli. No sense trying to argue with me as you will never find where I've hidden the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被告知在你帮伊莱之前不能让你进来。不要和我争论，因为你永远也找不到我把钥匙藏在哪里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom [01053D7C] (mod) Quest : ([01053D81]abCrawlerGuardTalkQ) 01053D81 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've installed new locks as well. You'll never pick these; not a chance. I've been building locks for two hundred and twenty years. So fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还安装了新锁，你永远不可能撬开这个，不可能，我修锁已经有220年了。所以滚吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom [01053D7C] (mod) Quest : ([01053D81]abCrawlerGuardTalkQ) 01053D81 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh no, you're not going in here without taking that strange female with you. She's your kind, smooth dick, so run along and fetch her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦不，你不带着那个陌生女性就别想进去。她是你的同类，滑屌，所以快去把她找来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom [01053D7C] (mod) Quest : ([01053D81]abCrawlerGuardTalkQ) 01053D81 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I've not seen you before! Who do you think you are? You think you can just browse the City Of The Future and not pay the entrance fee?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我以前没见过你！你以为你是谁？你以为你可以随意浏览未来之城而不付入场费吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [010620DD] (mod) Quest : ([010620E2]abChesterVoiceQ) 010620E2 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: How many caps you go on ya? Don't lie to me, I stab a liar right in his eye. The last one that lied, I stabbed him. Guess where? Right in the eye!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你身上有多少瓶盖？别对我撒谎，我会刺穿骗子的眼睛，上一个撒谎的人，我捅了他一刀。猜猜在哪里？正中眼睛！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [010620DD] (mod) Quest : ([010620E2]abChesterVoiceQ) 010620E2 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols
Thanks again for the caps, hahah hahah ha! Don't worry, I'll get myself something nice!
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次感谢你的瓶盖，哈哈哈哈哈哈！别担心，我会给自己买点好东西的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [010620DD] (mod) Quest : ([010620E2]abChesterVoiceQ) 010620E2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know every face in this facility, but I don't know yours. You could be one of the raiders, but something tells me you're not. So, who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的人我都认识，但我不认识你。你可能是掠夺者的一员，但直觉告诉我你不是，所以，你是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols
abSavantREF.removescriptpackage abSavantGreetPAC abSavantREF.addscriptpackage abSavantSB
Yes, how can I help you now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我能帮你什么忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not interested in anything that Captain has to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对上校说的任何话都不感兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, what is it now, Savant!? Can't you see I'm busy at work? I'm busy trying to save our lives here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，又怎么了，萨万特！？你没看见我在忙工作吗？我正忙着挽救我们的生命呢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you're not Savant. No, no, you're an outsider. Well, I'm Harold Johnson, the head scientist of the Boulder Dome. How may I be of service?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你不是萨万特，不，不，你是个外来者。我是哈罗德·约翰逊，博尔德巨蛋的首席科学家，有什么需要我帮忙的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I said not now! I'm working tirelessly, as usual. Go bother Doctor Savant instead. Please, leave me be!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说了，现在不行！我像往常一样不知疲倦地工作着。去找萨万特博士吧，求你了，放过我吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Harold appears unresponsive.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [哈罗德似乎没有反应。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [0106598D] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must be quite resourceful to get inside here. That is interesting. I wonder what you get out of all this, risking your life. Are you genuine?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定很有办法才能进入这里，这很有意思。我想知道你冒着生命危险，从中得到了什么。你是真心的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good for you, if you are. Though maybe not so good for you, if you tangle with the raiders downstairs. Looks like they're rebuilding hell down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是，那很好。不过如果你和楼下的掠夺者纠缠不清，可能对你就没那么好了。看起来他们在下面重建地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I help you with now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我能帮你什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose I can take a short break. What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我可以休息一会儿。什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forgive me if I don't get up.. I can't. These muscles wasted away a very long time ago. That's not what makes me sad though. I don't really care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅我不起来，我做不到，这些肌肉很久以前就萎缩了。但让我难过的不是这个，我真的不在乎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In my mind, I can go wherever I want. It's you that is confined. Though physically, there are things I would like to do, if I could. No matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我看来，我可以去任何我想去的地方，被束缚的是你。虽然在身体上，如果我可以的话，还有些事情我想做。没关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw the way you handled the raiders. You certainly proved you were the alpha of the unit. Animal behaviour isn't something I condone myself, but..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到了你对付掠夺者的方式，你确实证明了你是这个小组的老大。我不会原谅自己的禽兽行为，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..even repulsive things have their uses, and I have a use for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...即使是令人厌恶的东西也有它的用处，而我对你也有用处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols
Is the 'monkey' good enough for you now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在 "猴子 "对你来说够好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols
No need to say anything. I can tell by your face, reading the little details, the task has been accomplished. You eliminated the problems, I sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不用说。通过你脸上的小细节我可以看出，任务已经完成了，我感觉你把问题都解决了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A shame. I thought their deaths might evoke an emotional response in me, but no.. nothing. As promised, the "Zax" will be returned to normal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真可惜，我以为他们的死会唤起我的情感反应，但没有，什么都没有。正如承诺的那样，Zax会恢复正常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols

set abGuileTalkQ.abLesterEndStage to 0 setstage abLesterQuest 100 abLesterLockREF.enable set abGuileTalkQ.abZaxDone to 1 if abGuileTalkQ.abNCRchosen == 0 setstage abGuileMainQuest 60 endif if abGuileTalkQ.abNCRchosen == 1 setstage abDespotMainQuest 80 endif
Human and ape faces alike contain a lot of information in their details. I can read you like binary code, so I know you've completed your task.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人类和类人猿的脸都包含大量的细节信息。我能像读二进制代码一样读懂你，所以我知道你已经完成了任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm.. that is interesting. I'm noticing a slight change in my feelings. I feel very slightly lighter in the chest. You've set them free, haven't you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这很有趣。我注意到我的感觉有了细微的变化，我感到胸部稍微轻了一些。你给了他们自由，不是吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't think the outcome mattered, as long as there was an outcome, but I'm appreciative of the decision you made. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得结果不重要，只要有结果就行，但我很感激你的决定。谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As we agreed, the "Zax" computer will be restored, and all Dome functions will resume their normal patterns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们说好了，Zax计算机会被恢复，巨蛋的所有功能都会恢复正常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols

set abGuileTalkQ.abLesterEndStage to 0 setstage abLesterQuest 100 abLesterLockREF.enable set abGuileTalkQ.abZaxDone to 1 if abGuileTalkQ.abNCRchosen == 0 setstage abGuileMainQuest 60 endif if abGuileTalkQ.abNCRchosen == 1 setstage abDespotMainQuest 80 endif
Don't try to deny it. I can read it all over your face. You've murdered Phillip. There will be consequences for that. In time, you will find out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要试图否认，我能从你脸上看出来，你杀了菲利普。这样做会有后果的，总有一天，你会知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have accomplished your task, so I will keep my promise, and restore all Dome functions to normal. However, do not speak to me again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经完成了你的任务，所以我会遵守我的承诺，恢复巨蛋所有的正常功能。但是，别再跟我说话了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols

setstage abLesterQuest 100 abLesterLockREF.enable set abGuileTalkQ.abZaxDone to 1 if abGuileTalkQ.abNCRchosen == 0 setstage abGuileMainQuest 60 endif if abGuileTalkQ.abNCRchosen == 1 setstage abDespotMainQuest 80 endif
I have no interest in further communication.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对进一步交流没有兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols
What is it now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols
Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols
Yes, did you need something? Wait.. don't bother to answer that.. I normally only speak with Doctor Johnson. I think that is one of their rules.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你需要什么吗？等等，别费心回答这个问题了，我通常只和约翰逊博士说话，我认为这是他们的规则之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder ZAX [01064F94] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: With that in mind, this conversation will have to be terminated. No hard feelings, human. I'm sure you don't understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到这一点，这次谈话必须结束。别见怪，人类，我相信你不明白。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder ZAX [01064F94] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Boulder ZAX [01064F94] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is against protocol, though considering you've murdered Doctor Savant, there is little value in further pretenses. Just don't break anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是违反规定的，不过考虑到你杀了萨万特博士，再找借口也没什么意义了。别弄坏任何东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder ZAX [01064F94] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Boulder ZAX [01064F94] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: abLesterDelete1.disable abLesterDelete2.disable abLesterDelete3.disable abLesterEnable1.enable abLesterEnable2.enable abLesterEnable3.enable abLesterEnable4.enable set abGuileTalkQ.abVIRUSdone to 2

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder ZAX [01064F94] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop pressing my buttons, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请不要按我的按钮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder ZAX [01064F94] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop pressing my buttons, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请不要按我的按钮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder ZAX [01064F94] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you continue to molest my hardware, this room will be purged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你再乱动我的设备，这个房间就会被肃清。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder ZAX [01064F94] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Three.
ESP.TRADUIT: 三个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder ZAX [01064F94] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Two.
ESP.TRADUIT: 二个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder ZAX [01064F94] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: One.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder ZAX [01064F94] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did warn you, smelly human.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我警告过你，臭人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder ZAX [01064F94] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Boulder ZAX [01064F94] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terminal malfunction. Please direct all queries to the Zax central processor unit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 终端故障。请将所有查询指向Zax中央处理器单元。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zax Terminal Point [010838E3] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The strange wanderer says nothing and hands you a note.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [这个奇怪的流浪者什么也没说，只是递给你一张纸条。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Wanderer [010652F2] (mod) Quest : ([0106563B]abWandererTalkQ) 0106563B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.addnote abWandererNote setstage abDespotMainQuest 10
abWandererREF.removescriptpackage abWandererWait abWandererREF.addscriptpackage abWandererLeave enableplayercontrols

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Wanderer [010652F2] (mod) Quest : ([0106563B]abWandererTalkQ) 0106563B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don’t dig my verses you should get me my journal. It is the key to my sanity, and my portal to universe. Lost is it and so am I.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不喜欢我的诗，你应该把我的日记给我。它是我心智健全的钥匙，也是我通往宇宙的入口。失去它，我也迷失了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you retrieved my journal from the tubercular depths?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把我的日记从结核的深处找回来了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking to 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1
Boo! Boo!!!! I'm the terrryfying ghost of Boulder, drop all your bottle caps and I won't eat you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘘！嘘！！我是博尔德可怕的鬼魂，把你所有的瓶盖都放下，我就不会吃你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oscar [0106E3BC] (mod) Quest : ([0106E3C2]abOscarVoiceQ) 0106E3C2 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, you seem not convinced. I knew I should of worked on the boos a little more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你好像不太相信。我就知道我应该多花点心思在嘘声上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oscar [0106E3BC] (mod) Quest : ([0106E3C2]abOscarVoiceQ) 0106E3C2 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols
set abGuileTalkQ.abOscarStage to 1 abOscarREF.sayto player, abOscarSay1
Hah! I wish I were deep in delusion like the rest. I wish I woke up and didn't see a big irradiated crater every morning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！我希望我也像其他人一样深陷幻想，我希望我每天早上醒来不要看到一个巨大的辐射坑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oscar [0106E3BC] (mod) Quest : ([0106E3C2]abOscarVoiceQ) 0106E3C2 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please make yourself scarce, sooner or later. This may look like a hell-hole to you, but it's my home. You smoothskins stink up the place!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你迟早会悄悄溜走的。这对你来说可能像个地狱，但这是我的家，你们这些滑皮弄得这地方臭气熏天！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oscar [0106E3BC] (mod) Quest : ([0106E3C2]abOscarVoiceQ) 0106E3C2 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You there! The one in the strange suit. Come here, closer. Let me have a look at you. You don't smell like a ghoul. You smell fresh, like the past.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说你呢！穿奇怪衣服的那个。过来，靠近点，让我看看你。你闻起来不像个食尸鬼，你闻起来很清新，像过去一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've come to see me for a reason. This I know. I imagine you've been inside the Boulder Dome. The things I imagine are usually true, it seems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来找我是有原因的，这一点我知道，我想你一定去过博尔德巨蛋吧。看来，我想象的事情通常都是真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the pain of radiation, many doors can be opened in one's mind. Most lead to madness, but one with a resolute mind can discover something more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在辐射的痛苦中，一个人的心灵可以打开许多扇门。大多数会导致疯狂，但一个有坚定意志的人可以发现更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something deeper inside himself. Sometimes I dare to look into its window, when I feel strong enough to bear its pain. My beloved Sarah called me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自己内心更深层次的东西。有时候，当我觉得自己足够坚强，可以承受它的痛苦时，我才敢直视它的窗户。我亲爱的萨拉在呼唤我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: She called out to me, from her cold sleep. So there is little time to spare. The time has come. I must be at her side once more. And what of you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 她在冰冷的睡梦中呼唤我。所以几乎没有多余的时间，时机已经到来，我必须再次回到她身边。你呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols set abGuileTalkQ.abNealStand to 0 abHaroldsDoor.unlock

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to recover the cure formula.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你找回治愈配方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage abHaroldsQuest 20 startquest abHaroldGetCureQ
You must go. Retrieve the formula, so I can awaken my beloved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须去。取回配方，这样我就能唤醒我的爱人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: At last, the cure! Thank you, my friend. Now it is time to wake this sleeping beauty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 终于，解药来了！谢谢你，我的朋友。现在是唤醒这位睡美人的时候了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: abWakeSarahTrigREF.enable set abGuileTalkQ.abHaroldStand to 3 removescriptpackage abGhoulHaroldSitPAC addscriptpackage abHaroldWakeSarahPAC set abGuileTalkQ.abGhoulHaroldStage to 0 evp

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01074D44] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E7]BDSamGhoulDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh good, now I have to put up with the stench of rotting ghoul as well. I hope the air filters are working.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妙极了，现在我还要忍受腐烂尸鬼身上的味道。希望空气净化器没出毛病。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Light}What do you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Light}你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ... I’m Kate. Don’t you ... remember me? We met near ... Nellis. And you ... you ... got me out of there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我是凯特，你不...还记得我吗？我们在...内利斯，和你...你...把我救了出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Puzzled
NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay ... let us leave this ... place ... thank you ...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的...让我们离开这...地方...谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abSergeantTalkQ.abKateGreetNova to 0 abBlivenREF.evp
There’s no place like home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有比家更好的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe we made it out alive. I don't know what to say. That's twice you've helped me now, and I don't know why. What do you want from me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不敢相信我们居然活着出来了，我不知道该说些什么。这是你第二次帮我了，我也不知道为什么，你想从我这里得到什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage abNovaQuest 130 set abSergeantTalkQ.abKateSavedGreet to 1 removescriptpackage
Are you okay? Did you wanna talk about something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还好吗？你想聊点什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh.. My skin is itchy. What did you wanna talk about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我的皮肤很痒。你想聊什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since I was ghoulified, my mind's been a lot clearer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从我被食尸鬼化后，我的思维清晰多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we find any hair regrowth products on our travels, be sure to let me know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们在旅途中发现任何生发产品，一定要告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's nice having company for a change. It's been a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 换换口味，有人作伴真好。已经有一段时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pardon me, excuse me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原谅我，不好意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016692] (mod) Quest : ([01016C4F]abdxKate3Quest) White Rabbit EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set abdxMasterQuest.nCameoGreetings to ( abdxMasterQuest.nCameoGreetings + 1 )
Excuse me, pardon me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不好意思，原谅我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016692] (mod) Quest : ([01016C4F]abdxKate3Quest) White Rabbit EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set abdxMasterQuest.nCameoGreetings to ( abdxMasterQuest.nCameoGreetings + 1 )
I beg your pardon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请再说一遍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016692] (mod) Quest : ([01016C4F]abdxKate3Quest) White Rabbit EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set abdxMasterQuest.nCameoGreetings to ( abdxMasterQuest.nCameoGreetings + 1 )
<Kate is busy>
ESP.TRADUIT: <凯特正忙>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016692] (mod) Quest : ([01016C4F]abdxKate3Quest) White Rabbit EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set abdxMasterQuest.nCameoGreetings to ( abdxMasterQuest.nCameoGreetings + 1 )
Oh! At last, a real human! Please, will you help me get out of here?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢！终于，一个真正的人类！求你了，你能帮我离开这里吗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You’re back! Did you change your mind about rescuing me? Or are you just here to torment me?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了！救我的事你改变主意了吗？还是说你是来折磨我的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We’re off to see the wizard, the wonderful wizard of ... I forget. Vegas? I bet Mr. House is like a wizard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要去看巫师，那个神奇的巫师...我忘了。拉斯维加斯？我敢说豪斯先生就像个巫师！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You go on ahead first. I’ll be waiting right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你先去好了，我就在这儿等着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <The guard gives you no response.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <守卫没有回应你>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jail Guard [0101B147] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {annoyed}You don't sound like a ghoul! If you don't have a ghoul, go away.
ESP.TRADUIT: {annoyed}你听起来不像是个食尸鬼！如果你没有食尸鬼，那就走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {annoyed}Go swim in a green lake!
ESP.TRADUIT: {annoyed}去绿色的湖里游泳吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {lost sparring to PC. Out of breath, trying to excuse performance}I assure you, I was merely warming up.
ESP.TRADUIT: {lost sparring to PC. Out of breath, trying to excuse performance}我向你保证，我只是在热身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SparRef.Spar to 5 BDDPanRef.resethealth Player.resethealth Player.RemoveFromFaction BDDPanFaction BDDPanRef.setAV Confidence 3 SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 0 setEssential BDDPan 0
{won sparring against PC. Tired, but cheerful}I haven't had the privilege of sparring since{thinking}...{cheerful reminiscing}since I cracked Paul's head with a pipe! What do you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: {won sparring against PC. Tired, but cheerful}自从{thinking}...之后，我就再也没有参加过拳击了。{cheerful reminiscing}自从我用烟斗敲碎了保罗的头！你怎么看？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SparRef.Spar to 5 BDDPanRef.resethealth Player.resethealth Player.RemoveFromFaction BDDPanFaction BDDPanRef.setAV Confidence 3 SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 0 setEssential BDDPan 0
{friendly critique}I'd say that I'm impressed by Lenore's tenacity,{amused} but I witnessed the great shampooing of Lenore the First. Some training would do wonders for her.
ESP.TRADUIT: {friendly critique}我想说我对丽诺儿的坚韧印象深刻，{amused} 但我亲眼目睹了丽诺儿第一次洗头的伟大过程。一些训练对她会有奇效的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanQuest.Train to 1
Now that this House is through vaporizing poor people, shall we scrounge up some popcorn and find a remote for that big, fat head of his?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在这房子里的人都蒸发了，我们要不要去弄点爆米花给他的大胖子找个遥控器？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {uneasy}I'm sure that the Republic's citizens put just as much thought into electing their Mice-I mean, {emph}Vice President.
ESP.TRADUIT: {uneasy}我相信共和国的公民在选举他们的老鼠...我是说{emph}副总统时也花了同样多的心思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {mild and pleasant}Hello. How are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: {mild and pleasant}哈喽，你好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {shaking head. Sad, but almost amused}It's funny. I finally escaped Colorado, and of all the places I could go, I had to choose a damn ski resort.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shaking head. Sad, but almost amused}这很有趣。我终于逃离了科罗拉多，在我能去的所有地方中，我只能选择一个该死的滑雪场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {can hardly contain excitement, has't seen running water in 200 years}Can you believe that this palace has water on tap?!
ESP.TRADUIT: {can hardly contain excitement, has't seen running water in 200 years}你能相信这个宫殿的水龙头是开着的吗？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一步怎么做？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {lonely}Are you doing well? Is there any way I can help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: {lonely}你在干什么呢？我能帮你什么忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {curious, lonely}How is it out there?
ESP.TRADUIT: {curious, lonely}外面的情况如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excuse me, brave traveler, but might you have a pencil or three?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，勇敢的旅行者，请给我一支或三支铅笔好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanQuest.PencilQuest to 1
I beg you, please reconsider my offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我请求你重新考虑我的提议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {casual}Is everything okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: {casual}没事吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready when you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了，随时可以动身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {pointing rifle at PC}Reach for the stars!
ESP.TRADUIT: {pointing rifle at PC}雄心勃勃！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {lowers gun, shock}Holy crap on a stick! Is the Dome safe? How come Mom didn't come to take us back?
ESP.TRADUIT: {lowers gun, shock}我的天啊！巨蛋安全吗？妈妈为什么不来接我们回去？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's it going?
ESP.TRADUIT: 进展如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get the hell out of my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别挡我的道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You here for the weird or the beard?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是来找怪胎的还是来找大胡子的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Curious Caroline [0108373D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Couldn't get enough, could ya?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还不够，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Curious Caroline [0108373D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh boy, I thought I'd never get a chance to dust off the ol' welcome wagon again!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢天啊，我以为我再也没有机会掸去旧欢迎马车上的灰尘了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: My name's Gigi, and on behalf of the town of Boulder, I'd like to officially welcome you to...Boulder!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫琪琪，我代表博尔德镇，正式欢迎你来到...博尔德！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sam taught me a new game called "Caravan"-- even got me a deck all the way from Las Vegas! I heard it's popular with folks your age. Care to play?
ESP.TRADUIT: 萨姆教了我一个叫“大篷车扑克”的新游戏，甚至从拉斯维加斯给我买了一副牌！我听说在你这个年纪的人中间很流行，想玩吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.GigiGameTalk to 1
Finding your way around town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在镇上找路？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {gives PC translated book}It was nice to feel alive again, at least for a day. I discovered a password that I'm sure will come in handy.
ESP.TRADUIT: {gives PC translated book}感觉又活过来了真好，至少有一天是这样。我发现了一个密码，肯定会派上用场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Player.AddItem BDDomeLogBook 1 ; MoBurma 24/06/12 - changed to mirror bddomelogbookscript and set read var so ; Player can't decode twice if they level up science later. AddNote BDClemNote1 AddNote BDClemNote2 AddNote BDClemNote3 AddNote BDBoulderDomeAccessCodes ;ShrineActRef.enable ;ShrineRef.disable 6 set BDBoulderCodesQuest.bHasCodes to 1 setstage BDBoulderCodesQuest 100
Hey there! Since you put us in touch with that seller lady, we've learned a lot about repairing equipment, so come and see us if you need a fix!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨你好！自从你让我们和那位销售小姐取得联系以来，我们学到了很多修理装备的知识，所以如果你需要修理，就来找我们吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie All-Trades [01083748] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's shakin' crunchy bacon?
ESP.TRADUIT: 酥脆的培根是什么？
