ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie All-Trades [01083748] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I once dreamed that I was a talking grass skirt named "Betty."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经梦见自己是一条会说话的草裙，名叫“贝蒂”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey [0108374C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.Dream to 1
One time, I dreamed that I had to climb a ladder made of bumper stickers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一次，我梦见我必须爬上一个用保险杠贴纸做成的梯子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey [0108374C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.Dream to 2
I dreamed that I was at a parade and saw a truck with color TVs for wheels. It rolled and everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我梦见自己在游行，看到一辆卡车，轮子上装着彩电，正在滚动着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey [0108374C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.Dream to 3
I had this dream that I got a pass to get out of work because I beat the President at basketball.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做了一个梦，我得到了一张不用上班的通行证，因为我打篮球赢了总统。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey [0108374C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.Dream to 4
I dreamed that it was possible to get super powers by being shot out of a magic cannon, but {a little sad}I was too afraid of heights to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我梦见只要把自己从魔法大炮中射出去就能获得超能力，但{a little sad}我恐高，做不到这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey [0108374C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.Dream to 5
Blow my mind! Are you one of the Stork's friends?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我大吃一惊！你是鹳鸟的朋友吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mark [01083742] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why would anyone use bottle caps for money? Do you make change with soda can tabs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么会有人用瓶盖当钱？你会用汽水罐的拉环找零吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0108374A] (mod) NPC : Connie [0108374B] (mod) NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) NPC : Petey [0108374C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it true that cows have two heads out there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 牛真的有两个脑袋？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0108374A] (mod) NPC : Connie [0108374B] (mod) NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) NPC : Petey [0108374C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) NPC : Jeff [0108374A] (mod) NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) NPC : Connie [0108374B] (mod) NPC : Petey [0108374C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice to see you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴见到你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0108374A] (mod) NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) NPC : Connie [0108374B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: We really appreciate all the help. So, what can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们真的很感谢所有的帮助。那么，我能为你做什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0108374A] (mod) NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {suspicious}Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: {suspicious}嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0108374A] (mod) NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) NPC : Connie [0108374B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {suspicious}What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: {suspicious}你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0108374A] (mod) NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) NPC : Connie [0108374B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit on a shingle or crap on a cracker?
ESP.TRADUIT: 瓦片上的屎还是饼干上的屎？(注:"Shit on a shingle"和"crap on a cracker"都是军队俚语，指一种在面包片上撒碎牛肉的食物。)
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0108374A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, ha, ha. Don't look so surprised!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈哈，别这么惊讶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [0108374B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy BDEvilConnieFaction playerfaction EvilConnieRef.SetAV aggression 3 EvilConnieRef.ResetAI EvilConnieREF.startcombat player
<meow?>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emaciated Cat [010838DC] (mod) Quest : ([010837EF]BDLenoreQuest) Lenore follower quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <purr>
ESP.TRADUIT: <呼噜>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emaciated Cat [010838DC] (mod) Quest : ([010837EF]BDLenoreQuest) Lenore follower quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's one ragged Ghoul you've got with you. Seems like a good guy, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟着你的尸鬼还真是破衣烂衫的。不过看起来是个好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That ghoul with you looks like he's older than the war! My the things he must have seen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟你一起的那个尸鬼看起来像是战前出生的！他肯定见识过许多事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never seen a ghoul up close. Not sure I wanted to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没近距离看过尸鬼。还是别看的好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Surprise mixed with disgust}They let Ghouls into the Strip, now?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Surprise mixed with disgust}长街现在还放尸鬼进来了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Proud Assertion}All humans are welcome here, even Ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Proud Assertion}这里欢迎任何人，包括尸鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to your buddy's face?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你朋友的脸怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice to see a human palling around with a ghoul. I see a lot of people around here avoid them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人类与尸鬼和睦相处，这场面真温馨。我们这儿的多数人对他们可是避之不及呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837FA]BDDPanReactions) Vanilla Mojave DPan reactions <dummied out, altered comments directly> EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your pal's one ugly motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的朋友真他妈逼丑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837FA]BDDPanReactions) Vanilla Mojave DPan reactions <dummied out, altered comments directly> EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanReactions.Speaker to GetSelf BDDPanRef.Sayto Speaker DPanKhanRetort
Oh good, now I have to put up with the stench of rotting ghoul as well. I hope the air filters are working.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妙极了，现在我还要忍受腐烂尸鬼身上的味道。希望空气净化器没出毛病。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837FA]BDDPanReactions) Vanilla Mojave DPan reactions <dummied out, altered comments directly> EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wouldn't want to live forever if I had to look like a ghoul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我得像个食尸鬼，我可不想长生不老。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837FA]BDDPanReactions) Vanilla Mojave DPan reactions <dummied out, altered comments directly> EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Proud Assertion}All humans are welcome here, even Ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Proud Assertion}这里欢迎任何人，包括尸鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837FA]BDDPanReactions) Vanilla Mojave DPan reactions <dummied out, altered comments directly> EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Surprise mixed with disgust}They let Ghouls into the Strip, now?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Surprise mixed with disgust}长街现在还放尸鬼进来了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837FA]BDDPanReactions) Vanilla Mojave DPan reactions <dummied out, altered comments directly> EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll never get used to the sight of ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我永远也不会习惯看到食尸鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837FA]BDDPanReactions) Vanilla Mojave DPan reactions <dummied out, altered comments directly> EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to your buddy's face?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你朋友的脸怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837FA]BDDPanReactions) Vanilla Mojave DPan reactions <dummied out, altered comments directly> EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's one ragged Ghoul you've got with you. Seems like a good guy, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟着你的尸鬼还真是破衣烂衫的。不过看起来是个好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837FA]BDDPanReactions) Vanilla Mojave DPan reactions <dummied out, altered comments directly> EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That ghoul with you looks like he's older than the war! My the things he must have seen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟你一起的那个尸鬼看起来像是战前出生的！他肯定见识过许多事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837FA]BDDPanReactions) Vanilla Mojave DPan reactions <dummied out, altered comments directly> EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh. One of the burned people walks in our camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，一个被烧伤的人走进了我们的营地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837FA]BDDPanReactions) Vanilla Mojave DPan reactions <dummied out, altered comments directly> EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a revolting sight. {incredulous}To call that a friend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个令人作呕的景象。{incredulous}称他为朋友？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837FA]BDDPanReactions) Vanilla Mojave DPan reactions <dummied out, altered comments directly> EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your ghoul wants to have some fun he can, we don't discriminate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你的尸鬼也想找乐子，我们不会歧视的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn! How did you get such a nice avatar, while the rest of us look like chumps? Are you some kind of mod?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死！你是怎么弄到这么漂亮的头像的，而我们其他人看起来都像笨蛋？你用了什么mod吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's the hunting?
ESP.TRADUIT: 打猎怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you my mummy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是我妈吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0100585E]BDMamasBoyQuest) Mama's Boy's Greeting - dummied out, used note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: PlaySound UIWildWasteland showmessage WildWastelandMessage MamasBoyRef.SetRestrained 0 setenemy BDMamasBoyFaction playerfaction MamasBoyRef.StartCombat Player
{Companion Reaction - Raul}{disgusted by ghoul's appearance}What a revolting sight. {incredulous}To call that a friend?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Companion Reaction - Raul}{disgusted by ghoul's appearance}真恶心。{incredulous}你和那玩意做朋友？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your pet ghoul smells like ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这宠物尸鬼闻起来跟屎一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Companion Reaction - Raul}Ugh. One of the burned people walks in our camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Companion Reaction - Raul}啊。有个被烧伤的家伙跑到我们的营地来啦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Companion Reaction - Raul}I'll never get used to the sight of ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Companion Reaction - Raul}我就是不习惯见到尸鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Companion Reaction - Raul}Wouldn't want to live forever if I had to look like a ghoul.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Companion Reaction - Raul}要是变成尸鬼那样，我宁愿不要长生不死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice to see a human palling around with a ghoul. I see a lot of people around here avoid them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人类与尸鬼和睦相处，这场面真温馨。我们这儿的多数人对他们可是避之不及呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your pal's one ugly motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的朋友真他妈逼丑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYER THROW GRENADE
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩家扔手雷

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get under a desk!
ESP.TRADUIT: 躲到桌子下面去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Run!!!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh my god! Commies!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的天啊！共产党！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our property values!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的房产价值！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quick! Find a desk!
ESP.TRADUIT: 快！找张桌子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYER FIRE WEAPON
{slightly surprised}I didn't know you were a sniper.
ESP.TRADUIT: {slightly surprised}我不知道你是狙击手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {looking around, alert}Do you see something?
ESP.TRADUIT: {looking around, alert}你看到什么了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYER LAY MINE
{casual observation}It'll take more than that to put a man on the moon.
ESP.TRADUIT: {casual observation}要把人送上月球还不够。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {a bit impressed}You sure know how to play the "hot lava" game.
ESP.TRADUIT: {a bit impressed}你还真会玩“热熔岩”游戏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYER IN IRON SITES
Shall I put an apple on my head?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以把苹果放在我的头上吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cheese.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉啦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd criticize your gun safety...but I fear your response.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想批评你的枪支安全...但我害怕你的反应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {casual menace}Now, I've met Death more than once, so don't think your little toy scares me.
ESP.TRADUIT: {casual menace}现在，我已经见过死神不止一次了，所以别以为你的小玩具吓到我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {casual menace}What a cute little gun you've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: {casual menace}你的小枪多可爱啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {in PC iron sights, trying to repress fear} That's not loaded, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: {in PC iron sights, trying to repress fear} 没有装子弹，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {in PC iron sights, shock} What're you doing?!
ESP.TRADUIT: {in PC iron sights, shock}你在干什么？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no beer, so don't ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有啤酒，所以别问了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E7]BDSamGhoulDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {casual anecdote to Cricket}Hey, Crick, "Peeping Thomas" is back.
ESP.TRADUIT: {casual anecdote to Cricket}嘿，克里克，"偷窥狂托马斯 "回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello, kitty cat! Have you seen my friend, Thomas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，小猫咪！你见过我的朋友托马斯吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, aren't you a dapper fellow?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你不是一个潇洒的家伙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: We could always use volunteers, if you're interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有兴趣，我们总是需要志愿者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are we doing on Rad-Away?
ESP.TRADUIT: 辐特宁进展如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are Alice and Bob when you bring them food?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给艾丽斯和鲍勃送去食物时，他们的表现如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's it like outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 外面怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you need me to run out for anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要我出去买点什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sleep tight, and don't let the ferals bite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 睡个好觉，别让野性尸鬼咬了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have I told you how much I hate mornings?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉过你我有多讨厌早晨吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: {mild and pleasant}Hello. How are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: {mild and pleasant}哈喽，你好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {affectionate}Hugs for {JEE-jee}Gigi?
ESP.TRADUIT: {affectionate}拥抱{JEE-jee}琪琪？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {weary}Before you ask, I'm working on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {weary}别问了，我正在想办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {lonely}Are you doing well? Is there any way I can help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: {lonely}你在干什么呢？我能帮你什么忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {curious, lonely}How is it out there?
ESP.TRADUIT: {curious, lonely}外面的情况如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sighing, heart aflutter}For a place full of fire, it sure is heavenly.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sighing, heart aflutter}对于一个充满火焰的地方来说，这确实是天堂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: How’s my putrid princess?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的腐烂公主怎么样了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: LenoreRef.Sayto BDDPanRef Hello
{casual}Is everything okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: {casual}没事吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready when you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了，随时可以动身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My aim's getting better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我瞄得越来越准了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's it going?
ESP.TRADUIT: 进展如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sarcastic, sigh}Buried alive with old people. What fun!
ESP.TRADUIT: {sarcastic, sigh}和老人一起被活埋，多有趣啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd think a place this{emph} zombie-infested would be exciting or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会认为这样一个{emph}僵尸横行的地方会很刺激还是什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {to player}Firefly says that the zombie disease can make people go psycho at any minute, but these people seem okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: {to player}萤火虫说僵尸病会让人随时发疯，但这些人看起来还好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {to player} That Firefly guy taught me how to shoot himself! {finds it sick, but almost amusing} No, really, I'm supposed to {emph}shoot him if he ever turns crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: {to player} 那个叫萤火虫的家伙教我怎么开枪自杀！{finds it sick, but almost amusing}不，真的，我应该{emph}毙了他，如果他疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {to Tora, trying to comfort him}See, it's not so bad down here! There's no baths, no school...
ESP.TRADUIT: {to Tora, trying to comfort him}看，这里没那么糟！没有浴场，没有学校...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't wander too far. You never know when one of them'll turn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要走太远，你永远不知道他们什么时候会转变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {to Tora}Don't worry, Mom'll come for us soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: {to Tora}别担心，妈妈很快就会来接我们的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {shocked}Ho-ley smokes! You could make a fortune exhibiting that cat out of state! They're supposed to be extinct...at least everywhere else.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shocked}我的妈呀！你可以把这只猫在别的州展出，赚一大笔！它们应该已经灭绝了...至少在其他地方是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the market from some out-of-this-word ammo? Look no further!
ESP.TRADUIT: 想在市场上买到什么与众不同的弹药？别舍近求远了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Curious Caroline [0108373D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yao guai have been extinct in Colorado for the last ten years, or {emph}have they? Savor the flavor of the very last one!
ESP.TRADUIT: 近十年来，科罗拉多的妖怪已经绝种了，是这样吗？品尝最后一个的味道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Curious Caroline [0108373D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls! Prepare yourself for the astounding, mind-bending Curious Caroline's Emporium!
ESP.TRADUIT: 女士们，先生们，男孩们，女孩们！准备好迎接令人震惊的、稀奇古怪的稀奇卡洛琳商场吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Curious Caroline [0108373D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Step right up, and witness history come to life! Truly a miracle of science, I present to you Lightning, the one-headed wonder brahmin!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，见证历史重现！这真是一个科学的奇迹，我向你们展示闪电，一头独头的奇迹婆罗门！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Curious Caroline [0108373D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Peruse our new collection of quilts and trinkets handcrafted by the lost ghouls of ancient Boulder!
ESP.TRADUIT: 仔细查看我们的新收集的被子和饰品，由古代博尔德失踪的食尸鬼手工制作！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Curious Caroline [0108373D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let us know if you need anything fixed. We've learned a lot since we started trading with the outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要修理什么，请告诉我们。自从我们开始与外界贸易以来，学到了很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nicky [0108374D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {low voice, in case bad-rep PC is around}I can't wait for that stranger to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: {low voice, in case bad-rep PC is around}我迫不及待地想让那个陌生人离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {impressed}Our new visitor's really something.
ESP.TRADUIT: {impressed}我们的新访客真不简单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {firm praise}Keep up the good work. You've earned your ration.
ESP.TRADUIT: {firm praise}继续努力。你的配给是应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {tired of waiting, but tries to be hopeful}Any progress with the mushrooms?
ESP.TRADUIT: {tired of waiting, but tries to be hopeful}蘑菇有什么进展吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {trying to be tough but fair}I know we all have "off" days, but the next time I catch you slacking that much, I {emph}will dock you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {trying to be tough but fair}我知道我们都有休息的时候，但是下次我再发现你这么偷懒，我{emph}一定会扣你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {angry and sick of DP's shit}You're lucky I even allow you in here! How many more weeks do you need? Two? Two-hundred?
ESP.TRADUIT: {angry and sick of DP's shit}我能让你进来算你走运！你还需要几个星期？两个？两百个？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about a game?
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩个游戏怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh. I forgot how much beer tastes like piss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我忘了啤酒的味道有多像尿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, I'm bored.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，我很无聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The nice thing about Boulder is the weather's always fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 博尔德的优点的天气总是很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you ready for movie night?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好迎接电影之夜了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet the next party will be bigger than the last!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌下次派对一定比上次更盛大！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd kill for a cold beer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真想喝杯冰啤酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wanna trade books?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想换书吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you think of that book?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得那本书怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {to self. Eczema being a euphemism for rotting}Damn itchy eczema...
ESP.TRADUIT: {to self. Eczema being a euphemism for rotting}该死的湿疹瘙痒...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderDoctor.Eczema to 1
{disturbed}I've seen 'Love Sets Sail!' so many times, I say the lines in my sleep.
ESP.TRADUIT: {disturbed}我看过《爱情起航！》很多次，我都是在睡梦中念那些台词。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good morning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早上好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got that wall done like you wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我按你的要求把墙修好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey [0108374C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The floor's all set.
ESP.TRADUIT: 地板都准备好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey [0108374C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {annoyed}When's Andre gonna catch the gremlin anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: {annoyed}安德烈什么时候能抓到小魔怪？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {angry}I can't sleep with that damn gremlin running around!
ESP.TRADUIT: {angry}那该死的小魔怪跑来跑去，我睡不着！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sighs}The gremlin robbed me again.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sighs}小魔怪又抢了我的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope someone finally cleans up that library.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真希望有人能把图书馆清理干净。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {surprised, disappointed}I can't believe Connie was the gremlin.
ESP.TRADUIT: {surprised, disappointed}真不敢相信康妮就是那个小魔怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I have a sore throat! Should I be worried?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我喉咙痛！我应该担心吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sore}My back hurts. My knees hurt. Everything hurts.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sore}我的背疼，我的膝盖疼，全都很疼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been having trouble getting up. {hushed fear}Do you think I'll finally die soon?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直起不来。{hushed fear}你认为我很快就会死吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {paranoid}Don't sniff the mushrooms. The spores will grow in your brain!
ESP.TRADUIT: {paranoid}不要闻蘑菇，孢子会在你的大脑里生长！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucia [01083751] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {paranoid}Watch out for that slippery spot. You could break your neck and get paralyzed and die of infected bedsores.
ESP.TRADUIT: {paranoid}小心那个滑溜溜的地方。你可能会折断脖子，瘫痪，死于褥疮感染。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucia [01083751] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {unusually calm, happy}I love the way the mushrooms twinkle, don't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: {unusually calm, happy}我喜欢蘑菇闪闪发光的样子，你呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucia [01083751] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's my little beansprout?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的小豆芽怎么样了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you need me to read anything, sweetie?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要我读点什么吗，亲爱的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {mournful}The last thing Boulder needs is more death!
ESP.TRADUIT: {mournful}博尔德最不需要的就是更多的死亡！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) NPC : Jackie All-Trades [01083748] (mod) NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: We oughta finish that game we started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该结束我们开始的游戏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sam taught me a new game called "Caravan." Care to play?
ESP.TRADUIT: 萨姆教了我一个新游戏叫"大篷车扑克"，想玩吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Murrr!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emaciated Cat [010838DC] (mod) Quest : ([010837EF]BDLenoreQuest) Lenore follower quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <hiss!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emaciated Cat [010838DC] (mod) Quest : ([010837EF]BDLenoreQuest) Lenore follower quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Meow?>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emaciated Cat [010838DC] (mod) Quest : ([010837EF]BDLenoreQuest) Lenore follower quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Purr>
ESP.TRADUIT: <呼噜>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emaciated Cat [010838DC] (mod) Quest : ([010837EF]BDLenoreQuest) Lenore follower quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {in character}"Legalize catnip?! While a tax levy could bring down the {losing it, thinks line is stupid}national de-fur-cit, the Champurr of Cat-merce--" {out of char, mutters} *groan* Fuck you, Bedpan.
ESP.TRADUIT: {in character}"猫薄荷合法化？！虽然征税可以 {losing it, thinks line is stupid}扳倒去毛, 但猫商..." {out of char, mutters} *呻吟* 操你妈，便盆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Thank you for seeing me on such short notice, Empurress. This is a grave e-purr-gency.
ESP.TRADUIT: "感谢您在这么短的时间内见我，皇后。这是个严重的紧急情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Scar Pei! How dare you show your muzzle around here after nine cat-sassination attempts, among other crimes. Bark now before I shoot!"
ESP.TRADUIT: "刀疤佩！你怎么敢在这里露出你的枪口，在九次试图杀猫和其他罪行之后。在我开枪之前，现在就叫吧！"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderPerformances.break1 to 1 if GameHour >= 13 set BDBoulderPerformances.break2 to 1 endif
;dummied out this scene. lost audio files
I've never seen a ghoul up close. Not sure I wanted to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没近距离看过尸鬼。还是别看的好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never seen a ghoul up close. Not sure I wanted to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没近距离看过尸鬼。还是别看的好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837FA]BDDPanReactions) Vanilla Mojave DPan reactions <dummied out, altered comments directly> EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mmm, I haven't had a ghoul before. Do I get to keep the tip?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我没和尸鬼打过交道。是不是可以留着小费？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837FA]BDDPanReactions) Vanilla Mojave DPan reactions <dummied out, altered comments directly> EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your ghoul wants to have some fun he can, we don't discriminate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你的尸鬼也想找乐子，我们不会歧视的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837FA]BDDPanReactions) Vanilla Mojave DPan reactions <dummied out, altered comments directly> EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey big guy, looking for a good time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，大帅哥，要来爽一下吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

Don't walk away, let me show you the time of your life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别走开，我会让你享受这一生最美好的时刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mmm, I haven't had a ghoul before. Do I get to keep the tip?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我没和尸鬼打过交道。是不是可以留着小费？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Awfully long game, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 游戏时间太长了，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨你好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your pet ghoul smells like ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这宠物尸鬼闻起来跟屎一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your pet ghoul smells like ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这宠物尸鬼闻起来跟屎一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {warning}By the way, as you stroll around our scenic town, between the hours of seven AM and eleven PM, you'll notice that there is no jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: {warning}顺便说一下，当你在我们风景优美的小镇闲逛时，在早上7点到晚上11点之间，你会注意到这里没有监狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest

ESP.ORIGINAL: {ominous threat}Cross us, and you'll wish for one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 背叛我们，你就会想要一个的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.ThreatBye to 1
Go ahead. Turn your back on me and see what happens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去吧。背对着我，看看会发生什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back later if you need anything!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么需要的话，就记得来找我啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [001164F9] (ID) NPC : [0016A21D] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 拜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Onwards!
ESP.TRADUIT: 前进！

ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bye.

ESP.ORIGINAL: {casual}If you're going to the ruins, I can make it worth your while.
ESP.TRADUIT: {casual}如果你要去废墟，我可以让你不虚此行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Curious Caroline [0108373D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Neutral

Be sure to tell your friends!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一定要告诉你的朋友！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Curious Caroline [0108373D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back soon! Sensational new stock arriving every three days!
ESP.TRADUIT: 快回来吧！绝妙的新货每三天到货一次！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Curious Caroline [0108373D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enjoy your stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 住宿愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have a nice day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你今天愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: See ya late-o, fried potato.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见，炸土豆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie All-Trades [01083748] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have a good one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你过得愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gooo Gofers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 去吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie All-Trades [01083748] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emaciated Cat [010838DC] (mod) Quest : ([010837EF]BDLenoreQuest) Lenore follower quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <murrrf!>
ESP.TRADUIT: <呜呜！>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emaciated Cat [010838DC] (mod) Quest : ([010837EF]BDLenoreQuest) Lenore follower quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Fingers [01083743] (mod) Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have fun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩得开心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Fingers [01083743] (mod) Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lie down and die you zombie freaks!
ESP.TRADUIT: 躺着去死吧，你们这些僵尸怪胎！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [01065CF5] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eat lead you rotting sacks of shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 吃枪子儿吧，你们这群烂货！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [01065CF5] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got your medicine right here, maggot face!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这儿有你的药，蛆虫脸！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [01065CF5] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll hurt you if I have to!
ESP.TRADUIT: 必要的话我会伤害你的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What we've got here is a failure to communicate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们现在面临的是沟通失败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You asked for it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你自找的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've stepped on radroaches tougher than you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我踩过的蟑螂都比你厉害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Show me what you've got!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看你有什么本事！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 接招！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get outta here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚开！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're gonna burn!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会被烧死的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {mostly deadpan, but almost sinisterly pleasant}Break a leg...please.
ESP.TRADUIT: {mostly deadpan, but almost sinisterly pleasant}祝你好运...请。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {bad attempt to sound swashbuckling} It's curtains for you, ha-HA!
ESP.TRADUIT: {bad attempt to sound swashbuckling}你的表演结束了，哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Run while you still can!
ESP.TRADUIT: 趁你还能跑，赶紧跑吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, no you don't!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，不你不能！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll scrape you off the ground and sell you as hemorrhoid cream!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把你从地上刮下来当痔疮膏卖！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {grit teeth}Enjoying your free sample?
ESP.TRADUIT: {grit teeth}享受你的免费样品吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {practical business move, calling over battle}Scream a little louder. It'll draw a crowd!
ESP.TRADUIT: {practical business move, calling over battle}叫得再大声一点，会吸引很多人的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: This used to be such a nice neighborhood!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里以前是个很好的社区！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [0108374B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 从这里滚出去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [0108374B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Flee
ESP.TRADUIT: 逃跑

ESP.ORIGINAL: Safety first, revenge later!
ESP.TRADUIT: 安全第一，复仇在后！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {urging PC}Let's go! There's a reason I've lived as long as I have!
ESP.TRADUIT: {urging PC}我们走吧！我能活这么久是有原因的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I give up! Just leave us alone!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我放弃了！离我们远点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {tired and pissed}I'm too old for this shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: {tired and pissed}我太老了，玩不了这个了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: And here I thought carrying knives was for the paranoid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还以为只有偏执狂才会带刀呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {flee, panic}Leave me alone!
ESP.TRADUIT: {flee, panic}离我远点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {flee, panic}You win! You win!
ESP.TRADUIT: {flee, panic}你赢了！你赢了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't boot me off! All my friends are here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别赶我走！我所有的朋友都在这里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Steal
ESP.TRADUIT: 偷窃

ESP.ORIGINAL: This ain't a charity, yet!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是一个慈善机构，还不是！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Drop it, thief!
ESP.TRADUIT: 放下它，小偷！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {slightly annoyed}I may hail from a cave, but I'm not blind!
ESP.TRADUIT: {slightly annoyed}我可能来自山洞，但我不是瞎子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't just take that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能就这么拿走！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also have eyes in the back of my head, so give it up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的后脑勺也长了眼睛，所以放弃吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do that again, and we're gonna skin you alive!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你再这样，我们就活剥了你的皮！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Put that back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 把它放回去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowMessage BDBoulderInfamy set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep to (BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep -1)
You can't just take our stuff!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能拿走我们的东西！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowMessage BDBoulderInfamy set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep to (BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep -1)
Don't be a hog. There's no "I" in team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要像猪一样，团队里没有“我”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: AcceptYield
{a bit annoyed}I suppose I should thank you for the training...
ESP.TRADUIT: {a bit annoyed}我想我应该感谢你的培训...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assault
ESP.TRADUIT: 突击

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, now it's on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，现在开始了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell did I do?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我到底做了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looking for a fight?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想找人打架？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {a bit annoyed/surprised, and appalled at improper procedure}Don't you know to stretch before sparring?
ESP.TRADUIT: {a bit annoyed/surprised, and appalled at improper procedure}你不知道拳击前要做伸展运动吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {caught slightly off-guard}Couldn't we just talk this out?
ESP.TRADUIT: {caught slightly off-guard}我们就不能好好谈谈吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {terror} Somebody help me!
ESP.TRADUIT: {terror}谁来救救我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {got hit sound}Aah! {shouts to body guard, rolling up sleeves}Cassy, we've got ourselves a heckler!
ESP.TRADUIT: {got hit sound}啊哈！{shouts to body guard, rolling up sleeves}凯西，有人来捣乱了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: What're you doing?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在干什么？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowMessage BDBoulderInfamy set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep to (BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep -1)
No fair! I can't equip weapons!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不公平！我不能装备武器！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Murder
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀人犯

ESP.ORIGINAL: {shocked, enraged at Mu's murder}You fucking killed her!
ESP.TRADUIT: {shocked, enraged at Mu's murder}你他妈的杀了她！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {panicking, trying to calm himself down}The world is different up here, and I must respect its hideous, illogical customs!
ESP.TRADUIT: {panicking, trying to calm himself down}这里的世界是不同的，我必须尊重这里可怕的、不合逻辑的习俗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {rationalizing successfully}Whatever ancient feud you must've settled with that stranger, I don't need to know about it...{morbid curiosity piqued}no matter how intriguing.
ESP.TRADUIT: {rationalizing successfully}不管你和那个陌生人有什么宿怨，我都不需要知道...{morbid curiosity piqued}无论多么有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You monster!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个怪物！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Murderer!
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀人犯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: PowerAttack
MurderNoCrime
{pity for a stranger, shaking head}All that potential, spilled across the cutting room floor.
ESP.TRADUIT: {pity for a stranger, shaking head}所有的潜力，都洒在了剪辑室的地板上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sad, disgusted}I thought life was supposed to be priceless, not worthless.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sad, disgusted}我认为生命应该是无价的，而不是毫无价值的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: FireExplosive
{nostalgic}Happy Fourth!
ESP.TRADUIT: {nostalgic}独立日快乐！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Duck and cover!
ESP.TRADUIT: 蹲下找掩护！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: StartCombat
ESP.TRADUIT: 战斗开始

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got company, and they're not here to deliver the mail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有同伴，他们不是来送信的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: CombatToNormal
I'm glad that's over.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

I've lost them.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {confused}What, are we fighting wizards now?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

I guess they're gone, hopefully for good.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {smug}That's right, you go live a long and productive life, you coward.
ESP.TRADUIT: {smug}没错，你去好好活一辈子吧，胆小鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {satisfied}And good riddance!

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

Found em!

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, here's your money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，给你钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {happy}Don't worry. This clinic is equipped with only the latest, state-of-the-art biting sticks.
ESP.TRADUIT: {happy}不要担心。本诊所配备了最新的、最先进的咬合棒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then, you should probably get back to treasure hunting, or whatever you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你应该回去寻宝，或者做你该做的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I had a cat with thumbs, I'd train her to play rock ballads on piano, and...oh who am I kidding. No one would see it anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我有一只长拇指的猫，我会训练她用钢琴弹奏摇滚民谣，还有...哦，我在骗谁呢。反正也没人会看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {curiosity over strange fact}When I was a child, there were a few years during which it was illegal to portray Santa Claus wearing red. {extra odd}Pink was okay though.
ESP.TRADUIT: {curiosity over strange fact}当我还是个孩子的时候，有几年的时间里，描绘圣诞老人穿红色衣服是非法的。不过，粉红色是可以的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever noticed that a mother dog is known as a "bitch," while a cat is called a "queen"? {smug}I know where I stand in the matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有注意到狗妈妈被称为“母狗”，而猫被称为“女王”？{smug}我知道我在这件事上的立场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder if beards are as hot and itchy as they look. They must be hell in the desert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道胡子是不是像看上去那样又热又痒，这玩意在沙漠里一定是地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <murrr!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emaciated Cat [010838DC] (mod) Quest : ([010837EF]BDLenoreQuest) Lenore follower quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, cure me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，请治疗我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {shaking head}If you ever find yourself in a garage, don't lick the stuff off the floor, no matter how sweet it tastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shaking head}如果你发现自己在车库里，不要舔掉地上的东西，不管它尝起来有多甜。

Yes, cure me. Here's 50 caps.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then, you should probably get back to treasure hunting, or whatever you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你应该回去寻宝，或者做你该做的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I don't have 50 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我没有50瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {light}Glad to hear it, boss.
ESP.TRADUIT: {light}很高兴听你这么说，老大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Happy

Want to play a hand of Caravan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 来一把商队牌？

ESP.ORIGINAL: All the games I know are very old. You're probably not familiar with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道的所有游戏都很古老，你可能不熟悉它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know any games?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道什么游戏吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure! I've got plenty of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然！我有的是时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

Sam taught me a new game called "Caravan"-- even got me a deck all the way from Las Vegas! I heard it's popular with folks your age. Care to play?
ESP.TRADUIT: 萨姆教了我一个叫“大篷车扑克”的新游戏，甚至从拉斯维加斯给我买了一副牌！我听说在你这个年纪的人中间很流行，想玩吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

Do you know any games?

Nhh. Is-- is this how the story ends?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这...这就是故事的结局吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {dying, confused by visions of ghosts} Daddy?...Lenore?
ESP.TRADUIT: {dying, confused by visions of ghosts}爸爸？...丽诺儿？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {dying}I'm going into that light if you don't do something...
ESP.TRADUIT: {dying}如果你不做点什么，我就要走进那道光里了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: {dying, attempts dark humor}I can't die without reciting my soliloquy!
ESP.TRADUIT: {dying, attempts dark humor}我不能在不背诵我的独白的情况下死去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: {dying}My friend, I--I'm sorry...
ESP.TRADUIT: {dying}我的朋友，我...我很抱歉...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: {dying}Please...bury me beneath a tree.
ESP.TRADUIT: {dying}请...把我埋在树下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我现在真的很需要一针治疗针。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should I be more alarmed that I'm injured, or that I can't feel it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该更担心我受伤了，还是我没感觉了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {alarmed, pain}That is more than just a stitch in my side!
ESP.TRADUIT: {alarmed, pain}这可不仅仅是我身上的一处刺痛！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could use some help!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一些帮助！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wake
ESP.TRADUIT: 醒来

ESP.ORIGINAL: {longing for parties}Ohh, hangovers...how I've missed you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {longing for parties}噢，宿醉...我是多么想念你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {mild shock}You let me fall asleep with a concussion?
ESP.TRADUIT: {mild shock}你让我带着脑震荡睡着了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {dreamily, thinks he blacked out at party}Oh, Gigi{JEE-jee}, you throw the best...{confused}wait, where are the balloons?
ESP.TRADUIT: {dreamily, thinks he blacked out at party}噢，琪琪{JEE-jee}，你扔得最好...{confused}等等，气球在哪里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sore}Ohh...I had the strangest dream that I was dangling from the hands of a clock tower.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sore}哦...我做了一个很奇怪的梦，梦见我在钟楼的钟摆上晃荡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: ArmorIneffective
{not so much sarcasm as throwing ideas out there}Maybe I could mime myself a shield.
ESP.TRADUIT: {not so much sarcasm as throwing ideas out there}也许我可以模仿自己的盾牌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: My glasses are made of sterner stuff than this suit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的眼镜是用比这套衣服更坚固的材料做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: WeaponIneffective
I need a bigger gun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一把更大的枪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This weapon is useless!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这武器没用！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps I'd have better luck lobbing a baseball.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我扔棒球的时候运气会好点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's like fencing with a loaf of bread, and not the stale kind either!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就像用一块面包击剑，而且不是不新鲜的那种！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't working! Do you have a, what do they call it...a{unsure of slang, emphasizes "fucking sword" as if it's a noun phrase} "big fucking sword" I could use?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这行不通！你有没有，他们怎么说的来着...一把{unsure of slang, emphasizes "fucking sword" as if it's a noun phrase} "他妈的大剑" 给我用吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: WeaponBroke
{slightly embarrassed}Uh...I've, uh, made a Picasso of this weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: {slightly embarrassed}呃...我把这把武器画得像毕加索一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: {to self}Lousy dollar store prop.
ESP.TRADUIT: {to self}糟糕的一元店道具。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: NoAmmo
I'm out of ammo!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没子弹了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {tired, but not blaming player}This is the problem with guns. Unlike swords, they run out.
ESP.TRADUIT: {tired, but not blaming player}这就是枪支的问题所在，它们会耗尽，不像剑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {tired, but not blaming player}It looks like I'll have to resort to spitballs.
ESP.TRADUIT: {tired, but not blaming player}看来我只能用纸团了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crippled
ESP.TRADUIT: 残废

ESP.ORIGINAL: {exhausted with pain, shocked/offended at having been "cursed"}Raaaah! Somebody said "Macbeth!"
ESP.TRADUIT: {exhausted with pain, shocked/offended at having been "cursed"}哇啊！有人说:“麦克白！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't fight with my cane if I'm using it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我用手杖，就不能用它战斗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Moans]
ESP.TRADUIT: [呻吟]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010269AB]abCannibalDialogue) 010269AB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Cries]
ESP.TRADUIT: [喊叫]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010269AB]abCannibalDialogue) 010269AB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: KOed
{KOed 1}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {KOed 2}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {KOed 3}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: KnockedBack
{hit}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: {hit}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regenerating
ESP.TRADUIT: 治愈中

ESP.ORIGINAL: {dark}Ahhh, that feels better.
ESP.TRADUIT: {dark}啊，感觉好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {light}Ahhh, that feels better.
ESP.TRADUIT: {light}啊，感觉好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {second wind}As much as I hate needles, that feels pretty good.
ESP.TRADUIT: {second wind}虽然我讨厌打针，但感觉还不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {second wind}Ah, thank you, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: {second wind}啊，谢谢你，我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the show goes on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 演出还在继续。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: OnFire
Stop, drop, and AHHHHRGH!
ESP.TRADUIT: 停下，卧倒，啊啊啊啊啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poison
ESP.TRADUIT: 中毒

ESP.ORIGINAL: {weak, breathy panic}I think I've got rabies or...or poison!
ESP.TRADUIT: {weak, breathy panic}我想我得了狂犬病或者...中毒了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {grows slurred, weak, almost drunk}Hey...! Poison's my...uhh...thing that I...do...
ESP.TRADUIT: {grows slurred, weak, almost drunk}嘿...！毒药是我...呃...我...做的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: FollowersOverburdened
Ehh, I can't carry anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我拿不动了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid the heaviest lifting I do is pencils.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕我搬得最重的是铅笔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;removed script variable that bHired has to equal 1 ;this is to allow fired trading
{sore}I am the camel, and {emph}that was the straw!
ESP.TRADUIT: {sore}我是骆驼，{emph}那是稻草！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: <hiss!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emaciated Cat [010838DC] (mod) Quest : ([010837EF]BDLenoreQuest) Lenore follower quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;removed script variable that bHired has to equal 1 ;this is to allow fired trading
FollowersStealthing
I'll be as quiet as a munchkin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会像梦境人一样安静的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {polite}After you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {polite}你先请。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {whispers}I shall follow your lead.
ESP.TRADUIT: {whispers}我将跟随你的脚步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <murrr>
ESP.TRADUIT: <呼噜>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emaciated Cat [010838DC] (mod) Quest : ([010837EF]BDLenoreQuest) Lenore follower quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, yes, the courier everyone's been talking about. Nice to meet you. I'm Kate, a mercenary. I'd be happy to join you in your travels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊对，就是大家都在谈论的那个邮差。很高兴见到你，我是凯特，一个雇佣兵，我很乐意和你一起旅行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere Comment (NAM2) : Topics 00A to 00Z: Standard Player-NPC introduction. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage abdxKateQuest 10 SetStage abdxKateQuest 20 SetStage abdxKateQuest 21 Set abdxKateRef.bAvailable to 1
Hello, my name is &PCName;. I'm a courier with the Mojave Express. Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，我是 &PCName;。我是莫哈韦快递的邮差，你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {outraged, to Player}And you’re supposed to trust these people?!
ESP.TRADUIT: {outraged, to Player}而你应该相信这些人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sees hometown in ruins, dryly}Ah. This is why I don’t get out...
ESP.TRADUIT: {sees hometown in ruins, dryly}啊，这就是我不出去的原因...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came looking for a friend of mine by the name of Kate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来找一个叫凯特的朋友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have her. She is going to be our concubine, as soon as we get the generator up and running. You must really love her to risk your life like this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们抓到她了，等我们把发电机修好，她就会成为我们的情妇。你一定很爱她，才会冒这样的生命危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: She is leaving with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她要和我一起走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: HAH! Are you trying to scare me? I've killed thousands of fools who looked just like you. And those ones were armed. I’m giving the orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！你是想吓我吗？我杀过成千上万个像你一样的傻瓜，那些人都有武器。我来下命令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get your ass down to the other side of Nova Industries and clear the fucking zombies out, so we can fix the damn generator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我滚到新星工业的另一边把该死的僵尸清出去，这样我们就能修好该死的发电机了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report to Private Knolls right now. If you live through this, I'll think about giving you back your whore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马上向列兵诺尔斯报到。如果你能活下来，我会考虑把你的妓女还给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abSergeantTalkQ.abEngineerOn to 1 setstage abNovaQuest 40
What is it going to take to get her out of here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎样才能把她弄出去？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I admire a man who makes sacrifices for others. You took a big risk coming down here, but your sacrifice has just begun my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我钦佩为他人做出牺牲的人。你冒了很大的风险来到这里，但你的牺牲才刚刚开始，我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a task for you. I need those ghouls cleared out of the other side of this building. We need to get our generator back up and running.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个任务要交给你。我需要把这幢楼另一边的食尸鬼清出去，我们得让发电机恢复运转。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go talk to my engineer for the details. He'll give you the rundown. You show me you're willing to do this, and I give you your girlfriend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 具体情况去问我的工程师吧，他会给你详细介绍的。你表现出你愿意这么做，我就把你女朋友给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abSergeantTalkQ.abEngineerOn to 1 setstage abNovaQuest 40
About that... I put a password on the terminal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于这个...我在终端上设置了密码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did what? I knew I couldn’t trust you! Let me guess, you have a moral issue with what we're doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做了什么？我就知道我不能相信你！让我猜猜，你对我们在这里做的事有道德问题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was just insurance in case you changed your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是以防你改变主意而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that’s twice I have underestimated you, soldier. It’s no wonder you survived out there. Give me the password and I give you the girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我第二次低估你了，士兵，难怪你能在外面活下来。把密码给我，我就把那个女孩给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You get the password when she and I walk out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我和她走出这里你就能拿到密码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see you have little trust in a man’s word. I will forgive you since you don’t know me well. I don’t give out my trust easily either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看你对一个人的话没什么信任，既然你不了解我，我就原谅你。我也不会轻易放弃我的信任。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What you're doing is wrong, so I locked the terminal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这样做是不对的，所以我把终端锁上了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should have known that you would do something like this. What kind of psycho runs head long into radiation and ghouls for a woman he barely knows.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我早该知道你会做出这种事。什么样的神经病会为了一个几乎不认识的女人，一头扎进辐射和食尸鬼堆里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A fucking self-righteous hero, that’s who. You have no idea the sacrifices I have made to save the hapless dipshit civilians of the NCR!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个他妈的自以为是的英雄，是谁。你根本不知道我为拯救NCR那些倒霉的平民做出了多大的牺牲！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have given every part of my being to this cause, and you think you can just walk in here and fucking judge me guilty. Let me ask you something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为这个事业付出了我的全部，而你却以为你可以大摇大摆的进来判我有罪。我来问你一件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you seen an entire town have the skin rot off their flesh because of the Seltsam Syndrome? Have you burned children’s bodies?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见过一整个镇子的人因为泽尔特扎姆综合征而皮肤腐烂吗？你烧过孩子的尸体吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Children who you were sworn to protect. You could stop the bandits, and animals, but this fucking virus killed them right in front of your eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发誓要保护的孩子。你可以阻止强盗和动物，但这该死的病毒就在你眼前杀死了他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever had to euthanize an entire town? I know you can kill feral ghouls and bandits, but have you shot a child and her mother in the head?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有对整个镇子的人实施过安乐死？我知道你可以杀死野性尸鬼和土匪，但你开枪打爆过一个孩子和她母亲的头吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you irradiate yourself and your men into the monsters you have been sent to destroy? I don’t think so. You have no right to judge me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是否将自己和你的手下辐照成了派你去消灭的怪物的样子？我不这么想。你没有权利评判我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.SquadPurpose to 1
You have lost sight of your mission. You are supposed to protect citizens not kill them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你忘记了自己的使命。你应该保护市民，而不是杀害他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am protecting the healthy citizens. Those with the Syndrome are already dead. They just don’t know it yet. A swift death is a gift to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在保护健康的市民，那些患有这种综合症的人已经死了，他们只是还不知道而已。迅速死亡对他们来说是一种礼物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me that password and I let you and the girl walk out of here alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把密码给我，我就放你和那女孩活着出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.SquadPurpose to 1
I’ll give you the password when we are safely on our way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我们安全上路了，我再告诉你密码。
