ESP.ORIGINAL: If that’s what it’s going to take to get my operation up and running again than so be it. I am used to making sacrifices as you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这能让我的行动重新开始运转那就这样吧。你知道的，我习惯了做出牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you do this to yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么把自己弄成这样的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Captain Despot was convinced there was no way into the city due to the radiation. We didn’t have enough men to seal it off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 德斯波特上校确信由于辐射太强，没有办法进入城市。我们没有足够的人手把它封锁起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We had wiped the Syndrome out of the West, and traced it back to here. I knew I had to finish the job or else it would escape again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在西方消灭了这种综合症，并追溯到这里。我知道我必须完成这项工作，否则它会再次逃跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I spent years of my life fighting this thing. I saw many good men die, and killed thousands of people. I had to get in the city some way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我花了这么多年时间和这东西斗争，我看到许多好人死去，成千上万的人丧生。我总得想办法进城。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We all know the ghouls are immune to the radiation, but we didn’t allow ghoul soldiers in the NCR special forces any more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都知道食尸鬼对辐射有免疫力，但我们不再允许食尸鬼士兵加入NCR特种部队了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will spare you the scientific details, but I found a way to make a man into a ghoul. I couldn’t ask it of my men, so I was the first to change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就不跟你说科学细节了，但我找到了把人变成食尸鬼的方法。我不能要求我的手下这么做，所以我是第一个改变的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was excruciating pain for days, but it only hardened my resolve. The Captain was impressed and allowed me to take volunteers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种痛苦持续了好几天，但却坚定了我的决心。上校被打动了，允许我招募志愿者去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately not everyone survives. I killed ten men before I had enough to come into the city and I was out of power.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，并不是每个人都能幸存下来。我杀了十个人才足以进程，但却没电了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I needed to find a power source. That’s how we ended up here. The Dead factory. It had all the power and shelter we needed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要找个电源，所以我们才会来到这里，死亡工厂。那里有我们需要的所有电力和庇护所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.SquadPurpose to 1
Some of your men said they were forced into this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的一些手下说他们是被迫这么做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We started with volunteers, but we ran through them fast enough. We still needed more men so Captain Despot assigned new men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一开始是志愿者，但很快就把他们用完了。我们仍然需要更多的人，所以德斯波特上校指派了新的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The men knew what they were signing up for when they joined the NCR. They knew that any day they could be killed. This is part of their duty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些人加入NCR时就知道他们要面对的是什么，他们知道自己随时都可能被杀死，这是他们职责的一部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is no different than them getting killed in an ambush, only they get a chance to still complete the mission after they die. They are lucky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这与他们在伏击中被杀没有什么区别，只是他们死后还有机会完成任务。他们是幸运的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We lose men every time we fight a battle. The only way we can fight this disease is with ghoul troopers. I have weighed the costs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们每次打仗都有人阵亡。我们对抗这种疾病的唯一方法就是使用食尸鬼部队，我权衡了代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once I became a ghoul I realized I was never making it back home. That’s fine with me. The mission is more important than anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦我变成了食尸鬼，我就意识到我再也回不了家了。对我来说没问题，任务比任何人都重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.SquadPurpose to 1
What are you going to do with the ghouls inside Boulder?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打算怎么处理博尔德的食尸鬼？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They are infected. They have to die. Everyone in this fucking crater has to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们被感染了，他们必须死，这破坑里的人都得死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Lie) Applies
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>合理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Now get out of here. I don’t want to see either of you again. As far as I’m concerned you are both kill on sight if we see you out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，现在给我滚出去，我不想再见到你们俩了。在我看来，如果我们在外面看到你们，你们俩都得当场被杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abSergeantTalkQ.abGotKate to 0 rewardkarma 20 ; 06/07/12 MoBurma - reward player for lying, but make everyone hostile on return. Consequences! set abSergeantTalkQ.abNovaPassLie to 1 evp
Apples
ESP.TRADUIT: 合理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Now get out of here. I don’t want to see either of you again. As far as I’m concerned you are both kill on sight if we see you out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，现在给我滚出去，我不想再见到你们俩了。在我看来，如果我们在外面看到你们，你们俩都得当场被杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abSergeantTalkQ.abGotKate to 0 evp
I'll be on my way then, if it's all the same to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不介意，那我就走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; 05/07/12 MoBurma - Changed to stop Renato giving you more than one key. if Player.getitemcount abKateDFkey == 0 player.additem abKateDFkey 1 setstage abNovaQuest 110 endif
Suicide mission?
ESP.TRADUIT: 自杀任务？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sergeant said I needed to talk to you before I go in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中士说我进去之前需要和你谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes I need you to get some spare parts to fix the generator. You'll find them in a supply closet. While you're down there, try not to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我需要你去弄些备件来修理发电机，你可以在储物柜里找到它们。你下去的时候，尽量别死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Knolls [01004D79] (mod) Quest : ([01004D7B]abEngineerTalkQ) 01004D7B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you have the know how feel free to get the generator back up and running. If you don’t then please don’t fucking touch anything important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有这方面的知识，可以随时让发电机恢复运行。如果你没有，那么请不要他妈的碰任何重要的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Knolls [01004D79] (mod) Quest : ([01004D7B]abEngineerTalkQ) 01004D7B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abSergeantTalkQ.abNovaFixQStarted to 1 player.additem abNovaTermPass 1 setstage abNovaQuest 50
How did you end up here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么到这来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was a sapper in the NCR special forces. I volunteered to help fight the Seltsam Syndrome because I lost a sister to it back in Cali.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾是NCR特种部队的一名工兵，我自愿帮助对抗泽尔特扎姆综合症是因为我有个妹妹在加州死于这个病。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Knolls [01004D79] (mod) Quest : ([01004D7B]abEngineerTalkQ) 01004D7B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It also sounded a lot safer than being behind the front lines with the Legion. They never told me how gruesome this work would be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这听起来也比跟军团在前线安全得多，他们从没告诉过我这工作有多可怕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Knolls [01004D79] (mod) Quest : ([01004D7B]abEngineerTalkQ) 01004D7B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This process may have changed me into a ghoul, but I lost my humanity a long time ago. You just don’t go back to normal after so much killing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个过程也许把我变成了一个食尸鬼，但我很久以前就失去了人性。杀了这么多人，你就不可能恢复正常了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Knolls [01004D79] (mod) Quest : ([01004D7B]abEngineerTalkQ) 01004D7B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I volunteered to become a ghoul because I had already become a monster inside. You could almost say that I am a victim of this Disease too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我自愿成为一个食尸鬼，因为我的内心已经变成了一个怪物。你几乎可以说，我也是这种疾病的受害者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Knolls [01004D79] (mod) Quest : ([01004D7B]abEngineerTalkQ) 01004D7B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you got some tricks up your sleeve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你有什么妙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Knolls [01004D79] (mod) Quest : ([01004D7B]abEngineerTalkQ) 01004D7B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Lie) No, you better go check it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>不，你最好去看看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay I’m going to head down there and see for myself. If you fucked this up I’m going to turn you into a corpse instead of a ghoul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我要亲自过去看看。如果你搞砸了，我就把你变成一具尸体而不是食尸鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Knolls [01004D79] (mod) Quest : ([01004D7B]abEngineerTalkQ) 01004D7B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abSergeantTalkQ.abSendEngineer to 1 set abSergeantTalkQ.abEngineerMove to 0 evp
Lets just say I have a back-up plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说吧，我有个备用计划。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh I see how it is. You think we weren’t going to let you go. You might have been right. Just tell me how to fix it and I will make sure you get out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我明白是怎么回事了，你认为我们不打算让你走。你可能是对的，只要告诉我如何修理它，我就会确保你能出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Knolls [01004D79] (mod) Quest : ([01004D7B]abEngineerTalkQ) 01004D7B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I’m only telling the Sargent when I have Kate, and I'm on my way out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我抓到凯特后才告诉会告诉中士，我正要出去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that's how you wanna play it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想这样玩的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Knolls [01004D79] (mod) Quest : ([01004D7B]abEngineerTalkQ) 01004D7B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abSergeantTalkQ.abEngineerMove to 0 evp
Wait...what's this little body you've been feasting on? It looks like...{horrific realization}
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等...你吃的这个小尸体是什么？看起来像...{horrific realization}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: BDDPanRef.Say LenInspectMeat
Franko won’t be bothering you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗兰科不会再来烦你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {uncertain, suspects PC murdered him, but doesn’t want to think about it}Oh. Well, I’m glad to see they listened to reason then.
ESP.TRADUIT: {uncertain, suspects PC murdered him, but doesn't want to think about it}噢好吧，我很高兴看到他们听进去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage abCricketsQuest 100
I've found your "forgotten tribe." They're sending over a scout to show you some of their crafts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了你的“被遗忘的部落”，他们派了一个侦察员来给你看看他们的手艺。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {pleasantly surprised}Well, I wasn't expecting a wholesaler opportunity! For a crazy rumor, this certainly panned out better than I expected.
ESP.TRADUIT: {pleasantly surprised}好吧，我没想到会有批发商的机会！作为一个疯狂的谣言，这肯定比我预期的要成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDCarolineTrade 100
Yes, I remember. You’re Kate? What the hell happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我记得。你是凯特？到底发生了什么事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ... it’s ... complicated. I ... don’t know how to explain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...这...很复杂，我...不知道该怎么解释。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ... I need to get away from these ... creatures. Are ... is it safe to leave ... now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我需要远离这些...生物。是...离开...安全吗？现在？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, yes, I remember now. Well, it seems I’ve rescued you a second time. You’re free to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，对，我现在想起来了。好吧，看来我又救了你一次，你可以走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please ... can I come with you? If ... if they find me, he ... they will bring me back here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托...我可以和你一起吗？如果...如果他们找到我，他...他们会把我带回来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, come with me. Wait, you’ll need some gear. Can you use weapons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，跟我来吧。等等，你需要一些装备，你会用武器吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ... my stuff is ... here ... in this box. I ... I have a ... small gun ...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我的东西...在这...在这个盒子里，我...我有一把...小枪...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abSergeantTalkQ.abKateGetStuff to 1 abKateRescuedTRIG1REF.enable abKateRescuedTRIG2REF.enable setstage abNovaQuest 120
I don’t have time for this. The way is open, you can stay or go. I’m out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没时间跟你废话，路是敞开的，你可以走也可以留。我要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ... I ... thank you again ...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我...再次感谢你...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abSergeantTalkQ.abKateRejected to 1 set abSergeantTalkQ.abKateExitDoor to 1 setstage abNovaQuest 130 if abSergeantREF.getdead == 0 && abSergeantTalkQ.abNovaTERMlocked ; 09/07/12 MoBurma - Don't move Renato if he is dead abSergeantREF.disable abSergeantREF.moveto abSgtMoveMarker abSergeantREF.enable endif abBlivenREF.evp
Snap out of it soldier. You have a duty to perform! Now man up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 振作起来，士兵，你还有责任要履行！现在爷们点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can’t snap out of it man! They are going to fill me with that poison. They make me watch. I can still hear the others screaming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没法振作起来，老兄！他们要给我注射那种毒药。他们让我看着，我还能听到其他人的尖叫声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry [01007909] (mod) Quest : ([01008252]abSoldierCell1TalkQ) 01008252 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold tight. I will stop them from doing this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坚持住，我会阻止他们这么做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh thank you. Thank you so much. I have seen so many of them die so far. They bring you in, in a coffin! They told me I’m already dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，谢谢你，非常感谢。到目前为止，我已经目睹了很多人的死亡，他们把你放进棺材里！他们告诉我我已经死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry [01007909] (mod) Quest : ([01008252]abSoldierCell1TalkQ) 01008252 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You volunteered to do this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你自愿这么做的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn’t volunteer for shit, I’m a soldier. I was told to do this, and now this is what I’m going to do. If Captain Despot tells me to do it. I do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是自愿的，我是个军人。我被告知要这样做，现在这就是我要做的，如果德斯波特上校让我这么做， 我就去做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis [0100825F] (mod) Quest : ([01008267]abSoldierCell2TalkQ) 01008267 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You aren’t afraid of what might happen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不害怕会发生什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have seen plenty of death in my service with the NCR. I have even come close to seeing my own a few times. Maybe this time is the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在NCR服役期间目睹了很多人的死亡。甚至有几次差点看到自己的死亡，也许现在是时候了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis [0100825F] (mod) Quest : ([01008267]abSoldierCell2TalkQ) 01008267 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I die at least I will die doing my duty. I have seen what this disease does, and I am willing to give my life to try and stop it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我死了，至少我是为了履行我的职责而死。我已经见识了这种疾病的威力，我愿意用我的生命去阻止它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis [0100825F] (mod) Quest : ([01008267]abSoldierCell2TalkQ) 01008267 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: So get your ass down there and fix this machine. The more I am sitting in here the more time I have to dwell on it. I just wanna do it now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以给我滚下去把这台机器修好。我在这里坐得越久，纠结于此时间就越多。我只想现在就开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis [0100825F] (mod) Quest : ([01008267]abSoldierCell2TalkQ) 01008267 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who’s Jenny? I’m here for Kate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 珍妮是谁？我是来找凯特的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh that’s so smooth. Don’t think for a second I don’t see through your tricks. I should kill you right now and be done with your fucking ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，太光滑了。别以为我看不懂你的把戏，我现在就该杀了你，了结你这混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bliven [01008276] (mod) Quest : ([01008717]abBlivenTalkQ) 01008717 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be watching you! If you try and take Jenny anywhere, I will splatter your brains on the walls with my shotgun. Don’t think I won’t.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会看着你的！如果你想带珍妮去任何地方，我就用猎枪把你的脑袋打到墙上。别以为我不会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bliven [01008276] (mod) Quest : ([01008717]abBlivenTalkQ) 01008717 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did they irradiate your brain too?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们也辐照了你的大脑吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very funny. When they told me you were coming, I knew you would have all sorts of tricks, but I never guessed humor would be one of 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常有趣。当他们告诉我你要来的时候，我就知道你会有各种各样的花招，但我确实没想到幽默也是其中之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bliven [01008276] (mod) Quest : ([01008717]abBlivenTalkQ) 01008717 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright I’ll be going now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我现在要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was sure I would never see Jenny again when I became a ghoul, and now here she is. I will make her a ghoul, and we will be together forever!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我变成食尸鬼时，我以为我再也见不到珍妮了，而现在她来了。我要把她也变成食尸鬼，我们就能永远在一起了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bliven [01008276] (mod) Quest : ([01008717]abBlivenTalkQ) 01008717 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can’t take her away from me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能把她从我身边夺走！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bliven [01008276] (mod) Quest : ([01008717]abBlivenTalkQ) 01008717 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who’s going to know if you talk to me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你跟我说话谁会知道？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess you are right about that, but if the Sergeant decides to come up here and I'm talking to you. He will skin the leathered flesh from my bones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你是对的，但如果中士决定上来而我在跟你说话，他会把我的皮肉从骨头上剥下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pvt. Scylla [0100874A] (mod) Quest : ([01008753]abScyllaTalkQ) 01008753 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said you aren’t authorized to talk? Does that mean you're NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你无权说话？这是否意味着你是NCR的人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn. Did I say that? The Sergeant is going to flog me again. I'll be on booth duty for another month! This is why he doesn’t let me talk to anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，我说了吗？中士又要鞭打我了。我又要在岗亭上待一个月了！这就是为什么他不让我和任何人说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pvt. Scylla [0100874A] (mod) Quest : ([01008753]abScyllaTalkQ) 01008753 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That’s no way to speak to a fellow soldier. Back in the Mohave I am held in high regard with the NCR
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可不是跟战友说话的方式，我在莫哈维很受NCR的尊重。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That doesn’t mean piss here. Our Sergeant says we see more action here in a day than what you New Vegas cowboys see in a month.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这并不意味着你能在这里小便。我们中士说过，我们在这里一天看到的行动比你们新维加斯的牛仔一个月看到的还要多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pvt. Scylla [0100874A] (mod) Quest : ([01008753]abScyllaTalkQ) 01008753 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem awfully bored here. Are you sure you wouldn’t enjoy some company?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来很无聊，你确定不喜欢有人陪伴？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well It has been a while since I've had the opportunity to talk to someone other than the Sergeant or other grunts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经有一段时间没有机会和中士或其他士兵以外的人说话了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pvt. Scylla [0100874A] (mod) Quest : ([01008753]abScyllaTalkQ) 01008753 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That suit can’t hide your nice body. How do you stay so fit being in this booth all the time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那套衣服遮不住你的好身材，你在这个小隔间里怎么一直能保持这么好的身材？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh, You’re not so bad looking yourself. I have my own work out routine that I do when I am in the booth and can’t work out with the others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵呵，你自己看起来也不错。我有自己的健身程序，当我在岗亭上不能和其他人一起健身时，我就会做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pvt. Scylla [0100874A] (mod) Quest : ([01008753]abScyllaTalkQ) 01008753 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lets be reasonable now. There must be something I can do to talk to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在让我们讲点道理，我一定能做些什么来跟你谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just told you I can’t talk to you. Now if you had some booze I might be willing to talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚说了我不能跟你说话。如果你有酒的话，我也许愿意跟你谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pvt. Scylla [0100874A] (mod) Quest : ([01008753]abScyllaTalkQ) 01008753 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here’s your “booze” now tell me whats going on in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你要的酒？现在告诉我里面发生了什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You expect me to tell you everything just because you gave me this swill? You get one question, and that’s it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就因为你给了我这瓶酒，你就指望我什么都告诉你吗？你只有一个问题，仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pvt. Scylla [0100874A] (mod) Quest : ([01008753]abScyllaTalkQ) 01008753 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I’m looking for a friend of mine named Kate. I think she is inside this building.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个叫凯特的朋友，我想她就在这栋建筑里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No Kate here. Now go away and leave me alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里没有凯特。现在走开，别烦我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pvt. Scylla [0100874A] (mod) Quest : ([01008753]abScyllaTalkQ) 01008753 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard her on my Radio. She said the NCR picked her up, and is holding her against her will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在无线电里听到了她的声音。她说NCR把她抓走了，并强行扣留了她。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don’t even know what the NCR is. Now for the last time, fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我甚至不知道NCR是什么。我再说最后一次，滚远点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pvt. Scylla [0100874A] (mod) Quest : ([01008753]abScyllaTalkQ) 01008753 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know it wouldn’t be so hard to wire some C4 to the outside of this box.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道在盒子外面装上C4炸药没那么难吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey hey, now wait a minute. I’m not going to die so Bliven can get his rocks off. If anyone is going to die for her it should be him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，嘿，现在等一下。我不会为了让布利文爽一把而去死的，如果有人要为她而死，那应该是他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pvt. Scylla [0100874A] (mod) Quest : ([01008753]abScyllaTalkQ) 01008753 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will let you in, but you are going to have to leave your weapons. The Sergeant will want to speak with you. Just remember we can kill you anytime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让你们进去的，但你们必须放下武器。中士会想和你谈谈，记住我们随时可以杀了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pvt. Scylla [0100874A] (mod) Quest : ([01008753]abScyllaTalkQ) 01008753 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: abBrusselsREF.enable abScyllaREF.damageav perceptioncondition 1000 abScyllaREF.damageav health 1000 playsound WPNRifleSniperFire3D abShutterREF.playgroup forward 1 playsound abCustomPanelSFX ;abDisableScyllaREF.disable setstage abNovaQuest 20 abExhaustDoorREF.unlock
Don’t play dumb with me. I know this is an NCR base. You even mentioned your Sergeant earlier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别跟我装蒜。我知道这是个NCR基地，你之前甚至提到了你的中士。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn it. See why the Sergeant tells me to shut up. Now that you know our secret location I might as well let you in. Let the Sergeant deal with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，知道为什么中士叫我闭嘴了吧。既然你知道了我们的秘密地点，我还是让你进去吧，让中士来对付你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pvt. Scylla [0100874A] (mod) Quest : ([01008753]abScyllaTalkQ) 01008753 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fair warning though. He is just as likely to kill you as he is to give you want you want. You'll have to check your weapons as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我要警告你，他有可能杀了你，也有可能给你你想要的东西。你也必须检查你的武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pvt. Scylla [0100874A] (mod) Quest : ([01008753]abScyllaTalkQ) 01008753 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: abBrusselsREF.enable abScyllaREF.damageav perceptioncondition 1000 abScyllaREF.damageav health 1000 playsound WPNRifleSniperFire3D abShutterREF.playgroup forward 1 playsound abCustomPanelSFX ;abDisableScyllaREF.disable setstage abNovaQuest 20 abExhaustDoorREF.unlock
Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want to talk about then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你想谈什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I'm armed too. Look, see? Way more armed than you guys and your furniture.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，我也有武器。看，看到了吗？比你们这些家伙和你们的家具武装强多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Advanced language skills. Knowledge of how to operate advanced automatic weapons. We are the scientists at the Brain facility. Cryogenically frozen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 高级语言技能，了解如何操作先进的自动武器。我们是神经研究中心的科学家，低温冷冻的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We awake and are forced from our equipment and we had to barricade ourselves here! We don't know if it's 10 years since we've been frozen or a 1000.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们醒了，被迫离开我们的设备，我们不得不把自己封锁在这里！我们不知道从我们被冷冻开始到现在过了10年还是1000年。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What year is this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 今年是哪一年？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: The United States, The U.S. Government gone? Society as we know it broken down?
ESP.TRADUIT: 美国，美国政府完蛋了？我们所知的社会已经崩溃了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: That means no Animal Welfare agency. That means a victory for science.. Just if I can have access to my equipment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这意味着没有动物福利机构了，这意味着科学的胜利！只要我能拿到我的设备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately our test subjects turned against us. Drove us here. Our test subjects are aggressive chimpanzees, augmented with intelligence drugs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，我们的实验对象背叛了我们，把我们逼到了这里。我们的实验对象是具有攻击性的黑猩猩，用智力药物增强了它们的能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you kill them and let us have access to our equipment, perhaps we can make a trade?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你杀了它们，让我们拿到我们的设备，或许我们可以做个交易？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: The United States, The U.S. Government gone? Society as we know it broken down?
ESP.TRADUIT: 美国，美国政府完蛋了？我们所知的社会已经崩溃了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: That means no Animal Welfare agency. That means a victory for science.. Just if I can have access to my equipment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这意味着没有动物福利机构了，这意味着科学的胜利！只要我能拿到我的设备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately our test subjects turned against us. Drove us here. Our test subjects are aggressive chimpanzees, augmented with intelligence drugs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，我们的实验对象背叛了我们，把我们逼到了这里。我们的实验对象是具有攻击性的黑猩猩，用智力药物增强了它们的能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you kill them and let us have access to our equipment, perhaps we can make a trade?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你杀了它们，让我们拿到我们的设备，或许我们可以做个交易？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: The year you die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你死的那年。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The subject has become hostile! Put him down, Philip!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个人变得充满敌意了！把他干掉，菲利普！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player setenemy playerfaction abBrainScienceFaction setenemy abBrainScienceFaction playerfaction
Before I agree to anything, can I get a few questions answered?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我同意之前，能先回答几个问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Curiousity and queries is not good for scientific advancement, you know! But if you must.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，好奇和质疑对科学进步是不利的！但如果你必须的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What experiments?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么实验？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aided by my husband, with a little help from our colleague we map the human brain by doing necessary experiments on our closest cousins: Chimpanzees.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我丈夫的帮助下，再加上同事的一点帮助，我们对人类的近亲黑猩猩进行了必要的实验，从而绘制出了人类大脑的图谱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surgical, ingested, inserted. Anything to help further our progress.
ESP.TRADUIT: 手术、摄取、插入。只要能帮助我们进步就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't know what turned the specimens aggressive. They are dangerous animals, that's why sometimes a bullet is a regrettable, but needed solution.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不知道是什么让这些样本变得好斗。它们是危险的动物，这就是为什么有时子弹是一种令人遗憾的，但必须的解决方案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what? They suddenly went rabid? That doesn't seem right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以呢？他们突然变得狂暴了？这似乎不对。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They are animals! Look we are offering our million-dollar skills and base for the death of some mindless beasts. I won't answer you till you are done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们是动物！听着，我们用我们价值百万的技术和基地来换取一些无意识的野兽的死亡。在你完成之前，我不会回答你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abChimpVariablesQ.abBreeTalk to 1 player.additem abBrainCenterKey 1
Sure, I don't mind killing a few monkeys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我不介意杀几只猴子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very good. Hurry along now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好，现在赶快去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bree [0100A12F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A132]abBreeTalkQ) 0100A132 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abChimpVariablesQ.abBreeTalk to 1 player.additem abBrainCenterKey 1
I don't know, that's kind of interesting. So, can I ask you something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，这挺有趣的。我能问你个问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You.. You.. Think so? I've never had anyone interested in my ideas before. Except my wife, but that's a given, I don't know where I'd be without her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...你这么认为吗？以前从来没有人对我的想法感兴趣，除了我的妻子，但那是理所当然的，我不知道没有她我会怎样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was top of my class at Boulder University, and then I met her.. and my life went to shit... And without her... Well, I don't know how I'd bare it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在博尔德大学是全班第一名，然后我遇到了她...我的生活一团糟。没有她...好吧，我不知道我该怎么忍受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um... Are you sure your wife and shitty life aren't somehow connected?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...你确定你妻子和你糟糕的生活没有任何联系吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey lookey here, mister, well I'd better give you a sm-smack on the jaw for t-talking like that... Please don't eat me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，听着，先生，我最好给你下巴来一巴掌，因为你这样说话...请不要吃我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, sure... So, can I ask you some things?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，当然...我能问你几个问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... If you want to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...如果你想的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about your experiments?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能给我讲讲你的实验吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My experiments. Hey! We are a husband and wife team. Initially, we didn't need any specimens, just a few willing human test subjects..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的实验。嘿！我们是夫妻团队。最初，我们不需要任何样本，只需要几个自愿的人类试验对象...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..subjected to the mildest psychological tests, and the rest would be up to us.. but time was of the essence.. according to my wife..
ESP.TRADUIT: ...接受最温和的心理测试，剩下的就由我们自己决定了，但时间是最重要的...据我妻子说...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..so we had to start experimenting in Chimpanzees in very necessary ways to advance our science.. I guess you can't say no, when a war is on. Right?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我们必须开始在黑猩猩身上做实验，用非常必要的方法来推进我们的科学。我猜当战争爆发时，你不能说不，对吧？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about the chimps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我讲讲黑猩猩吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We took in our chimpanzees. The first batch didn't survive our initial tests. And we collected very little data. I wondered what I was going to do..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们收留了黑猩猩，第一批没能通过我们最初的测试。我们收集的数据很少，我在想我该怎么办，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: but I got a good scolding from the wife for being an over-worrying husband! and Hey! next morning, brand new batch of chimpanzees.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我被妻子狠狠地骂了一顿，因为我是一个过度担心的丈夫！嘿！第二天早上，一批全新的黑猩猩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Little more bitey than the last batch. But hey! Can't have everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比上一批多了一些咬咬。但是，嘿，不可能拥有一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bitey?
ESP.TRADUIT: 咬咬？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bitey. Scratchy. Punchy. One of them even molested Lester. Poor guy. Yeah, that's the current batch in the lab. My wife is right. Clearly unusable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 咬咬，沙沙，拳拳。其中一个甚至猥亵了莱斯特，可怜的家伙。对，这是实验室里现有的一批，我妻子是对的，显然不能用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Were the chimps violent straight away, or did you turn them that way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 黑猩猩是一开始就有暴力倾向，还是你把它们变成这样的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, they bit me straight away. Had to get a shot. I usually hate shots, but no insurance means no chances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，它们直接咬了我。必须要打一针，我通常不喜欢打针，但没有保险就没有机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I asked that question myself. But my wife just told me to shut up and start work. She's got a get up and go about her that made me marry her..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我自己也问过这个问题，但我妻子只是让我闭嘴，开始工作。她一起床就神气活络的样子让我娶了她...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..even though she proposed.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...尽管是她求婚的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the deal with your wife? Seems like she's hiding something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你妻子怎么了？她好像在隐瞒什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only her undying love for me..
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有她对我永恒的爱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay then. Don't let me keep you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。别让我耽搁你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Philip [0100A14F] (mod) Quest : ([0100A152]abPhilipTalkQ) 0100A152 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There hasn't been a baseball league since before I was born.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我出生之前就没有棒球联赛了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you happen to know who won the match between the Boulder Pebbles and the Flagstaff Romans? I got kinda iced before it was finished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道博尔德鹅卵石队和旗杆市罗马人队的比赛谁赢了吗？还没打完我就被冻住了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was several hundred years ago. So...no. Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是几百年前的事了。所以，没有，对不起。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then what are you good for?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你还能干什么？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cleaning up chimp problems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 解决黑猩猩的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I used to do that a lot. Not a lot of work for a fucking chump psychologist like me. But these floors were so clean...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我以前经常这么做。像我这样的白痴心理学家可没多少活干，但这些地板太干净了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...You can lick cream out of the creases in the floor. And I did.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...你可以从地板的折痕上舔出奶油来，我做到了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shooting you in the head!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一枪爆了你的头！

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player setenemy playerfaction abbrainsciencefaction setenemy abbrainsciencefaction playerfaction
Can you answer some questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能回答几个问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to ask some questions or what, asshole? I don't...got...Well, I do got all day...but...you smell, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还想问我问题，混蛋？我没...好吧，我有一整天的时间，但是...你身上有味道，知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about your experiments.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说你的实验。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I smoked marijuana in college but didn't inhale, and to be fair, Peter had softer lips than any girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在大学里抽过大麻，但没吸进去，说实话，彼得的嘴唇比其他任何女孩都软。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outstanding. Filing that away for future reference.. Now. Monkey experiments?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了，归档以备将来参考。现在，猴子实验？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, work! I'm a clinic psychologist and chimpanzees were considered to be the closest to the human mind in our goal of unlocking the human potential.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，工作！我是一名临床心理学家，黑猩猩被认为最接近人类的大脑，我们的目标是释放人类的潜能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So Uncle Sam can have a little bit of a headstart on old grandpa-don't-touch-me-there Cheng.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样山姆大叔就能在"别碰我"的问题上领先程爷爷一步了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you have any success?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有取得什么成功？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yeah! I'm sitting in the lab, drinking champ with the 'happy' couple. How many I.Q points were destroyed with my pension fund in this nuclear war?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢对！我坐在实验室里，和那对"幸福"夫妇一起喝冠军酒。在这场核战争中，有多少IQ和我的养老金一起被摧毁了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. No success. Little chixa, Bree, she tries her hardest. New things. Doesn't help with old-shakey legs Phil. But whatever, she tried.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，没有成功。小奇克莎，布莉，她尽力了。新事物，对老弱病残的菲尔没有帮助。但不管怎样，她努力了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And now the chimps are trying to murder you. Great job "unlocking the human potential" there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在黑猩猩们想要杀了你，伟大的工作“释放了人类的潜力”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, and from the looks of you, I can see humanity did a great job without me. Get out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，从你的表情，我能看出没有我人类也做得很好。滚出去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did the chimps go nuts? What did you guys do to them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么黑猩猩会发疯？你们对它们做了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. We walk into the office and the chimps are going crazy. I needed to get the tranqualizer dart and shoot them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我们走进办公室，黑猩猩们都疯了，我只得拿麻醉枪射它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: God, it felt good knocking those animals out, afterwards. Bree ran into my arms...
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，事后把那些动物打晕的感觉真好。布莉扑到我的怀里...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...I held her so softly, and she cried and I said, "Stop crying on my pants will ya, they're new."
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我温柔地抱着她，她哭了，我说：“别在我的裤子上哭好吗，这是新的。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, could anyone have done anything to make them crazy? I'm thinking of the woman, in particular.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，有谁做过什么让它们抓狂的事吗？我特别想到了那个女人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bree? No. We get our chimps from a special breeding facility up in Denver. The chimps were specially bred to be docile going back generations...
ESP.TRADUIT: 布莉吗？不。我们的黑猩猩是从丹佛的一个特殊育种机构那里得到的，几代以来，黑猩猩被特殊培育得很温顺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perfect candidates for the cocktail of drugs, instruments and audio-visual light shows, directed by yours truly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是由你指导的药物、乐器和视听灯光表演的完美候选。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me anything else? Something useful?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还能告诉我什么吗？有用的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a psychologist, Son.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是个心理学家，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [0100A477] (mod) Quest : ([0100A47B]abCliveTalkQ) 0100A47B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: if BDDPanQuest.CliveBaseball == 1 BDDPanRef.SayTo CliveRef DPanBoulderBarkClive set BDDPanQuest.CliveBaseball to 0 endif
Do you need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh right! Well listen, our captain saw you and he wants to have a word with you right away. I would come with me if I were you. He gets mad easily.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的！听着，我们上校看到你了，他想马上和你谈谈。如果我是你，就会跟着我一起去，他很容易生气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : US Remnant Trooper [0100AF37] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF3C]abPrisonG3TalkQ) 0100AF3C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not a Ghoul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是尸鬼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell is a Ghoul? Never mind, would you come with me please? My captain wants to talk with you and he doesn't like to be kept waiting, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 食尸鬼是什么鬼？没关系，请跟我来好吗？我的上校想和你谈谈，他不喜欢让人等，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : US Remnant Trooper [0100AF37] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF3C]abPrisonG3TalkQ) 0100AF3C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell him he can wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉他可以等。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell him he can wait? Are you out of your mind? Did you miss this fatman on my shoulder. I will kill us both right now, I don't give a fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉他可以等？你疯了吗？你没看到我肩膀上的那个胖子吗。我现在就把我们俩都杀了，我他妈才不管呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : US Remnant Trooper [0100AF37] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF3C]abPrisonG3TalkQ) 0100AF3C (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure! Lead the way!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然！带路！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that's a relief! I was worried you might argue with me or something like that! Come on, just follow me and we'll be there in no time, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就好办了！我还担心你会和我争吵之类的呢！来吧，跟着我，我们马上就到，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : US Remnant Trooper [0100AF37] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF3C]abPrisonG3TalkQ) 0100AF3C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPrisonG3MET to 1 setstage abWarsFunnyThing 10
Okay, I get it, lead the way then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我懂了，你带路吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I thought. Now follow me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是这么想的。现在跟我来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : US Remnant Trooper [0100AF37] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF3C]abPrisonG3TalkQ) 0100AF3C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPrisonG3MET to 1 setstage abWarsFunnyThing 10
I think you're bluffing. Just go ahead and pull the trigger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你在虚张声势。开枪吧，扣下扳机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yeah? You think I'm kidding? You're wrong!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是吗？你以为我在开玩笑？你错了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : US Remnant Trooper [0100AF37] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF3C]abPrisonG3TalkQ) 0100AF3C (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPrisonG3MET to 2 startcombat player setenemy abUSremnantFaction playerfaction
Is there going to be a point to this eventually?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这最终会有什么意义？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 3 abPierceREF.startconversation player, GREETING
Wow...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦...

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 3 abPierceREF.startconversation player, GREETING
Umm...hello?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...你好？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 3 abPierceREF.startconversation player, GREETING
I wish I had popcorn for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真希望我有爆米花吃。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 3 abPierceREF.startconversation player, GREETING
Congratulations!
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why thank you, Outsider! At least SOMEONE here understands the sacrifices I've been making around here for the American people's homes and families!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，外来者！至少这里还有人理解我为美国人民的家园和家庭所做的牺牲！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I doubt it was heroic..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很怀疑这是否英勇...

ESP.ORIGINAL: I kicked two live grenades into his bodyguards' mouths and beat him with my own dented helmet until he submitted to me! I was VERY heroic, Outsider!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把两颗手榴弹踢进了他的保镖的嘴里，并用我自己那顶凹陷的头盔打他，直到他屈服于我！我很英勇，外来者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And..?
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I need your help to figure out what to do with the Red bastard! He refuses to speak to me and my men have no spines so I can't just kill him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你帮我想想怎么处理那个赤匪杂毛！他拒绝和我说话，我的人又没骨气，所以我不能杀了他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just don't hurt him, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别伤害他，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll just pretend that you didn't say that for now! I don't need to deal with anymore spineless men! This is AMERICA. We kill our enemies first!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就当你现在没说过吧！我再也不需要和没骨气的男人打交道了！这里是美国，我们要先杀死敌人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you just kill him and be done with it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不直接杀了他，了结这一切？

ESP.ORIGINAL: For some silly reason they think his death will incite his soldiers to try a final assault on our camp! I say bring it on, you slitty-eyed Commies!
ESP.TRADUIT: 出于某种愚蠢的原因，他们认为他的死会煽动他的士兵对我们的营地进行最后的攻击！要我说就放马过来吧，你们这些眯眯眼的共产党！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He deserve to die, the Commie scum!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他该死，共产主义败类！

ESP.ORIGINAL: EXACTLY. Well try telling that to some of these yellow bastards under my command! Pierce here says it'll cause a final Chinese assault on our camp!
ESP.TRADUIT: 完全正确。好吧，试着把这话告诉我手下的那些黄皮杂种！皮尔斯说这会引起中国人对我们营地的最后一次攻击！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where do I fit in then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我该怎么做呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what I need from you is really simple when you think about it, Outsider. I can't order his execution.. but YOU can and then they can't defy me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我需要你做的事情仔细想想其实很简单，外来者。我不能下令处决他...但你可以，这样他们就不能违抗我了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're an Outsider! If you make a show of investigating and then give the order to kill him; they can't blame me for it and argue! It's perfect!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是一个外来者！如果你假装在调查，然后下令杀了他，他们就不能因此责怪我然后吵架了！太完美了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think of it as being conscripted with a very important military position to help rid your country of Communist scum from the face of the Earth, eh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以把这件事想象成被征召担任一个非常重要的军事职位来帮助你的国家从地球上清除共产主义人渣，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got yourself a deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做了明智的选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent! You can talk to him if you want but he only speaks his weird language to me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了！如果你想的话，你可以和他说话，但他只对我说他那奇怪的语言！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 5 set abGraveyardVariables.abEliStage to 5 set abGraveyardVariables.abEliLocation to 1 enableplayercontrols setstage abWarsFunnyThing 20
I want to be fair about this and do actual research.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要公平一点，做些实际的研究。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A waste of time if you ask me. He only speaks his crazy-ass Commie language though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要我说，就是浪费时间。他只会说他妈的疯狂的共产主义语言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 5 set abGraveyardVariables.abEliStage to 5 set abGraveyardVariables.abEliLocation to 1 enableplayercontrols setstage abWarsFunnyThing 20
Can I think about this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能考虑一下吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well don't take too long thinking about it! America is a country of action and needs its people to be the same damned way! Thinkers are useless here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要花太多时间考虑！美国是一个行动的国家，需要它的人民也以同样该死的方式行动！思想家在这里是无用的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 5 set abGraveyardVariables.abEliStage to 5 set abGraveyardVariables.abEliLocation to 1 enableplayercontrols setstage abWarsFunnyThing 20
Your kind are called "Ghouls" now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们现在叫"食尸鬼"了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Ghouls"? Well.. I suppose it's better than "Zombie" or "Undead", right? Well now there's a name for what we are now at least, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: “食尸鬼”吗？我想这比"僵尸"或"亡灵"要好，对吧？至少我们现在有了一个名字，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, your kind are considered freaks out in the real world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，你们这种人在现实世界里被认为是怪胎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Freaks?! Well that's not exactly the kind of opinion I was hoping for when it came to what we were out there! Oh dear.. this might be a problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怪胎？！好吧，当我们在外面的时候，这可不是我想要的观点！噢，天哪，这可能是个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meh, you look human enough for most people not to care what you call yourselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你看起来很有人情味，大多数人并不关心你叫什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why thank you. I appreciate the kind words but.. there's no way we can be called humans out there with how we look now. We'll learn eventually I hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。我很感谢你的好意，但我们现在的样子已经不能被称为人类了。我希望我们最终会了解的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you want to talk about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想谈什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to talk to you about what Eli wants you to do! He's not in his right state of mind anymore and to be honest..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得跟你谈谈伊莱想让你做什么！说实话，他的精神状态已经不正常了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't want me to do what he wants?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不想让我照他说的做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that's the short answer, yes. I still want you to investigate if you wish but.. if you choose NOT to kill him that would be for the best for us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 简单地说，是的。如果你愿意，我还是希望你去调查，但如果你选择不杀他那对我们来说是最好的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He seems like an idiot to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我看来，他像个白痴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to sound too harsh; he's just confused. I need you to make sure you do NOT sentence that poor man to death to help us leave this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想说得太难听，他只是糊涂了。我需要你确保自己不会为了帮我们离开这里而判那个可怜的人死刑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you some kind of traitor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是某种叛徒？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course I'm not a traitor! But killing that man would be wrong and you must NOT sentence him to die like he wants you to! It would be wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然不是叛徒！但是杀死那个人是错误的，你不能像他希望你的那样判处他死刑！那就错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm listening..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在听...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eli never even captured the poor man! He walked up to him and Eli just beat him nearly to death with his rifle! I had to stop him from killing him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 伊莱根本没抓住那个可怜的人！他走到他面前，伊莱用步枪差点把他打死！我必须阻止他杀了他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No one wants to be here anymore. Neither side has been actually fighting if you could tell! We've just been shooting slightly away from the others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人想再待在这里了。如果你能看出来的话，双方都没有真正的战斗过！我们只是在稍微远离其他人的地方射击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eli doesn't understand that neither side wants to be involved in this war anymore. He thinks that the world is still the same out there but it's not!
ESP.TRADUIT: 伊莱不明白双方都不想再卷入这场战争了。他以为外面的世界还是老样子，但其实并非如此！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We just want to leave this place and explore this new world we live in, but we can't because Eli won't let us leave this stupid place! He's stubborn!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们只想离开这个地方去探索我们生活的新世界，但我们做不到，因为伊莱不让我们离开这个愚蠢的地方！他太固执了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But there's one other issue and we need your help! We want to leave but we need to make sure the Chinese won't attack us while our backs are turned!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但还有一个问题，我们需要你的帮助！我们想离开，但我们需要确保中国人不会在我们转身的时候攻击我们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why we need their leader alive. If we kill him then the Chinese probably won't let us leave this place! Our peace agreement will be ruined!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我们需要他们的首领活着。如果我们杀了他，中国人可能不会让我们离开这里！我们的和平协议就毁了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just need you to talk to him and talk to the soldiers too if you like! Understand their side and please try and convince Eli to leave this place!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只需要你和他谈谈，如果你愿意，也可以和士兵们谈谈！理解他们的想法，说服伊莱离开这里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you'll excuse me; I need to go before Eli starts screaming for me. Please, consider my option instead! We don't need any more bloodshed here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不介意的话，趁伊莱还没喊我我得走了。请考虑一下我的选项！我们不需要再流血了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 6 set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceLocation to 1
So what does this have to do with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这和我有什么关系？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mister "We-Need-To-Talk" over here thinks that I may have made a mistake in capturing this OBVIOUS Chinese spy! She won't talk to anyone though!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这位 "我们需要谈谈 "先生认为，我可能在抓捕这个明显的中国间谍方面犯了一个错误。但她不愿意和任何人说话！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 10 abPierceREF.startconversation player, GREETING
It's that easy to get out of here as a prisoner?
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一个囚犯，有那么容易离开这里吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't the first time he's randomly accused someone of being a spy. He accuses a new soldier every day of being a Communist.. sometimes twice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是他第一次随意指控别人是间谍了。他每天都指责一名新兵是共产党，有时两名。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pierce [0100AAE8] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF53]abPierceVoiceQ) 0100AF53 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 12 set abGraveyardVariables.abEliStage to 10 abKateCOLL.disable enableplayercontrols set abGraveyardVariables.abKateGraveyardStand to 1 abdxKate2REF.evp player.additem abdxKate2key 1
(Persuade) I promise Eli won't find out that you let me talk to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我保证伊莱不会发现你让我跟他说话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well.. as long as you promise that he won't find out about it then I suppose it's all right with me. Just make it quick so we don't get caught, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，只要你保证他不会发现这事那我想我没问题。动作快点，别被抓到，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prison Guard [0100AAED] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF0]abPrisonG1TalkQ) 0100BBF0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abBaojiaStage to 1 set abGraveyardVariables.abPrisonG1Stage to 2 set abGraveyardVariables.abPrisonG2Stage to 2 abBaojiaREF.startconversation player, GREETING
(Intimidate) Do I need to tell Eli that you're hindering my investigation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要我告诉伊莱你在妨碍我的调查吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well there's no need to be so rude about it, Outsider! I swear manners has gone the way of the dinosaurs with some people! Absolutely ridiculous!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，没必要这么粗鲁，外来者！我发誓有些人的礼貌已经像恐龙一样绝迹了！太荒谬了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prison Guard [0100AAED] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF0]abPrisonG1TalkQ) 0100BBF0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abBaojiaStage to 1 set abGraveyardVariables.abPrisonG1Stage to 2 set abGraveyardVariables.abPrisonG2Stage to 2 abBaojiaREF.startconversation player, GREETING
Cut to the chase; what are you people planning?
ESP.TRADUIT: 开门见山，你们这些人在计划什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You remind me of my cousin Jingwei. He is...or perhaps I should say was an impatient and angry man too. We never did get along with each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让我想起了我的表哥经纬。他是，或者我应该说曾经是，一个不耐烦和易怒的人，我们一直合不来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Baojia Jingwei [0100AB00] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF6]abBaojiaTalkQ) 0100BBF6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm starting to think coming here was a bad idea..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我开始觉得来这里不是个好主意了...

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry that you have been dragged into our conflict, Outsider. My attempts at a peace talk were interrupted by a rifle butt to the face, sadly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉你被卷入了我们的冲突，外来者。不幸的是，我试图和平谈判却被一枪托顶在脸上打断了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Baojia Jingwei [0100AB00] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF6]abBaojiaTalkQ) 0100BBF6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think he's an idiot that needs to be stopped. You can help me figure it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得他是个需要被阻止的白痴，你可以帮我算计算计。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it will help my people leave this place peacefully with the Americans then I will do my best to help you in any way that I can, Outsider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这能帮助我的人民与美国人和平离开这里那么我会尽我所能帮助你，外来者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Baojia Jingwei [0100AB00] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF6]abBaojiaTalkQ) 0100BBF6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You tried to have a peace talk with Eli? Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你试图和伊莱进行和平谈判？为什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought that the man could be reasoned with. Neither side has been actually shooting at each other for some time now and I think we should leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为那个人是可以讲道理的。双方已经有一段时间没有互相开火了，我想我们该走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Baojia Jingwei [0100AB00] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF6]abBaojiaTalkQ) 0100BBF6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eli thought it would be a good idea to hit me with the butt of his rifle and try to kill me right then & there. My mistake for thinking he was wise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伊莱觉得用他的枪托打我，然后当场杀了我是个好主意。我错在以为他很明智。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Baojia Jingwei [0100AB00] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF6]abBaojiaTalkQ) 0100BBF6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cut the crap and stop lying, Commie!
ESP.TRADUIT: 少废话，别再撒谎了，共产党！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think this conversation has come to a sadly bad end, Outsider. I no longer wish to speak with you and shall wait here in silence for your choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得这次谈话的结局很糟糕，外来者。我不想再和你说话了，我将在这里静静地等待你的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Baojia Jingwei [0100AB00] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF6]abBaojiaTalkQ) 0100BBF6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abBaojiaStage to 2 enableplayercontrols setstage abWarsFunnyThing 30 abUSHenryREF.enable
So you and Pierce want the same thing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你和皮尔斯想要的是一样的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pierce is a very wise man it seems. He knows that the world outside is different. We need to come together and leave this place.. not stay here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来皮尔斯是个很聪明的人，他知道外面的世界不一样了。我们需要一起离开这个地方，而不是呆在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Baojia Jingwei [0100AB00] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF6]abBaojiaTalkQ) 0100BBF6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do the rest of your men want to leave here peacefully too?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你其余的人也想和平地离开这里吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course they do. There is nothing for us to fight about anymore. You may go and ask them yourself if you wish. They will not attack you, Outsider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了，我们已经没什么争吵了。如果你愿意，你可以自己去问他们，他们不会攻击你的，外来者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Baojia Jingwei [0100AB00] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF6]abBaojiaTalkQ) 0100BBF6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage abWarsFunnyThing 35
What will happen if Eli kills you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果伊莱杀了你会怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suspect that they will be.. upset about what happens to me. They will most likely start to actually shoot at the Americans if pushed to it really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怀疑他们会...0对发生在我身上的事感到不安。如果真的被逼急了，他们很可能会开始向美国人开枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Baojia Jingwei [0100AB00] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF6]abBaojiaTalkQ) 0100BBF6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to need time to decide what to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要时间来决定该怎么做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you decide is what you decide, Outsider. For better or worse Eli has given you the power to decide the fate of two armies. Choose wisely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想怎么决定就怎么决定吧，外来者，不管是好是坏，伊莱给了你决定两支军队命运的权力。做出明智的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Baojia Jingwei [0100AB00] (mod) Quest : ([0100BBF6]abBaojiaTalkQ) 0100BBF6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abBaojiaStage to 2 enableplayercontrols setstage abWarsFunnyThing 30 abUSHenryREF.enable
I think your way is the only way to deal with this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你的方法是唯一的解决办法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well THAT'S the answer I was looking for! It's about time someone listened to me for once! Pierce! Go get the prisoner! We'll have him shot out front!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我想要的答案！该有人听我一次了！皮尔斯！去抓犯人！我们会在门口毙了他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 13 abPierceREF.startconversation player, GREETING
Everyone just wants to leave this place, Eli. Why won't you just let this war end and let it go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都想离开这里，伊莱。你为什么不让这场战争结束，让它过去呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What?! I thought we had a deal you smooth-skinned backstabbing bastard! You were supposed to help me kill him! Have you gone soft on me too, Outsider?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？！我们不是说好了的吗？你这个厚脸皮背后捅刀子的杂种！你本该帮我杀了他的！你也在我这心软吗，外来者？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm surrounded by cowards and weaklings! America is a strong country and I refuse to let it die just because of some spineless fools!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我周围全是软骨头和懦夫！美国是一个强大的国家，我不会让它因为一些懦弱的傻瓜而灭亡！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who is that guy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那家伙是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : US Remnant Soldier [0100CB31] (mod) Quest : ([0100CB39]abUSRemnantVoiceQ) 0100CB39 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why does he look so.. smooth like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么他看起来这么...这么光滑？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : US Remnant Soldier [0100CB34] (mod) Quest : ([0100CB39]abUSRemnantVoiceQ) 0100CB39 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is he from the outside? Wait.. does that mean that it's safe out there?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是从外面来的吗？等等，这是不是意味着外面是安全的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : US Remnant Soldier [0100CB35] (mod) Quest : ([0100CB39]abUSRemnantVoiceQ) 0100CB39 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh wow.. it was true!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，哇，是真的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : US Remnant Soldier [0100CB36] (mod) Quest : ([0100CB39]abUSRemnantVoiceQ) 0100CB39 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it safe on the outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 外面安全吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : US Remnant Soldier [0100CB37] (mod) Quest : ([0100CB39]abUSRemnantVoiceQ) 0100CB39 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: His skin is so smooth what the hell..
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的皮肤这么光滑，什么鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : US Remnant Soldier [0100CB38] (mod) Quest : ([0100CB39]abUSRemnantVoiceQ) 0100CB39 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understood. I think you'll make a great Elder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白了，我觉得你会成为一位伟大的长老。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, that's good of you to say. Take good care of yourself, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，你能这么说真是太好了。好好照顾自己，我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't fool me. You're all the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你骗不了我，你们都是一样的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After everything that's happened, I understand your animosity towards us, so I won't take that personally. Take care of yourself out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 发生了这么多事，我理解你对我们的敌意，所以我不会把你的话放在心上。在外面照顾好自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What would you like to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想知道些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you a personal question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问你一个私人问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do a little of this and a little of that. I'm handy with locks and computers and I've done a little acting as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会的技能东一点西一点，我对锁和电脑很在行，我也做过一些表演。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can I best use your skills?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最得心应手的技能都有什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can smuggle both holdout and improved holdout weapons on my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以自己偷运可藏匿武器和改装可藏匿武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want me to smuggle your improved holdout weapons for you, give them to me before we are searched.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想让我帮你偷运改装过的可藏匿武器，在我们被搜查之前给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are you at handling holdout weapons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能处理可藏匿武器？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can only smuggle holdout weapons, not improved holdout weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只能偷运可藏匿武器，不能偷运改装过的可藏匿武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, if you are sneaky enough, your skill will enable me to smuggle improved holdout weapons as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，如果你足够狡猾，你的潜行技能也可以让我偷运改装过的可藏匿武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are you at handling holdout weapons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能处理可藏匿武器？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll always draw my weapon whenever you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，你一开枪我就开枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set abdxKateRef.bTacticsAlert to 1
Always draw your weapon whenever I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要我一动手，就一定要拔出你的武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll only draw my weapon when I sense danger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我只有感觉到危险时才会拔出武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set abdxKateRef.bTacticsAlert to 0
Only draw your weapon when you sense danger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有在感觉到危险的时候才拔出武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, when waiting I'll take it easy and relax a bit in the general area you leave me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，等待的时候我会在你离开我的地方放松一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set abdxKateRef.bTacticsWaitSandbox to 1 abdxKateRef.EVP
When waiting, relax a bit in the general area I leave you but don't go too far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等待的时候，在我留给你的大致区域放松一下，但不要走得太远。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, when waiting I'll stand guard at the spot you leave me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，等待的时候我会在你离开的地方站岗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set abdxKateRef.bTacticsWaitSandbox to 0 abdxKateRef.EVP
When waiting, guard the spot I leave you at and don't wander.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等待的时候，守住我留给你的地方，不要乱走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The America you remember is long gone, Eli. Why don't you let them start over?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你记忆中的美国早已不复存在，伊莱。你为什么不让他们重新开始？

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..I could be the one who helps everyone start over? You mean.. I would be the hero in this story? Yes, yes I can see it! I.. I would be the one!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以帮大家重新开始吗？你是说...我会成为这个故事中的英雄？是的，是的，我看到了！我...我就是那个人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haha! I am such a genius! I knew it all along! I'm the hero that's going to get everyone out of here so we can explore this new America! Brilliant!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈！我真是个天才！我一直都知道！我是英雄，我会让所有人离开这里，这样我们就可以去探索这个新的美国！太棒了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: This was my idea all along you know. You played your part but in the end it is MY decision that everyone will remember, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一直都是我的主意。你扮演了你的角色，但最终是我的决定，每个人都会记住，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haha! Pierce! Tell that slitty bastard that he's free to go! We need to get ready to leave this place with those Commies! I'm a hero, you know!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈！皮尔斯！告诉那个杂种，他可以走了！我们要准备好和那些共产党一起离开这个地方！我是个英雄，你知道的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abPierceStage to 20 abPierceREF.startconversation player, GREETING
You're the only one holding everyone back, Eli. Stand down or be forced to!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是唯一一个阻碍大家的人，伊莱。要么下台，要么被迫下台！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forced to stand down?! Was that some kind of threat towards me?! Do you think you're man enough to take me on you smooth skinned bastard?! Try it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 被迫下台？！你是在威胁我吗！你觉得你有本事来对付我吗，你这个皮肤光滑的混蛋！试试看！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: abEliREF.removefromfaction abUSRemnantFaction abEliREF.startcombat player set abGraveyardVariables.abEnding3 to 1 enableplayercontrols
I've not decided yet, but I'll get back to you soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没决定，不过我会很快给你答复的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0100AAE6] (mod) Quest : ([0100AF51]abEliTalkQ) 0100AF51 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols
It's a tough world we live in. I just think people have to stick together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们生活在一个艰难的世界，我只是觉得人们应该团结在一起。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I guess you're right. It's been a long time since I've met a good person, I suppose. I've been looking over my shoulder for a long time now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想你是对的。我想我已经很久没有遇到一个好人了，我已经小心翼翼很久了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage abdxKateQuest 10 SetStage abdxKateQuest 20 SetStage abdxKateQuest 21 Set abdxKateRef.bAvailable to 1
Don't flatter yourself. I just pity people like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别自作多情了，我只是同情像你这样的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'm not sure I completely believe you, but I thanks all the same. You didn't have to help me, and I appreciate it, that's all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我不确定我是否完全相信你，但我还是要谢谢你。你不用帮我，我很感激，仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage abdxKateQuest 10 SetStage abdxKateQuest 20 SetStage abdxKateQuest 21 Set abdxKateRef.bAvailable to 1
I think I've just acquired a new slave!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我刚得到了一个新奴隶！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just try it! If you'd like both your arms and legs broken, then be my guest!
ESP.TRADUIT: 试试看！如果你想让你的胳膊和腿都被打断，那就请便！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage abdxKateQuest 10 SetStage abdxKateQuest 20 SetStage abdxKateQuest 21 Set abdxKateRef.bAvailable to 1
So.. Kate.. where are you from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，凯特，你从哪儿来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose, since you've helped me, it wouldn't hurt to tell you a little about myself. I grew up in Alaska. I was abandoned as a young child..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想，既然你帮了我，告诉你一点我的情况也无妨。我在阿拉斯加长大，我在很小的时候就被遗弃了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hid in the bushes, as I saw the hunters kill them, one by one. I was paralysed with fear, and I reget every day not doing something to save them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我躲在灌木丛中，看着猎人一个一个地杀死他们。我害怕得瘫痪了，我每天都在后悔没有做点什么来拯救他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got a wild imagination. Now tell me the truth, or I leave you right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的想象力真丰富。现在告诉我真相，否则我就把你留在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, okay.. you're sharper than most I've met. I grew up in Shady Sands, my father was a soldier in the NCR. In short, I ran away from all that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧！你比我见过的大多数人都敏锐。我在沙荫镇长大，我父亲是NCR的一名士兵，简而言之，我逃离了这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've done a lot of travelling, done some things I'm not proud of on my way, but I wanna just put that all behind me now. Can't live in the past.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去过很多地方，在旅途中也做过一些不光彩的事，但我现在想把这一切都抛在脑后。不能活在过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never seem to stay in one place too long. I always seem to get myself in trouble, and end up abandoning ship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我似乎从没在一个地方呆太久过，我似乎总是给自己惹上麻烦，最后落得弃船而逃的下场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, that's amazing! I've never met anyone like you before!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，太神奇了！我从来没见过像你这样的人！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I know. I don't like to pat myself on the back too hard, but I guess I really am special. It must be a real honour for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我知道。我不太喜欢表扬自己，但我想我真的很特别，这对你来说一定很荣幸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is a strange story, not sure what to make of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个奇怪的故事，不知道该怎么解释。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah.. well.. that's my life, one strange occurrence after another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，嗯...这就是我的生活，一件又一件奇怪的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like you're making this up as you go along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来像是你自己瞎编的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? No.. I find that insulting! I open up to you, and you call me a liar? Well, I never!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？不！我觉得这很侮辱人！我对你敞开心扉，你却说我是骗子？好吧，我从来没有过！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: What were you doing in the Nellis airplane graveyard anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在内利斯的飞机墓地做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should've known better. If an offer's too good to be true, it usually is, like they say. I needed the caps, so I could afford to move on again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我早该知道的，就像他们说的，如果一份提议好得令人难以置信，通常都是假的。我需要这些瓶盖，这样我才有能力继续前进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mean you were gonna run away again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的意思是你又要逃跑了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gimme a break already! No matter where I go, it's just like a bad dream out there. What's the point of staying around anywhere? You're the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我喘口气吧！无论我走到哪里，那里都像一场噩梦。留在这里有什么意义？你也一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wander from place to place, just like I do. At least we're doing it together now. We can watch each other's backs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到处流浪，就像我一样。至少我们现在一起这样做了，我们可以互相照应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know the feeling. I'm a courier. I'm always on the move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这种感觉。我是个邮差，我总是在四处奔波。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you can relate then.. Hey, we have something in common. Maybe it's not a complete accident you found me. Maybe like-minded people find each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你可以联系起来...嘿，我们有些共同点。也许你找到我并不完全是偶然，也许是志同道合的人能找到彼此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you end up in Nova Industries?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么进入新星工业的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ran into a few ghouls just outside Boulder, they said they were headed to some kind of refuge for ghouls in the canyons. Just a rumour I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在博尔德城外碰到几个食尸鬼，他们说他们要去峡谷里的某个食尸鬼庇护所。我想这只是个谣言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: The "Death Squad" found us, and the ghouls just started running. So I ran too, but we were outnumbered. I must have been knocked unconscious I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: "暗杀小队"发现了我们，食尸鬼就开始逃窜，所以我也开始跑，但我们寡不敌众。我想我一定是被打晕了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not before seeing my new friends gunned down in front of me. I've never seen NCR troops do that before. They left me alive because I was human.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我看到我的新朋友在我面前被枪杀之前，我从没见过NCR的军队做这种事。他们让我活着，因为我是人类。
