ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: That weird little man, Bliven, wanted to keep me for himself, as some kind of ghoul bride. God help him if he'd tried it on with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个奇怪的小男人，布利文，想把我留给他自己，当成什么食尸鬼新娘。如果他想和我试试，那就只有上帝保佑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you happy travelling with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和我一起旅行开心吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's fine with me.. for now. It's not like I have much else to be doing, or anywhere to call home. You like to explore, like me, so I'm happy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我暂时还好，我又没有什么别的事要做，也没有什么地方可以称之为家。你喜欢探索，跟我一样，所以我很开心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay then, let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧，我们走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be right behind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就在你身后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here if you need me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要我，我就在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just listen carefully, Young! I'll speak slowly, so your tiny brain can process it. Enter the serial numbers and scan the frequencies again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 仔细听好了，杨！我会说慢点，这样你的小脑袋就能理解了。输入序列号，重新扫描频率。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know where your stolen ferals went to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你偷来的野性尸鬼去哪了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, do you know? I'll humor you then. Where are they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，你知道了？那我就迁就你吧，它们在哪儿？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A ghoul called Cricket has them, in the old Ranger's station.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们在一个叫克里基特的食尸鬼手上，在旧游骑兵站。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? A ghoul? I can't believe it! How dare a ghoul interfere with my research! That I will simply not tolerate. Something must be done about this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？食尸鬼？真不敢相信！一个食尸鬼竟敢干涉我的研究！我绝对不能容忍，对此必须采取一些措施。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mister Young! Head up to that cabin and kill this Cricket! Did you hear me? Oh, nevermind, you'd be useless at that as well, I'd imagine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杨先生！快去小屋，杀了这个蟋蟀！你听见我说的了吗？哦，算了，我猜你在这方面也没用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about you? You're one of us now, right? I'm sure someone like you could settle this little disagreement. Do whatever you have to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你呢？你现在是我们中的一员了，对吧？我相信像你这样的人能解决这个小分歧的，做你该做的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually...I have an idea. See if you can get this "Cricket" to leave its home. Lead it here, to meet with us for a fake peace-keeping talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上...我有个主意。看看你能不能让这个“蟋蟀”离开它的家，把它带到这里来，跟我们进行一场虚假的和平谈判。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: While it's here, we'll have the men trash its little nest, and all its equipment. Or simply kill it. The choice is yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它在这里的时候，我们会让人把它的小巢和所有设备都毁掉。或者干脆杀了它，选择权在你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDCricketMuDialogue.FrankoSuggestsFakeMeeting to 1 setstage abCricketsQuest 30
<Lie> It turns out your ferals escaped to a nearby cave. The location is here, on my Pip-Boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>原来你的野性尸鬼逃到了附近的一个山洞里，地点就在这里，在我的Pip-boy上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your pip what? I better see this for myself. Come on, Mister Young, it's time to retrieve those ferals you lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的Pip什么？我最好亲自去看看。来吧，杨先生，是时候找回你失去的那些野性尸鬼了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abFrankoTrapTime to 1 abFrankoREF.addscriptpackage abFrankoTrapPAC abYoungREF.addscriptpackage abYoungFrankoTrapPAC abFrankoTrapTrigREF.enable abFrankoTrapTrig2REF.enable abDCcaveDoor.disable
Having some trouble?
ESP.TRADUIT: 遇到麻烦了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trouble? I don't know. Hey Mister Young, are we having trouble? Yes, Mister Young here, is in a lot of trouble. Even a chimpanzee could do his job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麻烦？我不知道。嘿，杨先生，我们有麻烦了？是的，这位杨先生有大麻烦了，即使是黑猩猩也能胜任他的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But it's too much for his poor, sapling mind to monitor a few signals. It's too much, but he's a tryer, and God loves a good tryer, they say. Indeed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但对于他那可怜幼小的大脑来说，监测几个信号实在是太难了。这太过分了，但他是一个尝试者，上帝喜欢一个好的尝试者，他们说。的确如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've lost the signal on another feral. That's three now. Which means it must have wandered out of range, right under Mister Young's nose here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们失去了另一只野性尸鬼的信号，现在是三只了。也就是说它一定是跑出了射程，就在杨先生的眼皮底下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could help locate the missing ferals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以帮你找到那些失踪的野性尸鬼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could? Well, I'll believe it when I see it, but by all means, you can try. Just try better than Young here, will you? Here, you can take these.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以？好吧，眼见为实，但无论如何，你可以试试，试着比杨做得更好，好吗？给，你可以拿着这些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: These are last recieved coordinates of the third missing feral. Search the area for clues as to its whereabouts. Report back here, if you find them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是第三个失踪野性尸鬼的最后坐标。搜索这一地区，寻找它下落的线索，如果你们找到了，就回来报告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: if abGuileTalkQ.abFeralsFound == 0 setstage abCricketsQuest 10 else setstage abCricketsQuest 20 endif
I'd like you to make your way to the Boulder Library for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你先去博尔德图书馆。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {dark}Okay, if you need anything look for me at the Boulder Library.
ESP.TRADUIT: {dark}好吧，如果你有什么需要就去博尔德图书馆找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL:
SetStage abdxKateQuest 30 Set abdxKateRef.bFired to 1 Set abdxKateRef.bL38 to 0 Set abdxKateRef.bLibrary to 1 abdxKateRef.ResetAI
SetStage abdxKateQuest 31
abdxKateRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade abdxKateIdleMarkerLibraryRef ;(Remove from display any unfinished personal quest objectives) ShowMessage abdxKateMesgFiredBoulder
{light}Okay, if you need anything look for me at the Boulder Library.
ESP.TRADUIT: {light}好吧，如果你有什么需要就去博尔德图书馆找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL:
SetStage abdxKateQuest 30 Set abdxKateRef.bFired to 1 Set abdxKateRef.bL38 to 0 Set abdxKateRef.bLibrary to 1 abdxKateRef.ResetAI
SetStage abdxKateQuest 31
abdxKateRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade abdxKateIdleMarkerLibraryRef ;(Remove from display any unfinished personal quest objectives) ShowMessage abdxKateMesgFiredBoulder
{Boulder undiscovered}Okay...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Boulder undiscovered}好吧...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([01001658]abdxKateQuest) Somewhere EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL:
SetStage abdxKateQuest 30 Set abdxKateRef.bFired to 1 Set abdxKateRef.bL38 to 0 Set abdxKateRef.bLibrary to 1 abdxKateRef.ResetAI
SetStage abdxKateQuest 31
abdxKateRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade abdxKateIdleMarkerLibraryRef ;(Remove from display any unfinished personal quest objectives) ShowMap BDBoulderTownMarker ;***KAZ ShowMessage abdxKateMesgFiredBoulder
I'd like you to find a safe place to stay for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你暂时找个安全的地方待着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have time to do errands. Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有时间去跑腿，对不起。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aww shit.. well thanks for being such a major asshole about it anyway! I'll just try to figure this out on my own and try not to get caught.. fuck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，该死，谢谢你在这件事上表现得这么混蛋！我会自己想办法弄清楚然后尽量不被抓到的。操！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [01016393] (mod) Quest : ([01016395]abUSHenryQ) 01016395 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abHenryStage to 1
As long as it doesn't take too much of my time..
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要不占用我太多时间就行...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh it shouldn't take too much of your time at all! I just need you to do me one little favor and that's all! I'm not asking for a whole lot here, see?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，这应该不会占用你太多的时间！我只需要你帮我一个小忙，仅此而已！我不会要求太多的，明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [01016393] (mod) Quest : ([01016395]abUSHenryQ) 01016395 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure! What do you need me to do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然！你需要我为你做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll do it? Thanks so much! I would do it myself but that ass Eli has been keeping a close eye on everyone and there's no way for me to sneak out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你愿意？非常感谢！我也想自己去，但那个混蛋伊莱一直在盯着所有人，我根本没办法溜出去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [01016393] (mod) Quest : ([01016395]abUSHenryQ) 01016395 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, let's hear it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们来听听。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well you know how everyone around here doesn't really want to fight anymore? Well, we still gotta keep up appearances to Eli or else he yells at us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这里的每个人都不想再打仗了吧？我们还是得在伊莱面前装模作样，不然他会吼我们的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [01016393] (mod) Quest : ([01016395]abUSHenryQ) 01016395 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's really annoying sometimes but we came up with this system of just shooting at those Chinese to the left of where they're standing to miss them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时真的很烦人，但我们想出了这个办法，就是向那些中国人站的位置左侧射击，这样就不会打中他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [01016393] (mod) Quest : ([01016395]abUSHenryQ) 01016395 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The plan's been going along really well so far for us but, but I didn't mean to actually hit that guy! He moved just as I pulled the trigger! Honest!
ESP.TRADUIT: 到目前为止，我们的计划进行得很顺利，但我不是真的想打中那个人！我扣动扳机的时候他动了一下！真心的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [01016393] (mod) Quest : ([01016395]abUSHenryQ) 01016395 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you even know he's still alive and didn't die from the wound by now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么知道他还活着，而且到现在还没有死于伤口？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I only hit him in the leg! That couldn't have killed him, could it? Oh, I hope it didn't kill him! I didn't mean to actually hit him! He moved!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是打中了他的腿！那不会害死他的，对吧？噢，我希望这不会害死他！我不是真的想打他！他动了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [01016393] (mod) Quest : ([01016395]abUSHenryQ) 01016395 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't get over there to apologize to the guy myself but I'm sure that YOU could get over there and give him this apology note from me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能亲自过去跟那个人道歉，但我相信你可以过去把我的道歉信交给他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [01016393] (mod) Quest : ([01016395]abUSHenryQ) 01016395 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So all I gotta do is deliver this note? Sure, whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我要做的就是送这张纸条？当然，随便吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks a lot! Here's the note! All you have to do is find the soldier sitting in the back somewhere. I haven't seen him so he must be in the back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常感谢！这是纸条！你要做的就是找到坐在后方某个地方的士兵。我没见过他，所以他一定在后方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [01016393] (mod) Quest : ([01016395]abUSHenryQ) 01016395 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abHenryStage to 1 set abGraveyardVariables.abHuangStage to 1 player.addnote abHenryNote
Naw, I'm not in the mood to be act like an errand boy to a soldier who can't even shoot right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我可没心情给一个连枪都打不好的士兵当跑腿的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well fuck you, asshole! I'm a great shot with a gun! I just didn't want to hit him and he stepped in the way! Fuck off, you smooth skinned bastard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你妈的，混蛋！我枪法很准！我只是不想打他，结果他挡了我的路！滚开，你这个皮肤光滑的杂种！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [01016393] (mod) Quest : ([01016395]abUSHenryQ) 01016395 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abHenryStage to 1
I brought you a letter from the soldier that shot you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你带来一封信，是开枪打你的那个士兵写的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The soldier who shot me? Stupid man with bad aim.. Why he send letter? Hm.. I do not know how to read English. I need you to read it for me, please?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个朝我开枪的士兵？笨手笨脚的家伙，打不准。他为什么要写信？嗯，我不懂英文，我需要你读给我听，行吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Huang [0100E4D5] (mod) Quest : ([01016391]abChinaGhoul8Q) 01016391 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Lie] I just wanted to see how you were doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>我只是想看看你怎么样了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How I am doing? Strange American wants to know how I am doing?! I was shot in leg! How else am I supposed to feel? Go away, strange looking American.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我过得怎么样？奇怪的美国人想知道我怎么样了？！我的腿中枪了！不然我还能有什么感觉？走开，长相奇怪的美国人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Huang [0100E4D5] (mod) Quest : ([01016391]abChinaGhoul8Q) 01016391 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's apologizing for shooting you in the leg.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他为朝你的腿开枪道歉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought it was accident.. no one killed each other in long time now so it no make sense to start now! Tell him it is okay, I no longer mad at him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还以为是意外。现在很久没有人互相残杀了，所以现在开始没有意义！告诉他没关系，我已经不生他的气了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Huang [0100E4D5] (mod) Quest : ([01016391]abChinaGhoul8Q) 01016391 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abHenryStage to 2 set abGraveyardVariables.abHuangStage to 2
[Lie] It says that you're an idiot and that next time don't move when he pulls the trigger.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>上面写着你是个白痴，下次他扣动扳机时你别乱动。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He is saying what to me?! Idiot American shoots me and he insults me instead?! You tell him that I gonna shoot him when I get chance! Idiot American!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在跟我说什么？！傻逼美国佬开枪打我，还要侮辱我？！你告诉他一有机会我就开枪打死他！傻逼美国佬！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Huang [0100E4D5] (mod) Quest : ([01016391]abChinaGhoul8Q) 01016391 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abHenryStage to 2 set abGraveyardVariables.abHuangStage to 2
He said that he hates your guts and he's going to shoot you the next time he sees you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说他对你恨之入骨，下次再见到你就一枪毙了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He.. he what?! How could he be mad at me?! It wasn't my damned fault that he stepped in the way dammit! What an asshole! Stupid slitty eyed bastard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他...他什么？！他怎么能生我的气！他挡在路上又不是我的错，该死！真是个混蛋！愚蠢的眯眯眼杂种！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [01016393] (mod) Quest : ([01016395]abUSHenryQ) 01016395 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abHenryStage to 3 player.rewardxp 200 player.additem prewarmoney 5
He said that he forgives you for shooting him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说他原谅你开枪打他了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So he's going to be all right? Good! I was so worried about him. I've never actually hit anything before to be honest.. just targets during practice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以他会没事吗？很好！我很担心他。说实话，我以前从来没有开枪打过任何人，只是在练习时瞄准目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [01016393] (mod) Quest : ([01016395]abUSHenryQ) 01016395 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abHenryStage to 3 player.rewardxp 200 player.additem prewarmoney 5
How did you expect someone who is Chinese to be able to read a note written in English?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么能指望一个中国人能读懂用英语写的纸条呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well.. I.. So does that mean he never read the note? Dammit! I should have thought about that before! Argh, thanks for trying anyway! I'm an idiot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧...我...那就是说他从没读过那张纸条吗？该死！我早该想到的！啊，谢谢你的努力！我真是个白痴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [01016393] (mod) Quest : ([01016395]abUSHenryQ) 01016395 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGraveyardVariables.abHenryStage to 3 player.rewardxp 200 player.additem prewarmoney 5
I can't leave my gear behind. I'm going down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能丢下我的装备，我要下去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right, it's not worth dieing over. I'll leave it behind then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对，不值得为此而死。那我就把它留下吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I already went in there. I'm afraid one of those "things" got him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经进去过了，恐怕他被那些"东西"抓走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no, no. I told Derek he couldn't see shit, shouldn't be stumbling about out there. Now he's gone and done it, I'm the only survivor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不，不。我告诉过德里克他什么都看不见，不应该跌跌撞撞的去外面，现在他死了，我是唯一的幸存者了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your water and fruit like I told you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我告诉你的水和水果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: abplaceholderref.setav charisma 7 player.additem pear 3 player.additem waterpurified 2
Okay, I'll do it and be right back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我去办，马上回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, you're a sport.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，你真是好样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose the radiation turned some folks into cannibals. They live up in the caves, but they come down to eat people like you and me, so watch out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜是辐射把一些人变成了食人族。他们住在洞穴里，但他们下来吃像你我这样的人，所以要小心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem abCheckNote 1
Not interested, find someone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不感兴趣，找别人吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright then, don't bother. Young people are so damned lazy! What's the matter, you're not tough enough?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，别麻烦了。年轻人真是太懒了！怎么了，你不够强硬？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem abCheckNote 1
Derek is dead. He was killed by one of those cannibal creatures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 德里克已经死了，他是被那些食人族杀死的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no, no. I told Derek he couldn't see shit, shouldn't be stumbling about out there. Now he's gone and done it, I'm the only survivor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不，不。我告诉过德里克他什么都看不见，不应该跌跌撞撞的去外面，现在他死了，我是唯一的幸存者了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your water and fruit like I told you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我告诉你的水和水果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: abPlaceholderREF.setav charisma 7 player.additem pear 3 player.additem waterpurified 2
I’m Kate! I came here about the research job but those ghouls captured me and locked me in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是凯特！我是来做研究的，但那些食尸鬼抓住了我，把我锁在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They are accusing me of being a Chinese spy! They’re crazy! They want to kill me, or worse!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们指控我是中国间谍！他们疯了！他们想杀了我，或者更糟！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, will you help me get out of here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 求你了，你能帮我离开这里吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I’m Kate! I came here about the research job but those ghouls captured me and locked me in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是凯特！我是来做研究的，但那些食尸鬼抓住了我，把我锁在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They are accusing me of being a Chinese spy! They’re crazy! They want to kill me, or worse!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们指控我是中国间谍！他们疯了！他们想杀了我，或者更糟！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, will you help me get out of here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 求你了，你能帮我离开这里吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say, didn't we bump into each other at Old Mormon Fort in Freeside recently?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们最近是不是在自由城的旧摩门要塞偶遇过？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, not my problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，不是我的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? No! Please don’t leave me in here, please!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？不！求你别把我丢在这里，求你了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set abdxKate2Quest.bPlayerIsHelping to 0 Set abdxMasterQuest.bGraveyardKateDenied to 1
Yes, they said I could release you if I wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他们说我想放你就放了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you! Can I follow you? I was blindfolded when they brought me in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你！我能跟着你吗？他们把我带进来的时候，我的眼睛是蒙住的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: abKate2CellDoor.unlock Player.RemoveItem abdxKate2Key 1 abdxKate2ContainerRef.RemoveAllItems abdxKate2Ref 1 Set abdxMasterQuest.bGraveyardKateFreed to 1
I’ve decided to leave you here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我决定把你留在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I’m just here to torment you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是来折磨你的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You’re a really sick person!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个变态！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set abdxKate2Quest.bPlayerIsHelping to 0 RewardKarma -50 Set abdxMasterQuest.bGraveyardKateTaunted to 1
Yes, let's go find the exit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我们去找出口吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We’re off to see the wizard, the wonderful wizard of ... I forget. Vegas? I bet Mr. House is like a wizard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要去看巫师，那个神奇的巫师...我忘了。拉斯维加斯？我敢说豪斯先生就像个巫师！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set abdxKate2Quest.bFollowingPlayer to 1 SetStage abdxKate2Quest 20
set abGraveyardVariables.abKateGraveyardStand to 2 abdxKate2Ref.EVP
No, I got you free but you’re on your own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我让你自由，但你得靠自己了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Taken aback.}Alright ... well, thank you again ... I owe you ...{voice trails off}
ESP.TRADUIT: {Taken aback.}好吧...嗯，再次感谢你...我欠你...{voice trails off}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage abdxKate2Quest 30
set abGraveyardVariables.abKateGraveyardStand to 2 abdxKate2Ref.EVP abdxKate2Ref.Sayto abdxKate2GuardRef abdxKate2Stage30B
You go on ahead first. I’ll be waiting right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你先去好了，我就在这儿等着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time for some quick, creative thinking ...
ESP.TRADUIT: 是时候进行一些快速、创造性的思考了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soldier! I am to leave the base immediately. After you, soldier!
ESP.TRADUIT: 士兵！我必须马上离开基地。你先，士兵！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless you WANT me to report you left a guest to wander the base unescorted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你想让我举报你让一个访客独自在基地游荡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set abdxKate2Quest.iSelfExit to 1
If I only had a brain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 假如我有脑子 !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [01016691] (mod) Quest : ([0101834D]abdxKate2Quest) If I Only Had A Brain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a minute, you've been here since before the Great War?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你大战之前就在这里了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! Yes I have! I have. Not personally, my great grandfather has, or was. He's dead. We have the same name. Henry. So that counts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！是的，我是！是我。不是我个人，是我的曾祖父，或者曾经是。他已经死了，我们有相同的名字，亨利。所以这也算。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not the same person though. You just have the same name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你已经不是原来的你了，你们只是名字一样而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hahah! A comedian is it? I did some stand-up in my time, before the war. I know. I read it in my journal. I read all about what I used to do!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈！是喜剧演员吗？战前，我演过一些单口相声。我知道，我在日记里看到的，我读了所有我以前做的事情！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便你说什么。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you, an idiot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是白痴吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Show me what you have for sale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看你都卖些什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right away, friend! I've picked up all sorts of treasures on my travels. Have a browse!
ESP.TRADUIT: 马上，朋友！我在旅行中捡到了各种各样的宝贝。浏览一下吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
Of course, right away! Take a look at this stuff!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，马上！看看这些东西！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
What can you tell me about the boat outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我外面那艘船的情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's my junk ship. I call it The Mighty Junker! I take it up the river, to search for things that I can sell. I need things to sell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是我的垃圾船，我叫它强力废车！我带着它沿河而上，寻找我可以出售的东西，我需要东西来卖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'll need some gasoline to run. Mickey used to take care of that. I hope he's okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它需要一些汽油才能运转。米奇以前负责这个，我希望他没事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything interesting going on around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这附近有什么有趣的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard the government did tests on chimpanzees in this area. I don't know what a chimpanzee is, but it sounds scary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说政府在这个地区用黑猩猩做实验。我不知道黑猩猩是什么，但听起来很可怕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw some soldiers heading into the caves nearby. Once, I saw a soldier shoot a ghoul dead. Not a feral ghoul neither. He said he was infected.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到一些士兵进入附近的洞穴。有一次，我看到一个士兵开枪打死了一个食尸鬼，也不是野性尸鬼。他说它被感染了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I fell into one of those smoking pits once. It jogged a lot of old memories, from before the war. Can't believe I'd forgotten all that stuff!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经掉进过一个冒烟的坑里，勾起了许多战前的旧记忆。真不敢相信我竟然把那些东西都忘了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once I was scavenging in the park, and I saw some strange ferals, with metal on their faces. They were heading towards Boulder I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一次我在公园里拾荒，看到一些奇怪的野性尸鬼，脸上都是金属。我想他们是朝博尔德方向去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't go into the caves much. They say that cannibals live there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不常进山洞，他们说食人族住在那里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take care out in the wastes, my friend!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在废土上要小心，我的朋友！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So long for now! Come and see Henry soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见了！常来看看亨利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you repair my stuff?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能修理我的东西吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing, friend!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，朋友！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [0101CF88] (mod) Quest : ([0101D750]abHenryTalkQ) 0101D750 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: showrepairmenu
Oh.. great.. pain in my ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，太好了。讨厌鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Gerard [01023343] (mod) Quest : ([01023E1B]abGerardTalkQ) 01023E1B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you wanna find out how tough I am, old man?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想知道我有多强硬吗，老头子？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not really. I can't see shit, for a start.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，算不上。首先，我什么都看不见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm not tough enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不够强硬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I thought! I can't see you, but I can sure smell you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是这么想的！我看不见你，但我能闻到你的味道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Keith [0101B332] (mod) Quest : ([0101B334]abKeithTalkQ) 0101B334 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: What have you got for sale?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么要卖的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay then.. that's what I like to hear. Let me show you all of my fabulous.. crap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这就是我想听的。让我给你看看我所有的...废品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Gerard [01023343] (mod) Quest : ([01023E1B]abGerardTalkQ) 01023E1B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
I've got a lot of great stuff.. uh, well.. maybe not the greatest, but.. I do have guns and ammo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有很多好东西。呃，也许不是最棒的，但是...我有枪和弹药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Gerard [01023343] (mod) Quest : ([01023E1B]abGerardTalkQ) 01023E1B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
Can you repair my gear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能帮我修装备吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I could take a look at your stuff, see what I can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我可以看看你的东西，看看我能做些什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Gerard [01023343] (mod) Quest : ([01023E1B]abGerardTalkQ) 01023E1B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: showrepairmenu
Sure, hand it over, I can fix anything.. most things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，交给我，我什么都能修。大多数。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Gerard [01023343] (mod) Quest : ([01023E1B]abGerardTalkQ) 01023E1B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: showrepairmenu
So what's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么故事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really much of a story, to tell you the truth. I collect a bunch of shit and sell it so I can eat. Living the American dream.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说实话，这也算不上什么故事。我收集一堆垃圾，然后卖掉，这样我就有饭吃了。活在美国梦中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Gerard [01023343] (mod) Quest : ([01023E1B]abGerardTalkQ) 01023E1B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about this area?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我这个地区的情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the really old ghoul is in charge.. I'm not supposed to speak his name.. That's all I can say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个老食尸鬼是老大。我不能说出他的名字，我只能说这些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Gerard [01023343] (mod) Quest : ([01023E1B]abGerardTalkQ) 01023E1B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay then, thanks for stopping by. Remember, tell your friends about me. The best deals, remember?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧，谢谢你光临。记住，把我的事告诉你的朋友。最划算的交易，记得吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Gerard [01023343] (mod) Quest : ([01023E1B]abGerardTalkQ) 01023E1B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back if you need any more useless shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还需要什么没用的东西，就来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Gerard [01023343] (mod) Quest : ([01023E1B]abGerardTalkQ) 01023E1B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...personality issues. Oh yes, heheh, we won't have any more trouble from you, little Cricket. Now come along, Mister Young.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...个性问题。噢，是的，嘿嘿，你不会再给我们添麻烦了，小蟋蟀。来吧，杨先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, Mister Young! It's time to earn your paycheck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，杨先生！是时候挣你的薪水了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: abYoungREF.say abYoungTrapSay1
Yes sir, Mister Franko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是先生，弗兰科先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about this area?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我这个地区的情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's relatively peaceful here, in the park. If you discount the cannibals and the dirty people who live in the garbage, it's not all bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里相对来说比较安静，在公园里。如果你不考虑食人族和生活在垃圾堆里的肮脏人，也不全是坏事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boulder itself is another story. Why everyone is so eager to relocate to that damn Dome is beyond me. What a filty mess of a place, Boulder Colorado.
ESP.TRADUIT: 博尔德则是另一回事，为什么每个人都那么渴望搬到那个该死的巨蛋，我不懂。科罗拉多的博尔德，真是个脏乱的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you go there, stay away from the dead factory. Our scans have been picking up high radiation spikes in that area. It's best to just keep away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你去那里，远离那个废弃的工厂。我们的扫描在那个区域发现了高辐射峰值，最好离远点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么故事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's my story? Like it's any of your business! You like poking your nose around, don't you? Sniffing into other peoples business. Listen up..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的故事是什么？好像这关你什么事似的！你喜欢瞎打听，是吧？窥探别人的私事。听好了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Doctor Leonard Franko, one of the senior scientists here. Elington, Young, they report to me. I'm like.. a mentor to them, especially Young here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是莱纳德·弗兰科博士，这里的资深科学家之一，埃灵顿，杨，他们都向我汇报。我就像他们的导师，尤其是杨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Poor boy was born without a brain. Not the most ideal of candidates, when one is choosing an apprentice, but these are the times we live in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个可怜的男孩生下来就没有脑子。在选择学徒时，这不是最理想的人选，但我们生活在这样的时代。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me anything about the Dome?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于巨蛋的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, of course. I've read books on the Dome. There are some that doubt it is the only one. Sometimes I gaze up at the moon with my binoculars..
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，当然，我读过关于巨蛋的书。有些人怀疑这是唯一的一个，有时我用望远镜凝视月亮...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..and I wonder, might there be another Dome up there as well? We certainly had the technology before the war. Who knows what could be up there!
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我就会想，上面会不会还有另一个巨蛋？我们在战前肯定有技术，谁知道上面会有什么！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got to be going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. It doesn't make any difference to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。对我来说没什么区别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, what are you waiting for then. Get lost, and let me get back to work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，那你还在等什么呢。滚开，让我回去工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you stand up for yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不站起来维护自己？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, I don't think that's such a good idea. Doctor Franko yells at me for my own good. How else would I learn?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我不认为这是个好主意。弗兰科博士对我大吼大叫是为了我好，不然我怎么学？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you end up in the Brotherhood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么混到兄弟会里面来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I probably shouldn't talk about that. I'm sorry. It's best I keep my mouth shut, before I get myself in more trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能不应该谈论这个，我很抱歉。我最好还是闭上嘴巴，免得惹上更多麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you know Jessica Robbins at all?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底认识杰西卡·罗宾斯吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, not really. I'm not really very confident, when it comes to the females of our species. She said hello to me once, but I was too shy to reply.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，算不上。当涉及到我们这个物种的女性时，我不是很有信心，她向我打过一次招呼，但我太害羞了，不敢回答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll let you get back to your work then. See you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就不打扰你工作了，回见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's a good idea. I'd better get back to work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，这是个好主意。我最好回去工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll be here if you want to talk again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果你想再聊的话，我就在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know, gentle encouragement?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，温柔的鼓励？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if you want to suggest that to him, then by all means..
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果你想向他提出这个建议，那请便...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut the hell up, both of you! If you want a donkey to move, you have to whip it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们两个都给我闭嘴！如果你想让驴子动起来，你就得用鞭子抽它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's a.. donkey?
ESP.TRADUIT: 驴子是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's true, you probably don't pay attention otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是真的，否则你可能不会关注。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you're right about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's like a small horse. I read about them once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像一匹小马，我曾经读过关于它们的文章。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh.. right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦...好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I honestly have no idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说实话，我也不知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, me neither.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我也是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It must be some kind of animal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一定是某种动物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: An animal? From before the war then, I'm guessing. Maybe it was some kind of strange, one-headed Brahmin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一种动物？我猜是战前的吧。也许是某种奇怪的，独头婆罗门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't you tell I'm the type of person you can talk to?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看不出来我是那种可以和你谈心的人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I suppose you are. Just keep this to yourself, okay. Doctor Franko knows, but no one else. I used to be in an NCR prison, but they let me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想你是。不要告诉别人，好吗？弗兰科博士知道，但其他人都不知道。我以前在NCR监狱，但他们放我出来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They let a lot of us out, to work as salvagers in Denver. It's a rough city, but we had a lot more freedom than in prison. Then the Legion came.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们放了我们很多人出来，去丹佛做回收工。那是一个混乱的城市，但我们比在监狱里自由多了。然后军团来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the rangers were busy fighting, I managed to slip away unnoticed, before the sandstorms started up again. Eventually I made my way here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当游骑兵们忙着战斗的时候，我设法在沙尘暴再次袭来之前悄无声息地溜走了。最终我来到了这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I almost died, but my quality of life is much better now. I really don't mind Franko yelling at me, as I've been yelled at all my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我差点死了，但我现在的生活质量好多了。我真的不介意弗兰科吼我，因为我这辈子都在被人吼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, if it's all the same to you, I'd like to keep my personal life private. Please don't hit me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，如果你不介意的话，我想保留我个人生活的隐私。请不要打我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever. I don't really care anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便吧，反正我也不在乎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, well, uhm, okay. I better get back to work soon anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，嗯，好吧。我最好尽快回去工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will knock you clean out, little man. You better not lie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把你打爆的，小家伙。你最好不要撒谎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no, I wouldn't do that. I never knew her, I swear!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不，我不会那样做的。我从没见过她，我发誓！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave Mister Young here alone, he has work to do. The day Young touches a woman, is the day I'll put on a dress and go dance with the ferals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让杨先生一个人呆在这儿吧，他还有工作要做。杨碰到女人的那一天，就是我穿上裙子去和野性尸鬼跳舞的那一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure about that? Nothing you wanna tell me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定？没什么要告诉我的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean? No, like I said, I barely even looked at her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么意思？不，就像我说的，我几乎没看她一眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay then, you seem to be telling the truth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧，看来你说的是实话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, I wouldn't lie about that sorta thing. It was terrible what happened to her, really terrible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我不会在这种事上撒谎。她的遭遇太可怕了，真的太可怕了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Initiate Young [0101382C] (mod) Quest : ([01013842]abYoungVoiceQ) 01013842 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a hoard of zombies coming, take the bastards down!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一群僵尸要来了，把这些混蛋干掉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [01065CF5] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just got word that Elder Guile has entered the Dome through the second entrance in the caves. He wants you to meet with him at once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚得到消息，盖尔长老已经从洞穴的第二个入口进入了巨蛋。他要你马上去见他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [01065CF5] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you end up in here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么跑到这里来了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was staying with my brother, in the shack town, further up the valley. Then those creatures came down from the caves. I guess they were hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和我兄弟住在一起，在山谷深处的棚户区。然后那些生物从山洞里下来了，我猜他们是饿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Suzy [0103599B] (mod) Quest : ([0103599E]abSuziTalk) 0103599E (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's your brother now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你兄弟现在在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. I just had to run. He told me to run away, so I did. I had no choice. Those things were coming. He said he'd meet me here though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我必须得跑，他叫我跑，我就跑了，我别无选择，那些东西来了。不过他说他会在这里见我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Suzy [0103599B] (mod) Quest : ([0103599E]abSuziTalk) 0103599E (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was two days ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是两天前的事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Suzy [0103599B] (mod) Quest : ([0103599E]abSuziTalk) 0103599E (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll see if I can find him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看看能不能找到他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I wanna come with you. We'll find him together. You can't leave me here alone, those things will get me. I'm coming with you, that's final!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我想和你一起去，我们一起去找他。你不能把我一个人留在这里，那些东西会抓住我的。我跟你一起去，就这么定了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Suzy [0103599B] (mod) Quest : ([0103599E]abSuziTalk) 0103599E (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just go outside first and check it's safe, then come back and get me. Don't be long though! I don't wanna stay here alone any longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你先出去看看是否安全，然后再回来接我。不过不要太久！我不想再一个人待在这里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Suzy [0103599B] (mod) Quest : ([0103599E]abSuziTalk) 0103599E (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll go check the coast is clear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我去检查一下海岸是否安全。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, I'll be waiting right here. Thank you so much for helping me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，我就在这儿等着。非常感谢你的帮助！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Suzy [0103599B] (mod) Quest : ([0103599E]abSuziTalk) 0103599E (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: abSuzyScreamREF.enable
I don't have time for this, you're on your own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有时间，你自己去吧。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Suzy [0103599B] (mod) Quest : ([0103599E]abSuziTalk) 0103599E (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: abSuzyScreamREF.enable
Okay, I'll be back soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我很快就回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, you're a good egg.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，你是个好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mickey [01019664] (mod) Quest : ([01036265]abMickeyTalk) 01036265 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for the documents transported with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找我随身携带的文件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I figured they were just some legal documents you signed, with being frozen alive and all. They're in my bag, down that dark pit over there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我以为那只是你签的一些法律文件，上面写着被活冻什么的。在我包里，就在那边的黑坑里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mickey [01019664] (mod) Quest : ([01036265]abMickeyTalk) 01036265 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: if getstage abBurntRubber < 20 setstage abBurntRubber 20 endif
It's not worth the risk, just for some papers and junk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不值得冒这个险，就为了一些文件和垃圾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you say so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你这么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mickey [01019664] (mod) Quest : ([01036265]abMickeyTalk) 01036265 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened on the journey from Nevada?
ESP.TRADUIT: 从内华达来的路上发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, my truck had a bit of an accident, you see. Car tunnel caved in on us. Broke my leg pretty bad, but still managed to lug myself into this cave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，我的货车出了点小事故，汽车隧道坍塌了，压在我们身上。我的腿伤得很厉害，但还是设法把自己拖进了这个山洞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mickey [01019664] (mod) Quest : ([01036265]abMickeyTalk) 01036265 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you manage to get an old truck working?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么把一辆旧货车修好的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It all started with my great, great grandfather. He buried A LOT of gasoline during the Resource Wars, left a map too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切要从我的曾曾祖父说起。他在资源战争期间埋了很多汽油，还留下了一张地图。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mickey [01019664] (mod) Quest : ([01036265]abMickeyTalk) 01036265 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When my father died, he gave it to me. I had to build a whole truck-engine from scratch, using an old book on mechanics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我父亲死后，把它给了我。我不得不用一本机械学旧书，从头开始造一个卡车引擎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mickey [01019664] (mod) Quest : ([01036265]abMickeyTalk) 01036265 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Took me six years, going from junkyard to junkyard. People pay a lot of caps for my services. I hope I get her running again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我花了六年时间，从一个垃圾场到另一个垃圾场，人们为我的服务付了很多钱。我希望我能让她重新跑起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mickey [01019664] (mod) Quest : ([01036265]abMickeyTalk) 01036265 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got any weapons I could use?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有我能用的武器吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take this shotgun. I think it's busted up, but maybe you can smack something over the head with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着这把猎枪。我觉得它坏了，但也许你可以用它打什么东西的头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mickey [01019664] (mod) Quest : ([01036265]abMickeyTalk) 01036265 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abMickeyTalk.abMickeyGOTGUN to 1 player.additem aaShotgunClub 1
You're not exactly getting to the point right now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在还没说到重点！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hahah, quite right. Shall we continue then? Let's continue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈，非常正确。我们继续吗？让我们继续。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's all nonsense to me too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我来说，这也都是些无稽之谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good! Good, that's what I like to hear. Straight to business!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好！很好，这正是我想听的，直奔主题！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think small talk has its place though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我觉得闲聊还是有用处的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. Anyway, we've diverged too far already, let us get back to the task at hand, shall we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。不管怎样，我们已经扯得太远了，让我们回到手头的任务上来，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, let's continue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我们继续。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the Environmental Armor! It is a prototype, created by myself. It is the product of hours of hard labour and scientific breakthrough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是环境装甲！这是一个原型，我自己制造的，它是长时间艰苦劳动和科学突破的产物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will not waste time trying to explain how or why it works. The advanced theory involved would turn the average mind to a quibbling wreck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会浪费时间去解释它是如何或为什么工作的，所涉及的高级理论会让普通人的头脑变成一个争论不休的残骸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Suffice it to say, this armor will protect you in Boulder. You may not need it inside shelter, but you must wear it at all times when outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想说，这身盔甲能在博尔德保护你。在室内你可能不需要它，但在室外你必须一直穿着它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: To take it off would mean a slow and painful death. So don't do it! One would think the radiation would've died down after two hundred years..
ESP.TRADUIT: 脱下来就意味着痛苦而缓慢的死亡，所以不要这样做！有人会认为辐射会在200年后消失...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: One might think that, but not a scientific mind. Upon closer inspection, it's not normal radiation. Clearly it's the result of some chemical weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人可能会这么想，但科学的头脑不会这么想。经过仔细检查，这不是正常的辐射，很明显这是某种化学武器造成的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look what you've done! We've diverged yet again! Life is too short for that! Scientific discovery can take decades! We can't waste even a minute.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看你做了什么！我们又分化了！生命太短暂了！科学发现可能需要几十年的时间！我们不能浪费哪怕一分钟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now let me get back to my work. You have your protective suit, so go and use it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在让我回去工作吧。你有防护服了，快去用吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem abEnvironmentalArmor 1 setstage abGuileMainQuest 10 abSamTrigREF1.enable abSamTrigREF2.enable if getstage abDespotMainQuest == 15 setstage abDespotMainQuest 20 endif
Are you sure this armor will protect me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定这身盔甲能保护我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Am I sure? It's never been tested practically, but the equations involved in its production are mathematically infallible, I assure you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确定吗？它从未经过实际测试，但它的生产方程式在数学上是绝对正确的，我向你保证！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, I'll get going then. Goodbye!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，那我就走了。再见！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told you, I don't have time for goodbyes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉过你，我没时间跟你道别！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My name is Louise Grady, ...well, that was my name a long, long time ago. That is my sister, Lisa.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫路易丝·格雷迪，这是我很久很久以前的名字了。那是我的妹妹，丽萨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When we were little we lived here in Boulder, until those bad men came and blew everything up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们小时候住在博尔德，直到那些坏人来了，把一切都毁了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I can see you, and I don’t know how either. Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我能看见你，但我也不知道怎么回事。你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, our big sister Lucia was supposed to meet us here, but she left us and ran off with her boyfriend. She shouldn’t have done that, that was mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我们的大姐露西娅本应该在这里见我们的，但她丢下我们和她男朋友跑了。她不应该那样做，太卑鄙了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then, all of the sudden.. pow pow pow.. And we were trapped here by this mean, nasty monster! He won’t let us leave to go into the light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后，突然之间...噗噗噗！我们被这个卑鄙无耻的怪物困在这里了！他不让我们离开进入光明世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have been here sooooo long, we’re tired of this place and just want to go find my mama and papa in the light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在这里已经很久了。我们厌倦了这个地方，只想在阳光下找到我的爸爸妈妈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know they’re in there. I can feel them. But not Lucia. I don’t know how, but I think she’s still here, in Boulder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道他们在那里，我能感觉到。但不是露西娅，我不知道怎么回事，但我觉得她还在这里，在博尔德。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But.. I think she's.. different now somehow. I don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我觉得她...现在不一样了。我不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: StartQuest MHBoulderTwinsFirstExitQUEST
So, you were here in this toy store when the war started?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以战争开始的时候你就在这家玩具店里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You’re crazy, no one has been able to see us for 200 years! But HE won’t like them being in here either way, so they need to leave, NOW!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你疯了，200年来都没有人能够看到我们！但无论如何，他都不会喜欢他们在这里，所以他们需要离开，现在就走！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lisa [01052682] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You’re always getting us into trouble. He’s going to be really mad at you, you know that don’t you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你总是给我们惹麻烦。他会非常生你的气，你知道的，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lisa [01052682] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fabler's report?
ESP.TRADUIT: 法布勒的报告？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Fabler is a crafty man. He claims to have been "following your progress" in the Mojave. I wanted to speak with you about a delicate matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，法布勒是个狡猾的人，他说他一直在莫哈韦"关注你的进展"。我想和你谈一件微妙的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A young initiate, Jessica Robins, was found killed in the bathrooms a few nights ago. I'm supposed to be on leave at the moment, due to stress.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个年轻的新兵，杰西卡·罗宾斯，几天前被发现死在浴室里。我现在应该在休假，但是压力太大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've taken a suspect, Edison Blake, into custody, but I've not felt capable to run a proper investigation yet. I could use an impartial eye on this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经拘留了一名嫌疑人，爱迪生·布莱克，但我觉得自己还没有能力进行正式调查。我需要一个公正的视角。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you say? Are you able to handle this investigation for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说呢？你能帮我处理这次调查吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abJessicaTalk to 1
Elementary, my dear Watson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这很简单，我亲爱的华生。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh? Who's Watson? Is that a suspect? Well.. it looks like you know what you're doing, so I'll leave it to you, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？华生是谁？是嫌疑人吗？好吧...看来你很清楚自己在做什么，我就交给你了，先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage abMonsterBloodQ 10 player.additem abBOSMurderKey 1
I could handle this with my eyes closed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我闭着眼睛都能搞定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just don't be so cocky about it. I don't want an innocent man going down for this, so make sure you do your job properly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别太自大了。我不想让一个无辜的人因此而被定罪，所以你一定要做好你的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage abMonsterBloodQ 10 player.additem abBOSMurderKey 1
Yes, sir. I'll do my very best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，先生，我会尽力的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, that's what I like to hear. I just wanted this all put behind us. You're doing me a big favour and I won't forget it. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，这正是我想听的。我只想让这一切都过去，你帮了我一个大忙，我不会忘记的。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage abMonsterBloodQ 10 player.additem abBOSMurderKey 1
I've discovered the identity of the killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经查出了凶手的身份。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? That's great news, my friend. So.. who is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？这是个好消息，我的朋友。那么，是谁呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's Paladin Roach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是圣骑士罗奇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Roach? Are you sure? I didn't think he had it in him. He's a gentle idiot. You sure he's the killer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗奇？你确定？我不认为他有这个本事，他是个温柔的傻瓜，你确定他就是凶手？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, without a doubt, he is the killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，毫无疑问，他就是凶手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well.. that certainly is a surprise. I suppose you can never truly know a man. Stand aside, it's time to play my part. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这确实是个惊喜，我猜你永远不可能真正了解一个人。靠边站，该我上场了。谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGrantTalkQ.abBloodSampleDone to 0 ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackPermanent abEdisonREF.disable setstage abMonsterBloodQ 100 abEdisonREF.moveto abEdisonFreeMarker abEdisonREF.enable abRoachREF.disable abRoachREF.moveto abBosJailMarker abRoachREF.enable set abGrantTalkQ.abRoachJailed to 1 set abGrantTalkQ.abEdisonReleased to 1 set abGrantTalkQ.abGotSuspect to 1 set abGrantTalkQ.abRoachConvicted to 1
Actually, I should give it some more thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我应该再考虑一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I think you should. I wouldn't say Roach was the type to do something like this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我认为你应该这样。我觉得罗奇不是会做这种事的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's Paladin Crawley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是圣骑士克劳利。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crawley, huh? That doesn't surprise me one bit. He had a violent temper and liked to keep his women "in line", or so I've heard. So you're certain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克劳利，是吗？我一点也不惊讶。他脾气暴躁，喜欢让他的女人“循规蹈矩”，至少我是这么听说的。所以你确定吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm certain. He did it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我确定，他干的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's that, then. I'll release Blake, and put Crawley in his place. I'm happy to put this whole situation behind us. Poor Jessica.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那就这样吧。我会放了布莱克，让克劳利顶替他。我很高兴能把这件事抛之脑后，可怜的杰西卡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGrantTalkQ.abBloodSampleDone to 0 ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackPermanent abEdisonREF.disable abEdisonREF.moveto abEdisonFreeMarker abEdisonREF.enable abCrawleyREF.disable abCrawleyREF.moveto abBosJailMarker abCrawleyREF.enable set abGrantTalkQ.abCrawleyJailed to 1 set abGrantTalkQ.abEdisonReleased to 1 set abGrantTalkQ.abGotSuspect to 1 set abGrantTalkQ.abCrawleyConvicted to 1 setstage abMonsterBloodQ 100
On second thought, I need to think some more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 转念一想，我还需要再考虑考虑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, it's your decision. Be sure you make the right one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你来决定。确保你做出了正确的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's Edison Blake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是爱迪生·布莱克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that certainly makes it easy for me, as he's already in the cell. So you're sure he's the killer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，那我就轻松多了，因为他已经进牢房了。你确定他就是凶手？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, without a shadow of doubt, he is the killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，毫无疑问，他就是凶手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's good news, my friend. Thank you for everything you've done here. The right man will pay for his crime. Now I can put all this behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个好消息，我的朋友。谢谢你在这里所做的一切，正确的人将为他的罪行付出代价。现在我可以把这一切都抛之脑后了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGrantTalkQ.abBloodSampleDone to 0 set abGrantTalkQ.abGotSuspect to 1 set abGrantTalkQ.abBlakeConvicted to 1 setstage abMonsterBloodQ 100
I think I should give it more thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我应该再考虑考虑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, it's better to think it through and take your time, rather than making a rash decision we'll regret later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，最好仔细考虑一下，慢慢来，而不是草率的做出一个会让我们将来后悔的决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's Scribe Elington.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是埃灵顿学士。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scribe Elington? Are you out of your mind, or pulling my leg?
ESP.TRADUIT: 埃灵顿学士？你是疯了，还是在逗我玩？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm serious. He's the killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我是说真的，他是凶手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have an odd sense of humour. Just get back out there and find the real killer!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的幽默感真奇怪。快出去，找到真正的凶手！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got you! I was just kidding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抓住你了！我只是开个玩笑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you really fooled me. Stop wasting both our time and find the real killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，你真的把我骗了。别再浪费我们的时间了，去找真凶吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's Doctor Anderson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是安德森医生。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know I asked for your help, but now I'm starting to doubt my decision. Get your shit together and find the real killer. Stop fucking around!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我请求过你的帮助，但现在我开始怀疑我的决定了。打起精神，找到真凶，别再胡闹了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's you, Sentinel Wesley Grant!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你，尖兵卫斯理·格兰特！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Har Har, very funny, wise guy. Just let me know when you actually find something out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈，非常有趣，聪明的家伙。如果你有什么发现就告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jessica Robins killed herself, I'm sure of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰西卡·罗宾斯是自杀的，我敢肯定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess again, you idiot! There's no way Jessica killed herself. She wasn't wired that way at all. She's taken some abuse, but she valued life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再猜一遍，你这个白痴！杰西卡不可能自杀的，她根本不是那种人。她受过虐待，但她珍视生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to trade with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想和你做笔交易。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood doesn't normally trade with outsiders, though here in Colorado we tend to be more liberal. We won't trade with just anyone..
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会通常不与外人交易，尽管在科罗拉多我们更倾向于自由主义。我们不会随便跟谁做生意，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..but, those with skills useful to us, are more than welcome to. Let me show you what we have in stock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我们非常欢迎那些拥有对我们有用的技能的人。让我给你看看我们有什么存货。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: SHOWBARTERMENU
Yes, that's fine. Feel free to take a look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，没问题。请随便看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
Of course. Here's what we have in stock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然可以。这是我们的存货。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
What can you tell me about the surrounding area?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我周围的情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Head into the landfill and you'll notice an old gas station nearby. To the right, you'll find the road to Dome City. Not the place for normal humans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走进垃圾填埋场，你会注意到附近有一个旧加油站。往右走，你会找到通往巨蛋城的路，不是正常人类待的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard there's an old factory there. They call it The Dead Factory. Probably just campfire tales, for the most part.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说那里有一家老工厂，他们称之为“死亡工厂”。多半只是些篝火故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else can you tell me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还能告诉我什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we're presently in Boulder Mountain Park. Nothing but a big landfill, a rusty old shack town, and a lot of caves. Steer clear of the caves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们目前在博尔德山公园。除了一个巨大的垃圾填埋场，一个生锈的旧棚户区，还有很多洞穴。避开洞穴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The cannibal creatures inhabit most of them, so you're better off keeping well away, though some of the caves will lead you into the Wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大部分洞穴里都住着食人生物，所以你最好远离它们，尽管有些洞穴会把你引向废土。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also a dangerous place. We believe the NCR are camping out there somewhere. We've sent salvager teams in as well, to recon the old facilities.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也是一个危险的地方，我们相信NCR就在某处扎营。我们也派出了搜救队，去侦察旧设施。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could be some great prewar tech out there, but we have to be careful not to provoke the NCR too early. We can't afford to lose more men right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能会有一些很棒的战前科技，但我们得小心别过早激怒NCR。我们现在不能再损失更多的人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you follow the cave tunnel, past the shooting range, you'll eventually reach the Wastes. A lot of it's unexplored territory, so be on your guard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你沿着洞穴隧道走，经过射击场，你最终会到达废土。很多地方都是未开发的领域，所以要提高警惕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all I need to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就想知道这些。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay then, glad to be of help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧，很高兴能帮上忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of your mission?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对你的任务有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seeking to acquire new and powerful tech, to keep it from the hands of those who'd misuse it. It's our primary function in the Brotherhood of Steel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试图获得新的强大的技术，防止它落入那些滥用者之手。这是我们钢铁兄弟会的主要职能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Dome itself is an extremely strategic fort to capture as well. Would give us a point of great strength in Colorado, to help us withstand the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 巨蛋本身也是一个极具战略意义的堡垒，会成为我们在科罗拉多的一个强大据点，帮助我们抵抗NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're like cockroaches, mutiplying all the time. Our recon reports reveal a small army of NCR Ghouls. I mean, Ghouls?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们就像蟑螂一样，一直在繁殖。我们的侦察报告显示有一支NCR食尸鬼部队，我是说，食尸鬼？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since when does the NCR recruit Ghouls as troopers? They're using them to navigate Boulder. We can't afford them to capture the Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR什么时候开始招募食尸鬼当兵了？NCR用它们为博尔德导航，我们不能让他们去占领巨蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though the Dome has some very strong defences, I feel it's only a matter of time. That's why we're sending you in there, to make contact first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然巨蛋有很强的防御能力，但我觉得这只是时间问题。所以我们才派你过去，先和他们取得联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do the NCR want with the Dome?
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR对巨蛋有什么企图？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We believe they want to destroy the Dome, to contain the original source of the Seltsam Syndrome, but you have proven their foolishness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们认为他们想摧毁巨蛋，以遏制泽尔特扎姆综合症的源头，但你已经证明了他们的愚蠢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their methods are too extreme. They gave up on finding a cure, and decided they simply had to kill every carrier. I doubt the public NCR knows this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的方法太极端了，他们放弃了寻找治疗方法，决定杀死所有携带者。我怀疑NCR公众是否知道这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR are operating in secret death squads. They've tracked the virus for months, killing all carriers they came across, until they came here..
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR的秘密暗杀小队正在运作。他们追踪病毒数月，杀死所有他们遇到的携带者，直到他们来到这里...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..To Boulder. As they believe the Dome is the origin point of the disease, so they seek to destoy it and everyone inside. We can't let that happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...博尔德。因为他们相信巨蛋是疾病的源头，所以他们想要摧毁巨蛋和里面的所有人。我们不能让这种事情发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to be going now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay then. I'm here if you need me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。如果你需要我，我就在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand. I'll see you around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。回头见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Wesley Grant [0103EEEA] (mod) Quest : ([0103EEED]abGrantTalkQ) 0103EEED (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you analyse this blood sample for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能帮我分析一下血样吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see Sentinel Grant has hung the investigation upon your shoulders, hmm? Let me see.. hmm.. that's odd.. there are actually two blood samples here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来尖兵格兰特把调查任务推给你了？让我看看，嗯，真奇怪...这里其实有两份血样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: That would suggest the killer was wounded during the attack. Rather than taking a blood sample from everyone in the building, go and speak to Penny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这说明凶手在袭击中受伤了。与其从大楼里的每个人身上取血样，不如去找佩尼谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doctor Anderson, that is. There was a full medical check-up the day after the attack. Find out if anyone had recent wounds. That'll narrow it down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是安德森医生。袭击发生后的第二天进行了全面体检，看看有没有人最近受过伤，这样就能缩小范围了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGrantTalkQ.abPennyTime to 1 setstage abMonsterBloodQ 30
What exactly do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里具体做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I work for Doctor Franko. He designs the tech we use in the ferals, and I apply it to them. You can call them "Remote Ferals".
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为弗兰科博士工作。他设计了我们在野性尸鬼身上使用的技术，我负责应用到它们身上，你可以称它们为“遥控野性尸鬼”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We implant a device right inside their brains, which, in simple terms, broadcasts subtle suggestions into their subconscious minds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在它们的大脑中植入了一个装置，简单地说，就是向他们的潜意识中传播微妙的建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We are able to calm them and control them. We use them to navigate the toxic city. Their headsets are wired into their sense organs..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们能够安抚它们，控制它们。我们利用它们在有毒的城市中穿行，他们的耳机与他们的感觉器官相连，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..so we can transmit back data, every second they are out there.. until we lose contact that is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样我们每隔一秒就能传送数据回来，直到失去联系为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lose contact?
ESP.TRADUIT: 失去联系？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, for an unknown reason, the ferals cease to transmit data after a few hours within the city. Data suggests they are regaining their "senses"..
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知什么原因，这些野性尸鬼在城里待了几个小时后就停止传输数据了。数据显示，他们正在恢复“感觉”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..if you can call them that. More than that, their behaviour becomes somewhat different than the average feral. They will even attack sane Ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能这么称呼它们的话。更重要的是，它们的行为与一般的野性尸鬼有所不同，它们甚至会攻击理智的食尸鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They will even attack "natural ferals"; ones we haven't touched. They only seem to tolerate their own kind, with strict discrimination.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们甚至会攻击“天然野性尸鬼”，就是那些我们还没碰过的。它们似乎只容忍自己的同类，有着严格的歧视。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abElingtonFerals to 1
Why use ferals? Why not robots?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么使用野性尸鬼？为什么不用机器人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what it's like in the Mojave, but there aren't many robots around here. At least not in areas we can reach. Besides, they're expensive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道莫哈韦是什么样子，但这附近没有多少机器人，至少在我们能到达的区域没有。此外，它们很贵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: To create, I mean. There were plenty of ferals, wandering out from Boulder, and the materials needed to manipulate them are much less than robots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是创造。有很多野性尸鬼，从博尔德游荡出来，而操纵它们所需的材料比机器人少得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks to Doctor Field's unconventional inovations, we're able to recon Boulder at an acceptable cost. They are strange but efficient means.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多亏了菲尔德博士的非常规创新，我们才能以可接受的成本侦察博尔德。这是一种奇怪但有效的方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的故事好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I was born in a vault in Denver. Left for greener pastures, when I became a young man. I thought the Mountain Park would be a safe place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我出生在丹佛的一个避难所里。当我年轻的时候，就离开那里去了更好的地方，我以为山地公园是个安全的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It has its dangers, but anything is better than becoming food for the dogs. I wandered for a while, kept myself alive by scavenging, and hunting..
ESP.TRADUIT: 它有它的危险，但任何事情都比成为狗的食物要好。我游荡了一段时间，靠拾荒和打猎维持生计...
