ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..sometimes being hunted. Then I met Doctor Franko in the junk yard. He recognized my talents and put in a good word for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...有时也被猎杀。然后我在垃圾场遇到了弗兰科博士，他赏识我的才能，为我美言了几句。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anything I can do to help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么我能帮忙的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doctor Franko could probably use your assistance, if you haven't spoken with him already. Our ferals have been going missing, it seems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗兰科博士可能需要你的帮助，如果你还没跟他谈过的话。我们的野性尸鬼似乎失踪了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll find him outside in the junk yard, working with his assistant, Young.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以在外面的垃圾场找到他，和他的助手杨一起工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to be going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, don't let me keep you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我不耽误你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say no more. I have to get back to work anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再说了。反正我也得回去工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have any wounds been treated, since the attack?
ESP.TRADUIT: 袭击发生后，有伤者接受过治疗吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, everyone had their scheduled full check-ups the day after the attack, and only two soldiers had minor wounds. Crawley and Roach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，袭击发生后的第二天，每个人都按预定计划进行了全面检查，只有两名士兵受了轻伤。克劳利和罗奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Roach had a minor cut across his hand, and Crawley had a deep wound on his forearm, that he'd recently treated himself. Was a terrible dressing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗奇的手上有一个小伤口，克劳利的前臂上有一个很深的伤口，是他最近自己治疗的。真是糟糕的包扎！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else I can help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么能为您效劳的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGrantTalkQ.abTakeBloodTime to 1 setstage abMonsterBloodQ 40 startquest abBloodSamplesQ
Do you have any medical supplies to trade?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么医疗物资可以交易吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I certainly do. Here, take a look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然有。来，看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
Can you heal my injuries?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能治好我的伤吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be more than happy to help. Please lie down on the operating table, and I'll be right over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很乐意帮忙。请躺在手术台上，我马上过来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not a scribe or a paladin, what are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你既不是学士也不是圣骑士，你在这里干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right, the Brotherhood are very selective, to say the least, when it comes to membership. Times have been tough for us here, in Boulder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对，兄弟会是非常挑剔的，至少在成员名单上是这样。我们博尔德的日子过得很艰难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They wanted to tap into any resources they could, to gain any edge over the NCR. They took to recruiting the most useful civilians in the area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们想利用一切可以利用的资源，以获得对NCR的任何优势。他们开始招募该地区最有用的平民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My advanced medical expertise ensured I was one of the first on the list. I'm happy here. I've more than proved my worth and loyality, and besides..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我先进的医学专业知识确保了我是名单上的第一名。我很高兴在这里，我已经证明了我的价值和忠诚，而且...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..they couldn't exactly manage without a medical expert. The soldier who was filling in for medic could barely put a band-aid on! How ridiculous.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...没有医学专家他们根本应付不来，那个代替军医的士兵连创可贴都贴不上！太荒谬了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what they'd have done, if I hadn't come along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道如果我没来，他们会怎么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you know Jessica well?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和杰西卡熟吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did.. yes. I can't even think about it. It's too much to even think about. I just have to move on and keep working. It's too horrible to dwell on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是。我甚至不敢去想，想都不敢想，我只能继续前进，继续工作。这太可怕了，不能老想着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes, getting your thoughts out in the open brings clarity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候，把你的想法说出来会让你更清晰。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.. maybe you're right. I shouldn't keep everything bottled up inside. I was concerned about her relationship with Crawley; the constant arguments.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，也许你是对的，我不该把一切都憋在心里。我担心她和克劳利的关系，不断的争吵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: She was such a kind person; so gentle. It upset me to hear him shouting at her. I heard him on more than one occassion. I confronted Jessica.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她是一个如此善良的人，如此温柔。听到他对她大喊大叫，我很心烦，我听他说过不止一次。我质问杰西卡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: She kept telling me it was her own fault, that she was a lousy person sometimes, and Crawley only wanted to help her. It was so sad to hear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她一直对我说这是她自己的错，说她有时是个讨厌的人，而克劳利只是想帮助她。听到这个消息我很难过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: She really believed she was worthless, and it crushed me. More than a few times I found bruises, during her medical exams. She always had an excuse,
ESP.TRADUIT: 她真的认为自己一无是处，这让我崩溃了。在她的体检中，我不止一次发现了瘀伤。她总是有借口，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: but I knew the truth. I knew he was hitting her. I just never thought he would go that far. I still don't believe it, I suppose. Did he kill her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我知道真相，我知道他在打她，我只是没想到他会走到那一步。我想我还是不相信，是克劳利杀了她吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I honestly do not know, but it's scary to think a killer is among us. I hope you get to the bottom of it soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说实话，我不知道，但一想到凶手就在我们中间，我就很害怕。我希望你能尽快查明真相。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't think that's a good idea. I just can't handle it right now; I'm too busy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我觉得这不是个好主意。我现在实在处理不了，我太忙了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's vital you tell me anything you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你知道的都告诉我很重要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm really sorry. I don't want to impede your investigation, but I really couldn't handle it right now. I just can't go there now, I'm sorry!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的很抱歉。我不想妨碍你的调查，但我现在真的处理不了。我现在不能去，对不起！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You better tell me what you know, or you will feel pain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好告诉我你知道什么，否则你会很痛苦的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you dare threaten me. Do you even know where you are? I'll pretend this never happened, for now, but don't ever fuck with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你竟敢威胁我，你知道自己在哪吗？我暂时就当这事没发生过，但别来惹我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to be going now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just come back to me, if you need any medical assistance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要医疗帮助就来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be right here, with the band-aids ready!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就在这，准备好创可贴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Penny Anderson [010403AD] (mod) Quest : ([010403B2]abPennyTalkQ) 010403B2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've finished gathering the blood samples.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经采集完了血样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, yes.. let me see.. hmm.. unfortunately, it looks like none of these match the blood at the murder scene. I'm sorry you wasted your time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，是的，让我看看。嗯，不幸的是，这些看起来都和谋杀现场的血迹不匹配。很抱歉你浪费了时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGrantTalkQ.abBloodSampleDone to 1 setstage abMonsterBloodQ 80 stopquest abBloodSamplesQ set abGrantTalkQ.abTakeBloodTime to 0
Ah yes, of course. Let me have a look then... hmm.. yes, that's a definite match. It looks like your killer is Edison Blake after all. Well done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊是的，当然，让我看看。嗯，是的，绝对匹配，看来凶手终究还是爱迪生·布莱克。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should go and report your findings to Sentinel Grant at once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该马上把你的发现报告给尖兵格兰特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Elington [01040398] (mod) Quest : ([0104039A]abElingtonTalkQ) 0104039A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGrantTalkQ.abBloodSampleDone to 1 setstage abMonsterBloodQ 80 stopquest abBloodSamplesQ
I don't think you're a monster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认为你是怪物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Well.. thank you. That means a lot. You know, I would never have hurt Jessica. She had an innocent soul. She didn't deserve what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？嗯，谢谢你，这对我意义重大。我绝不会伤害杰西卡的，她有一个纯洁的灵魂，她不该被这样对待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sound like a monster to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听起来就像个怪物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're wanting a rise out of me? Sorry to disappoint. I never expected you'd believe me. Not that it matters. The others have made up their minds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想激怒我吗？抱歉让你失望了。我从没想过你会相信我，但这并不重要，其他人已经下定决心了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if you're telling the truth or not. Time will tell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你说的是不是实话，时间会证明一切的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's fair enough. I'm glad you have an open mind about all this. So many are quick to judge, without knowing all the facts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这很公平。我很高兴你对这一切持开放态度，许多人在不了解所有事实的情况下，就迅速做出判断。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where were you, the night of the attack?
ESP.TRADUIT: 袭击那晚，你在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was meditating in my room, then sleeping as most were. I was unaware anything had happened, until morning. I thought my heart would stop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在自己的房间里冥想，然后像大多数人一样睡觉。直到早上我才意识到发生了什么事，我想我的心脏都要停止跳动了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It enraged me to think, that someone could hurt something so pure and innocent. That person is still out there, while I'm stuck in this damn cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一想到有人会伤害如此纯洁无辜的人，我就很愤怒。那个人还逍遥法外，而我却被困在这该死的笼子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're not guilty, who do you think the real killer is?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你无罪，你觉得谁才是真正的凶手？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crawley. Paladin Crawley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克劳利，圣骑士克劳利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was always jealous of me. Hated me. Jessica, his girlfriend, had a soft spot for me. He couldn't stand it. He suspected we were together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他总是嫉妒我，憎恨我。他的女朋友杰西卡对我很有好感，他不能忍受，他怀疑我们在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He is a paranoid man. Many nights I overheard them arguing. But I never touched Jessica. We had a connection, that's true, but we were just friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个多疑的人。许多个夜晚，我无意中听到他们争吵。但是我从来没碰过杰西卡，我们很来电，这是真的，但我们只是朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wouldn't surprise me, if he killed her himself, in one of his jealous fits. Using my combat knife to incriminate me. The man is a snake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他出于嫉妒，亲手杀了她，我也不会感到惊讶。用我的战斗刀陷害我，这个人是条蛇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me your hand, I'm taking a sample of your blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你的手给我，我要取你的血样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you need that? I mean, of course, that's fine. Here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么需要这个？我的意思是，当然，这很好，给。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGrantTalkQ.abGotBlakeBlood to 1 setstage abMonsterBloodQ 65
Looks like this cell is your permanent home now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来这间牢房是你永远的家了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The blood sample, of course. I should've been more careful.. Getting involved with Jessica, I mean. Crawley is a jealous man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，血样。我应该更小心的，我是说和杰西卡扯上关系，克劳利是个爱嫉妒的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGrantTalkQ.abEdisonConvictedAfter to 1
A liar, even to the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个骗子，直到最后。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think what you like. You think you're clever, don't you? In time, you'll be put to the test. You'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随你怎么想。你觉得你很聪明，是吗？总有一天，你会受到考验的，你会明白的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's that supposed to mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh.. nothing. Nothing at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，没什么，什么都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just face it, you've lost. Now shut the hell up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 面对现实吧，你已经输了。现在他妈的闭嘴！

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll see who's lost.. in time. It's all a matter of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到时候我们就知道谁输了，这只是时间问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really are a monster, just like they said.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个怪物，就像他们说的那样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think what you like. I wouldn't waste my time, trying to educate a simple mind such as yours. Things aren't always as black and white as you think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随你怎么想。我不会浪费我的时间，去教育你这样一个头脑简单的人，事情并不总是像你想的那样非黑即白。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got to be going now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在必须走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, but don't forget about me. I'm an innocent man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，但别忘了我。我是无辜的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: An innocent man has been put in a cage. I hope you will seek out the truth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个无辜的人被关在笼子里。我希望你能查明真相。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edison Blake [0103F4D8] (mod) Quest : ([010406B7]abEdisonTalkQ) 010406B7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you kidding?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在骗谁呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excuse me?! What the hell are you trying to say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说什么？！你到底想说什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm saying you liked to knock her around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说你喜欢打她。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? No! Who told you that? It's not what you think. You don't know what Jessica was like. She had a mean streak. It was self-defence..
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？不！谁告诉你的？不是你想的那样。你不知道杰西卡是什么样的人，她脾气不好，这是出于自卫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you did kill her then. In "self defence!" You admit it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你确实杀了她，出于“自卫”！你承认了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no! I didn't kill her. It wasn't like that. Okay, fine.. sometimes I had to put her in her place, but I didn't kill her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不！我没有杀她，事情不是那样的。好吧，有时候我得让她认清自己的处境，但我没有杀她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: She had a "mean streak?" That's bullshit. We both know it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她有“卑劣的一面”？那是胡扯，我们都知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, okay, fine. Somnetimes I had to put her in her place. I'm the man. I had to keep her in check, a girl like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，好了，好吧，有时我不得不让她认清自己的处境。我是男人，我得管住她，像她这样的女孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? So she was the violent one! Must have been tough for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？所以她是暴力的那个！对你来说一定很艰难。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh.. yeah. It was tough sometimes. I just kept telling myself that she would get better. Looks like someone else was looking out for me..
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，是的。有时很艰难，我一直告诉自己她会好起来的。看来还有人在照顾我...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..but I don't condone what they did to her. In spite of everything she put me through, I still loved her.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...但我不能宽恕他们对她做的事，不管她让我经历了什么，我仍然爱她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a good man, Crawley. I'll find the real killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个好人，克劳利。我会找到真凶的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, friend. I know you'll do your best. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，朋友，我知道你会尽力的。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're so full of shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是满口胡言！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell? Can't you see I'm grieving here? Just watch your mouth. You don't know me! What, you've been here five minutes, and you know me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么鬼？你没看到我很伤心吗？说话注意点，你不了解我！怎么，你才来了五分钟，就认识我了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry for your loss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请节哀顺变。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, me too. Thank you all the same though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我也是。不过还是要谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是这么说的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell's that supposed to mean? Just keep your sights on the real killer, smart ass! I know that Blake did this. That jealous son of a bitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这是什么意思？盯着真正的凶手，聪明鬼！我知道是布莱克干的，那个狗娘养的嫉妒的家伙！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think Edison Blake is the killer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为爱迪生·布莱克是凶手？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, as a matter of fact I do. He's the only person that comes to mind. He was always leaching after her, but Jessica would have none of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，事实上我知道，他是唯一能想到的人。他总是缠着她不放，但杰西卡一点也不喜欢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He mustn't have taken the rejection well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他肯定不太能接受拒绝。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right! He didn't. There's motive for you, right there. Unrequited love. I almost feel sorry for the guy, but the man's real sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错！他不能，这就是动机，单相思。我几乎为他感到难过，但他真的病得很重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard Jessica liked Blake's attention. That must have made you angry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说杰西卡喜欢布莱克的关注，那一定让你很生气。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not fucking true! She fucking hated that bastard. Don't push me, asshole! I'll fucking kill you where you stand!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那他妈不是真的！她他妈的恨那个混蛋。别逼我，杂碎！我他妈当场杀了你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like you killed Jessica?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像你杀了杰西卡？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No! I didn't mean that. I would never have hurt her. Not really. I hit her a few times, but never any serious damage. You gotta believe me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！我不是那个意思。我绝不会伤害她，不完全是，我是打了她几次，但都没有严重的伤害。你得相信我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, calm down. I'm just after the truth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，冷静点。我只是在寻找真相。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, you're right. I'm sorry. Continue with your investigation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你说得对。我很抱歉，继续调查吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did Jessica have any enemies? Anyone who'd want to harm her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰西卡有什么仇人吗？有人想伤害她吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, nothing like that. She was a sweet girl. Well liked. You want my opinion? This was a crime of passion. Two words: Edison Blake. He's your man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有，什么都没有，她是个可爱的女孩，很受欢迎。你想听我的意见？这是激情犯罪，两个字：爱迪生·布莱克，他是你要找的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me your hand. I'm taking a blood sample.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你的手给我，我要取血样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you need that? No! Stop wasting time with me and find the real killer. It's Blake's blood you should be taking, not mine!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么需要这个？不！别在我身上浪费时间了，去找真凶吧。你应该抽的是布莱克的血，不是我的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage abMonsterBloodQ 60
Are we gonna have a problem here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会有什么问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh.. no. Here's my hand. I'm sorry about that, I've just been upset.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，没有，给你手。我很抱歉，我只是有点心烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGrantTalkQ.abGotCrawleyBlood to 1 setstage abMonsterBloodQ 45
[Grab hand and forcibly take blood sample]
ESP.TRADUIT: [抓住手，强行采集血样]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ow! You didn't have to be so rough. I would've given it to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗷！你没必要这么粗暴。我会把它给你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGrantTalkQ.abGotCrawleyBlood to 1 setstage abMonsterBloodQ 45
Please give me your hand, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请给我你的手，先生。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I told you. Stop bothering me and find the real killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我告诉过你，别再烦我了，去找真正的凶手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just give me your fucking hand!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的把手给我！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't talk to me like that. I'm not intimidated easily. Now stop bothering me and find the real killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别那样跟我说话，我不会轻易被吓倒。别再烦我了，去找真正的凶手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 暂时再见了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay then, good luck with the investigation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧，祝你调查顺利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. You've interrogated me enough. Find the real killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，你已经审问我够久了。找到真凶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not fooling anyone with your lies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的谎言骗不了任何人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you'll see. It'll be too late for me, but you'll get your wake-up call, when you cross paths with Blake. You better watch your back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你会明白的。对我来说已经太晚了，但当你遇到布莱克的时候，你会被唤醒的。你最好小心点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you're paranoid! You should lay off the Jet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在太多疑了！你应该戒掉杰特。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jet?! I've never taken drugs in my life! Just move the fuck along and let me rot in peace, asshole! You'll be sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰特？！我这辈子从没吸过毒！你他妈走开，让我安静地腐烂吧，混蛋！你会后悔的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care if you're innocent, I just don't like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎你是否无辜，我只是不喜欢你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fucking piece of shit! I'll kill you myself when I get out of here! You better watch your back, I'll be coming for you, you son of a bitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你个人渣！等我出去了，我会亲手杀了你！你最好小心点，我会来找你的，你个狗娘养的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Crawley [0103DA6C] (mod) Quest : ([01040F8B]abCrawleyTalkQ) 01040F8B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can you be sure Blake is the killer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么能确定布莱克就是凶手？

ESP.ORIGINAL: She was killed with Blake's combat knife. It was found at the scene. I saw the way he looked at her. He was jealous of Crawley and what they had.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她是被布莱克的战斗刀杀死的，是在现场发现的。我看到他看她的眼神了，他嫉妒克劳利和他所拥有的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: He must've thought, if he can't have her, then no one can. That's evidence and a motive. The guy's guilty as sin!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他肯定在想，如果自己得不到她，那就没人能得到。这是证据，也是动机，这家伙罪大恶极！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I agree. He doesn't deserve to live.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意，他不配活着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you've got some sense, friend. Amen to that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你还真有头脑，朋友。衷心赞同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me your hand, I'm taking a blood sample.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你的手给我，我要取血样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright then, here it is. Take as much as you want; it's all clean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，给你。你要多少抽多少，都很干净。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abgranttalkq.abgotroachblood to 1 setstage abMonsterBloodQ 50
Did Crawley and Jessica fight a lot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克劳利和杰西卡经常吵架吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know, I suppose they did, now that I think of it. Crawley like to keep his women in line, you can't fault him for that. It would get heated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，现在我想起来了，应该是吧。克劳利喜欢管他的女人，这不能怪他，这会变得很激烈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was Crawley ever violent to Jessica?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克劳利对杰西卡有暴力行为吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only when she got out of line, he would put her in her place. Not out of spite, you must know. Just.. to teach her a lesson. You don't think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有当她不守规矩时，他才会让她回到自己的位置上。你必须知道，这不是出于怨恨，只是...给她一个教训。你不这么认为吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, of course not. Crawley could never have done that to her. I don't like where these questions are going. Let's just talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，当然没有，克劳利不可能那样对她。我不喜欢这些问题的走向，我们还是谈点别的吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGrantTalkQ.abSpokenRoach to 1
Where were you the night of the murder?
ESP.TRADUIT: 凶案发生当晚你在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had a couple drinks in the mess hall, nothing unusual, and then I went to bed. Like most nights. The other men will vouch for me, except.. Crawley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在食堂喝了几杯，没什么特别的，然后就去睡觉了，和大多数夜晚一样。除了克劳利，其他人都可以为我担保。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that I think of it, he did get up real late, probably around midnight. Figured he went for one of his late walks. That isn't a crime, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我想起来了，他确实起得很晚，可能是午夜左右，估计他是去散步了。这不是犯罪，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Roach [0103F4DB] (mod) Quest : ([01040FC4]abRoachTalkQ) 01040FC4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want me to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想让我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The man who transported you here was injured during the journey. He fled up into some caves, further down the valley. I need you to find him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你送到这里的人在途中受伤了。他逃到了山谷深处的一些洞穴里，我需要你找到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The formula for the cure was missing from the wreckage. According to one of the Nevada scientists, it was placed in the driver's bag. I need it back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 解药的配方在废墟中失踪了。据内华达的一名科学家说，它被放在司机的包里。我要拿回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage abBurntRubber 10 set abGuileTalkQ.abGuileStages to 3
I have it, but the driver was killed by cannibals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了，但司机是被食人族杀害的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is a tragedy. He did a great service for the Brotherhood. At least he didn't die in vain. We have the cure, at last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个悲剧，他为兄弟会做了很大的贡献。至少他没有白白死去，我们终于有了解药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have your next assigment, if you're ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的下一个任务，准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removenote abCureFormula
setstage abBurntRubber 100
No, not yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to me when you have it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: For years we have been gathering the feral ones, from the irradiated areas of Colorado, engineering them for a greater cause.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多年来，我们一直在从科罗拉多受辐射的地区，收集野性尸鬼，为了更伟大的事业而改造它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In so doing, we've been able to control them, to use them to recon the Boulder Dome. We get a few hours of intel before they turn feral once more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样一来，我们就能控制它们，利用它们来侦察博尔德巨蛋。在它们再次发狂之前我们有几个小时的情报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ordinary humans, even with advanced radiation suits, cannot last but minutes in Boulder, due to the intense radiation there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在博尔德，普通人即使穿着先进的防辐射服，也只能坚持几分钟，因为那里的辐射强度很大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've found evidence that a scientist has recently left the Dome and fled into some underground caverns, beneath Boulder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们发现有证据表明有个科学家最近离开了巨蛋，逃到了博尔德地下的某个洞穴里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We believe he may be in possession of access codes, which will enable you to enter the Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们认为他可能拥有访问密码，可以让你进入巨蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once inside, I have an offer I wish you to extend to the scientists. Tell them the Brotherhood has a real cure for the Seltsam Syndrome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进去后，我有个提议希望你能转达给科学家们。告诉他们兄弟会有真正的治愈泽尔特扎姆综合症的方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We will share the cure, in exchange for the total assimilation of the Boulder Dome into the Brotherhood Of Steel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们将分享治愈方法，作为交换博尔德巨蛋将完全融入钢铁兄弟会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do what you can to convince them. I know that time is running out for the scientists, so they have little choice but to submit themselves to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽你所能说服他们。我知道留给科学家们的时间不多了，所以他们别无选择，只能屈服于我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood has Boulder's best interests in mind. I will rule it with a fair hand and bring peace to Colorado.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会考虑的是博尔德的最大利益。我会用公平的手段统治这里，为科罗拉多带来和平。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It must not be allowed to fall into the hands of the corrupt NCR. Be cautious if you cross their path. Their Captain is a foolish, unstable man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 绝不能让它落入腐败的NCR之手。如果你遇到他们，一定要小心，他们的上校是个愚蠢又不稳定的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've devised a prototype Environmental Armor, which should protect you from radiation while in Boulder. You're the first to use it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们设计了一种环境盔甲的原型，可以在博尔德保护你免受辐射。你是第一个使用它的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be worried though. I have complete confidence in this suit. It's the product of many years' work. Collect it from Doctor Field.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过别担心，我对这套衣服有十足的信心，这是多年工作的成果。去菲尔德博士那里拿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd also advise you to study our research and history logs, on the terminals, so you're familiar with the situation in Boulder. Good luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还建议你看看我们的研究和历史记录，在终端上，这样你就能熟悉博尔德的情况了。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abGDiag1 to 1 set abGuileTalkQ.abGDiag2 to 1 set abGuileTalkQ.abFieldStage to 1 set abGuileTalkQ.abBOSisGo to 1 setstage abGuileMainQuest 5
No, not yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to me, when you are ready for the next stage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你准备好进入下一阶段，再来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abGDiag1 to 1
No, I've not yet completed my mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我还没完成任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must convince them of my offer. Report back when you have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须说服他们接受我的提议，好了就回来报告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I've convinced them. The Dome's waiting for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我已经说服他们了。巨蛋在等你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's excellent news if I ever heard it, but there's no time to celibrate. We must get to the Dome at once! We can't give them chance to dig in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我听过的最好的消息，但没时间庆祝了。我们必须马上赶到巨蛋！我们不能给他们掘壕防守的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've killed Captain Despot already!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经杀了德斯波特上校！

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..and I'm sure he deserved it, but the NCR are not complete fools. His back-up forces are likely approaching the Dome as we speak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信他罪有应得，但NCR也不是完全的傻瓜。他的后援部队可能正在接近巨蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean, "dig in"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说"掘壕"是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR cannot enter the Dome, they don't have the access codes, but they can take up position outside of the Dome, blocking our path.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR无法进入巨蛋，他们没有访问密码，但他们可以在巨蛋外面占据位置，挡住我们的去路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to move in now, before they have chance to dig in and fortify their position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得马上行动，趁他们还没来得及掘壕加固阵地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not ready yet, let me gather some things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没准备好，让我收拾一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is no time for that. You will come with us now, or I'll kill you where you stand! There is too much at stake, I won't play games with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没时间了。你现在就跟我们走，不然我就当场杀了你！这事关重大，我不会和你玩游戏的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give it your best shot!
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽力一试吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would have made you an honorary member of the Brotherhood. I had such high hopes for you, but now you disgrace yourself. You make me sick!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本来想让你成为兄弟会的荣誉成员。我曾对你寄予厚望，但现在你却自取其辱，你真让我恶心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: abGuileREF.startcombat player setenemy playerfaction abBOSfaction setenemy abBOSfaction playerfaction
Okay, I'm ready then, let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，我准备好了，走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very good. Let's make haste. Scout ahead into Boulder and eliminate any NCR in your path. We'll meet you outside the Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好。我们快点吧，侦察前进到博尔德并消灭路上的任何NCR。我们在巨蛋外面见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [010377B2] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: abBattleCOL1.enable abBattleCOL2.enable abBattleCOL3.enable abBattleCOL4.enable abBattleCOL5.enable abBattleCOL6.enable abBattleCOL7.enable abBattleCOL8.enable abBattleCOL9.enable abBattleCOL10.enable abBattleCOL11.enable abDSbattleSoldier1.enable abDSbattleSoldier2.enable abDSbattleSoldier3.enable abDSbattleSoldier4.enable abDSbattleSoldier5.enable abDSbattleSoldier6.enable
player.moveto abPlayerBattleStart enablefasttravel 0 setstage abGuileMainQuest 80 set abGuileTalkQ.abGDiag4 to 1
The Brotherhood do have a cure. It worked on me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会确实有解药，对我起作用了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is only a half-truth. Traces of the virus will still lie dormant in your blood. They could reactivate at any time, or spread and infect others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只是一半的事实，病毒仍然会潜伏在你的血液里。它可能在任何时候重新激活，传播并感染其他人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: For years the NCR worked for a cure, but in the end we realized the only cure is death. It's a cold truth, but a truth nonetheless
ESP.TRADUIT: 多年来，NCR一直在寻找治疗方法，但最终我们意识到唯一的治疗方法是死亡。这是一个冷酷的事实，但毕竟是事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My orders are clear, to eliminate all potential carriers of the disease. To leave it unchecked is too great a risk for mankind. This must be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的命令很明确，消灭所有潜在的病毒携带者，放任不管对人类来说风险太大了。必须这样做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes, in life, one must choose a lesser of two evils. The cost to the country as a whole would be too great, if I did not complete my mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时，在生活中，两害相权取其轻。如果我不完成我的使命，整个国家将付出巨大的代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. We can't take any chances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对，我们不能冒任何风险。

ESP.ORIGINAL: For years the NCR worked for a cure, but in the end we realized the only cure is death. It's a cold truth, but a truth nonetheless
ESP.TRADUIT: 多年来，NCR一直在寻找治疗方法，但最终我们意识到唯一的治疗方法是死亡。这是一个冷酷的事实，但毕竟是事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My orders are clear, to eliminate all potential carriers of the disease. To leave it unchecked is too great a risk for mankind. This must be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的命令很明确，消灭所有潜在的病毒携带者，放任不管对人类来说风险太大了。必须这样做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes, in life, one must choose a lesser of two evils. The cost to the country as a whole would be too great, if I did not complete my mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时，在生活中，两害相权取其轻。如果我不完成我的使命，整个国家将付出巨大的代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can you justify killing innocent people? You are nothing but a murderer!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么能为杀害无辜的人辩护？你只是个杀人犯！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you to judge me, courier? My actions are not my own, they are the actions of the people! I have the cure, and it is a bloody one, I admit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你凭什么审判我，邮差？我的行动不是我自己的，是人民的行动！我有解药，而且我承认这是一种血腥的解药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Life is not always black and white. Sometimes difficult choices must be made.The lives of a few are not worth the lives of all! Listen to reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 生活并不总是非黑即白，有时必须做出艰难的选择。少数人的生命抵不上所有人的生命！听听劝吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will you help us or not? If you cannot listen to reason, then get out of my way! I don't have time to justify my actions to an ignorant fool!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底帮不帮我们？如果你听不进道理，那就给我让开！我没时间向一个无知的傻瓜解释我的行为！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, you're right. How can I help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你说得对。我怎么帮你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've tracked the last remaining carriers to the Boulder Dome. It is likely the origin point of Seltsam Syndrome in this century.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们追踪到最后几名病毒携带者都在博尔德巨蛋，这可能是本世纪泽尔特扎姆综合症的源头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We believe the scientists caught it in prewar times, taking it with them into their cold sleep. It was possibly a chemical weapon, made in china.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们相信科学家们在战前就发现了这种病毒，并带着它进入了冰冷的睡眠。这可能是中国制造的一种化学武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need you to gain access to the Dome and prepare the way for our forces to occupy it. First of all, you'll need to gain access codes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要你进入巨蛋，为我们的军队占领巨蛋做好准备。首先，你需要获取访问密码。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our spies reported a scientist leaving the Dome, months ago, and fleeing into the underground caverns of Boulder. Find him and the access codes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几个月前，我们的间谍报告说有个科学家离开了巨蛋，逃进了博尔德的地下洞穴。找到他和访问密码。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once inside the Dome, either convince the scientists to work with you, or eliminate them. There is no time for compassion. Do what must be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦进入巨蛋，要么说服科学家与你合作，要么消灭他们。没有时间去同情别人，做必须做的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next, head to the city district. We've recieved reports that a group of raiders has taken control there. Eliminate them. Then find the ZAX computer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来，前往市区，我们收到报告说一群掠夺者已经控制了那里。消灭他们，然后找到ZAX计算机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It controls all the main functions of the Dome. Taking control of it is essential to holding the Dome. Make sure it's in full working order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它控制着巨蛋的所有主要功能，控制它是守住巨蛋的关键。确保它处于正常工作状态。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do what needs to be done, to ensure its continued operation. When you've competed these tasks, report back to me here and we'll take the Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 做需要做的事，以确保其持续运行。完成这些任务后，向我报告，我们就能拿下巨蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you come across any potential carriers, eliminate them without question. It's for the greater good and the safety of the many. Good luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你遇到任何潜在的病毒携带者，毫无疑问地消灭他们，这是为了更大的利益和大多数人的安全。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: One more thing, Boulder is extremely irradiated. Reports say the Brotherhood have developed a prototype Environmental Suit. Without it, you're dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有一件事，博尔德受到了极大的辐射。有报道称兄弟会已经开发出了一种环境服装的原型，没有它，你就死定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Recover the suit from their base of operations, if you haven't already. We have our own prototype, but it's not ready yet. Now get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还没有的话，从他们的行动基地取回这套衣服。我们有自己的原型，但还没准备好。现在开始吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set abGuileTalkQ.abDespotStart to 1 set abGuileTalkQ.abCrossMet to 1 set abGuileTalkQ.abNCRisGo to 1
if getstage abGuileMainQuest == 10 setstage abDespotMainQuest 20 elseif abGuileMainQuest == 20 setstage abDespotMainQuest 30 elseif abGuileMainQuest == 30 setstage abDespotMainQuest 40 else setstage abDespotMainQuest 15 endif
I want no part in this slaughter. I'm leaving now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想参与这场屠杀，我现在要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. That is your right. Just watch your back out there. You've made an enemy today.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好，这是你的权利。在外面小心点，你今天树敌了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abCrossMet to 2
It was Randy, Randy Flagg. He was a kid once, then when everything exploded he changed. He was in the toy store too, with the rest of us...
ESP.TRADUIT: 是兰迪，兰迪·弗拉格。他曾经是个孩子，当一切都爆炸时他变了。他也在玩具店，和我们其他人在一起...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [01046DF1] (mod) Quest : ([01046DE2]MHBoulderTwinsFinalContact) 01046DE2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...but he got real mean and made us stay here with him. He turned into a monster.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...但他变得非常刻薄，让我们和他一起留在这里。他变成了一个怪物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [01046DF1] (mod) Quest : ([01046DE2]MHBoulderTwinsFinalContact) 01046DE2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of the other kids used to pick on him, and make fun of him. And he would always say he would get back at them some day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他一些孩子过去总是捉弄他，取笑他。他总是说他总有一天会报复他们的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [01046DF1] (mod) Quest : ([01046DE2]MHBoulderTwinsFinalContact) 01046DE2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We didn’t know it was Randy. All we ever saw was the monster. But when I saw that you killed him, I was able to come back to say goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不知道这是兰迪，我们看到的只有怪物。但当我看到你杀了他，我才有机会回来跟他道别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [01046DF1] (mod) Quest : ([01046DE2]MHBoulderTwinsFinalContact) 01046DE2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, that looked like a little boy, not a monster!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，那看起来像个小男孩，不是怪物！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say, I can’t take this with me, so I want you to have it. It’s a picture taken a long, long time ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能带走这个，所以我想让你拿走。这是一张很久很久以前拍的照片。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [01046DF1] (mod) Quest : ([01046DE2]MHBoulderTwinsFinalContact) 01046DE2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That’s my mama, my biggest sister Linda, my next big sister Lucia, me and Lisa.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我妈妈，我的大姐琳达，我的二姐露西娅，我和丽萨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [01046DF1] (mod) Quest : ([01046DE2]MHBoulderTwinsFinalContact) 01046DE2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you see Lucia out there anywhere, can you give it to her? If you find her, please tell her what happened, and that we’re OK?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你在外面看到露西娅，能交给她吗？如果你找到她，请告诉她发生了什么，告诉她我们没事好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [01046DF1] (mod) Quest : ([01046DE2]MHBoulderTwinsFinalContact) 01046DE2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don’t know how, but I can somehow feel that she is still very sad about leaving us all alone. But it’s really OK now thanks to you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道为什么，但我能感觉到她仍然很伤心，因为她离开了我们。但现在真的没事了，多亏了你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [01046DF1] (mod) Quest : ([01046DE2]MHBoulderTwinsFinalContact) 01046DE2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lisa has already gone, and I need to go now, too. She said to tell you goodbye, so thank you again, and goodbye. We will never forget you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽萨已经走了，我现在也得走了。她让我跟你说再见，所以再次谢谢你，再见，我们永远不会忘记你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [01046DF1] (mod) Quest : ([01046DE2]MHBoulderTwinsFinalContact) 01046DE2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: StartQuest MHBoulderTwinsFinalExit SetObjectiveCompleted MHBoulderTwinsDialog 30 1 CompleteQuest MHBoulderTwinsDialog player.additem MHBoulderGradyFamilyPhoto 1 abToyStoreDoor1.unlock abToyStoreDoor2.unlock
Dont mention it. I hope you find your family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别客气。希望你能找到你的家人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah whatever, the twins can go. I'm tired of them crying all the time anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，随便了，双胞胎可以走。反正我也厌倦了她们整天哭个不停。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Randy Flagg [01048A5C] (mod) Quest : ([01048A67]MHBoulderRandyFlaggDialog) 01048A67 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you better watch your back. Now LEAVE my store and DON'T come back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你最好小心点。现在离开我的店，别再回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Randy Flagg [01048A5C] (mod) Quest : ([01048A67]MHBoulderRandyFlaggDialog) 01048A67 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: StartQuest MHBoulderRandyFlaggExitQuest
You will let let the twins go. They want to go home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要放了双胞胎，她们想回家。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shhhh Lisa, QUIET! I think they can see us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘘，丽萨，安静！我想他们能看见我们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: MHBoulderTwinLouiseREF.activate player
Well, I don’t know if it will work, but I have a plan! If we can make him mad enough he might try to beat you up. He might even try to kill you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道会不会成功，但我有个计划！如果我们能激怒他，他可能会揍你，他甚至可能会杀了你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you made it here to this toy store you must be stronger than he is. If he shows himself to you I know you can take him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你能来到这家玩具店，你肯定比他强大。如果他出现在你面前，我知道你能打败他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can I possibly do anything to help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能帮上什么忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: OK, he has his most favorite-ist toys in the whole world hidden in here, and he won’t let anybody else play with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，他把全世界最喜欢的玩具都藏在这里了，他不让别人玩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He gets really, really mad if anybody touches them, so he made them invisible so nobody else can find them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有人碰它们，他会非常非常生气，所以他把它们变成隐形的，这样就没人能找到它们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I know where they are! Aren’t I smart!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我知道在哪里！我是不是很聪明！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do I make him show himself to me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么才能让他出现在我面前？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, all you have to do is find each of them, steal them and I’ll bet he will eventually come and try to get you. I can make it so you can see them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你所要做的就是找到每一个，偷走它们，我打赌他最终会来找你。我能让你看到它们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe, if you get his attention, me and Lisa can run away into the light when he isn’t looking. Will you pretty, pretty please try to help us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许，如果你能引起他的注意，我和丽萨可以趁他不注意的时候跑到光里去。你能不能，亲爱的，能不能帮帮我们？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, you are very clever!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你很聪明！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that’s SWELL! The first toy is over behind the tricycle behind me. Pick up that one first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，太棒了！第一个玩具在我身后的三轮车后面。先拿那个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: After that, I will make the next one appear, and then the last one after that. You just have to keep looking until you find the right toys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这之后，我会让下一个出现，然后是最后一个。你只需要继续寻找，直到找到合适的玩具。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That should be enough because he’s really, really protective of his toys. But be careful, he might send his friends to get you too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这应该足够了，因为他真的，真的很爱护他的玩具。但要小心，他可能也会派他的朋友来抓你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: StartQuest MHBoulderTwinsFinalContact SetObjectiveDisplayed MHBoulderTwinsDialog 10 1
OK, I’ll try. What should I do first?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我试试看。我应该先做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't feel too good. I think I was injected with something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我感觉不太好，我觉得我被注射了什么东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what? They infected me too. You don't see me breaking a sweat!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那又怎样？他们也感染了我。你没看到我在流汗吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marie [01051D7F] (mod) Quest : ([01051D81]abMarieTalkQ) 01051D81 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I guess you do look pretty sick. Maybe I'm immune. It might explain why I'm not dead like the others. Tough luck for you though, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你看起来确实病得很重。也许我有免疫力了，这也许能解释为什么我没像其他人那样死去。不过我猜你运气不太好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marie [01051D7F] (mod) Quest : ([01051D81]abMarieTalkQ) 01051D81 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry though, I'm sure you'll be going to a better place, if you believe all that. Try to stay positive, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过别担心，我相信你会去一个更好的地方，如果你相信这一切。尽量保持乐观，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marie [01051D7F] (mod) Quest : ([01051D81]abMarieTalkQ) 01051D81 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: So how did you end up here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你是怎么到这里来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was passing through Novac when I saw a poster, like you I suspect. They messed with the wrong girl though. They messed with an explosives expert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我路过诺瓦克的时候看到了一张海报，我猜和你一样。但他们惹错人了，他们找了个炸药专家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marie [01051D7F] (mod) Quest : ([01051D81]abMarieTalkQ) 01051D81 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they ever let me out, I might do some testing of my own on this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们让我出去，我可能会对这地方进行一些我自己的测试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marie [01051D7F] (mod) Quest : ([01051D81]abMarieTalkQ) 01051D81 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that a grenade in your pants, mister scientist, or are you just happy to see me? Wait, no, it's a grenade! Ha hah! I have a dark sense of humour.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你裤子里装的是手榴弹吗，科学家先生，还是你只是很高兴见到我？等等，不，是手榴弹！哈哈！我有一种黑色幽默感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marie [01051D7F] (mod) Quest : ([01051D81]abMarieTalkQ) 01051D81 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: So.. what did you do before?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你以前是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I traveled a lot. I don't tend to stay in one place very long. I do some trade with the Crimson Caravan. My home-made explosives bring the caps in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我经常旅行，我一般不会在一个地方待太久。我和深红商队有贸易往来，我自制的炸药能带来瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marie [01051D7F] (mod) Quest : ([01051D81]abMarieTalkQ) 01051D81 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any idea what's really going on here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这到底是怎么回事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, a few days ago I saw some unusual military types, and some old guy with a red baseball cap. I heard them mention Colorado.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，几天前我看到一些不寻常的军人，还有一个戴着红色棒球帽的老人。我听到他们提到了科罗拉多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marie [01051D7F] (mod) Quest : ([01051D81]abMarieTalkQ) 01051D81 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're a long way from home, if that's where they're from. I can't say I have any idea what's going on here. I'm so gonna blow this place up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们离家很远，如果那是他们的家乡的话，我不知道这是怎么回事。我一定要把这地方炸了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marie [01051D7F] (mod) Quest : ([01051D81]abMarieTalkQ) 01051D81 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough talking for now, I'm feeling a bit sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在说得够多了，我有点不舒服。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh oh, I think your number is up, buddy. One of those labcoats is coming over. Good luck in there. I'll light a fuse in your memory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哦，我觉得你的命到头了，伙计，一个穿实验服的人要过来了。祝你好运，我会点燃你记忆中的导火索。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marie [01051D7F] (mod) Quest : ([01051D81]abMarieTalkQ) 01051D81 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 0 0 1 abFablerREF.disable set abFablerVariablesQ.MarieConvoDone to 1 set abFablerVariablesQ.FablerPart2 to 1 abFabler2REF.enable
What are you talking about? A cure for what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在说什么？治什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Seltsam Syndrome is a deadly disease, that's claimed hundreds of lives over the years, particularly in Colorado.
ESP.TRADUIT: 泽尔特扎姆综合征是一种致命的疾病，多年来已经夺走了数百人的生命，尤其是在科罗拉多州。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Fabler [010377B0] (mod) Quest : ([01050EEF]abFablerTalkQ) 01050EEF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's now believed to be contained in one particular facility, the Boulder Dome, thanks to the barbarious NCR, who've been executing any carriers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据信它现在被藏在博尔德巨蛋的一个特殊设施里，多亏了野蛮的NCR，他们处决了所有的携带者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Fabler [010377B0] (mod) Quest : ([01050EEF]abFablerTalkQ) 01050EEF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is the Boulder Dome?
ESP.TRADUIT: 博尔德巨蛋是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I couldn't say for certain. There are rumours it was built before the Great War, to be a supreme fallout shelter, a "city of the future."
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，我不能肯定。有传言说它是在大战前建造的，是一个最高级辐射避难所，一座“未来之城”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Fabler [010377B0] (mod) Quest : ([01050EEF]abFablerTalkQ) 01050EEF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say only the elite of society went there. Sort of like an ark, to withstand the nuclear attacks, but I don't really know if that's true.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说只有社会精英才能去那里。有点像方舟，用来抵御核攻击，但我不知道这是不是真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Fabler [010377B0] (mod) Quest : ([01050EEF]abFablerTalkQ) 01050EEF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have nothing more to say to you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对你没什么好说的了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay then. Hold still for just a moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。别动，就一会儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Fabler [010377B0] (mod) Quest : ([01050EEF]abFablerTalkQ) 01050EEF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL:
disableplayercontrols 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 imod gastrapisfx imod fadetoblackpermanent
player.moveto abInsideTruckMarker set gamehour to 11 startquest abBinkQuest
Okay, calm down ace. Lead the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，冷静点，王牌。带路吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay then! I'm taking you to see Captain Despot. He's the finest man I've ever served, so you better speak to him with respect, vagrant! Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧！我要带你去见德斯波特上校。他是我侍奉过的最好的人，所以你最好尊重他，流浪汉！我们走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Cross [01048423] (mod) Quest : ([0105238A]abCrossTalkQ) 0105238A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abCrossMet to 4
You talk the talk, but do you walk the walk?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得天花乱坠，但你做到了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell is that supposed to mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这话到底是什么意思？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Cross [01048423] (mod) Quest : ([0105238A]abCrossTalkQ) 0105238A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It means you're a fucking dead man!
ESP.TRADUIT: 意思是你他妈的死定了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna rip your face off and fry it for lunch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把你的脸撕下来炸了当午餐！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Cross [01048423] (mod) Quest : ([0105238A]abCrossTalkQ) 0105238A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player setenemy abncrfaction playerfaction setenemy playerfaction abncrfaction
Don't you think the public should know the truth?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不认为公众应该知道真相吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No I don't. They would shut us down, and then they would all die. No one likes the job we have to do, but if we don't do it, then we're all dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不认为。他们会让我们关门，然后他们都会死。没人喜欢我们必须做的工作，但如果我们不做，我们都会死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Cross [01048423] (mod) Quest : ([0105238A]abCrossTalkQ) 0105238A (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the Seltsam Syndrome is allowed to spread, it'll only be a matter of time. We don't have any choice in what we do. Sure, we're a death squad..
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果泽尔特扎姆综合症继续蔓延，那只是时间问题，我们没有选择的余地。当然，我们是暗杀小队...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Cross [01048423] (mod) Quest : ([0105238A]abCrossTalkQ) 0105238A (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: .. and I really feel for the infected, but those people are gone anyway. What we're doing is for the greater good. Don't forget that!
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我真的很同情那些被感染的人，但那些人反正已经死了。我们所做的是为了更多人的利益，别忘了这一点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Cross [01048423] (mod) Quest : ([0105238A]abCrossTalkQ) 0105238A (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You forget that and you're gonna hesitate. You hesitate and you're dead. Or worse, we're all dead. You understand me? Just don't forget it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你忘了这一点，你就会犹豫，你一犹豫，你就死定了，或者更糟，我们都死定了。你明白吗？千万别忘了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Cross [01048423] (mod) Quest : ([0105238A]abCrossTalkQ) 0105238A (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abCrossMet to 2 evp
You're right. Sometimes it's not as black and white as people think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对，有时候事情并不像人们想的那样非黑即白。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said it. Right and wrong is more complicated than they like to admit. Like the Captain always says, the many are more important than the few.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对，对与错比他们愿意承认的更复杂。就像上校常说的，多数比少数更重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Cross [01048423] (mod) Quest : ([0105238A]abCrossTalkQ) 0105238A (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What we're doing is best for everyone. Sure, some innocent people have to die, and that is a tragedy, but I'd prefer that to everyone dieing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们这么做对大家都好。当然，一些无辜的人不得不死去，这是一个悲剧，但我宁愿那样，也不愿所有人都死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Cross [01048423] (mod) Quest : ([0105238A]abCrossTalkQ) 0105238A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you've got some work to do, I understand. I suggest you get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你有工作要做，我理解。我建议你现在就去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Cross [01048423] (mod) Quest : ([0105238A]abCrossTalkQ) 0105238A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abCrossMet to 2 evp
But if they can see us, that must mean they’re special, right? Maybe they can help!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果他们能看到我们，那就说明他们很特别，对吧？也许他们能帮上忙！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I don’t care. What’s the worst he can do, kill us? We’re already dead, remember? But what if they can help us? I’ve got to try!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我不在乎。他还能做什么，杀了我们吗？我们已经死了，记得吗？但如果他们能帮我们呢？我一定要试试！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louise [0103A49B] (mod) Quest : ([0103A49D]MHBoulderTwinsDialog) Little Toy Store of Horrors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage MHBoulderTwinsDialog 20 MHBoulderTwinLouiseREF.AddScriptPackage MHBoulderLouiseForcedGreet01
I don't have enough caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有足够的瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh no you didn't! You've asked for this! See how many caps you'll find, when you're blind!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，不，你没有！这是你自找的！看你瞎了以后能找到多少瓶盖！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [010620DD] (mod) Quest : ([010620E2]abChesterVoiceQ) 010620E2 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player setenemy playerfaction abMetalheadPassive
That seems fair enough. Here's one hundred caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这似乎很公平。这是一百瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No no no, that's not enough. Better make it two hundred.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不不不，这还不够。最好是两百。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [010620DD] (mod) Quest : ([010620E2]abChesterVoiceQ) 010620E2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 100 abChesterREF.additem caps001 100
Okay, two hundred it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，两百。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did I say two hundred? I meant five hundred!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说的是两百？我说的是五百！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [010620DD] (mod) Quest : ([010620E2]abChesterVoiceQ) 010620E2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 100 abChesterREF.additem caps001 100
Not a chance!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没可能！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then it's a battle you're after! You'll pay your fees in pain, from the end of my blade. Show me some flesh, so I can cut it open! Hahah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那这就是你所追求的战斗！你将用痛苦来支付你的费用，从我的刀尖开始。给我点肉，我好把它切开！哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [010620DD] (mod) Quest : ([010620E2]abChesterVoiceQ) 010620E2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player setenemy playerfaction abMetalheadPassive
Uh.. Okay then, five hundred sounds like a fair price.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧，五百听起来是个合理的价格。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How many caps do you have on you? Just gimme all your fucking caps!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你身上有多少瓶盖？把你的瓶盖都给我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [010620DD] (mod) Quest : ([010620E2]abChesterVoiceQ) 010620E2 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 300 abChesterREF.additem caps001 300
Okay, that's fair. Take everything I have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这很公平。拿走我的一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hahah! Have a good day sir! Enjoy your city of the fucking future! Hahah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈哈！祝您有愉快的一天，先生！好好享受你的未来之城吧！哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [010620DD] (mod) Quest : ([010620E2]abChesterVoiceQ) 010620E2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL:
short abChesterCaps
set abChesterCaps to player.getitemcount caps001 player.removeitem caps001 abChesterCaps
abChesterREF.additem caps001 abChesterCaps
I need you out of the Dome. Would you take a thousand caps to leave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你离开巨蛋，你愿意带着一千瓶盖离开吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make it two thousand and you'll never see me again, scout's honor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我两千，你就再也见不到我了，以荣誉担保。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [010620DD] (mod) Quest : ([010620E2]abChesterVoiceQ) 010620E2 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, here's two thousand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，给你两千。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you very much. Hahah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常感谢。哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [010620DD] (mod) Quest : ([010620E2]abChesterVoiceQ) 010620E2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 2000 abChesterREF.additem caps001 2000
No, I said one thousand, now take it and go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我说的是一千，拿着走吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You better give me all your caps now, or I'll rip you apart!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好把瓶盖都给我，不然我就把你撕成碎片！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [010620DD] (mod) Quest : ([010620E2]abChesterVoiceQ) 010620E2 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now get out of the Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在滚出巨蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't think so. Hahah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不这么认为。哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [010620DD] (mod) Quest : ([010620E2]abChesterVoiceQ) 010620E2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've come to extend an offer from the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来提供NCR的提议的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not interested in anything that Captain has to say. He's made it his sole mission to kill any carriers of the Seltsam Syndrome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对上校说的任何话都不感兴趣，他的唯一任务就是杀死所有的泽尔特扎姆综合症携带者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't plan on dieing today. Tell that ignorant bastard I'll kill him myself, if he shows his ugly face around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不打算今天就死。告诉那个无知的混蛋，如果他的丑脸再出现在这里，我就亲手杀了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL:
abHaroldRoomDoorREF.lock 255 abHaroldREF.disable set abGuileTalkQ.abNCRchosen to 1 abZAXdoorREF.lock 255 setstage abGuileMainQuest 95 setenemy abBOSfaction playerfaction
if getstage abBurntRubber < 100 setstage abBurntRubber 90 endif
if getstage abBurntRubber == 100 abGuileREF.addnote abCureFormula endif
I've come to extend an offer from the Brotherhood Of Steel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来提供钢铁兄弟会的提议的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Over the years, many have claimed to have a cure. I won't be fooled again. What proof do you have?
ESP.TRADUIT: 多年来，许多人都声称有治愈方法，我不会再上当了。你有什么证据？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: abDespotREF.disable setstage abDespotMainQuest 95
We could've done this the easy way, but now you have to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们本可以用简单的方法解决，但现在你得死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We didn't survive this long, to be stopped by the likes of you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没能活这么久，就是被你们这样的人阻止了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy abdomescientists playerfaction startcombat player setstage abDespotMainQuest 50
Nevermind then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就别管了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abDscientistsHateme to 1 setstage abDespotMainQuest 50
I am the proof. I had the virus and now I'm cured.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是证据。我感染了病毒，现在我痊愈了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me take a blood sample. If I can confirm what you're saying is true, you've got yourself a deal. Hold still.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我取个血样，如果我能证实你说的是真的，那就成交了。别动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'll be damned. Your blood contains dormant traces of the virus. It seems very likely that you're telling the truth. I'll agree to your terms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我真见鬼了。你的血液里有休眠的病毒，看来你说的很有可能是实话。我同意你的条件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: On two conditions though. We've got a couple serious problems here, at the Dome. Help us out, and you can tell the Brotherhood it's a done deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过有两个条件。我们在巨蛋这里遇到了几个严重的问题，帮我们一把，你就可以告诉兄弟会这事已经定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the first problem?
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一个问题是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Zax supercomputer, that runs the entire facility, is close to breaking down. If he shuts down, we've got some serious problems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 运行整个设施的ZAX超级计算机已经接近故障，如果它停了，我们就有大麻烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no manual controls for the exterior doors to this place. Without the Zax, those doors will stay locked forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方的外部门没有手动控制。没有ZAX，那些门会永远锁着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meaning you will never leave, and the Brotherhood will never enter. Go talk to the Zax. He can tell you himself what he needs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也就是说你永远无法离开，兄弟会也永远无法进入。去找ZAX谈谈，它可以自己告诉你它需要什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage abGuileMainQuest 50
What's the second problem?
ESP.TRADUIT: 第二个问题是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you might've noticed some rough-looking bastards wandering around the city district. Not exactly the "elite of society" you expected in here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能注意到了一些长相粗鲁的混蛋在市区游荡。这可不是你想象中的“社会精英”！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They tried posing as scientists to get into the Dome, but I wasn't falling for that. I don't know how they got inside. Call it a malfunction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们试图假扮科学家进入巨蛋，但我不上当。我不知道他们是怎么进来的，就当是故障吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once inside, they took control of the city district by force. Luckily, myself and some of the other scientists locked ourselves in this control room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一进来，他们就用武力控制了市区。幸运的是，我和其他一些科学家把自己锁在了控制室里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not all of us made it here alive, I'm afraid. Doctor Shirker managed to escape out into Boulder, is that how you got in here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕不是所有人都能活着回来。舍克博士设法逃到了博尔德，你就是这样进来的吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must've used her access codes to enter this control room. Is she still alive?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定是用她的密码进入这个控制室的，她还活着吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage abGuileMainQuest 40
I'm afraid she didn't make it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕她没能挺过来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a terrible shame. She was a good woman and a close friend of mine. At least I finally know what happened to her. Thank you for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那真是太遗憾了，她是个好女人，也是我的好朋友。至少我终于知道她发生了什么，谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back to the raiders, I need you to stop them, by whatever means necessary. Check the logs on my computer. The information might prove useful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说回掠夺者，我需要你阻止他们，不择手段。看看我电脑上的日志，这些信息可能会有用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides the city district, those freaks are nesting in engineering as well. So you'll have to get past them there, in order to reach the Zax.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了市区，那些怪胎也在工程部门安家。所以你得越过他们，才能到达ZAX那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll have to speak to Harold Johnson, our head scientist, as he's the only one who's had access to the Zax. You'll need his access codes to enter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得和我们的首席科学家哈罗德·约翰逊谈谈，因为他是唯一能接触到ZAX的人。你需要他的访问密码才能进入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck. We're all counting on you now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运。我们现在全靠你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did the raiders get inside the Dome?
ESP.TRADUIT: 掠夺者是怎么进入巨蛋的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was the strangest thing. It appeared the Zax itself issued the command to let them in. I don't know what could've caused that. A malfunction?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是最奇怪的事，似乎是ZAX自己发出了让他们进去的命令。我不知道是什么导致的，故障？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you know about the Zax?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对Zax了解多少？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personally, I wouldn't trust the Dome in the hands of a computer. You're better off asking Harold about the Zax. He probably built the damn thing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就我个人而言，我不会相信巨蛋在电脑手中。你最好问问哈罗德关于ZAX的事，这该死的东西可能是他造的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage abGuileMainQuest 31
I'll get moving then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Check my computer logs, if you need more information. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要更多信息，请查看我的电脑日志。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 暂时再见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll get back to work then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就回去工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've neutralized the raider threat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我解决了掠夺者的威胁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's fantastic news. I don't know how you did it, but we truly are in your debt! I don't know what we'd have done, if you hadn't come along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真是个好消息。我不知道你是怎么做到的，但我们真的欠你一个人情！如果你没来，我真不知道我们会怎样。
