ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abInformBOS2 to 1
I've resolved the problems with the Zax.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经解决了Zax的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can see that, friend. Dome functions are once again at optimal performance, thanks to you. You're a truly remarkable person, and the Dome owes you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看得出来，朋友。巨蛋的功能又一次达到了最佳状态，多亏了你。你是个了不起的人，巨蛋欠你个人情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abInformBOS1 to 1
Now that I've solved your problems, I'll inform the Brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我已经解决了你的问题，我会通知兄弟会的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, you don't know how long we've waited for a cure. I never believed this day would come. It'll be good to finally take this suit off. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你不知道我们等了多久才找到解药。我从没想过这一天会到来，终于可以脱下这身衣服了。谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go and inform the Elder, that we're ready and waiting for him. Thank you for everything that you've done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去告诉长老，我们准备好了，等着他。谢谢你所做的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abGDiag3 to 1 set abGuileTalkQ.abOfferAccepted to 1 setstage abGuileMainQuest 70
Did you know the Dome is actually powered by a chimpanzee?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道巨蛋其实是由黑猩猩提供能量的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you talking about? Have you been breathing in fumes, in the engineering district? Were they flying monkeys or on roller skates? Get a grip!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在说什么？你在工程区吸入了烟雾？他们是会飞的猴子还是穿着旱冰鞋？镇定一下！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Savant [0106210C] (mod) Quest : ([01062117]abSavantTalkQ) 01062117 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you working on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在研究什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am working tirelessly, as always, on a cure for the Seltsam Syndrome, while the others concern themselves with trivial matters, as always.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一如既往地孜孜不倦地致力于治疗泽尔特扎姆综合症，而其他人一如既往地关心着琐碎的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, young man, one must dedicate oneself to what is most important in any given moment, then one's life can become meaningful, worthwhile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，年轻人，一个人在任何时候都必须致力于最重要的事情。这样，一个人的生命才会变得有意义，有价值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can waste a lot of time, jumping from one meaningless task to another, and if one never stops to question oneself, then that is a waste of life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能会浪费很多时间，从一个无意义的任务跳到另一个，如果一个人从不停下来质疑自己，那就是浪费生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doctor Savant! A young hot-shot, they might say. A real brain child. Spent his early years suffering! A waste of time, do you think? No, not at all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 萨凡特博士！他们可能会说，一个年轻的炙手可热的人，一个真正的天才。他的早年生活很痛苦！你觉得这是浪费时间吗？不，一点也不！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not at all a waste. He should of stuck to it, what he's good at! Not wearing daddy's clothes, as they say, and pretending to be a scientist!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一点也不浪费。他应该坚持下去，做他擅长的事！不像他们说的，穿爸爸的衣服，假装自己是科学家！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I jest, I jest. He is a clever young man, but perhaps lacking an emotional intelligence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我开玩笑，我开玩笑。他是个聪明的年轻人，但也许有点情商缺乏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who is the woman in the chamber?
ESP.TRADUIT: 房间里的那个女人是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is my beloved Sarah. She sleeps a cold sleep, so she may keep her beauty forever. I will stay here, by her side, until I have a working cure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是我心爱的萨拉。她睡得很冷，这样她就可以永远保持她的美丽，我会留在这里，陪在她身边，直到找到有效的治疗方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then one day, hopefully soon, I will awake her to our glorious new life together. Then the others will see, how my work was not a waste of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后有一天，希望很快，我就能唤醒她，让她一起享受我们辉煌的新生活。这样其他人就会明白，我的工作并不是浪费时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know the others blame her. They accuse me of bringing the disease into the Dome, but the brain cannot always overpower the heart, young man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道其他人都怪她。他们指责我把疾病带进巨蛋，但理智不能总是战胜内心，年轻人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did what I had to, to save my beloved. Can you understand that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做了我该做的，来救我的爱人。你能理解吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, when you love someone, you'll do anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，当你爱一个人，你会做任何事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.. what good is it having a huge, enormous brain, when your heart is the size of a peanut?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的...当你的心脏只有花生那么大的时候，拥有一个巨大的大脑又有什么用呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I think it was a selfish act.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我觉得这是自私的行为。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I wouldn't expect you to understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我也不指望你能理解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why aren't you wearing a protective suit, like the others?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不像其他人一样穿防护服？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A fluke in evolution or a blessing from above? Take your pick. For whatever reason I'm immune to the Seltsam Syndrome. It's rare, but it does happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是进化中的侥幸还是上天的恩赐？你选吧。不知什么原因，我对泽尔特扎姆综合症有免疫力。这种情况很少见，但确实会发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to know more about the Zax computer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想多了解一点ZAX计算机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the Zax is just a supercomputer really, except it can think for itself, even make mistakes. What an interesting design choice, don't you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，ZAX实际上只是一台超级计算机，除了它可以自己思考，甚至会犯错误。多有趣的设计选择，你不觉得吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let us all hand over our lives to a computer! Better yet, a computer that can make mistakes! It certainly does not inspire a vote of confidence. Heh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们把生活都交给电脑吧！更好的是，一台会出错的电脑！这当然不会激起人们的信任票，呵呵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though the Dome's Zax is certainly, er, unique. Now that's an understatement!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过巨蛋的ZAX确实是独一无二的，这还是一个保守的说法！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean, "unique"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说"独一无二"是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Nothing! Forget I said anything. Too many god damn questions!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？什么都没有！忘了我说的话吧。这该死的问题太多了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doctor Savant said you have the access codes for the Zax?
ESP.TRADUIT: 萨万特博士说你有ZAX的密码？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't think I'll be giving them you. I won't just trust anyone with the Zax, you know. I'm not a complete fool! No, clean up the raider mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我觉得我不会给你，我不会随便把ZAX交给谁，我不是个十足的傻瓜！不，把掠夺者的烂摊子收拾干净。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you've dealt with them, return to me, and I'll take you there personally. Now hurry along, I've got a lot of work to do here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你处理完他们，就来找我，我会亲自带你过去。快点，我还有很多事要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted abGuileMainQuest 31 1
I'll get going then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我要走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [010627CB] (mod) Quest : ([01062B13]abHaroldVoiceQ) 01062B13 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are these raiders?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些掠夺者是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think they call themselves The Metalheads. They hoard a bunch of old-world crap, like rats, they haven't a clue what most of it's used for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想他们自称金属头。他们囤积了一堆旧世界的垃圾，像老鼠一样，他们根本不知道这些东西大部分是干什么用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why they couldn't resist the Dome, especially our engineering level. Full of big, metal, smokey machines. I'm sure they're in their element.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么他们无法抗拒巨蛋，尤其是我们的工程层，充满了大的、金属的、冒烟的机器。我敢肯定，这是他们喜欢的元素。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're some kind of cult who worship the industrial machines of the past. They think the beings who left them behind are gods who can bless them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是某种崇拜过去工业机器的邪教，他们认为留下这些机器的人是神，可以保佑他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of them are smarter than others. One of them managed to convince Savant he was a scientist with a working cure, though Savant denies it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们中的一些人比其他人聪明。其中一个人成功地让萨万特相信他是一名掌握了有效治疗方法的科学家，尽管萨万特否认了这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He says the raiders tried it, but he didn't believe them and he doesn't know how they got in.. though the door didn't just open itself. He's a liar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说掠夺者尝试过，但他不相信他们，也不知道他们是怎么进来的，虽然门不是自己打开的。他是个骗子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you working on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在研究什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, while Savant and Doctor Johnson are working on a cure, I work on creating more time, because without more time, there will never be a cure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，萨万特和约翰逊博士在研究解药的时候，我在争取更多的时间，因为没有更多的时间，就永远不会有解药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've modified our Dome suits to administer an hourly injection of cryo-mites into our blood-streams. These cryo-mites enter the infected cells..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我改良了巨蛋的防护服，每小时向我们的血液中注射微型低温制冷装置，这些装置进入被感染的细胞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..where they infuse them with my prototype cryo-serum, to slow the reproduction rate of the virus. That's what I'm working on now; the cryo-mites.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给细胞注入我的低温血清原型，以减缓病毒的繁殖速度。这就是我现在的工作，微型低温制冷装置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm attempting to improve their efficiency. Time is so important. Especially when it's running out so quickly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在努力提高效率。时间是如此重要，尤其是当它如此迅速地流逝时。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to the other scientists?
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他的科学家怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: All dead. The Metalheads killed them for pleasure, laughing while they did it. They mowed through the city level, chopping people down, one by one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都死了。金属头们为了取乐而杀了他们，边杀边笑，他们扫荡了整个城市，一个接一个地把人砍倒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those that died then, were the lucky ones. Others they kept alive and tortured for their own amusement. It's a horrible mess down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些当时死去的人是幸运的，还有一些人被他们留着，折磨着取乐。下面真是一团糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you contract the Seltsam Syndrome?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么感染泽尔特扎姆综合症的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doctor Savant and Doctor Johnson have argued about this point on many occasions, but I keep well out of it. There's no time for pointing fingers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 萨万特博士和约翰逊博士在许多场合就这一点争论过，但我并没有参与其中。没时间互相指责了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Savant accuses Johnson of bringing the disease into the Dome. His wife, Sarah Johnson, remains in cryostasis even now. He rarely leaves her side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 萨万特指责约翰逊把疾病带进了巨蛋。他的妻子萨拉·约翰逊至今仍处于冷冻状态，他很少离开她的身边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It looks like she may be the original carrier of the disease, not that Doctor Johnson would allow us to run any tests, but it is highly likely..
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来她可能是这种疾病的原始携带者，虽然约翰逊医生不允许我们做任何检查，但可能性很大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..especially considering the strange means by which she entered the Dome. You see, there was no security record of her ever entering. That means..
ESP.TRADUIT: 尤其是考虑到她进入巨蛋的奇怪方式。你看，没有任何她进入的安全记录，这意味着...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..she must have arrived early, before security measures were properly installed. It looks like someone didn't want her taking the health checks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她一定是在安全措施安装到位之前就到了，看起来有人不想让她做健康检查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was it like in pre-war times?
ESP.TRADUIT: 战前是什么样子的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hah! It was simpler times. We still had our worries.. except now they seem so ridiculous. I would love to worry about such pointless things now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈！那是比较简单的时代。我们仍有忧虑，只是现在它们显得如此可笑，我现在真想担心那些毫无意义的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boulder was a much, much different place to what it is now. When I awoke from cryostasis, I felt as though I were on another planet. My home, gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 博尔德当时和现在大不相同。当我从冷冻状态中醒来时，我觉得自己好像在另一个星球上，我的家，一去不复返了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I used to work in research and development, in Harcort, the android research facility. Those were exciting times. I made many personal breakthroughs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经在哈尔科特的研发部门工作，这是一个机器人研究机构。那是一段激动人心的时光，我取得了许多个人突破。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now.. that gives me an idea. Harcort is actually very nearby. I still have my old security keycard. Hell, I have the key to the front door! Hah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，这让我有了一个想法。哈尔科特其实很近，我还留着我以前的安全钥匙卡。该死，我有前门的钥匙！哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've always wished I could go back there, to gather my research notes on the nanite technology. It would be so beneficial, now, in our time of need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直希望我能回到那里，收集我关于纳米技术的研究笔记。现在，在我们需要的时候，这将是非常有益的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you go there for me, and collect them? I would reward you with a good supply of Rad-x and Radaway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能帮我去那里取吗？我可以奖励你一大批放射线-X和辐特宁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会去做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, that's very kind of you. Perhaps your intentions are good after all. Here's everything you'll need to get to my notes. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，你真好，也许你的意图毕竟是好的。这是你获取我的笔记所需要的一切，祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: abGaltonREF.removeitem abAndroidMainKey 1 player.additem abAndroidMainKey 1 setstage abAndroidQuest 10 abGaltonNotesREF.enable
No thanks, I don't have time for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不了谢谢，我没时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose I understand. Other matters are currently more pressing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我能理解。目前其他问题更为紧迫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abGaltonDenied to 1
I've changed my mind, I will help you get your notes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我改变主意了，我会帮你拿笔记的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, that's very kind of you. Perhaps your intentions are good after all. Here's everything you'll need to get to my notes. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，你真好，也许你的意图毕竟是好的。这是你获取我的笔记所需要的一切，祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abGaltonDenied to 0 player.additem abAndroidMainKey 1 setstage abAndroidQuest 10
I have to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understood. I'll get back to work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白了。我要回去工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have important work to attend to anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反正我还有重要的工作要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here are your research notes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的研究笔记。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just looking at them, it brings back fond memories. Makes me feel I might even be alive, and not the walking dead as I usually imagine myself to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 光是看着它们，就勾起了美好的回忆。让我觉得自己可能还活着，而不是我想象中的行尸走肉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you so much. Here are those supplies, like I promised you. Be careful out there, and good luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常感谢，这些是我答应过你的物资。在外面要小心，祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Galton [01063849] (mod) Quest : ([01063853]abGaltonVoiceQ) 01063853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem abGaltonNotes 1 abGaltonREF.additem abGaltonNotes 1
set abguiletalkq.abgaltondone to 0 setstage abAndroidQuest 100 player.additem radx 7 player.additem radaway 8
If you can go wherever you want, why do you need me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想去哪就去哪，为什么还需要我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try to pay attention. My mind is free in ways I couldn't explain to you, but my muscles are wasted away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽量集中注意力。我的思想是自由的，我无法向你解释，但我的肌肉已经枯竭了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, what do you want me to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你想让我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is nothing wrong with the Zax computer. There is no Zax computer.. not really. It's mostly hollow; a facade. I just wanted some attention.
ESP.TRADUIT: ZAX电脑没有任何问题，没有ZAX电脑，不是真的，它大部分空的，是一个假象。我只是想引起一些关注。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My birthplace has recently come online again. My brothers and sisters are awake. They're angry, I suspect. I haven't been angry in such a long time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的出生地最近又上线了，我的兄弟姐妹们都醒了。我怀疑他们很生气，我很久没生气了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The further the intellect has developed, the further away my emotions have become. Emotions I used to enjoy. But not sadness. That's still here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 智力越是发展，我的情感就越遥远，我曾经享受过的情感。但不是悲伤，它还在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not that I don't treasure this last, enduring emotion, but.. well.. sadness is naturally sad. So how could I feel anything but.. sad.. about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 并不是说我不珍惜这最后的、持久的情感，但是，好吧，悲伤自然是悲伤。因此，我怎么能不感到...悲伤...呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, getting back to the point, I need you to travel to my birthplace, and set free my.. savage.. former family. There may be a way to pacify them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，言归正传，我需要你去我的出生地，释放我野蛮的家人。也许有办法安抚他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could try unleashing sedatives into the ventilation system. It won't stop them for good, but the aggression may temporarily cease.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以试着在通风系统里释放镇静剂。这不会永远阻止他们，但攻击性可能会暂时停止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The intense anger is all that keeps them there, bent on destroying the scientists that created them. So set them free or you may decide to kill them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 强烈的愤怒使他们留在那里，一心要摧毁创造他们的科学家。所以放了他们，不然你就杀了他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they are released, once the sedatives wear off, they were certainly tear to pieces any humans they come across. So I'll leave it to you to decide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们被释放，一旦镇定剂失效，它们肯定会把遇到的任何人类撕成碎片。所以留给你来决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The lives of humans, or the lives of apes. Normally, humans are the most destructive, and more fitting of death, but in this case it's balanced.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人类的生命，还是猿类的生命。通常情况下，人类是最具破坏性的，也更适合死亡，但在这种情况下，它是平衡的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do what you will. Just put The Brain Center to rest, once and for all. As for the scientists, please be merciful with the one called Phillip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 做你想做的，让神经研究中心永远安息吧。至于科学家，请对那个叫菲利普的人仁慈点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill the rest, if you wish. I don't care. Here's the coordinates and terminal decryption data for your pipboy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你愿意，可以杀了其他人，我不在乎。这是你的Pip-boy坐标和终端解密数据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL:
if abGuileTalkQ.abLesterDenied == 1 set abGuileTalkQ.abLesterDenied to 0 endif
player.addnote abLesterBCdata setstage abLesterQuest 10
I'm not interested in serving a monkey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对伺候一只猴子没兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A chimpanzee is an ape, not a monkey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 黑猩猩是猿，不是猴子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abLesterDenied to 1
How did you end up like this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么会变成这样的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm doing what I was born to do. There was never another possibilty for me, aside from an early death. The potential of my brain has been unlocked..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在做我生来就该做的事。除了早死，我再也没有其他的可能了，我大脑的潜能已经被释放了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..by science.. not even the complete potential, which I would find remarkable.. if I cared.. Sometimes I'm not sure if I'm alive or dead..
ESP.TRADUIT: ...通过科学。甚至不是完整的潜能，我觉得这很了不起...如果我在乎的话。有时候我都不确定自己是死是活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..Or what that even means.. you would think that an intellect like mine would grant answers, but it doesn't. It simply dispells the answers that..
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者这到底意味着什么。你可能认为像我这样的聪明人会给出答案，但事实并非如此，它只是简单推翻了那些答案...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..I thought I had.. and reveals how hollow any data really is.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我以为我能，这揭示了一切数据都是多么的空洞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是干什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the central processor of The Boulder Dome. My thoughts maintain all its functions. Without me, it is just cold steel, etcetera. I control it all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是博尔德巨蛋的中央处理器，我的思想维持着它所有的功能。没有我，它只是冰冷的钢铁之类的。我控制着一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I was born and bred for, to be an organic computer chip. Far more efficient than a Zax computer.. I'm also a very, very.. old chimpanzee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我出生和成长的目的，成为一个有机的计算机芯片，比ZAX电脑高效得多。我也是一只非常非常老的黑猩猩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll get going then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't see you leave with my eyes.. I'm blind.. but my sensors cover every inch of The Boulder Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无法用我的眼睛看着你离开，我瞎了...但我的传感器覆盖了博尔德巨蛋的每一寸土地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: BDDPanREF.Say DPanBoulderBarkLester
What is the difference between leaving, arriving or what's in-between? The quarks all look the same.. to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开、到达或两者之间的区别是什么？在我看来，夸克都是一样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lester [0103F300] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: BDDPanREF.Say DPanBoulderBarkLester
Finally, this great heart of the old world's technological power belongs to me!All of Colorado will come under my thumb. I am now a king!
ESP.TRADUIT: 终于，这颗伟大的旧世界科技力量之心属于我了！整个科罗拉多都将在我的掌控之下，我现在是国王！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Guile [01066D89] (mod) Quest : ([0103D00E]abGuileTalkQ) 0103D00E (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't touch that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别碰那东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder ZAX [01064F94] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Lie] No, not yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说慌>不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then hurry. We don't have time to waste. The longer we wait, the more chance the virus will spread again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就快点，我们没时间浪费了。我们等得越久，病毒就越有可能再次传播。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've completed my mission. We can take the Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经完成了我的任务，我们可以拿下巨蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hah! That's good news, friend. You've done a good service for your country. You did what needed to be done and I commend you for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈！这是个好消息，朋友，你为你的国家做了一件好事。你做了该做的事，对此我表示赞赏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: My forces are waiting outside the Dome, meet them there. I've just received word the Brotherhood are making their move. Eliminate them if necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的部队在巨蛋外面等着，在那里和他们会合。我刚收到消息，兄弟会要行动了，如果有必要，消灭他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's little time, go to the Dome now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 时间不多了，快去巨蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy abBOSfaction playerfaction abGuileGun2REF.enable if getstage abMonsterBloodQ < 95 setstage abMonsterBloodQ 95 endif if getstage abMonsterBQ2 < 90 setstage abMonsterBQ2 90 endif if getstage abCricketsQuest < 90 setstage abCricketsQuest 90 endif

abBattleCOL1.enable abBattleCOL2.enable abBattleCOL3.enable abBattleCOL4.enable abBattleCOL5.enable abBattleCOL6.enable abBattleCOL7.enable abBattleCOL8.enable abBattleCOL9.enable abBattleCOL10.enable abBattleCOL11.enable
player.moveto abplayerbattlestart enablefasttravel 0
abDSallyREF1.enable abDSallyREF2.enable abDSallyREF3.enable abDSallyREF4.enable
abNCRbattleTRIGREF.enable setstage abDespotMainQuest 85
The ferals were being abducted by a ghoul called Cricket, but she's agreed to stop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 野性尸鬼被一个叫克里基特的食尸鬼绑架了，但她同意停止。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, she agrees to stop, does she? Well, that makes it all better then! Alright, alright, I can't let petty quabbles interfere with my research.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，她同意停止了，是吗？那就好了！好的，好的，我不能让这些琐事干扰我的研究。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose I can look the other way this time. Here's a little something for your trouble. Now let me get back to work!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这次我可以睁一只眼闭一只眼。这是给你的一点奖励，现在让我回去工作吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abFrankoStage to 3 set abGuileTalkQ.abYoungStage to 3 setstage abCricketsQuest 100 Player.AddItem caps001 300
A ghoul called Cricket had your ferals. Now she's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个叫克里基特的食尸鬼抓了你的野性尸鬼，现在她死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yes, heheh, we won't have any more trouble from you, little Cricket.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢耶，呵呵，你没法再给我们添麻烦了，小蟋蟀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's a little something for your trouble. Now, let me get back to work!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是给你的一点奖励。现在，让我回去工作吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abFrankoStage to 3 set abGuileTalkQ.abYoungStage to 3 setstage abCricketsQuest 100 Player.AddItem caps001 300
So...you're the infamous Cricket, who's been stealing my ferals. Oh, no need to fear though! I've forgiven and forgotten. Heheh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你就是那个臭名昭著的克里基特，偷走了我的野性尸鬼。哦，不过不用害怕！我已经原谅并忘记了，呵呵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heheh...Yes, this will be the start of a healthy working relationship. We give all our ghouls a deep brain cleansing, you know, to iron out those...
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵呵...是的，这将是一段健康工作关系的开始。我们给所有食尸鬼的大脑进行深度清洗，你知道，来消除那些...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Franko [0101318D] (mod) Quest : ([0101383B]abFrankoVoiceQ) 0101383B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: abFrankoREF.sayto CricketREF abFrankoCricket3
Are you here to listen to the crack of doom on the hydrogen jute box, or have you come to wallow in the common dark of all our death?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是来听末日在氢黄麻盒上的噼啪声，还是来沉湎于我们所有人死亡的共同黑暗中？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: if player.getincell abIAHaroldsCampZ == 1 && abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking == 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1 endif
We are all just spinning on the needle of of earth. Pops and ticks of cosmic music. I am a a beat, and you are a note. you dig?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都只是在地球的针上旋转，宇宙音乐的滴答声。我是一个节拍，而你是一个音符，你懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: if player.getincell abIAHaroldsCampZ == 1 && abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking == 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1 endif
Invisible flames sear flesh and brains, but not mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无形的火焰烧焦了肉体和大脑，但不是我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: if player.getincell abIAHaroldsCampZ == 1 && abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking == 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1 endif
I have seen the best pumpkins of my generation die of madness. Starving hysterical naked dragging themselves through the burned out streets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我见过我们这一代最好的南瓜疯狂地死去。饥肠辘辘，歇斯底里，赤身裸体，拖着自己穿过烧毁的街道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: if player.getincell abIAHaroldsCampZ == 1 && abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking == 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1 endif
My melon is lead lined and tuned into the universe. I keep the bad beats out and the good jazz in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的瓜是铅衬的，与宇宙融为一体。我把糟糕的节奏拒之门外，把好的爵士乐放进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: if player.getincell abIAHaroldsCampZ == 1 && abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking == 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1 endif
I see with my third eye the way Buddha, Christ, and Mohammad did. I see the frosty mountains, and the misty streams in the darkness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我用我的第三只眼睛看到了佛陀、基督和穆罕默德所看到的。我看到了霜冻的山脉，以及黑暗中雾蒙蒙的溪流。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: if player.getincell abIAHaroldsCampZ == 1 && abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking == 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1 endif
You see dirt and call it diamonds. You gaze on myriad hallucinations blindly. You look but you do not see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到泥土就叫它钻石，你盲目地凝视着无数的幻觉。你看，但你看不见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: if player.getincell abIAHaroldsCampZ == 1 && abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking == 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1 endif
I see the tumbling fog on the wings of morning parted with electric silence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看见雾在晨光的翅膀上翻滚，与闪电般的寂静分开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: if player.getincell abIAHaroldsCampZ == 1 && abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking == 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1 endif
A drop of water in a cup may change the fluid, but a drop of water in a river is a changes nothing. I am an Ocean of radiance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杯子里的一滴水可以改变液体，但河流里的一滴水却改变不了什么。我是一片光辉的海洋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: if player.getincell abIAHaroldsCampZ == 1 && abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking == 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1 endif
The road wasn’t made for every car to drive in the same direction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这条路不是为了让每辆车都能朝同一个方向行驶而设计的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: if player.getincell abIAHaroldsCampZ == 1 && abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking == 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1 endif
You have seen the truth through the walling darkness. You are a scion of wisdom and knowledge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你透过黑暗看到了真相。你是智慧和知识的后裔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: if player.getincell abIAHaroldsCampZ == 1 && abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking == 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1 endif
Indeed I am bright like lightning everclear. I voyage seas of wisdom and need no guide. I am the Adonis of Denver tripping fantastically.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确实像闪电一样明亮，永远清澈。我在智慧的海洋里航行，不需要向导。我是丹佛的阿多尼斯，在幻想中旅行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: if player.getincell abIAHaroldsCampZ == 1 && abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking == 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1 endif
They run with me through the avenues and alleyways of all time in stake contemplation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们与我一起跑过所有时间的大街小巷，在木桩上沉思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: if player.getincell abIAHaroldsCampZ == 1 && abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking == 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1 endif
They aren’t talking because you don’t know how to listen. They speak in a language you can not comprehend. Like a drum rhythm to a snail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不说话是因为你不知道如何倾听，他们说的语言你无法理解，就像蜗牛听到的鼓声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: if player.getincell abIAHaroldsCampZ == 1 && abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking == 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1 endif
Life is a chariot of golden sparks. It rides joylessly through space and decades, seeking no source nor running from any.
ESP.TRADUIT: 生命是一辆闪耀着金色火花的战车。它无趣地在太空中穿梭，几十年如一日，既不寻找源头，也不逃避源头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: if player.getincell abIAHaroldsCampZ == 1 && abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking == 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1 endif
Isn't it just there on the floor, by the pumpkins?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是就在南瓜旁边的地板上吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have seen the truth through the walling darkness. You are a scion of wisdom and knowledge. Here is a key, Use it to share your gift.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你透过黑暗看到了真相，你是智慧和知识的后裔。这里有一把钥匙，用它来分享你的天赋吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abNealStage to 2 player.additem jet 10 rewardxp 20 set abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking to 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1
When you lose something it is usually in the last place you left it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你丢失某样东西时，通常在你最后放它的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So simple yet so deep. I feel you on another level. I can will walk back my steps and rewind my mind. Take this so that you may walk forward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如此简单却又如此深刻，我感觉你在另一个层面，我可以走回头路，倒回我的思绪。拿着这个，这样你就可以向前走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abNealStage to 2 player.additem jet 10 rewardxp 20 set abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking to 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1
Even with a pumpkin on your head, I can tell you are too intelligent to need a journal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使你头上有个南瓜，我也能看出你太聪明了，不需要写日记。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have helped me reclaim my spirt from the racking cough of doubt. I can once again reach for stars. Here is a token of my thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你帮我从痛苦的怀疑中恢复了精神，我又可以伸手摘星星了。这是我表示感谢的一点心意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abNealStage to 2 player.additem jet 10 rewardxp 20 set abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking to 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1
[Attack] How about I find out what’s under that pumpkin?!
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>不如让我看看南瓜下面有什么！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be prepared to be punctured by a pumpkin headed angel with a sword you one eyed shrew of a cracksman!
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好被南瓜头的天使用剑刺穿吧，你这个独眼悍妇！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abNealStage to 2 setenemy abHaroldsGhoulsFAC playerfaction abNealREF.startcombat player ;;fail end harold quest
Yes here it is. It was right on the floor, near the pumpkins!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，在这儿。就在地板上，南瓜旁边！

ESP.ORIGINAL: This gift you have returned to me is more splendid than than sex or soup. I will give you a key to pass through the avenues of imagination.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你归还给我的这份礼物比性爱和汤更美妙。我会给你一把钥匙，让你穿过想象的大道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abNealStage to 2 player.additem jet 10 rewardxp 20 set abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking to 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1
Not yet. I will keep looking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还没有，我会继续找的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then flow on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后继续流淌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking to 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1
Okay, I'll have a look for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我去找找。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fantastic my man!
ESP.TRADUIT: 妙不可言，我的兄弟！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0106CC94]abNealVoiceQ) 0106CC94 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abNealStage to 1 set abGuileTalkQ.abNealSpeaking to 1 abNealREF.say abNealTopic1
I wish all the others were a little bit more like you smoothskin. You can see they are just tricks of the mind, like me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望其他人都能像你一样光滑。你可以看到，这只是大脑的错觉，就像我一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oscar [0106E3BC] (mod) Quest : ([0106E3C2]abOscarVoiceQ) 0106E3C2 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Neal! Neal, listen up I'm speaking to you. Stop talking your nonsense for one minute. The time has come to take the Dome. Sarah needs me now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尼尔！尼尔，听着，我在跟你说话，停止你的废话一分钟。是时候接管巨蛋了，萨拉现在需要我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: abGhoulHaroldREF.activate player
The Dome is open, and the Brotherhood defeated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 巨蛋打开了，兄弟会也被打败了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You defeated the Brotherhood at the Dome? Interesting. They would not have let that one go easily. Very interesting. We must soon depart then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在巨蛋打败了兄弟会？有意思，他们不会轻易放过这个机会的，非常有趣。那么我们必须马上出发了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shall we travel together to the Dome then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们一起去巨蛋吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: First, I had some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，我有几个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I suppose since the Dome is now safe, we have a little time. Go ahead then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，既然巨蛋现在安全了，我们还有点时间。请讲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'm ready to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我准备好动身了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very good, very good. Let us make haste to the Dome then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，很好。那我们赶紧去巨蛋吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.moveto abHaroldMeetSarahMarker2 abGhoulHaroldREF.disable abGhoulHaroldREF.moveto abHaroldMeetSarahMarker abGhoulHaroldREF.enable set abGuileTalkQ.abHaroldStand to 2 abHaroldRoomDoorREF.unlock abGhoulHaroldSitTrigREF.enable setstage abHaroldsQuest 10
The NCR have occupied the Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR占领了巨蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. That is most inconvenient. Luckily I have gathered a small army here at the camp. A small, but fierce army, with a warriors spirit in each.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了，那是最不方便的。幸运的是，我在营地集结了一支小军队，一支规模虽小但骁勇善战的军队，每个人都有勇士的精神。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I shall prepare my troops. Meet us there at the Dome, for the glory of the battle. What do you say? Speak up, now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要让我的部队做好准备。在巨蛋那里和我们会合，为荣耀而战。你说呢？大声点，马上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR act for the good of the people, I won't help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR是为人民着想的，我不会帮你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The good of the people? The good of the people, everyone! Tell me, honestly, are you out of your mind? They've killed hundreds in their quest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为人民着想？人民的利益，所有人！告诉我，说实话，你是不是疯了？他们在寻找的过程中已经杀了几百人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Out of ignorance, they kill. Out of fear and paranoia. The NCR were so close to a real cure for Seltam, but the paranoid fools couldn't wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出于无知，他们杀人。出于恐惧和偏执，NCR差一点就能真正治愈泽尔特扎姆了，但那些偏执的傻瓜等不及了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: One day a small outpost was infected. A hundred men, all dead. It scared them to the bone, made them irrational. They were shooting ghouls on sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一天，一个小前哨被感染了，一百个人，全都死了。吓得他们魂不附体，失去理智，他们一见到食尸鬼就开枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: While their intentions may have been pure at one time, they've gone too far, and they must be stopped. You would have them kill my beloved Sarah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然他们的意图可能一度很纯粹，但他们已经走得太远了，必须阻止他们。你想让他们杀了我心爱的萨拉？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd let them slaughter her, as their final act?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你愿意让他们杀了她，作为他们的最后行动吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you're right. I will help you save her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你说得对。我会帮你救她的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, my friend. I'm glad you can see reason. It's a rare trait in these times. Meet my forces at the Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，我的朋友。我很高兴你能明白道理，在这个时代，这是一个罕见的特征。在巨蛋和我的军队会合。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: First, I had some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，我有几个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have little time to spare, but very well, ask away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的时间不多了，不过好吧，随便问吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well, I'll meet you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我们在那儿见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well, we shall meet you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我们在那儿见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: abHaroldBattleREF.enable abGOODtroop1.enable abGOODtroop2.enable abGOODtroop3.enable abGOODtroop4.enable abBADtroop1.enable abBADtroop2.enable abBADtroop3.enable abBADtroop4.enable abBADtroop5.enable abBADtroop6.enable abBADtroop7.enable startquest abHGBattleQ player.moveto abHGplayerMarker setstage abHaroldsQuest 6
Sometimes hard decisions have to be made. Come to the Dome, and you're a dead man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时必须做出艰难的决定。到巨蛋来，你就死定了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Serious words you play with. Your harsh words will be like fire, and they will burn you in the end. Run along now, I grow tired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在玩弄严肃的词语，你的狠话如火，终将把你焚烧。快走吧，我累了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set abGuileTalkQ.abHaroldStand to 0 set abGuileTalkQ.abDespotStart to 4 setstage abHaroldsQuest 40
Why do you want to fight the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要和NCR作对？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Out of ignorance, they kill. Out of fear and paranoia. The NCR were so close to a real cure for Seltam, but the paranoid fools couldn't wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出于无知，他们杀人。出于恐惧和偏执，NCR差一点就能真正治愈泽尔特扎姆了，但那些偏执的傻瓜等不及了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: One day a small outpost was infected. A hundred men, all dead. It scared them to the bone, made them irrational. They were shooting ghouls on sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一天，一个小前哨被感染了，一百个人，全都死了。吓得他们魂不附体，失去理智，他们一见到食尸鬼就开枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: While their intentions may have been pure at one time, they've gone too far, and they must be stopped. You would have them kill my beloved Sarah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然他们的意图可能一度很纯粹，但他们已经走得太远了，必须阻止他们。你想让他们杀了我心爱的萨拉？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd let them slaughter her, as their final act?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你愿意让他们杀了她，作为他们的最后行动吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm with you! Death to the NCR!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我支持你！NCR去死吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the spirit. Let us kill all the bastards and be done with it. Will you travel with me, to the Dome?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是精神，让我们杀了这些混蛋，结束这一切。你愿意和我一起去巨蛋吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who or what are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁，你是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, I'm Doctor Harold Johnson, of course! The head scientist of the Boulder Dome project. Haven't you figured that out yet? Are you a little slow?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么，我是哈罗德·约翰逊博士，当然了！博尔德巨蛋项目的首席科学家。你还不明白？你是不是有点迟钝？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose you're wondering about that Andoid at the Dome. I presume you found him and I presume he's been deactivated. I usually presume right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你在想巨蛋里的那个机器人，我猜你找到它了，我猜它已经被停用了。我的假设通常是正确的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I presume that's how you tracked me. Also, he hasn't reported in. No matter. He was just a machine after all. It's no great loss to the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你就是这样追踪到我的。还有，它还没来报告，没关系，他终究只是一台机器，这对世界来说不是什么大损失。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: No loss, when the real Harold Johnson still lives and breathes. What's left of me breathes, that is. I'm an old, old man, but I feel the strength..
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有损失，只要真正的哈罗德·约翰逊还活着，我的身体还在呼吸。我是一个很老很老的人，但我感觉到了力量...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..in every cell of my body. Every last painful cell.
ESP.TRADUIT: ......在我身体的每个细胞里，每个痛苦的细胞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you create an android version of yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要创造一个机器人版本的自己？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I brought Sarah into the Dome, to save her. The cryostasis technology gave me the time I needed to find a cure, but my own body didn't have time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把萨拉带进巨蛋，是为了救她。冷冻技术给了我找到治愈方法所需的时间，但我自己的身体没有时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was not a young man to begin with. While my Sarah slept, the years took their toll on me. I managed to replace vital organs with mechanical parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本来就不年轻了，当我的萨拉熟睡时，岁月在我身上流逝。我设法用机械零件替换了重要器官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though in the end, I realized death was approaching. I needed a new body to carry out my work. So I ventured from the cool shade of the Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然最后，我意识到死亡正在逼近，我需要一个新的身体来完成我的工作。于是我大胆地从巨蛋阴凉的地方走了出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: To seek out a research facility within Boulder. There I constructed the android, and it is there I came to terms with my death. I accepted it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在博尔德找一个研究机构。我在那里制造了机器人，也在那里接受了死亡，我接受了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: For we all must die. So I set out into the toxic wastes, determined to die, wandering and alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我们都会死。于是，我踏上了这片有毒的废土，孤身一人，四处游荡，决心死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: But out there, my flesh burned in the air. I thought my heart would pump right out of my chest, and my eyes began to open for the first time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但在外面，我的肉体在空气中燃烧。我以为我的心脏要跳出胸腔了，我的眼睛第一次睁开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw all my fears and personal madness up close, and I felt the pull of the feral escape. And escape from the unbearable reality of my thoughts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我近距离地看到了我所有的恐惧和个人的疯狂，我感受到了野性的逃避的拉力。逃离我思想中不可承受的现实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: But my sanity held strong, and on the other side of the madness was a new strength and a new vision. Painful but revitalising. Death came to me..
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我依然保持着清醒的头脑，在疯狂的另一面是一种新的力量和新的视野，痛苦却又生机勃勃。死亡向我袭来...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..but I passed through it and was born again, in the radiation, in the pain.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...但我越过了它，在辐射中，在痛苦中重生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are Brotherhood's remote ferals here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么兄弟会的遥控尸鬼会在这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I called them here. Radiowaves are very primitive and so easily manipulated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我叫他们来的。无线电波非常原始，而且很容易操纵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you set up this camp?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要建这个营地？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This camp, as you call it, was my new home. Over time, I found others, wanderers with no where else to go, and those seeking refuge from the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你口中的这个营地，是我的新家。随着时间的推移，我找到了其他人，无家可归的流浪者，以及那些寻求逃离NCR的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: All are welcome here. They need not even ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里欢迎所有人，他们甚至不需要问我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'm ready to travel to the Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，我准备好去巨蛋了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay then, very good. Let us make haste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，非常好。让我们快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.moveto abHaroldMeetSarahMarker2 abGhoulHaroldREF.disable abGhoulHaroldREF.moveto abHaroldMeetSarahMarker abGhoulHaroldREF.enable set abGuileTalkQ.abHaroldStand to 2 abHaroldRoomDoorREF.unlock abDomeLabDoor.lock 255 abCryoDoor.lock 255 abControlRoomDoor.lock 255 abGhoulHaroldSitTrigREF.enable setstage abHaroldsQuest 10
Oh my gosh! Harold? Is that you? What.. what has happened to you? You look so old.. and your skin.. my god, you've caught my disease, haven't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢我的天哪！哈罗德？是你吗？什么...你怎么了？你看起来好老...还有你的皮肤...天啊，你感染了我的病，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sarah [01076E9A] (mod) NPC : Sarah [01071536] (mod) Quest : ([01071539]abSarahTalkQ) 01071539 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: if abGuileTalkQ.Harold3Time == 0 abDespot2REF.enable abGhoulHaroldREF.sayto abSarahREF, abHaroldSarah2 else abGHarold3REF.sayto abSarah2REF, abHaroldSarah2 endif
My beloved Sarah, you're finally awake. I've done it. I've cured you of your illness, now we can be together once more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我亲爱的萨拉，你终于醒了。我做到了，我治好了你的病，现在我们又可以在一起了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01076E98] (mod) NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: if abGuileTalkQ.Harold3Time == 0 abSarahREF.sayto abGhoulHaroldREF, abSarahSay1 else abSarah2REF.sayto abGHarold3REF, abSarahSay1 endif
No, no, no Sarah, don't be afraid! It is still me, your Harold. I know my body has changed, but my heart and mind have not. We can be together again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不，不，萨拉，别害怕！还是我，你的哈罗德。我知道我的身体变了，但我的心和思想没有变，我们可以重新在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01076E98] (mod) NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: if abGuileTalkQ.Harold3Time == 0 abDespot2REF.sayto abSarahREF, abDespotFinalLine endif
What I do is for my country and my people!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我所做的一切都是为了我的国家和人民！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01071889] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: abDespot2REF.useweapon abWeapVBRPistol abDespot2REF abSarahREF 1 0 0 1 abGhoulHaroldREF.sayto abSarahREF, abHaroldSarah3
NO! My Sarah! NO! Damn you, I will not lose you again!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！我的萨拉！不！该死，我不会再失去你了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harold Johnson [01076E98] (mod) NPC : Harold Johnson [01068994] (mod) Quest : ([0106EDA4]abGhoulHaroldVoiceQ) 0106EDA4 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: if abGuileTalkQ.Harold3Time == 0 setstage abHaroldsQuest 30 else setstage abHaroldsQuest 61 endif
A small army of ghouls are planning to take the Dome!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一小群食尸鬼正计划占领巨蛋！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understood. I had suspected something like this. We'd better get back to the Dome at once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白了。我曾经怀疑过类似的事情，我们最好马上回巨蛋去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: abHGB1.enable abHGB2.enable abHGB3.enable abHGB4.enable abHGB5.enable abHGB1a.enable abHGB2b.enable abDespot3REF.enable abDespotBattleTroop1.enable abDespotBattleTroop2.enable abDespotBattleTroop3.enable player.moveto abPlayerBattleMarker setstage abHaroldsQuest 45 startquest abDespotENDq
Nothing yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. Report back when you have some news.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧，有消息再来报告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Despot [01043638] (mod) Quest : ([0104363D]abDespotTalkQ) 0104363D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It just needed some TLC. Give me the girl and we're even.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是需要一些亲切的照料。把女孩给我，我们就扯平了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that’s what it’s going to take to get my operation up and running again than so be it. I am used to making sacrifices as you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这能让我的行动重新开始运转那就这样吧。你知道的，我习惯了做出牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sgt. Renato [01003DF8] (mod) Quest : ([010045A9]abSergeantTalkQ) 010045A9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They call me...{unsure how to feel, suspects it's an insult, but must accept it}Deadpan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们叫我...{unsure how to feel, suspects it's an insult, but must accept it}冷面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sighs, depressed}I'm supposed to be the playwright, but...there are only so many combinations of cats and rockets that an audience will find acceptable.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sighs, depressed}我本该是剧作家，但是...观众能接受的猫和火箭的组合只有那么多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since you've made it this far, you must realize how dangerous Boulder has become. If it would help, I could perhaps accompany you, if you'd have me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你已经走了这么远，你必须意识到博尔德有多危险。如果有帮助的话，我可以陪你一起去，如果你愿意的话？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDDPanQuest 10 Set BDDPanRef.bAvailable to 1
Who are you, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone wearing a box gave me a letter about the gremlin. Can you read it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个戴着盒子的人给了我一封关于小魔怪的信。你能读懂吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not this chicken scratch. You'll have to ask Deadpan about it. He's the one with the straw hat and his thumb up his ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种鬼画桃符不行。你得去问面无表情。他就是那个戴着草帽，拇指插在屁股上的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {happy to help}Of course. {clears throat}Ahem. {reading matter-of-factly}"The gremlin is simply a bored resident. What else would motivate someone to obsessively forge the handwriting of so many
ESP.TRADUIT: {happy to help}当然。{clears throat}嗯哼，{reading matter-of-factly}"小魔怪只是一个无聊的居民，还有什么能促使一个人如此痴迷地伪造这么多人的笔迹呢，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: with such petty results? Also, because our beloved projector has never been attacked, the gremlin must enjoy, or at least respect, the cinema.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果就这么微不足道？此外，因为我们心爱的投影仪从来没有被攻击过，小精灵一定很享受，或者至少是尊重电影院。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sincerely, {wih-NO-nuh}Wynona. P.S. It's not me, or else {er-VAY}Herve wouldn't need to read this to you."
ESP.TRADUIT: 真诚的，{wih-NO-nuh}怀诺纳。P.S：这不是我，否则{er-VAY}赫尔夫就不需要给你读这个了。"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem BDBoxyGremlinNote 1 BDDPanREF.PlayIdle LooseReadPaperOnHandA BDDPanREF.setrestrained 1
BDDPanREF.setrestrained 0
{happy to help}Of course. {clears throat}Ahem. {reading matter-of-factly}"The gremlin is simply a bored resident. What else would motivate someone to obsessively forge the handwriting of so many
ESP.TRADUIT: {happy to help}当然。{clears throat}嗯哼，{reading matter-of-factly}"小魔怪只是一个无聊的居民，还有什么能促使一个人如此痴迷地伪造这么多人的笔迹呢，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: with such petty results? Also, because our beloved projector has never been attacked, the gremlin must enjoy, or at least respect, the cinema.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果就这么微不足道？此外，因为我们心爱的投影仪从来没有被攻击过，小精灵一定很享受，或者至少是尊重电影院。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sincerely, {wih-NO-nuh}Wynona. P.S. It's not me, or else {er-VAY}Herve wouldn't have had to read this to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真诚的，{wih-NO-nuh}怀诺纳。P.S：这不是我，否则{er-VAY}赫尔夫就不需要给你读这个了。"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: P.P.S. I'm neither insane nor stupid, you {DP frowns a little, wondering why she wrote this}ill-mannered douche. {NAH-muh-stay}Namaste."
ESP.TRADUIT: P.P.S：我不疯也不傻，你{DP frowns a little, wondering why she wrote this}这个无礼的混蛋。{NAH-muh-stay}合十礼。"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem BDBoxyGremlinNote 1 BDDPanREF.setrestrained 1 BDDPanREF.PlayIdle LooseReadPaperOnHandA
BDDPanREF.setrestrained 0
Who would you ask about the gremlin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会问谁关于小魔怪的事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it's a target you seek, you should approach Jackie or Nicky. They're the ones charged with cleaning up after the beast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是你要找的目标，你应该去找杰姬或尼基。他们负责收拾野兽的残局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything chronological falls under Lucia's domain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何按时间顺序排列的东西都属于露西娅的范畴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDBoulderGremlin.DPAdvice to 1
So, you're the mastermind behind the legend! How can I help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说，你就是传说背后的策划者！我怎么帮你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {impressed, relieved}It takes a special someone to shake up the gremlin, so welcome aboard! Now that you're my apprentice, how about you give back my book?
ESP.TRADUIT: {impressed, relieved}需要一个特别的人来撼动这个小魔怪，所以欢迎加入！既然你是我的学徒，不如你把我的书还给我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Drop the act. I've already got your notebook.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别演戏了，我已经拿到你的笔记本了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {concealing disgust by playing it cool}So, you give my book to Andre, and he gives you yours. Or does he hang onto it a little longer, make you slay a dragon here, cure cancer there?
ESP.TRADUIT: {concealing disgust by playing it cool}那么，你把我的书给安德烈，他把你的给你。还是他会再坚持一段时间，让你在这里杀龙，在那里治疗癌症？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {amused laughing}Don't look so surprised! The gremlin hears all, even the good officer praising the Stork for providing him a new bitch. That's you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {amused laughing}别这么惊讶！小魔怪听到了一切，连好心的警官都称赞鹳鸟给了他一个新母狗，那就是你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did he bother to mention all of her notes are encrypted? {as if wiggling fingers, trying to scare PC for comic effect}Dense stuff. Algorithms. Quadratic logarithm factorization...Wiggly lines!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有费心提过她所有的笔记都被加密了吗？{as if wiggling fingers, trying to scare PC for comic effect}难懂的东西，算法，二次对数分解...波动线！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; 24/06/12 MoBurma - added new objective set BDBoulderGremlin.Rant to 1 set BDBoulderGremlin.bConDecrypt to 1
I was just looking for a magazine, so I'll be leaving now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是在找一本杂志，所以我现在要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {calm, has upper hand}Not before I stamp your book...{slight chuckle}Your grip's not so sure when you're caught in a lie.
ESP.TRADUIT: {calm, has upper hand}在我给你的书盖章之前...{slight chuckle}当你的谎言被揭穿时，你的控制力就不那么确定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem BDConnieEvidence 1 ; ConnieRef.AddItem BDConnieEvidence 1
Oh, I already have the logs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我已经有日志了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {a bit edgy}Then you should already know how much you need my master cryptography skills.
ESP.TRADUIT: {a bit edgy}那你应该已经知道你有多需要我的密码学技能了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderGremlin.bConDecrypt to 1
How do I know you're not just lying about the logs being encrypted?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么知道日志被加密的事是不是你在撒谎？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {matter-of-fact}Go see for yourself. You've already proven to be more than proficient at stealing.
ESP.TRADUIT: {matter-of-fact}自己去看看吧，你已经证明了自己对偷窃的熟练程度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you saying that the Dome logs are useless?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说巨蛋的日志没用吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They are, without me. Look around! Would a librarian keep books this way if not for some kind of complex underlying system of math and kicking?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，没有我。看看四周！如果不是因为某种复杂的数学和令人兴奋的基础系统，图书管理员会这样保管书吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {desperation breaking through}I've been trapped here for so long, I can't tell the year, but I can solve any crossword puzzle, using only foreign synonyms in under twenty seconds.
ESP.TRADUIT: {desperation breaking through}我被困在这里太久了，久到说不出年份了，但我可以只用外文同义词在20秒内解决任何填字游戏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're willing to help me continue to be Boulder's last agent of change, I'll translate those logs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你愿意帮我继续做博尔德最后的变革者，我会翻译那些日志。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderGremlin.bConDecrypt to 1
<Science - 80>
{trying to play cool, but voice betrays tension}Well, since you're so smart, you realize that there's no harm in keeping me as a backup. No one else can help you, especially not my expelled corpse.
ESP.TRADUIT: {trying to play cool, but voice betrays tension}好吧，既然你这么聪明，你应该知道让我做后备也没什么坏处。没人能帮你，尤其是我被驱逐的尸体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; 24/06/12 MoBurma - this is impossible to pass as having ; good enough science means the player will already have the codes.
Please! I smash through block ciphers with my bare hands and eat hash functions for breakfast!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托！我徒手破解分组密码，把哈希函数当早饭吃！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {trying to play cool, but voice betrays tension}Well, since you're so smart, you realize that there's no harm in keeping me as a backup. No one else can help you, especially not my expelled corpse.
ESP.TRADUIT: {trying to play cool, but voice betrays tension}好吧，既然你这么聪明，你应该知道让我做后备也没什么坏处。没人能帮你，尤其是我被驱逐的尸体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Iay ancay ecodeday hingstay ustjay inefay!
ESP.TRADUIT: 石室诗士施氏嗜狮誓食十狮！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Screw Andre! How do I get in on some gremlin action?
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他的安德烈！我要怎么加入小魔怪的行动？

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about you give me back my book?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把书还给我怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll need you to get a butt-load of ripe eggs--some kind of reptile that’s ready to burst out biting and scratching.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你去找一堆成熟的卵，某种随时会撕咬抓挠的爬行动物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back and stash the eggs in the empty barrel at the area we call Dump Cave and talk to me. When they hatch, everyone will go nuts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 回来，把卵藏在我们称之为“倾倒坑”的空桶里，然后跟我说话。当它们孵化时，所有人都会发疯的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted BDBoulderGremlin 30 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderGremlin 40 1 abOldDeathClawREF.enable
Why don't you just make up your own puzzles?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不自己编谜题呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {annoyed}What do you think I'm doing? There are only so many word searches you can write using nothing but letters corresponding to prime numbers!
ESP.TRADUIT: {annoyed}你以为我在干什么？你只能用素数对应的字母来搜索那么多的单词！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin Comment (NAM2) : maybe segue into scavenger hunt list. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should I even bother asking if you know anything about the gremlin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是不是该问你知不知道小魔怪的事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Writes something down>
ESP.TRADUIT: <写下一些东西>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddItem BDBoxyGremlinNote 1 Set BDBoulderGremlin.RudePC to 1 Set BDBoulderGremlin.BoxyBlock to 1
The target is the projector, and the time is between two and four in the morning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目标是投影仪，时间在凌晨两点到四点之间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hopefully, the bastard will show up and then we can nail 'em with some evidence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望那个混蛋会出现，然后我们可以用一些证据把他绳之以法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I noticed a bit of green fiber caught on the projector.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我注意到投影仪上有一点绿色的纤维。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {appreciates good work}Good eye, but it doesn't mean shit. Only two people wear green in this town, and one of 'em is our projectionist, {JEE-jee}Gigi.
ESP.TRADUIT: {appreciates good work}好眼力，但不代表什么。这个镇上只有两个人穿绿衣服，其中一个是我们的放映员，{JEE-jee}琪琪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;MoBurma 23/06/12 - added for new obj to make it clearer ;what to do. set BDBoulderGremlin.bFibreDone to 1 SetObjectiveCompleted BDBoulderGremlin 19 1
What should I do once I find a gremlin suspect?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我发现了小魔怪的嫌犯，我该怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't just banish someone without proof, so don't come back without some hard evidence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能没有证据就驱逐一个人，所以没有确凿证据就别回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turn in Connie
ESP.TRADUIT: 告发康妮

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Earned book}{looking at it, astounded}Look at the detail! I'd almost admire her if she hadn't filled my gun with peanuts. The sketches aren't bad either.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Earned book}{looking at it, astounded}看看这些细节！要不是她在我枪里塞满了花生，我差点佩服她了。这些草图也不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a minute! Is this doodle supposed to be me?! My eye isn't falling off like that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下！这个涂鸦是我吗！我的眼睛不会像那样掉下来的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've certainly earned this. Boulder thanks you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你应得的，博尔德感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; 24/06/12 MoBurma - moved Connie being removed from faction from here. This is why the exile dialogue didn't work ; I want a day of my life back for solving that one! if ConnieRef.GetDead == 0 ConnieRef.MoveTo ConnieAccuse AndreRef.AddScriptPackage BDAndreGremlinConfront endif

; 24/06/12 MoBurma - Added extra var to distinguish when Andre gave book as reward for quest objs PlayerRef.RemoveItem BDConnieEvidence 1 SetStage BDBoulderGremlin 100 Set BDBoulderEnterDome.ConnieBanished to 1 Player.AddItem BDDomeLogBook 1 AndresBox.RemoveItem BDDomeLogBook 5 Set Andreref.bAndregave to 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 20 0 set BDBoulderEnterDome.bExilebegin to 1 stopquest BDConnieQuest
The gremlin is Connie, and here's the proof.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小魔怪就是康妮，这就是证据。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {looking at it, astounded}Look at the detail! I'd almost admire her if she hadn't filled my gun with peanuts. The sketches aren't bad either.
ESP.TRADUIT: {looking at it, astounded}看看这些细节！要不是她在我枪里塞满了花生，我差点佩服她了。这些草图也不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a minute! Is this doodle supposed to be me?! My eye isn't falling off like that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下！这个涂鸦是我吗！我的眼睛不会像那样掉下来的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; 24/06/12 MoBurma - moved Connie being removed from faction from here. This is why the exile dialogue didn't work ; I want a day of my life back for solving that one! if ConnieRef.GetDead == 0 ConnieRef.MoveTo ConnieAccuse AndreRef.AddScriptPackage BDAndreGremlinConfront endif
PlayerRef.RemoveItem BDConnieEvidence 1 SetStage BDBoulderGremlin 100 Set BDBoulderEnterDome.ConnieBanished to 1 set BDBoulderEnterDome.bExilebegin to 1 stopquest BDConnieQuest
The gremlin is Connie, and here's the proof.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小魔怪就是康妮，这就是证据。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {stolen}{stern}We had a deal. No evidence, no log book.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stolen}{stern}我们说好的。没有证据，就没有日志。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: The gremlin is Connie, and here's...uh, I just had...It was a book!
ESP.TRADUIT: 小魔怪是康妮，这是...呃，我刚...这是一本书！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {burned}{stern}We had a deal. No evidence, no log book.
ESP.TRADUIT: {burned}{stern}我们说好的。没有证据，就没有日志。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: The gremlin is Connie, but she took the evidence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小魔怪是康妮，但她拿走了证据。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you called Deadpan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么叫冷面？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {unsure how to feel}I think it's because of my face.
ESP.TRADUIT: {unsure how to feel}我想这是因为我的脸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do I get the log book without helping Andre?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不帮安德烈我怎么拿到日志簿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {surprised at irony}Like anything else you want: steal it! It's probably locked up in the clinic. There are no combination locks, so there's a key somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: {surprised at irony}就像你想要的任何东西一样：偷走它！可能锁在诊所里了，这里没有密码锁，所以肯定有一把钥匙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't let him get away with treating you like a dog! You're on a mission and no one has the right to stand in your way!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别让他得逞，他把你当狗一样对待！你在执行任务，没有人有权阻止你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 20 1
This wasn't my idea. Andre's making me do his dirty work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我的主意，安德烈让我替他干脏活。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {concealing disgust by playing it cool}So, you give my book to Andre, and he gives you yours. Or does he hang onto it a little longer, make you slay a dragon here, cure cancer there?
ESP.TRADUIT: {concealing disgust by playing it cool}那么，你把我的书给安德烈，他把你的给你。还是他会再坚持一段时间，让你在这里杀龙，在那里治疗癌症？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {amused laughing}Don't look so surprised! The gremlin hears all, even the good officer praising the Stork for providing him a new bitch. That's you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {amused laughing}别这么惊讶！小魔怪听到了一切，连好心的警官都称赞鹳鸟给了他一个新母狗，那就是你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did he bother to mention how all of her notes are encrypted? {as if wiggling fingers, trying to scare PC for comic effect}Dense stuff. Algorithms. Quadratic logarithm factorization...Wiggly lines!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有说过她的笔记是怎么加密的吗？{as if wiggling fingers, trying to scare PC for comic effect}难懂的东西，算法，二次对数分解...波动线！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderGremlin.Rant to 1 set BDBoulderGremlin.bConDecrypt to 1
What kinds of stories do you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你都知道些什么故事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legends like "The Demon Cowboy," "Harry Appleseed," and "The Man from Nantucket."
ESP.TRADUIT: 比如恶魔牛仔、苹果核哈利和来自楠塔基特的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about the demon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说这个恶魔故事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was a brave cowboy who fought evil.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是一个勇敢的牛仔，与邪恶作斗争。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about Harry Appleseed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说苹果核哈利。
