ESP.ORIGINAL: I would like to know about this alledged man from Nantucket.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了解一下这个据说是从楠塔基特来的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There once was a man from there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 曾经有一个来自那里的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And?
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {shrug}That's it. Pretty boring, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: {shrug}就这些。很无聊，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of evil? Aliens? Slavers? Pollution?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么样的邪恶？外星人？奴隶贩子？污染？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {matter of fact, as if citing a movie scene off the top of his head}Probably the kind that would slit your dad's throat and hang him by the ankles, draining the blood into your mom's mouth until she confesses or dies.
ESP.TRADUIT: {matter of fact, as if citing a movie scene off the top of his head}可能是会割断你爸爸的喉咙，把他的脚踝吊起来，把血灌进你妈妈的嘴里，直到她认罪或死亡的那种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh...wow...Please continue!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，哇...请继续！

ESP.ORIGINAL: When bad guys murdered his family, he was the only witness, so he had to get revenge all by himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当坏人杀害他的家人时，他是唯一的目击者，所以他只能独自复仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even though he had two guns and a hundred bullets, the bad guys shot him until it rained meat a mile away and his heart turned to lead and stopped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管他有两支枪和一百发子弹，坏人还是朝他开枪，直到一英里外下起了肉雨，他的心像铅一样，停止了跳动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their escape left the cowboy so sour, the sky wouldn't take him, and the ground spat him back out. {quiet awe}Even the bomb shunned him, and he became a demon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的逃跑让牛仔变得如此痛苦，天空不愿带走他，地面又把他吐了出来。{quiet awe}连炸弹都避开了他，他变成了一个恶魔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unable to save the souls of his family, the immortal cowboy stalks the places Justice fears, hunting evil and protecting kids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于无法拯救家人的灵魂，这个永生的牛仔在正义恐惧的地方游荡，猎杀邪恶，保护孩子们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Awesome!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that {emph}is pretty evil, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这{emph}很邪恶，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDFireFlyFamilyDialogue.ToraEvils to 1
That's awfully specific.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这太具体了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {a little sad}I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: {a little sad}我猜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDFireFlyFamilyDialogue.ToraEvils to 1
When bad guys murdered his family, he was the only witness, so he had to get revenge all by himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当坏人杀害他的家人时，他是唯一的目击者，所以他只能独自复仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even though he had two guns and a hundred bullets, the bad guys shot him until it rained meat a mile away and his heart turned to lead and stopped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管他有两支枪和一百发子弹，坏人还是朝他开枪，直到一英里外下起了肉雨，他的心像铅一样，停止了跳动。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their escape left the cowboy so sour, the sky wouldn't take him, and the ground spat him back out. {quiet awe}Even the bomb shunned him, and he became a demon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的逃跑让牛仔变得如此痛苦，天空不愿带走他，地面又把他吐了出来。{quiet awe}连炸弹都避开了他，他变成了一个恶魔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unable to save the souls of his family, the immortal cowboy stalks the places Justice fears, hunting evil and protecting kids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于无法拯救家人的灵魂，这个永生的牛仔在正义恐惧的地方游荡，猎杀邪恶，保护孩子们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们以后再谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: That would be lovely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那会很写意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take it. Now what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿去吧。现在怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll need you to get a butt-load of ripe eggs--some kind of reptile that’s ready to burst out biting and scratching.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你去找一堆成熟的卵，某种随时会撕咬抓挠的爬行动物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back and stash the eggs in the empty barrel at the area we call Dump Cave and talk to me. When they hatch, everyone will go nuts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 回来，把卵藏在我们称之为“倾倒坑”的空桶里，然后跟我说话。当它们孵化时，所有人都会发疯的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem BDConnieEvidence 1 ; ConnieRef.AddItem BDConnieEvidence 1
SetObjectiveCompleted BDBoulderGremlin 30 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderGremlin 40 1 abOldDeathClawREF.enable
I'll hang onto it for safe keeping.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会保管好它的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {concealing disgust by playing it cool}So, you give my book to Andre, and he gives you yours. Or does he hang onto it a little longer, make you slay a dragon here, cure cancer there?
ESP.TRADUIT: {concealing disgust by playing it cool}那么，你把我的书给安德烈，他把你的给你。还是他会再坚持一段时间，让你在这里杀龙，在那里治疗癌症？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {amused laughing}Don't look so surprised! The gremlin hears all, even the good officer praising the Stork for providing him a new bitch. That's you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {amused laughing}别这么惊讶！小魔怪听到了一切，连好心的警官都称赞鹳鸟给了他一个新母狗，那就是你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did he bother to mention all of her notes are encrypted? {as if wiggling fingers, trying to scare PC for comic effect}Dense stuff. Algorithms. Quadratic logarithm factorization...Wiggly lines!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有费心提过她所有的笔记都被加密了吗？{as if wiggling fingers, trying to scare PC for comic effect}难懂的东西，算法，二次对数分解...波动线！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; 24/06/12 MoBurma - added new objective set BDBoulderGremlin.Rant to 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 35 1
Go ahead. Turn your back on me and see what happens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去吧。背对着我，看看会发生什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you stole my evidence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你偷了我的证据。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {smirking}And destroyed it. I told you not to turn your back on me, but did you listen?
ESP.TRADUIT: {smirking}并摧毁了它。我告诉过你不要背对着我，但你听了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really have to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {disappointed}Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: {disappointed}好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: How does he do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是怎么做到的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: As long as evil exists, he can never go home, so he shoots murderers with flaming bullets to alleviate his rage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要邪恶还存在，他就永远不能回家，所以他用燃烧的子弹向杀人犯射击，以减轻他的愤怒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: but if you just stole a soda or something, he'll shoot you with his other gun, which is full of gumdrops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你只是偷了一瓶汽水什么的，他会用他的另一把枪打你，那把枪里装满了橡皮软糖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like one sad, pathetic freak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来像个可悲的怪胎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {offended, getting emotional}I'd watch out, if I were you! Sam's grandpa actually saw him!
ESP.TRADUIT: {offended, getting emotional}如果我是你，我会小心的！萨姆的爷爷真的看见过他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {amazement and fear}His face is covered in blood and scales, and even though he has no eyes, he still shot Sam's grandpa's trigger finger clean off!
ESP.TRADUIT: {amazement and fear}他的脸上满是血和鳞片，尽管他没有眼睛，但他还是把萨姆爷爷扣动扳机的手指打飞了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gumdrops?
ESP.TRADUIT: 橡皮软糖？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. They make your skin all pink and itchy because they're radioactive, and the scar left from the burn reminds you to be good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。它们会让你的皮肤又红又痒，因为它们有放射性，而烧伤留下的疤痕会提醒你要乖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: To call him, you leave candy outside in a shoe before bed. He'll gobble it up, but you can never catch him because he'll turn into a bird or a dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呼唤他，你要在睡觉前把糖果放在外面的鞋子里。他会狼吞虎咽地吃下去，但你永远抓不到他，因为他会变成一只鸟或一只狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for the info, kid. I'll be sure to keep a look out with the eyes in the back of my head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的信息，孩子。我一定会用后脑勺的眼睛留心观察的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {suspicious}There's no need to fear...unless you're evil.
ESP.TRADUIT: {suspicious}没有必要恐惧...除非你是恶魔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you tried that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你试过吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. Now I'm itchy too!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，现在我也痒了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I could find were deathclaw eggs, and they're pretty dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能找到的只有死亡爪蛋，它们非常危险。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds perfect. The fun part will be watching people fight over who gets to eat what!
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来很完美，有趣的部分是看人们为谁能吃什么而争斗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did what you asked. Now what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我照你说的做了。现在怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to wait for them to hatch, be my guest. When you've got the log book, hand it over, and I'll decipher it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想等它们孵化，请便。你拿到日志后，交给我，我来破译。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and here's a gold star for your A+ performance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，你的表现是A+，给你一颗金星。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddItem NVStarBottleCap 1 GremDC1.enable GremDC2.enable GremDC3.enable SetStage BDBoulderGremlin 100
I've got the log book. Can you translate it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有日志薄，你能翻译吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, just give me a day to be on the safe side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，保险起见，给我一天时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem BDConnieEvidence 1 Player.RemoveItem BDDomeLogBook 1

; 24/06/12 MoBurma - Moved this from Gremlin topic as it caused bug where player could not get codes if already done quest. set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.ConnieDecode to 1 set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.DecodeA to GameDaysPassed set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.DecodeB to GameDaysPassed set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.DecodeC to (BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.DecodeB - BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.DecodeA) SetObjectivecompleted BDBoulderCodesQuest 35 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 50 1
I've got the log book, so here is your notebook.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有日志，这是你的笔记本。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, just give me a day to be on the safe side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，保险起见，给我一天时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem BDDomeLogBook 1 set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.ConnieDecode to 1 set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.DecodeA to GameDaysPassed set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.DecodeB to GameDaysPassed set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.DecodeC to (BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.DecodeB - BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.DecodeA) SetObjectivecompleted BDBoulderCodesQuest 35 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 50 1
How can I get you to decrypt the logs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么才能让你解密日志？

ESP.ORIGINAL: An even exchange. Bring my notebook and the logs, and I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 公平的交换。把我的笔记本和日志拿来，我来做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Moburma 23/06/12 ;changed from a say once so that the PC has a chance to ; think about it/be sure what their options are if they don't play for a while
set BDBoulderGremlin.bConDecrypt to 1 if player.getitemcount BDDomeLogBook > 0 && getobjectivedisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 35 == 0 setobjectivedisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 35 1 endif
I'll need you to get a butt-load of ripe eggs--some kind of reptile that’s ready to burst out biting and scratching.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你去找一堆成熟的卵，某种随时会撕咬抓挠的爬行动物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back and stash the eggs in the empty barrel at the area we call Dump Cave and talk to me. When they hatch, everyone will go nuts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 回来，把卵藏在我们称之为“倾倒坑”的空桶里，然后跟我说话。当它们孵化时，所有人都会发疯的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard you're the "Party Planner."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你是"派对策划人"。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {disgust}Is {emph}that what they're fucking calling me now? Does it {emph}look like I sit on my ass all day long coloring banners?!
ESP.TRADUIT: {disgust}他们{emph}现在都这么叫我了吗？我看起来{emph}像是整天坐在屁股上给横幅涂色吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [0108373E] (mod) Quest : ([010837E7]BDSamGhoulDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good! I've got the most important job here. Scrounging and hunting may not sound like much, but we're not exactly living on a big, juicy farm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好！我的工作是最重要的。拾荒和狩猎听起来可能没什么，但我们并不是生活在一个多汁的大农场里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [0108373E] (mod) Quest : ([010837E7]BDSamGhoulDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps, deep down inside, you have a sensitive, artistic soul that only wants to be loved?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许，在你的内心深处，你有一个敏感的，艺术的灵魂，只想被爱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's besides the point! I put my ass on the line finding shit to keep all these old bats from starving to death! I should be a goddamned hero!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是重点！我冒了这么大的风险就是为了不让这些傻老帽饿死！我应该成为一个该死的英雄！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [0108373E] (mod) Quest : ([010837E7]BDSamGhoulDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No! they should call me the freakin' mayor! Pfft! "Party Planner" my ass!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！他们应该叫我他妈的市长！呸！"派对策划人"个头！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [0108373E] (mod) Quest : ([010837E7]BDSamGhoulDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look like a dirty scrounger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来像个肮脏的乞丐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {some pride, relief}Finally, some truth!
ESP.TRADUIT: {some pride, relief}总算，有点道理！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [0108373E] (mod) Quest : ([010837E7]BDSamGhoulDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: These senile loons think that if they keep playing house, all the sunshine and rainbows they shit will keep mean Mr. Death from collapsing the cave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些老糊涂觉得，如果他们继续玩过家家，他们拉出的阳光和彩虹就能阻止卑鄙的死神先生坍塌山洞了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [0108373E] (mod) Quest : ([010837E7]BDSamGhoulDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know why they have so many "parties"? Because any bit of food is a special occasion!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道他们为什么有这么多"派对"吗？因为任何一点食物都能成为一个特殊的场合！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [0108373E] (mod) Quest : ([010837E7]BDSamGhoulDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {impression of self feeling good}"Hey guys, I found an extra carrot."
ESP.TRADUIT: {impression of self feeling good}“嘿，伙计们，我多找到一根胡萝卜。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [0108373E] (mod) Quest : ([010837E7]BDSamGhoulDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {less flattering impression of others}"Oh joy! Let's have a {drawn out with disdain}paaarty! Can you find more beer next time?"
ESP.TRADUIT: {less flattering impression of others}"噢太高兴了！ 我们来开{drawn out with disdain}派对吧！下次你能多找点啤酒吗？"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [0108373E] (mod) Quest : ([010837E7]BDSamGhoulDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {exhausted}God, if only there was a nice big rat infestation, we'd be living the high life. Pathetic, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: {exhausted}天啊，要是有个漂亮的大老鼠出没，我们就能过上好日子了。真可悲，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [0108373E] (mod) Quest : ([010837E7]BDSamGhoulDialogue) Sam's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: How old are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你多大了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My oh my. The years have flown by so fast, I can't even tell anymore! I must be having a lot of fun. I do remember my birthday though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的天啊，时间过得太快了，我都记不清了！我一定玩得很开心。不过我还记得我的生日。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's July 4th, 1996. It used to be a holiday you know, back when explosions in the sky were fun and colorful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是1996年7月4日。这曾经是一个节日，你知道的，那时候天空中的爆炸很有趣，五颜六色的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes we still have parties for it, or anything really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时我们还会为此举办派对，或者其他什么的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm new around here. Sam tells me that you know some pretty good stories.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是新来的。萨姆告诉我你知道一些很好的故事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shh! If Dad finds out I've been talking to people, he'll get mad! But, yes it's true.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘘！如果爸爸发现我在跟别人说话，他会生气的！但是，对，这是真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tora [0108373A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you speak up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能说说吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm well equipped for handling rads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有很好的装备来解决辐射。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <question later>
ESP.TRADUIT: <稍后再问>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before apocalypses muscled in, cancer was the number-one cause of death, and like ice cream, there's a flavor for every occasion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在末日来临之前，癌症是头号死因，就像冰淇淋一样，每种场合都有不同的口味。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {wry smirk}It's probably hard for you to believe, but at one time, we were all counting on radiation to save humanity.
ESP.TRADUIT: {wry smirk}也许你很难相信，但曾经有一段时间，我们都指望辐射来拯救人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {somber}However, my Danielle and Stacy were worried that at my age, the cure could be worse than the disease.
ESP.TRADUIT: {somber}然而，我的丹尼尔和史黛西担心，在我这个年纪，治疗可能比疾病更糟糕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {recalls indignation}I'd won a marathon, so you couldn't treat me like a glass bird! But after starting the regimen, I took them in my arms and apologized...and threw up.
ESP.TRADUIT: {recalls indignation}我赢过马拉松，所以你不能把我当玻璃鸟一样看待！但在开始治疗后，我把他们抱在怀里并道歉...然后吐了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {wide-eyed}Have you ever swallowed a boot?
ESP.TRADUIT: {wide-eyed}你吞过靴子吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on there! Our deal was that I'd kill those monsters and you'd give me the log book.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下！我们说好的是，我杀了那些怪物你就把日志给我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {aggressive}You oughta stick your pinky in your ear and rotate it! The deal was that {emph}you would help the town.
ESP.TRADUIT: {aggressive}你应该把你的小拇指插进耳朵里，然后转动！我们的协议是{emph}你要帮助这个小镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {offended cat-lover}Do you take me for a depraved Communist?! Give this creature a proper burial!
ESP.TRADUIT: {offended cat-lover}你把我当成堕落的共产党了吗！给这个家伙一个像样的葬礼吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {reluctant}Well, if eating cat is okay with Lenore, I suppose it's okay for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: {reluctant}好吧，如果丽诺儿不介意吃猫，我想我们也不介意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to help! Andre said that you're having problems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来帮忙的！安德烈说你遇到麻烦了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Three!
ESP.TRADUIT: 三！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you know that the death squad has a big bounty on your head?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道暗杀小队悬赏重金要你的人头吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: One!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Judging by your NCR rifle and itchy trigger finger, I'd say that you came from the death squad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据你的NCR步枪和扣动扳机的手指判断，我认为你来自暗杀小队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They can go to hell! I neutralized--{breaking himself of euphemism habit}killed-- Dullahan to slow them down,
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们都下地狱吧！我压制{breaking himself of euphemism habit}杀死了杜拉尔罕来拖住他们，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: but that asshole, Renato, just keeps frying good men into zombies. Until I see his head on a fucking plate, I'm not budging!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但那个混蛋雷纳托，总是把好人油炸成僵尸。在我看到他的头被放在盘子里之前，我不会让步的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDullahanQuest.HotShot to 1
<Attack> Time to collect!
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>该收货了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Collect this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 收收这个！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: FireflyRef.StartCombat Player
I want to help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想帮你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell could you do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底能做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you just going to let everyone starve because of you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打算让所有人都因为你而饿死吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: One!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here are the goods.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是货物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {infiltrate}{relaxed, friendly}It'll be nice being able to put food on the table again without worrying about orphaning the kids. You're a real hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: {infiltrate}{relaxed, friendly}能重新把食物摆上餐桌，不用担心孩子们会成为孤儿，这种感觉真好。你真是个英雄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem BDRenatoHead 1 Player.RemoveItem BDBoulderMap 1 SetStage BDDullahanQuest 100
Tell me about the gremlin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说小魔怪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The perp operates at night, stealing and breaking things to screw around with everyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个罪犯在夜间作案，偷东西，砸东西，捉弄大家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: To narrow down the suspects, I want you to go on a stakeout, but we need more information to pin down where and when it'll strike next.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了缩小嫌疑人范围，我希望你进行监视，但我们需要更多信息来确定下一次袭击的地点和时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about Firefly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说萤火虫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He abandoned his duty after too many of those invaders showed up, and holed up in here to patrol nights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那些掠夺者出现太多之后，他放弃了自己的职责，晚上躲在这里逛荡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: According to him, there's an army coming to kill us all any day now, {bitter sarcasm}and we're all too old and frail to wipe our own asses!
ESP.TRADUIT: 据他说，有一支军队随时会来杀了我们所有人，{bitter sarcasm}我们都太老了，太虚弱了，不能自己擦屁股了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: He clearly won't listen to the likes of us, but maybe another young wastelander like you could tell him how it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他显然不会听我们这种人的话，但也许另一个像你这样的废土人可以告诉他这是怎么回事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: if BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.Invasion == 0 set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.Invasion to 1 set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.CountdownA to GameDaysPassed set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.CountdownB to GameDaysPassed set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.CountdownC to (BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.CountdownB - BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.CountdownA) endif
I want to talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈其它的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make it quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快一点儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're just hiding in here because you're a coward!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你躲在这里是因为你是个懦夫！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you care about your own survival?
ESP.TRADUIT: 难道你不关心自己的生存吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That attitude murdered countless children! {shoots at PC}
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种态度害死了无数的孩子！{shoots at PC}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: FireflyRef.Addscriptpackage BDFireflyShootWarning set BDDullahanQuest.ShotPC to 1 Set FireflyRef.SelfDefense to 1 FireflyRef.RemoveFromFaction BDFireflyFamily ; Ingrid shouldn't attack PC for defense FireflyRef.RemoveFromFaction BDBoulderUnderground
{hits player}That attitude murdered countless children! {shoots at PC}
ESP.TRADUIT: {hits player}这种态度害死了无数的孩子！{shoots at PC}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: FireflyRef.StartCombat Player Set FireflyRef.SelfDefense to 1 FireflyRef.RemoveFromFaction BDFireflyFamily ; Ingrid shouldn't attack PC for defense FireflyRef.RemoveFromFaction BDBoulderUnderground
I've been inside their compound.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我进过他们的院子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {mix of suspicion and hope}And what do you intend to do about them?
ESP.TRADUIT: {mix of suspicion and hope}那你打算怎么处理他们？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: None of your damn concern!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不关你的事！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the fuckity fuck was Dullahan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁他妈的是杜拉尔罕？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {despite the atrocities, he remembers Dullahan fondly}He was our--their "acclimation officer."
ESP.TRADUIT: {despite the atrocities, he remembers Dullahan fondly}他是我们...他们的"驯化官"。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whenever someone froze up, he would put a gun to their head and whisper that it was okay to choose one's own life over a suffering orphan's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每当有人吓呆的时候，他就会拿枪指着他们的头小声说，选择自己的生命而不是一个受苦的孤儿是没问题的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because of him, we were able to keep on living.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为有了他，我们才能活下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems like Dullahan was pretty important. Who was he?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来杜拉尔罕很重要。他是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {greatly relieved}That's good to hear. It's hard to stay focused without breakfast.
ESP.TRADUIT: {greatly relieved}很高兴听到你这么说。不吃早餐很难保持注意力集中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowMessage BDBoulderFame set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep to (BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep +1)
I've convinced Firefly to scout again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经说服萤火虫再次进行侦察了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've certainly earned this. Boulder thanks you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你应得的，博尔德感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddItem BDDomeLogBook 1 ShowMessage BDBoulderFame set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep to (BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep +1) AndresBox.RemoveItem BDDomeLogBook 5 ; 24/06/12 MoBurma - Added extra var to distinguish when Andre gave book as reward for quest objs Set Andreref.bAndregave to 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 20 0
I've convinced Firefly to scout again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经说服萤火虫再次进行侦察了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Challenge accepted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接受挑战。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {thinks PC is full of shit}Hey, hot shot! While you're not busy taking a dump down Renato's throat, why don't you grab their map so they'll forget where we are for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: {thinks PC is full of shit}嘿，大人物！趁你没忙着往雷纳托的喉咙里拉屎的时候，不如去拿走他们的地图好让他们暂时忘记我们在哪里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDullahanQuest.Accept to 1 Set BDDullahanQuest.HotShot to 2 SetObjectiveCompleted BDDullahanQuest 5 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDullahanQuest 10 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDullahanQuest 20 1
Why would you want pencils?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要铅笔？

ESP.ORIGINAL: While we {emph}are lucky enough to have a projector, we only have so many films, and none of them are about cats, so, I write plays.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我们{emph}很幸运的拥有一台投影仪，但我们只有那么多电影，而且没有一部是关于猫的，所以，我在写剧本。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you paying for the pencils?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你花多少钱买这些铅笔？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have much, but I'm willing to part with my most precious possession:
ESP.TRADUIT: 我拥有的不多，但我愿意舍弃我最珍贵的东西：
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: my hat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的帽子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanQuest.SpecialHat to 1
Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's so special about the hat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这顶帽子有什么特别的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was an antique, even before I was born, if that still means anything. My father wore it during his best speeches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是件古董，甚至在我出生之前就是了，如果这还有什么意义的话。我父亲在他最精彩的演讲中就戴着它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Barter - 50>
[SUCCEEDED] {resigned}Very well. I may die, but my legacy, "Mr. Whiskers' Final Debate," must live on. It's not much, but here is my food ration.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]{resigned}很好。我可能会死，但我的遗产《胡须先生的最后辩论》必须继续流传下去。虽然不多，但这是我的食物配给。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem WaterPurified 1 Player.additem MoleRatStew 1 rewardxp 50
If you want those pencils, I'm going to need some supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想要那些铅笔，我需要一些物资。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] My food ration is very small, and I won't be able to pay you if I starve to death.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我的食物配给很少，如果我饿死了，我就没钱给你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: All that pencil-viewing will give me motion sickness if I don't get something to eat. Hint, hint.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我不吃点东西，整天看铅笔会让我晕的。意思意思。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't shut up, I'm gonna rip off your head, rendering hat-wearing inconvenient at best!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你再不闭嘴，我就把你的头拧下来，让你戴帽子都不方便！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {a little tense}I see. In that case, we have nothing to discuss.
ESP.TRADUIT: {a little tense}我明白了。那样的话，我们就没什么好说的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll give you any pencils that I find.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到的铅笔都给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {excitement and relief breaking through}A thousand times thank you! Ten of them should stay my nightmares.
ESP.TRADUIT: {excitement and relief breaking through}万分感谢！其中十个应该留在我的噩梦中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanQuest.PencilQuest to 2 player.addnote BDDeadpanPencilNote
Have you tried pricking your finger and writing with that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你试过刺破手指然后用它写字吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, at times of feverish inspiration, but it makes me dizzy and forgetful. Dr. Andrea advised against it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，有时灵感迸发，但它让我头晕目眩，健忘。安德里娅医生不建议这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以后再说吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {quietly, old wound}You sound like my father...just before he vaporized.
ESP.TRADUIT: {quietly, old wound}你听起来像我父亲...在他蒸发之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did somebody order fresh pencils?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人订购新铅笔了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {excited}Me!
ESP.TRADUIT: {excited}我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {slightly embarrassed, regains composure}*coughs* I mean, how many do you have?
ESP.TRADUIT: {slightly embarrassed, regains composure}*咳嗽*我是说，你有几支？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've found all ten pencils.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把十支铅笔都找到了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {misty}A blessing from The Stork{the nickname of the enshrined scientist}, you are. Here. I hope my hat brings you as much luck as it has to my family.
ESP.TRADUIT: {misty}来自鹳鸟的祝福{the nickname of the enshrined scientist}，给你。给，我希望我的帽子给你带来的好运和给我家人带来的一样多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanQuest.SpecialHat to 1 player.removeitem pencil01 10 set BDDPanQuest.PencilQuest to 3 rewardxp 50
{shocked}You stole my pencil from the shrine? Put it back, or this accursed block will rain on my head forever!
ESP.TRADUIT: {shocked}你从神殿偷了我的铅笔？把它放回去，否则这块被诅咒的石头就会永远落在我的头上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I seem to be short a few.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我好像少几个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {a bit let down}Oh. Well, good luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {a bit let down}哦。那么，祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep the hat. Helping you was its own reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 留着帽子吧，帮助你本身就是奖励。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {unusually emotive, speechless}Oh! Thank you! You know, I never would've been born if not for this hat. I don't know what I would've done without it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {unusually emotive, speechless}噢！谢谢你！如果不是这顶帽子，我根本不会出生。真不知道如果没有它我该怎么办。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardkarma 50 set BDDPanQuest.PencilQuest to 4 BDDPanRef.RemoveItem BDDeadpanHat 1 BDDPanRef.AddItem BDDeadpanHatPC 1
Not now. I like to travel light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在不行，我喜欢轻装旅行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {unexpected}Oh. Well, the offer still stands, I'm afraid.
ESP.TRADUIT: {unexpected}哦，好吧，恐怕这个提议仍然有效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanQuest.PencilQuest to 5
I'll take it when I need a toilet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想上厕所的时候就用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {a bit disgusted}Splendid.
ESP.TRADUIT: {a bit disgusted}精彩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanQuest.Bedpan to 1 set BDDPanQuest.PencilQuest to 5
Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please take good care of it. It's survived three World Wars, {just realizing strange fact}yet the ribbon hasn't been replaced yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请妥善保管。它经历了三次世界大战，{just realizing strange fact}然而彩带还没有被更换过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {happy}Thanks to your donation, I was able to write down instructions, if you ever need to clean it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {happy}感谢你的捐赠，如果你需要清理的话，我可以写下使用说明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem BDDeadpanHatPC 1
player.addnote BDDeadpanHatNote set BDDPanQuest.PencilQuest to 4
Oh, man. I just had a purple Salisbury steak, and you know what that means...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，伙计，我刚吃了一份紫色的索尔兹伯里牛排，你知道那意味着什么...

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sad to give hat away as a bedpan}My great-great-grandfather met his wife when this hat blew across Coney Island.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sad to give hat away as a bedpan}我的曾曾祖父就是在这顶帽子吹过科尼岛的时候认识他妻子的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: My grandfather sang in it for fifty-two years, and my father campaigned in it for twelve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的祖父在那里唱了52年的歌，我的父亲在那里参加了12年的竞选活动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sighs with resignation}<sigh> But a promise is a promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sighs with resignation}<叹气> 但承诺就是承诺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem BDDeadpanHatPC 1
rewardkarma -75 set BDDPanQuest.PencilQuest to 4
I'd like that hat now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在想要那顶帽子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please take good care of it. It's survived three World Wars, {just realizing strange fact}yet the ribbon hasn't been replaced yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请妥善保管。它经历了三次世界大战，{just realizing strange fact}然而彩带还没有被更换过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {happy}Thanks to your donation, I was able to write down instructions, if you ever need to clean it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {happy}感谢你的捐赠，如果你需要清理的话，我可以写下使用说明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem BDDeadpanHatPC 1
player.addnote BDDeadpanHatNote set BDDPanQuest.PencilQuest to 4
Err, I have no idea what you're talking about...
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我不知道你在说什么...

ESP.ORIGINAL: {cheerful}Oh, come on. You can't tell me you don't remember being carried off in a VR pod with the rest of us!
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful}哦，得了吧。别告诉我你不记得自己和我们一起被带进VR舱里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to collect the bounty on Firefly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来拿萤火虫的赏金的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, it has the right weight, and a pretty good shape. It'll make a fine bowling ball. Here's your money!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，重量适中，形状也很好，可以做成一个很好的保龄球。这是你的钱！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Fingers [01083743] (mod) Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem BDFireflyHead 1 Player.AddItem Caps001 2000 Set BDFingersBountyQuest.FFlyBountyDone to 1
I have fingers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, give me your fingers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，把你的手指给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Back away slowly>
ESP.TRADUIT: <慢慢后退>

ESP.ORIGINAL: And don't come back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再回来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Ask around the town and see what you can find out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。问问镇上的人，看看你能发现什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: StartQuest BDBoulderGremlin SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderGremlin 10 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderGremlin 15 1 NormProj.Disable GremProj.Enable
I'll look into this "gremlin" business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会调查这个"小魔怪"的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be warned: Don't make any sudden movements around him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 警告：不要在他周围做任何突然的动作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: StartQuest BDDullahanQuest SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDullahanQuest 5 1
I'll see what I can do about Firefly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看看能不能帮萤火虫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {pride, tongue-in-cheek}The panther's face is what makes it work.
ESP.TRADUIT: {pride, tongue-in-cheek}豹子的脸是它成功的关键。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDPanRef.bTacticsStowWeapons to 0 if BDDPanRef.GetItemCount BDDPanWeapMelee == 0 BDDPanRef.AddItem BDDPanWeapMelee 1 endif if BDDPanRef.GetItemCount BDDPanWeapRanged == 0 BDDPanRef.AddItem BDDPanWeapRanged 1 endif
You should use your personal weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该使用你的私人武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {unsure}Do you have something else with a predator's visage?
ESP.TRADUIT: {unsure}你还有其他有捕食者长相的东西吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDPanRef.bTacticsStowWeapons to 1 if BDDPanRef.GetItemCount BDDPanWeapMelee > 0 BDDPanRef.RemoveItem BDDPanWeapMelee 100 endif if BDDPanRef.GetItemCount BDDPanWeapRanged > 0 BDDPanRef.RemoveItem BDDPanWeapRanged 100 endif
I need you to put away your personal weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你的私人武器收起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {happy to have it back}You can't peel a classic like this off of a raider.
ESP.TRADUIT: {happy to have it back}你不可能从掠夺者身上剥下这么经典的东西的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDPanRef.bTacticsStowArmor to 0 if BDDPanRef.GetItemCount BDDPanArmor == 0 BDDPanRef.AddItem BDDPanArmor 1 endif
You should put your suit back on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该把你的西装穿上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {affirmative}I shall pretend that it's at the dry cleaners.
ESP.TRADUIT: {affirmative}我就当它在干洗店。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDPanRef.bTacticsStowArmor to 1 if BDDPanRef.GetItemCount BDDPanArmor > 0 BDDPanRef.RemoveItem BDDPanArmor 100 endif
I need you to change your suit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你把衣服换了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I had a cat with thumbs, I'd train her to play rock ballads on piano, and...oh who am I kidding. No one would see it anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我有一只长拇指的猫，我会训练她用钢琴弹奏摇滚民谣，还有...哦，我在骗谁呢。反正也没人会看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; removed bHired == 1 function -- Kaz
Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们说点别的吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {curiosity over strange fact}When I was a child, there were a few years during which it was illegal to portray Santa Claus wearing red. {extra odd}Pink was okay though.
ESP.TRADUIT: {curiosity over strange fact}当我还是个孩子的时候，有几年的时间里，描绘圣诞老人穿红色衣服是非法的。不过，粉红色是可以的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们说点别的吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever noticed that a mother dog is known as a "bitch," while a cat is called a "queen"? {smug}I know where I stand in the matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有注意到狗妈妈被称为“母狗”，而猫被称为“女王”？{smug}我知道我在这件事上的立场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们说点别的吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder if beards are as hot and itchy as they look. They must be hell in the desert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道胡子是不是像看上去那样又热又痒，这玩意在沙漠里一定是地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们说点别的吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you just smack Firefly around and put him in his place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不揍萤火虫一顿，让他认清自己的位置？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've showed him the inside of my gun barrel, and he didn't even flinch. If he wasn't so young and useful, I would've kicked his ass out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给他看了我枪管的内部，他甚至都没有退缩。要不是他年轻又有用，我早就把他赶出去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Isn't Firefly old too?
ESP.TRADUIT: 萤火虫不是也老了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. It's one of the few things he was willing to tell us after randomly showing up one day in rough shape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。这是他有一天状态糟糕的突然出现后愿意告诉我们的为数不多的几件事之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's right about that army. They're trying to wipe out a virus by killing all potential carriers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他对军队的看法是对的，他们试图通过杀死所有潜在的携带者来消灭病毒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {in a "well, I'll be" tone}Son of a bitch! He said the exact same thing! I'd thought that the radiation had fried his brain.{allows another speech option for Firefly}
ESP.TRADUIT: {in a "well, I'll be" tone}狗娘养的！他也说了同样的话！我还以为是辐射灼伤了他的大脑。{allows another speech option for Firefly}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, it doesn't change the fact that we're running out of food.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，这并不能改变我们的食物正在耗尽的事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.FireflyTipOff to 1
Shoot first and ask questions never? Are you sure you're not part of the death squad?
ESP.TRADUIT: 先开枪，不问问题？你确定你不是暗杀小队的成员？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They can go to hell! I neutralized--{breaking himself of euphemism habit}killed-- Dullahan to slow them down,
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们都下地狱吧！我压制{breaking himself of euphemism habit}杀死了杜拉尔罕来拖住他们，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: but that asshole, Renato, just keeps frying good men into zombies. Until I see his head on a fucking plate, I'm not budging!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但那个混蛋雷纳托，总是把好人油炸成僵尸。在我看到他的头被放在盘子里之前，我不会让步的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDullahanQuest.HotShot to 1
The death squad is top secret, so how did you know that they're trying to exterminate a virus?
ESP.TRADUIT: 暗杀小队是最高机密，你怎么知道他们要消灭一种病毒？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could ask you the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也想问你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Onwards!
ESP.TRADUIT: 前进！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Farewell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {upset and shocked}Do you have any idea how long it took me to write that new manuscript?
ESP.TRADUIT: {upset and shocked}你知道我写那篇新稿子花了多长时间吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. I've only slept through sixty-odd renditions of "Mr. Whiskers Champions the Earth," so two years?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我只睡过了六十多遍《胡须先生保卫地球》，所以两年？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {angry}Where is it, and I don't mean the fake!
ESP.TRADUIT: {angry}在哪里，我不是说假的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {tired and annoyed}Kid, I don't even remember what I did yesterday. Do something useful for once and find it yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: {tired and annoyed}孩子，我都不记得昨天做了什么。做一些有用的事情，自己去找。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {childish rage from shock}I--! I hate you! I'll write you into my next play and, and kill you off!
ESP.TRADUIT: {childish rage from shock}我...！我讨厌你！我要把你写进我的下一个剧本，然后把你杀了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {eyes rolling}It's the prospect of another one that really kills me.
ESP.TRADUIT: {eyes rolling}再来一次的可能性才真的要我的命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fantastic! A little chaos will do the town good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了！一点点混乱对小镇有好处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted BDBoulderGremlin 30 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderGremlin 40 1 abOldDeathClawREF.enable
I can't do that right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在不能那么做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There’s nothing to think about! Either you want to get in that Dome, or you don’t.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么好想的！你要么想进巨蛋，要么不想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woof!
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hsss!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you have an ass to lick?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有屁股可舔了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rrrow!
ESP.TRADUIT: 咕噜！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, "meow" to you too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，也对你 "喵"。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *trill* Meow?
ESP.TRADUIT: *颤音*喵？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for listening! Peace out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢收听！再见啦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mark [0108347C] (mod) NPC : Mark [01083742] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: MarkREF.PlayIdle LooseWaveHello MarkRef.setrestrained 0 set BDBoulderPerformances.MarkPerforming to 0 set MarkRef.playonce to 0 MarkRef.removescriptpackage MarkRef.evp
{a bit surprised}Not sure how I could, seeing how it's an invention of science-fiction.
ESP.TRADUIT: {a bit surprised}我不知道我怎么能做到，毕竟这只是科幻小说里的发明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDPanRef.bTacticsWarpOn to 0
Don't warp to me no matter how far away you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你离我有多远，都不要向我传送。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {thinks PC is insane}Sooo, I'm supposed to teleport now. I guess I'll just twitch my nose and--{realizes he has none}oh, wait...
ESP.TRADUIT: {thinks PC is insane}所以，我现在应该瞬移了。我想我只要抽动鼻子就行了...{realizes he has none}哦，等等...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDPanRef.bTacticsWarpOn to 1
Warp to me if you get too far away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你走得太远，就传送到我这里来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm parched. Is there a toilet around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我渴了，这附近有厕所吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not so much of a bathroom as it is a cliff, but don't worry, there are plenty of stalagmites to hang on to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与其说是一个浴室，不如说是一个悬崖，但别担心，有很多石笋可以抓住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do your glasses to stay on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的眼镜是怎么戴上的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, Nature's duct tape of course. Scabs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然是天然胶布，痂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会怎么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Boulder's official Social Activities Coordinator. I plan the chess tournaments, Movie Night, concerts, and plays.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是博尔德官方的社会活动协调员。我安排国际象棋比赛，电影之夜，音乐会和戏剧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I used to play the tree too, but all that dancing and claw-sharpening really hurt my back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以前也玩过树，但那些跳舞和磨爪子的动作真的伤了我的背。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's around town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 镇上有什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The heart of town is the stage, but don't expect to see too much going on. Poor Deadpan's had writer's block for years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小镇的中心是舞台，但不要期待看到太多的表演，可怜的冷面作家已经文思枯竭好几年了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, when you face it, on your left you'll find the clinic and Main Street, and behind the projector is the workshop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，当你面对它的时候，在你的左边你会发现诊所和主街，在投影仪的后面是车间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the right is the library up on the hill, and next to that is the Shrine of the Stork.
ESP.TRADUIT: 右边是山上的图书馆，旁边是鹳鸟神殿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Behind the stage is Dump Cave. I'll give you {slight emph}two guesses what that's for. We also have a lovely park. You'll find the stairs near the workshop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 舞台后面是倾倒坑，我给你{slight emph}两个猜测是干什么的。我们还有一个可爱的公园，你可以在车间附近找到楼梯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {better than alternative}Had you said, "Don't move a muscle," my heart would've stopped.
ESP.TRADUIT: {better than alternative}如果你说"不许动"，我的心脏就会停止跳动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDPanRef.bTacticsWaitSandbox to 0 BDDPanRef.EVP
When waiting, guard the spot I leave you at and don't wander.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等待的时候，守住我留给你的地方，不要乱走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sarcastic appreciation}Oh, how generous of you!
ESP.TRADUIT: {sarcastic appreciation}噢，你真是太慷慨了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDPanRef.bTacticsWaitSandbox to 1 BDDPanRef.EVP
When waiting, relax a bit in the general area I leave you but don't go too far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等待的时候，在我留给你的大致区域放松一下，但不要走得太远。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's it like to be so old?
ESP.TRADUIT: 年纪这么大是什么感觉？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if it still exists, but back when I was a kid, we all had to go to a place called "school" to learn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道它是否还存在，但在我小的时候，我们都要去一个叫“学校”的地方学习。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: And to this day, I still dream that I'm late for a test, naked, and can't remember my locker combination.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直到今天，我还会梦到自己考试迟到了，光着屁股，忘了储物柜的密码。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Other than that, all those aches and pains in your heart settle down in your knees, {satisfied}which is a fair enough trade-off, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除此之外，你内心所有的疼痛都在你的膝盖上安顿了下来，{satisfied}我认为这是一个足够公平的交换。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sighing, heart aflutter}For a place full of fire, it sure is heavenly.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sighing, heart aflutter}对于一个充满火焰的地方来说，这确实是天堂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, all you guys look like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，你们看起来都这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {curious, a little flattered}Really? I didn't think I smiled nearly as much as Gigi.
ESP.TRADUIT: {curious, a little flattered}真的？我觉得我没有琪琪笑得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I shall cheat like the wind!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要像风一样作弊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDPanRef.bTacticsCheating to 1
Ignore prohibited area and item restrictions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忽略禁区和物品限制。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't aware that there were any rules left, but okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道还有什么规矩，不过没关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDPanRef.bTacticsCheating to 0
Obey prohibited area and item restrictions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 遵守禁区和物品限制。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It may shock you to learn that the library isn't under construction. It's supposed to look this way...supposedly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能会惊讶地发现图书馆并没有在建设中。它应该是这样的...应该是这样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This area is affectionately known as...<sighs>"Dump Cave." Not much to see, and that's the way we like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地区被人们亲切地称为...<叹气>“倾倒坑”。没什么好看的，我们就喜欢这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {trying to think of retort}Then...{fails and quickly blurts out rest}consider yourself slain!
ESP.TRADUIT: {trying to think of retort}那...{fails and quickly blurts out rest}就当你死了吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {happy, dramatically calls her to adventure!}Come, my putrid princess! Stick with us and the meat of a thousand beasts shall fill your chalice!
ESP.TRADUIT: {happy, dramatically calls her to adventure!}来吧，我的腐烂公主！跟我们在一起，千头野兽的肉将填满你的圣杯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: BDDPanRef.RemoveScriptPackage BDLenoreDecide BDDPanRef.resetai
BDDPanRef.Say DPLenoreCome1
Of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to talk to you about something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想和你谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {mild pride}Aside from writing, I'm a skilled swordsman, {bright-eyed}and my weapon is an exquisite antique sword cane...with a venomous bite!
ESP.TRADUIT: {mild pride}除了写作，我剑术精湛，{bright-eyed}我的武器是一把精致的古董剑杖...淬了毒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {much less enthusiastic}I also possess a small firearm, but the last time Dad took me to the shooting range, the Earth was still green.
ESP.TRADUIT: {much less enthusiastic}我也有一把小枪，但上次爸爸带我去射击场的时候，地球还是绿色的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can spare any stimpaks, powders, or doctor's bags, I know enough first aid to take care of myself. Antivenom should prove useful as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能给我一些治疗针、治疗粉或医疗包，我拥有足够的急救知识来照顾自己。抗毒血清也应该有用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of skills do you have?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么技能？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can smuggle both holdout and improved holdout weapons on my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以自己偷运可藏匿武器和改装可藏匿武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want me to smuggle your improved holdout weapons for you, give them to me before we are searched.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想让我帮你偷运改装过的可藏匿武器，在我们被搜查之前给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are you at handling holdout weapons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能处理可藏匿武器？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can only smuggle holdout weapons, not improved holdout weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只能偷运可藏匿武器，不能偷运改装过的可藏匿武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, if you are sneaky enough, your skill will enable me to smuggle improved holdout weapons as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，如果你足够狡猾，你的潜行技能也可以让我偷运改装过的可藏匿武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are you at handling holdout weapons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能处理可藏匿武器？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {affirmative}Simon says, "will do."
ESP.TRADUIT: {affirmative}西蒙说:“我愿意。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDPanRef.bTacticsAlert to 1
Always draw your weapon whenever I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要我一动手，就一定要拔出你的武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You play the hero; I paint you on a horse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你扮演英雄，我画你在马背上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDPanRef.bTacticsAlert to 0
Only draw your weapon when you sense danger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有在感觉到危险的时候才拔出武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next time, it'll be your head!
ESP.TRADUIT: 下次，就轮到你的头了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;record later
I have other things to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有其他事情要做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no time for that! They'll be back any day to slaughter us,{emph} and you, because you know too much!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没时间了！他们随时都会回来屠杀我们，还有你，因为你知道的太多了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not on my watch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我眼皮底下不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set FireflyRef.SelfDefense to 1 FireflyRef.RemoveFromFaction BDFireflyFamily ; Ingrid shouldn't attack PC for defense FireflyRef.RemoveFromFaction BDBoulderUnderground FireflyRef.StartCombat Player
Stop them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 阻止他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {firm, happy} Then I think we can help each other. The bastard who went rogue and started frying us is Sergeant Renato.
ESP.TRADUIT: {firm, happy} 那么我想我们可以互相帮助。那个叛变并开始陷害我们的混蛋是雷纳托中士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: While Captain Despot outranks him, Renato is still the puppeteer. I want to see his head on a fucking plate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然德斯波特上校的级别比他高，但雷纳托仍然是操纵木偶的人。我要看到他该死的头被端上盘子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: His death isn't enough to stop their next invasion of Boulder, so you'll need to steal their map as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的死不足以阻止他们再次入侵博尔德，所以你还需要偷走他们的地图。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do that, and the town will be secure enough for me to resume scouting duties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那样的话，小镇就安全了，我就可以继续侦查了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDullahanQuest.Infiltrate to 1
I have to think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得考虑一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no time for that! They'll be back any day to slaughter us, {emph}and you, because you know too much!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没时间了！他们随时都会回来屠杀我们，还有你，因为你知道的太多了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {firm}Good luck. You'll need it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {firm}祝你好运。你会需要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDullahanQuest.Accept to 1 Set BDDullahanQuest.Infiltrate to 2 SetObjectiveCompleted BDDullahanQuest 5 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDullahanQuest 10 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDullahanQuest 20 1
Kill...like the wind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀了...像一阵风。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Until I get the head of the asshole sergeant responsible for this mess on a fucking plate, I'm not budging!
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非我把负责这个烂摊子的混蛋中士那该死的头放在盘子上，否则我绝不让步！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDullahanQuest.HotShot to 1
I've managed to get inside their compound, which is how I heard about the bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我设法进入了他们的院子，所以我才知道赏金的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {firm, happy} Then I think we can help each other. The bastard who went rogue and started frying us is Sergeant Renato.
ESP.TRADUIT: {firm, happy} 那么我想我们可以互相帮助。那个叛变并开始陷害我们的混蛋是雷纳托中士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: While Captain Despot outranks him, Renato is still the puppeteer. I want to see his head on a fucking plate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然德斯波特上校的级别比他高，但雷纳托仍然是操纵木偶的人。我要看到他该死的头被端上盘子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: His death isn't enough to stop their next invasion of Boulder, so you'll need to steal their map as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的死不足以阻止他们再次入侵博尔德，所以你还需要偷走他们的地图。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do that, and the town will be secure enough for me to resume scouting duties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那样的话，小镇就安全了，我就可以继续侦查了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDullahanQuest.Infiltrate to 1
Do it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 去做吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You asked for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你自找的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set FireflyRef.SelfDefense to 1 FireflyRef.RemoveFromFaction BDFireflyFamily ; Ingrid shouldn't attack PC for defense FireflyRef.RemoveFromFaction BDBoulderUnderground FireflyRef.StartCombat Player
<Attack> Too slow!
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>太慢了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Agh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837EA]BDDullahanQuest) Dullahan's Call EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: FireflyRef.StartCombat Player
{Weary}Terrible. How do you guys deal with the boredom and starvation?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Weary}太可怕了，你们是怎么应对无聊和饥饿的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: My aim's getting better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我瞄得越来越准了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {panicking}Shit! He's gone zombie!
ESP.TRADUIT: {panicking}该死！他变成僵尸了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: "We need to ready your cat-valry for deployment tonight if we have any hope of resc-mewing my dear Purrst Lady," who's name I forgot.
ESP.TRADUIT: "如果我们有希望救出我亲爱的呼噜女士，我们需要准备好你的猫军团，以便在今晚部署。她的名字我忘了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: *alarmed meows*
ESP.TRADUIT: *警觉的喵*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Fear
NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; reroute to line 10
Our oldest lunar colony has gone feral, de-meow-lishing clay mines, shooting down rockets,
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们最古老的月球殖民地变得野蛮了喵，品尝粘土地雷，击落火箭，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: all in purrotest of my moon taxes, which I only appurroved to fund face transplants for underpurrivileged kittens {emph}and even puppies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切都是在盗用我的“月球税”，我只批准用它来资助缺钱的小猫甚至{emph}小狗的面部移植。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: *uncertain meows*
ESP.TRADUIT: *犹豫的喵*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know it's risky, but this uprising could hairball out of control, shaking the Purrth to it's core. I need my steed, Devon the Rex, to reach her!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这很危险，但这次起义可能会失控，彻底动摇呼噜。我需要我的骏马，霸王龙德文，去救她！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;dummied out. lost audio
Where would the Igneous Kingdom be had I not lay in that bulldozer, saving you from Scar Pei's greedy claw-porations?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要不是我躺在那辆推土机里，把你从刀疤佩贪婪的爪下救出来，火成岩王国会在哪里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;dummied out. lost audio
*contemplative meows*
ESP.TRADUIT: *沉思的喵*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Now, do we purr-sess enough jetpacks for the rest of the dinosaurs and their riders?" Uhh, god. Let's take five before my tongue rolls out.
ESP.TRADUIT: “现在，我们为剩下的恐龙和它们的骑手准备好足够的喷气背包了吗？”噢，天哪，在我吐舌头之前先休息五分钟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderPerformances.Rehearsing to 0 If GameHour < 13 set BDBoulderPerformances.Break1 to 1 else set BDBoulderPerformances.Break2 to 1 endif BoxyRef.removescriptpackage BDBoxyAct WhiskersRef.removescriptpackage BDWhiskersAct WhiskersRef.SetRestrained 0 BoxyRef.SetRestrained 0 BoxyRef.EVP WhiskersRef.EVP
Meow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; scene 3 is eliminated due to lost sound files
No, no, no! This isn't working!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不，不！这行不通！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {defensive} Meow meow!
ESP.TRADUIT: {defensive} 喵喵！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you don't {emph}do dogs, but you're the only one left who can play him! Couldn't you at least wear the costume?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你不{emph}喜欢狗，但你是唯一一个能扮演它的人！你就不能穿上戏服吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meow mew meow!
ESP.TRADUIT: 喵喵喵！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How could Petey not return it?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 珀泰怎么能不还呢？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meow mew mew.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喵喵喵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Knowing him, that's probably what he did. We still have to make ration, so let's go on to the scene where Whiskers rides Devon to the fucking moon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据我所知，他可能就是这么做的。我们还是要定量配给，所以我们继续看胡须骑着德文去月球的那场吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meow meow?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 喵喵？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {"fuck you"}Meow mew...
ESP.TRADUIT: {"fuck you"}喵喵...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: BoxyRef.removescriptpackage WhiskersRef.removescriptpackage BoxyRef.EVP WhiskersRef.EVP If GameHour < 13 set BDBoulderPerformances.Break1 to 1 else set BDBoulderPerformances.Break2 to 1 endif set BDBoulderPerformances.Rehearsing to 0
Who else will do it? Either you put on a dino head and I ride you, or you can have fun convincing Bedpan to chop up his precious masterpiece.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有谁会这样做？要么你戴上恐龙头，我骑你，要么你就尽情说服便盆剁碎他珍贵的杰作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: {thinking}Not yet, but soon. I've started a new list.
ESP.TRADUIT: {thinking}还没有，但很快。我已经开始了一个新的清单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A little colder than I expected. I'd hate to imagine what'll happen to all those ferals when it snows.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比我想象的要冷一些，我真不敢想象下雪的时候那些野性尸鬼会怎样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay for now. A few more days' worth at least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在还好，至少还能再坚持几天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {unsure}They seem to be okay with it. They're getting more grabby, though. I'm not sure if that's good or bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: {unsure}他们似乎不介意。不过，他们越来越贪得无厌了，我不知道这是好是坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want ghouls for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要食尸鬼干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Important scientific research...{fantasizing a little, innuendo}and maybe a bit of poking and prodding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 重要的科学研究...{fantasizing a little, innuendo}也许还会调整改造一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My friend here is a ghoul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的朋友是个食尸鬼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {changes tune, happy}Well, why didn't you say so! Come on in. Crick will fill you in on what we're doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: {changes tune, happy}唉，你怎么不早说呢！请进，克里基特会告诉你我们在做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDCricketMuDialogue 10
