{patronizing}Wooow, we could really use one of those! How about you just leave your head at the door, so you can go on vacation at the same time!
ESP.TRADUIT: {patronizing}哇，我们真的可以用这个东西！不如你把脑袋留在门口，这样你们就可以同时去度假了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can do stuff! I'm a paperweight!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能做很多事！我可以是镇纸！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {relief}You have no idea how often wannabe treasure hunters try to pick our lock. It's great to meet someone who actually gives a damn about the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: {relief}你不知道有多少想寻宝的人想撬开我们的锁。见到一个真正关心未来的人真是太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crick will fill you in on what we're doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克里克会告诉你我们在做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDCricketMuDialogue 10
Your experiments will require a control group, so you'll have to study humans eventually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们的实验需要一个对照组，所以你们最终必须研究人类。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. We could use some sandwiches. Crick will fill you in on what we're doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对。我们可以吃点三明治，克里克会告诉你我们在做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDCricketMuDialogue 10 rewardxp 50
Despite being a human, you're obviously vital to the project, so why couldn't I contribute?
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管你是人类，但你显然对这个项目至关重要，为什么我不能贡献点什么呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, really? That's news to me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，真的吗？这对我来说可是个新闻！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a human!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个人类！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you love the way ghouls purr when they talk? I could listen to that all night long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不喜欢食尸鬼说话时发出的咕噜声吗？我可以听一整晚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {shocked, giddy}I know, right? Most people think it's gross, but everyone needs love! Come on in. I think you'd appreciate what we've been working on.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shocked, giddy}我知道，对吧？大多数人认为这很恶心，但每个人都需要爱！请进，我想你会欣赏我们的努力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDCricketMuDialogue 10
{shocked, giddy}I know, right? Most people think it's gross, but everyone needs love! Come on in. I think you'd appreciate what we've been working on.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shocked, giddy}我知道，对吧？大多数人认为这很恶心，但每个人都需要爱！请进，我想你会欣赏我们的努力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDCricketMuDialogue 10
{shocked, giddy}I know, right? Most people think it's gross, but everyone needs love! Come on in. I think you'd appreciate what we've been working on.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shocked, giddy}我知道，对吧？大多数人认为这很恶心，但每个人都需要爱！请进，我想你会欣赏我们的努力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDCricketMuDialogue 10
{shocked, giddy}I know, right? Most people think it's gross, but everyone needs love! Come on in. I think you'd appreciate what we've been working on.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shocked, giddy}我知道，对吧？大多数人认为这很恶心，但每个人都需要爱！请进，我想你会欣赏我们的努力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDCricketMuDialogue 10
Forget it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on! Scram!
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续！快滚！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: if GetQuestRunning abCricketsQuest == 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed abCricketsQuest 15 1 endif
Thirty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 三十。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Times?
ESP.TRADUIT: 时间？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Weeks in a row.
ESP.TRADUIT: 连续几周。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing out here in such a dangerous area?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这么危险的地方做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sounds like an emotional, rehearsed sales pitch}Imagine that dear old Grandpop has wandered off, forgetting every face he's ever seen and every thing he's ever known, even how to talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sounds like an emotional, rehearsed sales pitch}想象一下，亲爱的老爷爷走丢了，忘记了他见过的每一张脸，忘记了他知道的每一件事，甚至忘记了如何说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {complete sympathy for ferals}He's hungry, alone, and scared. He doesn't know what he'll eat or what might eat him. Is it any wonder when one of the neighbor kids loses a face?
ESP.TRADUIT: {complete sympathy for ferals}他很饿，很孤独，很害怕。他不知道自己会吃什么，也不知道什么会吃掉他。邻居家的一个孩子失去了脸，这有什么好奇怪的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, envision a center where he can be rehabilitated in peace and flushed clean of radiation's {former radiation addict, still misses it, but pretends not to}...alluring glow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，设想一个中心，在那里他可以平静地康复，并清除辐射...{former radiation addict, still misses it, but pretends not to}迷人的光芒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: A hop, skip, and a decade later, he hugs you hello and with tears in his eyes says, "I could sure go for one of your famous apple pies, Jerry!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 一蹦一跳，十年后，他拥抱你，含着泪说:“杰瑞，我一定会去吃你那著名的苹果派！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this supposed to be the center you were talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是你说的那个中心吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someday, I hope. Pinpointing the exact conditions that cause ghouls to develop feral aggression has been...discouraging.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望有一天。精确地找出导致食尸鬼产生野性攻击性的确切条件是...令人沮丧的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: No doubt you've noticed those cybernetic ferals roaming around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问，你已经注意到那些在周围游荡的受控野性尸鬼了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {has something to hide, but trying to act casual}Mu mentioned seeing one or two.
ESP.TRADUIT: {has something to hide, but trying to act casual}穆说见过一两个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's all the racket behind the locked door?
ESP.TRADUIT: 锁着的门后面是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {slightly nervous, has something to hide}Just a few patients. They get a little restless between meals.
ESP.TRADUIT: {slightly nervous, has something to hide}几个病人。他们会在两餐之间变得焦躁不安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood of Steel wants their ferals back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钢铁兄弟会想要回他们的野性尸鬼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {defends action passionately}Of all the medicines and therapy I've tried, nothing keeps them calm like that mind-control tech in their heads!
ESP.TRADUIT: {defends action passionately}在我试过的所有药物和疗法中，没有什么能像大脑中的精神控制技术那样让他们保持冷静！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I could figure out which parts of the brain are affected and how, do you know how many people I could save? Not just ghouls, but humans as well!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我能弄清楚大脑的哪些部分受到了影响以及如何受到影响，你知道我能救多少人吗？不仅是食尸鬼，还有人类！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {disgust}Give me one good reason why I should let people die so the Brotherhood can play moon rovers with sick people!
ESP.TRADUIT: {disgust}给我一个好的理由，我为什么要让人们死去，以便兄弟会可以和病人一起玩月球车！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: pms GlowingOneFXShader
set BDCricketMuDialogue.FrankoCanDie to 1
{frustrated, weary}What else is there to say?
ESP.TRADUIT: {frustrated, weary}还有什么要说的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk about those ferals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈那些野性尸鬼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> My fists!
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我的拳头！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {rage, shock, just assaulted}Shit! As if there aren't enough of you assholes out there!
ESP.TRADUIT: {rage, shock, just assaulted}该死！好像你们这种混蛋还不够多似的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: CricketRef.StartCombat Player SetEnemy BDCricketFaction PlayerFaction SetStage BDCricketMuDialogue 20
[FAILED] {angry, from personal experience}My patients are {emph}people, not {emph}things! It's that kind of attitude that gets us shot just for stepping outside!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {angry, from personal experience}我的病人是{emph}人，不是{emph}物品！就是这种态度，我们只要走出去就会挨枪子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: sms GlowingOneFXShader
Those ferals belong to the Brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些野性尸鬼是兄弟会的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {pissed at self, starts off quickly}[SUCCEEDED] Shit! Shit! Shit! Mu said they wouldn't miss one or two! Let's just keep this quiet and I'll have Mu take them back.
ESP.TRADUIT: {pissed at self, starts off quickly}[成功] 该死！该死！该死！穆说他们一两个都不会漏掉！别声张，我让穆把他们送回去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDCricketMuDialogue.QuestDone to 1 set BDCricketMuDialogue.GhoulsHome to 1 CricketRef.AddScriptPackage BDCricketTalkMuFerals set BDCricketMuDialogue.NoStop to 1 rewardxp 50 setstage abCricketsQuest 21 set abGuileTalkQ.abCricketAgreedStop to 1
The Brotherhood is tracking them, and once they catch you, they'll erase you and all your progress.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会在追踪他们，一旦他们抓到你，就会把你和你所有的进展都抹掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you should continue with your studies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为你应该继续你的学业。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do too, but if they've got people actively looking for my patients, how can we keep them from breaking down the door?{hyperbole, not serious} Throw them to the cannibals?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也是，但如果他们让人积极寻找我的病人，我们怎么能阻止他们破门而入？扔给食人族？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> I talked to the head of the Brotherhood's project, and he wants to make a deal with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>我和兄弟会项目的负责人谈过了，他想和你做笔交易。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {suspicious}What could he possibly want from the people who kidnapped their {disgust}toys? {angry}I'm not going to help him make better slaves, if that's what he's after.
ESP.TRADUIT: {suspicious}他想从绑架他们{disgust}玩具的人那里得到什么？{angry}我不会帮他制造更好的奴隶，如果他想要的是这个的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> Try "goodbye"!
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>试着说“再见”！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {rage, shock, just assaulted}Shit! As if there aren't enough of you assholes out there!
ESP.TRADUIT: {rage, shock, just assaulted}该死！好像你们这种混蛋还不够多似的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: pms GlowingOneFXShader
CricketRef.StartCombat Player SetEnemy BDCricketFaction PlayerFaction SetStage BDCricketMuDialogue 20
Never mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: sms GlowingOneFXShader
{calling the ferals, sighing. Sad and angry}Come on, Bob. You too Alice. Time to go back.
ESP.TRADUIT: {calling the ferals, sighing. Sad and angry}来吧，鲍勃，你也是，艾丽丝。该回去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: MuRef.AddScriptPackage BDMuFeralReturn AliceGhoulRef.resetai BobGhoulRef.resetai
{urgent, nervous}Mu, I need you to take Alice and Bob back before the Brotherhood catches us with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: {urgent, nervous}穆，我要你在兄弟会抓到我们之前把艾丽丝和鲍勃带回去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sad, thinks of them like cute dogs}But they don't want to go back. They followed me home.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sad, thinks of them like cute dogs}但他们不想回去，他们跟着我回家了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {stressed}I know, I know, but we can't afford to lose what little knowledge we've gained from them.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stressed}我知道，我知道，但我们不能失去我们从他们那里获得的一些知识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {irritated}Fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: {irritated}好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: CricketRef.sms GlowingOneFXShader set BDCricketMuDialogue.NoStop to 0 MuRef.ResetAi CricketRef.ResetAi
Well, yeah. You keep feeding him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，是的。你继续喂他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I say? I've got a soft spot for decaying creatures, large {emph}and small. Anyway, he did the damnedest thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能说什么呢？我对腐烂的生物很有好感，无论大{emph}小。不管怎样，他做了最可恶的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {friendly teasing}More damnedester than his terrifying meow?
ESP.TRADUIT: {friendly teasing}比他可怕的喵喵叫更可恶？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {defensive, but affectionate}Hey, it's not like we had those things back east! Anyway, all I had was toast, so I say, "Sorry, buddy. You're looking at a bread sandwich."
ESP.TRADUIT: {defensive, but affectionate}嘿，我们东部又没有这种东西！总之，我吃的都是面包，所以我说"对不起，伙计，你现在看到的是一个面包三明治。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {flat sarcasm}Wow. My mind...oh, how you've blown it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {flat sarcasm}哇哦。我的理智...噢，你怎么搞砸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It should be because {emph}then he rolled over! I say, "What kind of carnivore wants bread?" and he rolls over again! He wouldn't eat it though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 应该是这样，因为{emph}他翻了身！我说"什么样的食肉动物会想吃面包？"然后他又翻了个身！但他不肯吃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: If BDDPanRef.GetinCell BDCricketLab && BDDPanLenoreQuest.DoOnceMu == 0 set BDDPanLenoreQuest.SightingMu to 1 BDDPanRef.AddScriptPackage BDLenoreGreetSightingPKG endif
{mulling it over}That {emph}is weird. Could you let me know if he displays any other unusual behaviors?
ESP.TRADUIT: {mulling it over}这很{emph}奇怪。你能告诉我它还有什么不寻常的行为吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: MuRef.RemoveScriptPackage BDCricketMuCat CricketRef.RemoveScriptPackage BDCricketTemp
Something doesn't feel right about this. I'm coming with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这事有点不对劲，我和你一起去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: MuRef.AddScriptPackage DefaultFollowPlayerClose
I have a question about "Peeping Thomas."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个关于"偷窥狂托马斯"的问题.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a question about that cat you saw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于你看到的那只猫，我有个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 比如？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did the cat have spots?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那只猫身上有斑点吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was hard to tell with all the scabs, but I think so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有那么多结痂，看不出来，但我想是有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know where that cat went?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道那只猫去哪了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The last time I saw him, he ran off towards the dump. {shrugs}I guess he really hates toast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最后一次见到他时，他朝垃圾场跑去了。{shrugs}我猜他真的很讨厌烤面包。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted BDDPanLenoreQuest 25 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDPanLenoreQuest 30 1
My companion wants to know if Thomas really has testicles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的同伴想知道托马斯是否真的有睾丸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How should I know? It's not like I go sticking my face in cats' asses!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么知道？我又不会把脸贴在猫的屁股上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Testing, one, two, three...
ESP.TRADUIT: 测试，一，二，三...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowMessage BDDPanMesgTestModeEnabled BDDPanQuest.iVersion Set BDDPanQuest.bTestMode to 1
Enable test mode messages.
ESP.TRADUIT: 启用测试模式消息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad that's over. Did I pass?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴结束了。我通过了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDDPanQuest.bTestMode to 0
Disable test mode messages.
ESP.TRADUIT: 禁用测试模式消息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if he does, how else would you find out his plans and methods?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算他做了，你还怎么知道他的计划和方法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {considers it}You're right. It's my responsibility to at least try and reason with him, and if he wants to play dirty instead, {determined}I'll play dirty. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: {considers it}你说得对。我有责任至少试着跟他讲道理，如果他想玩阴的，{determined}我就玩阴的。我们走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: sms GlowingOneFXShader

setstage abCricketsQuest 40 set BDCricketMuDialogue.QuestDone to 1 ;CricketRef.ResetAI MuRef.ResetAI CricketRef.AddScriptPackage abCricketFollowPlayerClose ;MuRef.AddScriptPackage abCricketFollowPlayerClose MuRef.Sayto CricketRef MuSuspicious
I see your point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白你的意思了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {uncertain about skipping talks}I have to admit, it seems too obvious to be an actual trap.
ESP.TRADUIT: {uncertain about skipping talks}我得承认，这太明显了，不像是陷阱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: sms GlowingOneFXShader
Mu!!!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry. They trust me, so I'll make sure they *never* bother you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心。他们信任我，所以我会保证他们*永远*不会再来打扰你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {edgy}When you say, {repeats it back in ominous way, implying that's how player said it}"never bother you again," you're not talking about murder, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: {edgy}你说的{repeats it back in ominous way, implying that's how player said it}"不会再来打扰"意思不会是谋杀吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: sms GlowingOneFXShader pms GlowingOneFXShader
sms GlowingOneFXShader setstage abCricketsQuest 23 set abGuileTalkQ.abCaveOption to 1
I don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {determined}Well, they're not here yet, and there's got to be something in the machinery I can jam to buy us some time...
ESP.TRADUIT: {determined}好吧，他们还没来，机器里肯定有什么我可以塞进去的东西，为我们争取点时间...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [01083735] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: sms GlowingOneFXShader
{authoritative}Connie Wight, for your crimes against the town of Boulder under the guise of the so-called gremlin, I hereby banish you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {authoritative}康妮·怀特，鉴于你以所谓小魔怪的名义对博尔德镇犯下的罪行，我在此驱逐你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {pissed}Good! This place is a godforsaken dump! You can't just paint a prison and expect people to call it home! I'd rather be dead!
ESP.TRADUIT: {pissed}很好！这地方真是个该死的垃圾场！你不能只是粉刷了一座监狱，就指望人们把它叫做家！我宁愿去死！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: That isn't really my best work...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是我最好的作品...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want Lenore to focus on abominations like nightstalkers, cannibals, and deathclaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让丽诺儿把注意力集中在那些可憎的东西上，比如夜行族，食人族，还有死亡爪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Here is a list of items that I'll need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，这是我需要的物品清单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837ED]BDLenoreTrainQuest) Lenore Upgrade Training EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddNote BDLenoreTrainAbo set BDLenoreTrainQuest.Train to 1
I want Lenore to focus on humans, ghouls, and super mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让丽诺儿专注于人类，食尸鬼和超级变种人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Here is a list of items that I'll need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，这是我需要的物品清单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837ED]BDLenoreTrainQuest) Lenore Upgrade Training EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddNote BDLenoreTrainHum set BDLenoreTrainQuest.Train to 4
I want Lenore to focus on animals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让丽诺儿专注于动物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Here is a list of items that I'll need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，这是我需要的物品清单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837ED]BDLenoreTrainQuest) Lenore Upgrade Training EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddNote BDLenoreTrainAnim set BDLenoreTrainQuest.Train to 2
I want Lenore to focus on insects.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让丽诺儿专注于昆虫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {teasing, but flat for comic effect}Act now, and I'll throw in arachnid training for the low, low price of a pat on the head. Here is a list of items that I'll need.
ESP.TRADUIT: {teasing, but flat for comic effect}现在就行动吧，我将提供蛛形纲训练，只要你花很少的钱。这是我需要的物品清单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837ED]BDLenoreTrainQuest) Lenore Upgrade Training EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddNote BDLenoreTrainBug set BDLenoreTrainQuest.Train to 3
{JTown, Abo}Splendid! In three days hence, we shall return to Jacobstown. Take care, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: {JTown, Abo}好极了！三天后，我们将返回雅各布斯镇。保重，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837ED]BDLenoreTrainQuest) Lenore Upgrade Training EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDLenoreTrainQuest 10 Player.RemoveItem NVCentaurBlood 1 Player.RemoveItem DeathclawHand 1 Player.RemoveItem DeathclawEggNV 1 Player.RemoveItem NightStalkerBlood 1 Player.RemoveItem NightStalkerEgg 1 Player.RemoveItem NightStalkerTail 1 Player.RemoveItem abCannibalMeat 1
Here are the anti-abomination supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是克制可憎的生物的用品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Boulder, Abo}Splendid! In three days hence, we shall return to Boulder. Take care, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Boulder, Abo}好极了！三天后，我们将返回博尔德。保重，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837ED]BDLenoreTrainQuest) Lenore Upgrade Training EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDLenoreTrainQuest 10 Player.RemoveItem NVCentaurBlood 1 Player.RemoveItem DeathclawHand 1 Player.RemoveItem DeathclawEggNV 1 Player.RemoveItem NightStalkerBlood 1 Player.RemoveItem NightStalkerEgg 1 Player.RemoveItem NightStalkerTail 1 Player.RemoveItem abCannibalMeat 1
Here are the anti-abomination supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是克制可憎的生物的用品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Boulder, Anim}Splendid! In three days hence, we shall return to Boulder. Take care, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Boulder, Anim}好极了！三天后，我们将返回博尔德。保重，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837ED]BDLenoreTrainQuest) Lenore Upgrade Training EmotionType : Happy

Here are the anti-animal supplies.

ESP.TRADUIT: {Jtown, Anim}好极了！三天后，我们将返回雅各布斯镇。保重，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837ED]BDLenoreTrainQuest) Lenore Upgrade Training EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDLenoreTrainQuest 10 Player.RemoveItem BigHornerMeat 1 Player.RemoveItem BrahminMeat 1 Player.RemoveItem CoyoteMeat 1 Player.RemoveItem DogMeat 1 Player.RemoveItem GeckoEgg 1 Player.RemoveItem NVGeckoMeat 1 Player.RemoveItem GiantRatMeat 1 Player.RemoveItem MoleRatMeat 1 Player.RemoveItem LakeLurkMeat 1 Player.RemoveItem LakelurkEgg 1

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Jtown, Bug}Splendid! In three days hence, we shall return to Jacobstown. Take care, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Jtown, Bug}好极了！三天后，我们将返回雅各布斯镇。保重，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837ED]BDLenoreTrainQuest) Lenore Upgrade Training EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDLenoreTrainQuest 10 Player.RemoveItem BloatflyMeat 1 Player.RemoveItem CazadorEgg 1 Player.RemoveItem FireAntMeat 1 Player.RemoveItem FireAntEgg 1 Player.RemoveItem abIAAlbinoAntMeat 1 Player.RemoveItem AntMeat 1 Player.RemoveItem abIAAlbinoAntEgg 1 Player.RemoveItem AntEgg 1 Player.RemoveItem MantisLeg 1 Player.RemoveItem MantisEgg 1 Player.RemoveItem RadroachMeat 1

ESP.TRADUIT: {Boulder, Bug}好极了！三天后，我们将返回博尔德。保重，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837ED]BDLenoreTrainQuest) Lenore Upgrade Training EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDLenoreTrainQuest 10 Player.RemoveItem BloatflyMeat 1 Player.RemoveItem CazadorEgg 1 Player.RemoveItem FireAntMeat 1 Player.RemoveItem FireAntEgg 1 Player.RemoveItem abIAAlbinoAntMeat 1 Player.RemoveItem AntMeat 1 Player.RemoveItem abIAAlbinoAntEgg 1 Player.RemoveItem AntEgg 1 Player.RemoveItem MantisLeg 1 Player.RemoveItem MantisEgg 1 Player.RemoveItem RadroachMeat 1

ESP.TRADUIT: {Boulder, Hum}好极了！三天后，我们将返回博尔德。保重，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837ED]BDLenoreTrainQuest) Lenore Upgrade Training EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDLenoreTrainQuest 10 Player.RemoveItem WeapMinigun 1 Player.RemoveItem StealthBoy 1 Player.RemoveItem WeapNVBumperSword 1 Player.RemoveItem HumanFlesh 5 BDDPanRef.AddItem WeapMinigun 1 BDDPanRef.AddItem WeapNVBumperSword 1
Here are the anti-humanoid supplies
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是克制人类的用品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {JTown, Hum}Splendid! In three days hence, we shall return to Jacobstown. Take care, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: {JTown, Hum}好极了！三天后，我们将返回雅各布斯镇。保重，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837ED]BDLenoreTrainQuest) Lenore Upgrade Training EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDLenoreTrainQuest 10 Player.RemoveItem WeapMinigun 1 Player.RemoveItem WeapNVBumperSword 1 Player.RemoveItem HumanFlesh 5 Player.RemoveItem StealthBoy 1 BDDPanRef.AddItem WeapMinigun 1 BDDPanRef.AddItem WeapNVBumperSword 1
Here are the anti-humanoid supplies
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是克制人类的用品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jackie All-Trades of the Gofer Gang, at your service!
ESP.TRADUIT: 高飞帮的万事通杰姬竭诚为您服务！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie All-Trades [01083748] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me? I just make sure no one burns to death at night. Or trips in the morning...{goes on tangent that grows in speed to breathless anxiety}and falls off a cliff and suffers a compound fracture,
ESP.TRADUIT: 我？我要确保没有人晚上烧伤致死，或者早上去旅行{goes on tangent that grows in speed to breathless anxiety}从悬崖上掉下去，遭受复合骨折，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucia [01083751] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: and it goes septic, and while the amputation is successful, a bacterium survives to infect them with gangrene and they die and I'm a murderer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且会出现感染，虽然截肢很成功，但有细菌存活下来，使他们感染坏疽，他们就死了，我就是个杀人犯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucia [01083751] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {fauxlisophical}I can't tell you *who* I am, but I {emph}can tell you what I'm about, {pride}and that's the Plasmatic Soda Machine!
ESP.TRADUIT: {fauxlisophical}我不能告诉你我是*谁*，但我{emph}可以告诉你我是什么人，{pride}那就是等离子汽水机！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mark [01083742] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever heard of Mindy McMillan, the first chair violinist of Blue Sheep Limbo?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过岩羊幽冥的首席小提琴手明迪·麦克米兰吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mindy [01083744] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sighing, sad}<sighs> Of course you haven't, but that's me.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sighing, sad}<叹气>你当然没有，但那就是我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mindy [01083744] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Connie, the librarian. A pleasure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 康妮，图书管理员。幸会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoxyTalk to 1
{depressed, almost muttering}They call me "Chef" Jeff, for some reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: {depressed, almost muttering}不知什么原因，他们都叫我"主厨"杰夫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0108374A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I do is keep the meat from bleeding and the water from glowing, when there is any.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我所做的就是让肉不流血，水不发光，如果有的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0108374A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Nicky, the Gofer Gang's resident Mushroom Technician.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是尼基，高飞帮的常驻蘑菇技术员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nicky [0108374D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Petey's a much better name than "Scar Pei"{"pay"}, don't you think? I'm glad I quit and joined the Gofer Gang, even if Jackie's in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 珀泰这个名字比 "刀疤佩"{"pay"}好听多了，你不觉得吗？我很高兴我辞职加入了高飞帮，即使杰姬也在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey [0108374C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {in character, takes self seriously as a noble official despite horrid puns}I am the Cat-mander in Chief, Mr. Purrsident Whiskers of the Yarn-ited States of Ameri-cat.
ESP.TRADUIT: {in character, takes self seriously as a noble official despite horrid puns}我是猫咪总指挥，猫利坚线球国的喵总统胡须先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {out of character, quiet desperation}God help me. I don't even know who I am any more.
ESP.TRADUIT: {out of character, quiet desperation}愿上帝保佑我，我都不知道自己是谁了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's a "Blue Sheep Limbo"?
ESP.TRADUIT: “岩羊幽冥”是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {a little sad and frustrated}It's {slight emph}supposed to be a band, however A. it's a duo, and B. Mark and I can't really play together.
ESP.TRADUIT: {a little sad and frustrated}这应该是{slight emph}一个乐队，但是第一：这是个二人组合，第二：马克不能跟我一起演奏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mindy [01083744] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.MindyBand to 1
{cocks gun}Keep loitering, and you'll get your wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: {cocks gun}继续闲逛，你的愿望就会实现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; 24/06/12 MoBurma - Moved connie faction stripping to here to stop the most aggravating bug in the world. ConnieRef.AddscriptPackage BDConnieGremlinExile AndreRef.AddscriptPackage BDAndreGremlinExile ConnieRef.RemoveFromFaction BDBoulderUnderground
I found a vendor who's interested in trading with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了一个有兴趣和你做生意的卖家。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sam never mentioned any regular sellers before. What would anyone want from us? Junk?
ESP.TRADUIT: 萨姆从来没提过什么固定卖家。别人想从我们这里得到什么？垃圾？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty much. Everyone uses bottle caps for money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 差不多是这样，每个人都用瓶盖换钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. Well, the Gofers did make some lamps and beaded curtains out of caps...I'll give Sam a few of those the next time he goes out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。好吧，高飞帮确实用瓶盖做了一些灯和串珠窗帘...下次萨姆出去的时候，我会给他一些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivedisplayed BDCarolineTrade 10 1 set BDCarolineEmporium.BoulderTrade to 1
You said you have some work for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你有工作给我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, if you can find the sources of the rumors I've heard. Pick a rumor: one or two?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，如果你能找到我听到的传言的来源。选一个传言：第一个还是第二个？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Curious Caroline [0108373D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's rumor two?
ESP.TRADUIT: 第二个传言是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's said that a forgotten tribe lies deep in the heart of Boulder. If it's true, they've got to be sitting on a mess of old caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说有一个被遗忘的部落深藏在博尔德的中心。如果是真的，他们肯定坐在一堆旧瓶盖上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Curious Caroline [0108373D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they really are real, and you could convince them to establish trade with me, I'll give you a ten percent discount on my wares.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这些货是真的，而且你能说服他们和我做生意，我就给你九折的折扣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Curious Caroline [0108373D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDCarolineEmporium.BoulderTalk to 1
What's rumor one?
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一个传言是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {lowers voice}It's said that somewhere in the Boulder ruins, the voices of unseen children sometimes call from the stores. Some say they're ghosts.
ESP.TRADUIT: {lowers voice}据说，在博尔德废墟的某个地方，商店里有时会传来看不见的孩子们的声音。有人说他们是鬼魂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Others say they're some kind of super ghoul--that the explosion burned their bodies to ash, while radiation keeps their souls from dying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有人说他们是某种超级食尸鬼，爆炸把他们的身体烧成灰烬，而辐射使他们的灵魂免于死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {casual}Whatever the deal is, if you can find the place and bring me back a few reasonably haunted-looking souvenirs, I'll pay you a hundred caps a pop.
ESP.TRADUIT: {casual}不管怎么说，如果你能找到那个地方，给我带回来一些看起来很像闹鬼的纪念品，我就给你一百个瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDCArolineEmporium.ToyStore to 1
Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm all ears.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听着呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Curious Caroline [0108373D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I borrow a book?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能借本书吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only residents can check out books.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有居民可以借书。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, if you were to bring me some new stuff, I'd be willing to look the other way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，如果你能给我带来一些新东西，我愿意睁一只眼闭一只眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does the Gofer Gang do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 高飞帮是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {pep talk, like drill sergeant}What don't we do is more like it! Whether your coat has holes, or your lawn's got moles, we'll fix it! Toaster breaks at 3 AM? We'll fix it!
ESP.TRADUIT: {pep talk, like drill sergeant}我们更接近于什么都做。无论你的外套有洞，或者你的草坪有鼹鼠，我们都会解决！烤面包机凌晨3点坏了？我们可以修好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie All-Trades [01083748] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if it ain't broken, we'll {emph}still fix it because everything works better if it's painted gold!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算它没坏，我们{emph}仍然会修理，因为如果它被涂成金色会工作得更好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie All-Trades [01083748] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.GoferGang to 1
Can you heal my radiation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能治疗我的辐射吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {slight surprise}You're actually clean. Granted, that's weird, but nothing to worry about.
ESP.TRADUIT: {slight surprise}你真的很干净。我承认，这很奇怪，但没什么好担心的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll have you checked out just as soon as I receive your {co-pay}copay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一收到{co-pay}挂号费就会帮你检查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you forget to put on your space helmet before going outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你出门之前忘记戴太空头盔了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm hurt. I need help, Doc.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受伤了。医生，我需要帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {melodramatic concern}Ooh. That's bad. In fact, I've never seen such a horrible, oozing case of...hypochondria!
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，这很糟糕。事实上，我从来没见过这么可怕的，渗出液的...臆想病！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll have you checked out just as soon as I receive your {co-pay}copay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一收到{co-pay}挂号费就会帮你检查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sighing}Come here, and I'll kiss your boo-boos.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sighing}过来，我来亲亲你的小伤口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened? It looks like you tried to eat a porcupine!
ESP.TRADUIT: 发生什么事了？你看起来像是试图吃掉一头豪猪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh...For this, I'd need some grave dirt, candles, and the heart of a baby!
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔...为此，我需要墓土，蜡烛，还有婴儿的心脏！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have anything to treat addiction?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么治疗成瘾的药吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it's anything but a soft bed and a long time, then no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果一张柔软的床和一段时间不是，那就没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd be lucky to find an {fantasizing}ice-cold, frothy beer in these parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这能找到{fantasizing}冰镇的泡沫啤酒就算你走运了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: {wry joking}Sure, as long as you promise to bring me all your booze from now on...for immediate disposal, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: {wry joking}当然，只要你答应从现在起把你所有的酒都带来给我...当然，马上处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you treat my addiction?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能治好我的成瘾吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: How many caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 多少瓶盖？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {laughs}Caps? Seriously? The outside world has actually been reduced to paying its way with trash?
ESP.TRADUIT: {laughs}瓶盖？真的？外面的世界真的沦落到只能用垃圾来支付了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDBoulderDoctor.Payment to 1
Well, what kind of payment do you accept?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你们接受哪种付款方式？

ESP.ORIGINAL: For injury treatment, I'll take a Rad-X or RadAway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 治疗受伤的话，我会用放射线-X或辐特宁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: For radiation, I'll take a Med-X, Stimpak, Super Stim, or even some healing powder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于辐射治疗，我会用注射剂-X、治疗针、超级治疗针，甚至一些治疗粉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDBoulderDoctor.Payment to 2
I thought Ghouls were immune to rads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为食尸鬼对辐射免疫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give Stimpak>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给治疗针>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! Look behind you! Yeah, there! Did you see it? No? Ah, well, you're done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！看你身后！是的，在那里！你看到了吗？没有？好吧，你完成了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage BDBoulderDoctor 30 player.removeitem Stimpak 1
<Give Super Stimpak>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给超级治疗针>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! Look behind you! Yeah, there! Did you see it? No? Ah, well, you're done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！看你身后！是的，在那里！你看到了吗？没有？好吧，你完成了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage BDBoulderDoctor 30 player.removeitem NVSuperStimpak 1
<Give Healing Powder>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给治疗粉>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! Look behind you! Yeah, there! Did you see it? No? Ah, well, you're done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！看你身后！是的，在那里！你看到了吗？没有？好吧，你完成了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage BDBoulderDoctor 30 player.removeitem NVHealingPowder 1
<Give Med-X>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给注射剂-X>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! Look behind you! Yeah, there! Did you see it? No? Ah, well, you're done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！看你身后！是的，在那里！你看到了吗？没有？好吧，你完成了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage BDBoulderDoctor 30 player.removeitem Morphine 1
<Give Rad-X>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给放射线-X>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry. This clinic is equipped with only the latest, state-of-the-art biting sticks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要担心。本诊所只配备了最新、最先进的咬棒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetAv Variable01 1 player.removeitem RadX 1
<Give RadAway>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给辐特宁>

ESP.ORIGINAL: {happy}Don't worry. This clinic is equipped with only the latest, state-of-the-art biting sticks.
ESP.TRADUIT: {happy}不要担心。本诊所配备了最新的、最先进的咬合棒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetAv Variable01 1 player.removeitem RadAway 1
Lying, Congressional Style
ESP.TRADUIT: 国会教你撒谎

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem BookSkillSpeech 1 set BDConnieQuest.TalkToConnie to 2
Chinese Army: Special Ops Training Manual
ESP.TRADUIT: 中国军队：特种作战训练手册

ESP.ORIGINAL: {doesn't care, just cautioning player}Shh! Don't say the "C-word" too loudly.
ESP.TRADUIT: {doesn't care, just cautioning player}嘘！别把“中字”说得太大声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem BookSkillSneak 1 set BDConnieQuest.TalkToConnie to 2
Guns and Bullets
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪与子弹

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's as blunt as it is obvious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既直白又明显。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem BookSkillGuns 1 set BDConnieQuest.TalkToConnie to 2
Duck and Cover!
ESP.TRADUIT: 卧倒与掩蔽！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem BookSkillExplosives 1 set BDConnieQuest.TalkToConnie to 2
Wasteland Survival Guide
ESP.TRADUIT: 废土生存指南

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh! That one's missing a few pages, but it's in great shape compared to the corpse Sam pried it from.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢！那本书少了几页，但和萨姆从尸体上撬出来的那本相比，状态还不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem BookSkillSurvival 1 set BDConnieQuest.TalkToConnie to 2
Nikola Tesla and You
ESP.TRADUIT: 尼古拉·特斯拉与你

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem BookSkillEnergyWeapons 1 set BDConnieQuest.TalkToConnie to 2
Tumblers Today
ESP.TRADUIT: 今日锁具

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem BookSkillLockPicking 1 set BDConnieQuest.TalkToConnie to 2
Grognak the Barbarian
ESP.TRADUIT: 野蛮人歌南

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem BookSkillMelee 1 set BDConnieQuest.TalkToConnie to 2
Tales of a Junktown Jerky Vendor
ESP.TRADUIT: 垃圾镇肉干小贩传奇

ESP.ORIGINAL: A rare example of post-war literature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战后文学的罕见例子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem BookSkillBarter 1 set BDConnieQuest.TalkToConnie to 2
Pugilism Illustrated
ESP.TRADUIT: 拳击画报

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem BookSkillUnarmed 1 set BDConnieQuest.TalkToConnie to 2
D.C. Journal of Internal Medicine
ESP.TRADUIT: 特区内科杂志

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem BookSkillMedicine 1 set BDConnieQuest.TalkToConnie to 2
Dean's Electronics
ESP.TRADUIT: 迪安的电子学

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem BookSkillRepair 1 set BDConnieQuest.TalkToConnie to 2
Big Book of Science
ESP.TRADUIT: 科学大百科

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's as blunt as it is obvious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既直白又明显。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem BookSkillScience 1 set BDConnieQuest.TalkToConnie to 2
Here are the books you asked for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你要的书。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {enthusiastic}Nice work! So, what'll it be?
ESP.TRADUIT: {enthusiastic}干得好！那么，你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDConnieQuest.TalkToConnie to 1
I found some of those haunted items you wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了一些你想要的闹鬼物品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {eager}I've got goose bumps already.
ESP.TRADUIT: {eager}我已经起鸡皮疙瘩了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {casual anecdote to Cricket}Hey, Crick, "Peeping Thomas" is back.
ESP.TRADUIT: {casual anecdote to Cricket}嘿，克里克，"偷窥狂托马斯 "回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mu [01083736] (mod) Quest : ([010837E2]BDCricketMuDialogue) Cricket and Mu's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: About the hat...
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于帽子...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you purify my water?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能净化我的水吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not. There's nothing else to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不，没别的事可做了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0108374A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {slightly annoyed}What water?
ESP.TRADUIT: {slightly annoyed}什么水？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0108374A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't get any cleaner than what you've got, unless you want me to throw in some soap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有比你手上的东西更干净的了，除非你想让我给你加些肥皂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0108374A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: <give irradiated water>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给辐射水>

ESP.ORIGINAL: There you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0108374A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem IrradiatedWaterUnpurified 1 player.additem WaterPurified 1
<give dirty water>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给污水>

ESP.ORIGINAL: There you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0108374A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem WaterUnpurified 1 player.additem WaterPurified 1
How did you get here through all the radiation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么冒着这么强的辐射来到这里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I tell you, how do I know that you're not with those killers that broke into the Dome?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我告诉你，我怎么知道你不是那些闯入巨蛋的杀手的同伙？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for Firefly. Have you seen him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找萤火虫，你见过他吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {day time}He doesn't get up until eleven at night. You do NOT want to wake him.
ESP.TRADUIT: {day time}他直到晚上十一点才起床，你不会想吵醒他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {night}He's on patrol right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: {night}他现在正在巡逻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deadpan's been helping me. He won't let anything bad happen to Boulder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面一直在帮我，他不会让博尔德出事的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DP not hired}Bring him over and prove it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DP not hired}把他带过来证明一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DP hired}{a little wary, but concedes}Okay, I'll tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DP hired}{a little wary, but concedes}好吧，我来告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: A bunch of maniacs broke into the Dome. Mom disappeared, and we thought they killed her, but she found this tunnel and came back to save us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一群疯子闯进了巨蛋。妈妈失踪了，我们以为她被杀了，但她发现了这条隧道，回来救了我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: We got here, and Mom and Andre argued, {finds it strange}like they'd done it before. {angry}Then, she ditched us to go back and fight or whatever, and locked the door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们到这里以后，妈妈和安德烈吵了起来，{finds it strange}就像他们以前做过的一样。{angry}然后，她甩开我们回去吵架什么的，并锁上了门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once things were safe in the Dome she was {emph}supposed to come get us, but the town went and built that {finds it creepy and distasteful}weird shrine thing to seal off the tunnel!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦巨蛋安全了她应该{emph}就会来接我们，但是镇上的人{finds it creepy and distasteful}建了那个奇怪的神殿，封住了隧道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.Tunnel to 1 ShrineActRef.enable ShrineRef.disable 6
What can I do to convince you that I'm on your side?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要怎么做才能让你相信我是站在你这边的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that Andre guy trusts you enough to give you Mom's notes, then I'll tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果那个叫安德烈的信任你愿意把妈妈的笔记给你，那我就告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's Deadpan. See? He trusts me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是冷面，看到了吗？他信任我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {a little wary, but concedes}Okay, I'll tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {a little wary, but concedes}好吧，我来告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: A bunch of maniacs broke into the Dome. Mom disappeared, and we thought they killed her, but she found this tunnel and came back to save us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一群疯子闯进了巨蛋。妈妈失踪了，我们以为她被杀了，但她发现了这条隧道，回来救了我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: We got here, and Mom and Andre argued, {finds it strange}like they'd done it before. {angry}Then, she ditched us to go back and fight or whatever, and locked the door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们到这里以后，妈妈和安德烈吵了起来，{finds it strange}就像他们以前做过的一样。{angry}然后，她甩开我们回去吵架什么的，并锁上了门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once things were safe in the Dome she was {emph}supposed to come get us, but the town went and built that {finds it creepy and distasteful}weird shrine thing to seal off the tunnel!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦巨蛋安全了她应该{emph}就会来接我们，但是镇上的人{finds it creepy and distasteful}建了那个奇怪的神殿，封住了隧道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.Tunnel to 1 ShrineActRef.enable ShrineRef.disable 6
I want to talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈其它的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: OK。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Andre gave me the book, so tell me how you got here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安德烈把书给我了，告诉我你是怎么来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A bunch of maniacs broke into the Dome. Mom disappeared, and we thought they killed her, but she found this tunnel and came back to save us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一群疯子闯进了巨蛋。妈妈失踪了，我们以为她被杀了，但她发现了这条隧道，回来救了我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: We got here, and Mom and Andre argued, {finds it strange}like they'd done it before. {angry}Then, she ditched us to go back and fight or whatever, and locked the door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们到这里以后，妈妈和安德烈吵了起来，{finds it strange}就像他们以前做过的一样。{angry}然后，她甩开我们回去吵架什么的，并锁上了门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once things were safe in the Dome she was {emph}supposed to come get us, but the town went and built that {finds it creepy and distasteful}weird shrine thing to seal off the tunnel!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦巨蛋安全了她应该{emph}就会来接我们，但是镇上的人{finds it creepy and distasteful}建了那个奇怪的神殿，封住了隧道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.Tunnel to 1 ShrineActRef.enable ShrineRef.disable 6
If the tunnel is blocked, how will you get back to the Dome?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果隧道被堵住了，你要怎么回到巨蛋？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {unsure}I'm sure that Andre guy could knock it down, but since we don't know the door's password, we're stuck here until Mom,{grimly, considering likelihood of mom's death} or someone, comes.
ESP.TRADUIT: {unsure}我相信那个叫安德烈的人能把它拆掉，但因为我们不知道那扇门的密码，我们被困在这里，{grimly, considering likelihood of mom's death}直到妈妈或其他人来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't figure out the code in this book from the Dome. Can you help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我搞不懂巨蛋里这本书的密码，你能帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, that's a lot of numbers! If it helps, her favorite lotto numbers were four, sixteen, nine, and seven after Tora's and my birthdays.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，好多数字啊！如果有帮助的话，她最喜欢的乐透号码是4、16、9和7，在托拉和我生日之后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: She also had a thing for cars and liked to give them names that began with the letter "P." Pegasus, Persephone, {beat}Phil. Some kind of old joke, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她还对汽车情有独钟，喜欢给它们起以字母“p”开头的名字。帕伽索斯、珀尔塞福涅{beat}、菲尔。我猜是什么老笑话吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {unsure}Since "E" is the most common letter, maybe she used "P" or one of those numbers instead.
ESP.TRADUIT: {unsure}因为“E”是最常见的字母，也许她用“P”或其他数字代替。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837E4]BDBoulderFireflyFamilyDialogue) Firefly Family Dialogue (except Tora for now) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set BDBoulderEnterDome.CodeHint to 1 ShowMessage BDDomeLogBookDecryptHint SetObjectiveCompleted BDBoulderCodesQuest 15 1
I know that the Dome access tunnel is behind the shrine. I need a way to get through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道巨蛋的通道在神殿的后面，我得想个办法过去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {unpleasantly surprised}The Stork warned us about the Dome being under attack, and the shrine is our last defense if those raiders break through the locked entrance.
ESP.TRADUIT: {unpleasantly surprised}鹳鸟警告过我们巨蛋正在遭受攻击，如果那些掠夺者突破了锁着的入口，神殿将是我们的最后防线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Irritated}What about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Irritated}怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk about the tunnel behind the shrine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈神殿后面的隧道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {mumbling like an ashamed child}I've been trying my best, but it's been hard to think...
ESP.TRADUIT: {mumbling like an ashamed child}我已经尽力了，但是很难想象...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {quick, shameful mumble}Sorry, sir. I-I'll be good.
ESP.TRADUIT: {quick, shameful mumble}对不起，长官，我...我没事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Save it! You don't work, you don't eat! {Jee-jee}Gigi's almost three-hundred years old, and even {emph}she does more in one day than you do in a month!
ESP.TRADUIT: 省省吧！你不工作，你就没饭吃！{Jee-jee}琪琪都快三百岁了，{emph}她一天做的事比你一个月做的还多！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's taking a long time to effectively breed out the toxins in these things. They're not exactly raring to be eaten.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要花很长时间才能有效地清除这些东西里的毒素。它们并不是很渴望被吃掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nicky [0108374D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't let the raiders get to Boulder. I'm here to win back the Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会让掠夺者到达博尔德的，我是来赢回巨蛋的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {disgusted}You, who waltzed in here, contributing the bare minimum for your own selfish purposes? I doubt that a few dead citizens would keep you up at night.
ESP.TRADUIT: {disgusted}你，大摇大摆地闯进来，为自己的自私目的贡献最少的力量？我怀疑几个死去的市民就能让你夜不能寐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back when you've proven yourself trustworthy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你证明自己值得信赖时再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {amused, but good-natured}Ha! Such youthful bravado! Still, seeing what you've done for the town,{surprised at self} I think you might just pull it off.
ESP.TRADUIT: {amused, but good-natured}哈！多么年轻的虚张声势1不过，鉴于你为小镇所做的一切，{surprised at self}我觉得你会成功的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: This C-4 should clear that eyesore out of the way. You be very careful with it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个C-4应该能把碍眼的东西清除掉。你要非常小心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.additem WeapNVC4PlasticExplosive 1
If you don't help me, I'll just blow the wall up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不帮我，我就把墙炸掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {ominous, lowers voice so others don't hear}If you so much as lay a finger on that wall, I'll have the entire town tear you apart, and believe me, it wouldn't be the first time.
ESP.TRADUIT: {ominous, lowers voice so others don't hear}如果你敢碰那堵墙一根毫毛，我会让整个镇子的人把你撕成碎片，相信我，这也不是第一次了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowMessage BDBoulderInfamy set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep to (BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep -1)
Tear down that wall, or I'll bring those squad maniacs in to do it for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拆掉那堵墙，不然我就让那些小队的疯子来帮你！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Terrified}All right! All right! Anything to get you the hell out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Terrified}好吧！好吧！只要能让你离开这里，什么都行！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {quickly from fear/anger}Here! Just blow it up!
ESP.TRADUIT: {quickly from fear/anger}给！把它炸了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowMessage BDBoulderInfamy set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep to (BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep -4) Player.additem WeapNVC4PlasticExplosive 1
You've cleaned my hat. How thoughtful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你清洗了我的帽子，想得真周到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can talk later, but we really need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以稍后再谈，但我们真的得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {flat, deflated, quickly brushing off player}Yes, yes, "onwards," and all that.
ESP.TRADUIT: {flat, deflated, quickly brushing off player}是的，是的，“前进”之类的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set BDDPanLenoreQuest.Later to 1 BDDPanRef.resetai
if BDDPanLenoreQuest.DoOnceGrant ==1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDPanLenoreQuest 30 1 else SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDPanLenoreQuest 25 1 endif
What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说什么呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {fondness turning to sorrow}I had a cat...once, but I lost her.
ESP.TRADUIT: {fondness turning to sorrow}我有一只猫...曾经，但我失去了她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: She was a beautiful Bengal, {quickly realizes PC wouldn't know breeds}that is to say, a cat with spots--rather uncommon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她是一只美丽的孟加拉猫，{quickly realizes PC wouldn't know breeds}也就是说，带斑点的猫。相当罕见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.Spots to 1
When did you lose your cat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的猫什么时候丢的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {grim}She went missing soon after the bombs hit.
ESP.TRADUIT: {grim}核弹爆炸后不久她就失踪了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice to (BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice + 1)
My condolences.
ESP.TRADUIT: 深表同情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Under ordinary circumstances, I'd halfheartedly accept and request a hug, but truth be told, {doubting memories, mix of hope and fear}I never actually witnessed anyone eat her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在一般情况下，我会半心半意地接受并要求拥抱，但说实话， {doubting memories, mix of hope and fear}我从来没亲眼看到有人吃了她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice to (BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice - 1)
That's an awful long time--
ESP.TRADUIT: 时间太长了，她可能...

ESP.ORIGINAL: {snaps, then feels bad}I'm keenly aware of that! You don't have to "prepare" me for the disappointment you assume is inevitable.
ESP.TRADUIT: {snaps, then feels bad}我很清楚这一点！你不必让我 "准备 "你认为不可避免的失望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, it's highly likely that she was butchered and eaten.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，她很有可能是被宰杀后吃掉的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice to (BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice - 1)
Maybe she's a ghoul like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许她和你一样是个食尸鬼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, it's highly likely that she was butchered and eaten.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，她很有可能是被宰杀后吃掉的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: You thought someone ate her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得有人吃了她？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before midnight struck the world, Boulder teemed in the open sunlight with colorful reveries and non-murderous life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在午夜降临之前，博尔德开阔的阳光下充满了五彩缤纷的遐想和并不凶残的生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a deep blue Saturday morning when the sirens wailed. After so many drills, they were just another part of the soundscape, like cars or geese.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一个深蓝的星期六早晨，警报器鸣响。经过这么多次的演练，它们只是声景的另一部分，就像汽车或鹅一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: After the explosion, we ran, hoping to reach the Dome before it closed, but with our skin blowing like tattered flags, we had to settle for the cave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爆炸发生后，我们跑了起来，希望在巨蛋关闭之前到达那里，但我们的皮肤被吹得像破碎的旗帜，我们只能在山洞里栖身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We waited for it to dissipate, but the radiation was like nothing we'd ever heard of. A few brave souls ventured out for food, but never returned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们等着它消散，但辐射是我们从未听说过的。一些勇敢的人冒险外出觅食，但再也没有回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon, we were forced to consume people as fast as they died, before the maggots could burst from their flesh, as if lying dormant all along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很快，我们就被迫在蛆虫从他们的肉里钻出来之前，以最快的速度吃掉他们，就像他们一直休眠着一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: When we were left with nothing but the soles of our shoes, my faithful and precious Lenore was all that stood in the way of drawing straws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我们除了鞋底之外一无所有时，我忠实而宝贵的丽诺儿是阻碍我们抽签的唯一因素。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.Later to 1
With all the vaults and sirens, why weren't you better prepared?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有这么多避难所和警报器，你怎么没准备好点？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {passionately defending old way of life, but aware of the irony of their mistakes}Our lives were about friends, pizza, and baseball, not imminent death! Vaults were for those possessed by more fear and money than sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: {passionately defending old way of life, but aware of the irony of their mistakes}我们的生活是关于朋友，披萨和棒球，而不是即将到来的死亡！避难所是为那些恐惧和金钱多于理智的人准备的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: When we mistook the drills for real, people were injured, livelihoods suffered. The last straw was being roused at three AM on a school night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我们误以为演习是真的时，人们受伤了，生计受到了影响。让人忍无可忍的是在上学的晚上凌晨三点被叫醒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: It punished us to listen, so, we stopped and took comfort in the sentiment that our country was so strong, only a fool would dare to spit in our eye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听信是对我们的惩罚，所以，我们停下来，安抚自己的情绪，我们的国家是如此强大，只有傻瓜才敢对我们的眼睛吐口水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, the world is ending, and the first thing you think of is grabbing a cat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，世界要毁灭了，你想到的第一件事就是抓一只猫？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {irritated}The first thing I {emph}thought was what happened between calling Dad about coming home for my birthday, and waking up on the floor with {emph}glass in my head,
ESP.TRADUIT: {irritated}我想到的第一件事{emph}是给我爸爸打电话，让他回家给我过生日，然后在地板上醒来，{emph}脑袋里插着玻璃，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: followed by how on earth a deaf orphan was supposed to set a seventy-year-old woman's flayed arm. Tucking Lenore into my jacket came woefully late.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接着是一个失聪孤儿究竟该如何给一个七十岁老太太的剥了皮的手臂复位。把丽诺儿塞进我的夹克已经太迟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Taking a liability instead of food was a pretty stupid idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以责任代替食物是个相当愚蠢的想法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {reluctantly agrees, shaking head}As much as I'd like to fatten your lip for saying so, in hind sight, we both probably would've been better off if I'd left her behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: {reluctantly agrees, shaking head}虽然我很想让你闭嘴，但现在看来，如果我把她留在这里，我们俩可能会过得更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice to (BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice - 1)
It was kind of you to risk yourself for a friend, even a cat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真好，为了一个朋友冒生命危险，哪怕是一只猫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. I was shocked upon realizing that I was the only one who'd bothered. Pets were{emph} supposed to be {emph}family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你！当我意识到我是唯一一个为此烦恼的人时，我很震惊。宠物{emph}应该是{emph}家人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice to (BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice + 1)
Even after your hat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 甚至在你的帽子之后？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {inappropriately casual, quickly hand waving plot hole}That was recovered much later.
ESP.TRADUIT: {inappropriately casual, quickly hand waving plot hole}这是很久以后才发现的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My hearing had recovered enough to perceive shouting. Then, hands started grabbing...tearing us apart until Andre fired his pistol at the ceiling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的听力已经恢复到足以察觉到喊叫声。然后，双手开始抓取...把我们分开，直到安德烈向天花板开枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I couldn't let them butcher my best friend for being the wrong species! At least...until I felt my gram's hand rest on mine, so weak and cold...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能让他们杀了我最好的朋友，就因为她是错误的物种！至少...直到我感觉到奶奶的手放在我的手上，那么无力和冰冷...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: The burns around Lenore's neck were bleeding again, chafed by the leash I'd made from my shoelace, so I loosened it...for her comfort, I said.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽诺儿脖子上的烧伤又在流血，被我用鞋带做的皮带磨破了，所以我松开了她...我说是为了让她舒适。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then, I fell asleep, her little body purring against me to the end. When I awoke, the leash was empty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后，我睡着了，她小小的身体一直偎着我呜呜叫。当我醒来时，皮带是空的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least you gave her a chance to escape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少你给了她逃跑的机会。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sad, futile}In the end, it didn't really matter. Soon after, someone we'd thought dead made it back with food, and I was all alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sad, futile}最后，这都不重要了。没过多久，一个我们以为死了的人带着食物回来了，我也孤身一人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for letting me confide in you. If you hear anything more about that cat, please let me know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你让我向你倾诉。如果你有关于那只猫的任何消息，请告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.HeardStory to 1 set BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice to (BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice + 1) BDDPanRef.resetai if BDDPanLenoreQuest.DoOnceGrant ==1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDPanLenoreQuest 30 1 else SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDPanLenoreQuest 25 1 endif
{At Site. sad, futile}In the end, it didn't really matter. Soon after, someone we'd thought dead made it back with food, and I was all alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {At Site. sad, futile}最后，这都不重要了。没过多久，一个我们以为死了的人带着食物回来了，我也孤身一人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.HeardStory to 1 set BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice to (BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice + 1)
You can't beat yourself up for making the only decision you could live with at the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能因为自己当时做了唯一可以接受的决定而自责。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sad, futile}In the end, it didn't really matter. Soon after, someone we'd thought dead made it back with food, and I was all alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sad, futile}最后，这都不重要了。没过多久，一个我们以为死了的人带着食物回来了，我也孤身一人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for letting me confide in you. If you hear anything more about that cat, please let me know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你让我向你倾诉。如果你有关于那只猫的任何消息，请告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.HeardStory to 1 set BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice to (BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice + 1) BDDPanRef.resetai if BDDPanLenoreQuest.DoOnceGrant ==1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDPanLenoreQuest 30 1 else SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDPanLenoreQuest 25 1 endif
{At Site. sad, futile}In the end, it didn't really matter. Soon after, someone we'd thought dead made it back with food, and I was all alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {At Site. sad, futile}最后，这都不重要了。没过多久，一个我们以为死了的人带着食物回来了，我也孤身一人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.HeardStory to 1 set BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice to (BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice + 1)
If she ran off, people probably died because you were too afraid to give up a cat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果她跑了，可能会有人因为你不敢放弃一只猫而丧命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sad, futile}In the end, it didn't really matter. Soon after, someone we'd thought dead made it back with food, and I was all alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sad, futile}最后，这都不重要了。没过多久，一个我们以为死了的人带着食物回来了，我也孤身一人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for letting me confide in you. If you hear anything more about that cat, please let me know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你让我向你倾诉。如果你有关于那只猫的任何消息，请告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.HeardStory to 1 set BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice to (BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice - 1) BDDPanRef.resetai if BDDPanLenoreQuest.DoOnceGrant ==1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDPanLenoreQuest 30 1 else SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDPanLenoreQuest 25 1 endif
{At Site. sad, futile}In the end, it didn't really matter. Soon after, someone we'd thought dead made it back with food, and I was all alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {At Site. sad, futile}最后，这都不重要了。没过多久，一个我们以为死了的人带着食物回来了，我也孤身一人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.HeardStory to 1 set BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice to (BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice - 1)
If you'd sacrificed her, she could've been killed humanely instead of being hunted by predators.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你牺牲了她，她可能会被人道地杀死而不是被掠食者追杀。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sad, futile}In the end, it didn't really matter. Soon after, someone we'd thought dead made it back with food, and I was all alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sad, futile}最后，这都不重要了。没过多久，一个我们以为死了的人带着食物回来了，我也孤身一人了。
