ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for letting me confide in you. If you hear anything more about that cat, please let me know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你让我向你倾诉。如果你有关于那只猫的任何消息，请告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.HeardStory to 1 set BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice to (BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice - 1) BDDPanRef.resetai if BDDPanLenoreQuest.DoOnceGrant ==1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDPanLenoreQuest 30 1 else SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDPanLenoreQuest 25 1 endif
{At Site. sad, futile}In the end, it didn't really matter. Soon after, someone we'd thought dead made it back with food, and I was all alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {At Site. sad, futile}最后，这都不重要了。没过多久，一个我们以为死了的人带着食物回来了，我也孤身一人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.HeardStory to 1 set BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice to (BDDPanLenoreQuest.Choice - 1)
{indignant and smug}Pitiful fool! Even a child knows that he who hath smelt it is he who hath dealt it!
ESP.TRADUIT: {indignant and smug}可怜的傻瓜！连小孩子都知道，谁先闻到就是谁放的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; response to comments about smell ; doesn't work
"House"...The name rings a bell, but only faintly. Wasn't he some kind of actor?
ESP.TRADUIT: “豪斯”...这个名字听起来很熟悉，但很模糊。他不是演员吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanQuest.HouseWho to 1
{concern}What will you do if you help it--him? Run this place yourself? I strongly urge you to consider forming a chess club or a newsletter {emph}before a country.
ESP.TRADUIT: {concern}如果你帮它...他，你会怎么做？自己经营这个地方？ 我强烈建议你考虑成立一个国际象棋俱乐部或{emph}向一个国家发布时事通讯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {1st time story. urgent, stunned}Th-that's my trick! I say "bread" and Lenore rolls over. Bread roll.
ESP.TRADUIT: {1st time story. urgent, stunned}那...那是我的技巧！我说"面包"，丽诺儿就翻身，面包卷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.DoOnceMu to 1 BDDPanRef.resetai
{heard other sighting, stunned}Th-that's my trick! I say "bread" and Lenore rolls over. Bread roll. We should find out whether this "Thomas" actually has spots...or testicles.
ESP.TRADUIT: {heard other sighting, stunned}那...那是我的技巧！我说"面包"，丽诺儿就翻身，面包卷。我们应该弄清楚这个 "托马斯 "是否真的有斑点...或者睾丸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.DoOnceMu to 1 Set BDCricketMuDialogue.CatBalls to 1 BDDPanRef.resetai
{elated}I've seen such horrid and wonderful things! I'll tell you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: {elated}我见过这么可怕又美好的事物！我以后再告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {bitter-sweet sighing}Just awaiting my friend's return.
ESP.TRADUIT: {bitter-sweet sighing}在等我朋友回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {tired, sad}I've seen better days, I'm afraid.
ESP.TRADUIT: {tired, sad}恐怕我已经见过更好的日子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {annoyed}[SUCCEEDED] All right, all right. Just stay alive, you hear?
ESP.TRADUIT: {annoyed}[成功]好吧，好吧。活下去，听到了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDCarolineEmporium.BoulderBarter to 1 rewardxp 60
I'm risking my neck for you, so it shouldn't be too much to ask for twenty percent off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是在为你冒生命危险，所以要求打八折应该不算太过分。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {gushing with fake acceptance}[FAILED] Well, when you put it that way, you've got yourself a--{flat}no.
ESP.TRADUIT: {gushing with fake acceptance}[失败] 好吧，如果你这么说，你就给自己找了个{flat}不字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make it twenty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就二十吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I like the way you think, {beat, emph}partner!
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]我喜欢你的思维方式，{beat, emph}搭档！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDCarolineEmporium.ToysBarter to 1 rewardxp 50
If you pay me fifty percent more, you can charge extra to make the items seem more valuable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你多付我50%的钱，你可以额外收费，让这些东西看起来更有价值。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] The Emporium brand isn't just about product; it's about larger-than-life atmosphere. To everyone else, the ruins are nothing but junk.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]商场的品牌不仅仅是产品，而是一种传奇的氛围。对其他人来说，这些遗迹只是垃圾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want fifty percent more caps, or I'll sell them elsewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要加价百分之五十，否则我就卖到别处去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give haunted teddy bear>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给闹鬼的泰迪熊>

ESP.ORIGINAL: {shocked, a little frightened}Egads! Is this thing supposed to be warm? I guess I could say that there's a genie in it or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shocked, a little frightened}天哪！这东西应该是暖的吗？我想我可以说里面有个精灵什么的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDCarolineEmporium.ToysDone to (BDCarolineEmporium.ToysDone +1) Player.RemoveItem MHBoulderHauntedTeddyBear 1 if BDCarolineEmporium.ToysBarter == 1 Player.AddItem caps001 150 elseif BDCarolineEmporium.ToysBarter == 0 Player.AddItem caps001 100 endif
<Give haunted Stocks & Ladders game>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给闹鬼的树梯棋游戏>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. Holding this kind of gives me a chill...{growing sneeze}Ahh-ahhh-choo! Yeah, definitely a chill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。拿着这个让我有点不寒而栗...{growing sneeze}啊...哈...啾！对，绝对是一种寒意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDCarolineEmporium.ToysDone to (BDCarolineEmporium.ToysDone +1) Player.RemoveItem MHBoulderStockandLadderAvtivator 1 if BDCarolineEmporium.ToysBarter == 1 Player.AddItem caps001 150 elseif BDCarolineEmporium.ToysBarter == 0 Player.AddItem caps001 100 endif
<Give haunted Plutonium Dash game>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给闹鬼的钚冲刺游戏>

ESP.ORIGINAL: {scrutinizing, unsure}I don't really get any vibes from this one. It just feels empty like a...a...{grasping for ideas}receptacle for... luck! Yes, I'll make this a luck charm!
ESP.TRADUIT: {scrutinizing, unsure}我对这玩意没什么感觉，感觉很空虚，就像...一个...{grasping for ideas}一个容器...运气！对，我要把这个做成幸运符！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDCarolineEmporium.ToysDone to (BDCarolineEmporium.ToysDone +1) Player.RemoveItem MHBoulderPlutonDashActivator01 1 if BDCarolineEmporium.ToysBarter == 1 Player.AddItem caps001 150 elseif BDCarolineEmporium.ToysBarter == 0 Player.AddItem caps001 100 endif
I think that taking care of this cat would do you both good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得照顾这只猫对你们俩都有好处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sad}I can't. I don't know how I'd live with myself if I got another one killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sad}我不能。如果我再害死一个，我真不知道该怎么办。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {warms up to idea}You know...you're right. Lenore lives on in this cat, so, {happy, confident announcement}I shall call her...Lenore!
ESP.TRADUIT: {warms up to idea}你知道的...你说得对。丽诺儿活在这只猫身上，所以{happy, confident announcement}我应该叫她...丽诺儿！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDDPanLenoreQuest 10
The last thing you need is to be burdened by another cat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最不需要的就是被另一只猫拖累。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {disappointed, but agrees}Leaving her behind is probably for the best.
ESP.TRADUIT: {disappointed, but agrees}丢下她可能是最好的办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDDPanLenoreQuest 20
But what about all those things you said about how helping Lenore was the right thing to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你说的那些帮助丽诺儿是正确的事的话呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found this photo. I think you should have it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了这张照片，我认为你应该拥有它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {shocked, speechless}H-how did--where did--?
ESP.TRADUIT: {shocked, speechless}怎...怎么...在哪里...？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucia [01083751] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem MHBoulderGradyFamilyPhoto 1
Why aren't you armed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么没带武器？

ESP.ORIGINAL: People tend to...blow up if they pick me for co-op, so I sit and think up new challenges. Keeps everyone motivated. Care to play?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果人们选择我作为合作者，他们往往会...爆炸，所以我坐下来思考新的挑战，让每个人都有动力。想玩吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know that this is real right? You're all a bunch of killers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这是真的吧？你们是一群杀人犯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {cheerful, humors PC}I know the graphics are amazing, but if you don't stop once in a while and take a leak, you could get really sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful, humors PC}我知道画面很精彩，但如果你不偶尔停下来小便，你可能会真的生病。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give 1 finger>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给1个手指>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't that fun? Enjoy your prize!
ESP.TRADUIT: 很有趣吧？享受你的奖品！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem BDGhoulFinger 1 Player.AddItem caps001 5
<Give 5 fingers>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给5个手指>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't that fun? Enjoy your prize!
ESP.TRADUIT: 很有趣吧？享受你的奖品！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem BDGhoulFinger 5 Player.AddItem stimpak 1
<Give 10 fingers>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给10个手指>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't that fun? Enjoy your prize!
ESP.TRADUIT: 很有趣吧？享受你的奖品！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem BDGhoulFinger 10 Player.AddItem Ammo556mm 20
<Give 15 fingers>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给15个手指>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't that fun? Enjoy your prize!
ESP.TRADUIT: 很有趣吧？享受你的奖品！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem BDGhoulFinger 15 Player.AddItem NVHydra 1
<Give 25 fingers>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给25个手指>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't that fun? Enjoy your prize!
ESP.TRADUIT: 很有趣吧？享受你的奖品！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem BDGhoulFinger 25 Player.AddItem WeapNVServiceRifle 1
<Give 50 fingers>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给50个手指>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations! I bet no one will see you coming at night with this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜你！我敢打赌没人会看到你晚上带着这个来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem BDGhoulFinger 50 Player.AddItem BDSpyCoat 1
Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 比如？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a dead cat. I think it may be the one you're looking for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现了一只死猫，我想这可能就是你要找的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {shock, grief, desperation}Oh, god...You have to take me there! I have to see her for myself!
ESP.TRADUIT: {shock, grief, desperation}噢，上帝...你要带我去那儿！我必须亲眼见到她！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted BDDPanLenoreQuest 10 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDPanLenoreQuest 20 1
Would you tell me about your cat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能给我讲讲你的猫吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before midnight struck the world, Boulder teemed in the open sunlight with colorful reveries and non-murderous life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在午夜降临之前，博尔德开阔的阳光下充满了五彩缤纷的遐想和并不凶残的生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a deep blue Saturday morning when the sirens wailed. After so many drills, they were just another part of the soundscape, like cars or geese.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一个深蓝的星期六早晨，警报器鸣响。经过这么多次的演练，它们只是声景的另一部分，就像汽车或鹅一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: After the explosion, we ran, hoping to reach the Dome before it closed, but with our skin blowing like tattered flags, we had to settle for the cave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爆炸发生后，我们跑了起来，希望在巨蛋关闭之前到达那里，但我们的皮肤被吹得像破碎的旗帜，我们只能在山洞里栖身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found it in a toy store and it reminded me of you. It looks like someone took good care of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在玩具店找到的，它让我想起了你。看起来有人把它保养得很好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {speechless}Wow...This means more to me than you know. Thank you. {beat, nervous}You didn't get a paper cut, did you?
ESP.TRADUIT: {speechless}哇...这对我的意义超乎你的想象。谢谢你，{beat, nervous}你没有被纸划伤吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucia [01083751] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.LuciaOkay to 1 rewardkarma 50 ShowMessage BDBoulderFame set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep to (BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep +1)
Your dead sisters are still angry about being abandoned. They're coming for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你死去的姐妹们还在为被遗弃而生气，她们来找你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {starting to cry}I knew it! I just knew it!
ESP.TRADUIT: {starting to cry}我就知道！我就是知道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucia [01083751] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp -75 Lucia2Ref.AddScriptPackage BDLuciaRunHome ShowMessage BDBoulderInfamy set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep to (BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep -1)
Your sisters gave it to me. They want you to know that they've moved on and forgiven you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的姐妹们给我的。她们想让你知道，她们已经放下过去，原谅你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {horror}So, their restless spirits were trapped there this whole time?
ESP.TRADUIT: {horror}所以，她们不安的灵魂一直被困在那里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucia [01083751] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] {considers it, uncertainty growing to acceptance}I guess that's not so bad, and if they said they're okay, then...I guess it's okay for me to be okay too. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] {considers it, uncertainty growing to acceptance}我想这还不算太糟，如果她们说自己没事，那么...我想我也应该没事。谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucia [01083751] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardkarma 50 rewardxp 40 set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.LuciaOkay to 1 ShowMessage BDBoulderFame set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep to (BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.BoulderRep +1)
They had each other and plenty of toys to play with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她们有彼此，也有很多玩具可以玩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] {choked up}I--I need to be alone now!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {choked up}我...我需要一个人静一静！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucia [01083751] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lucia2Ref.AddScriptPackage BDLuciaRunHome
Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does your bodyguard hate me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的保镖讨厌我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {casual}Nah. Cassy's just practicing to be a mime. With enough brand recognition, we're hoping to expand into entertainment.
ESP.TRADUIT: {casual}不，凯西只是在练习做哑剧演员。有了足够的品牌认知度，我们希望扩展到娱乐领域。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if I kill your buddies for fingers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我为了手指杀了你的兄弟呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They'll just respawn on another server, or maybe even go home for the day. It's a win-win for everyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们只是在另一个服务器上重生，或者甚至回家休息一天。这对每个人来说都是双赢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to play.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想玩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, all right! You just go out there and go "pew! pew!" as usual, and when you kill an infectee near the Dome, (they look like zombies)
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好的！你只要像往常一样出去 "咻！咻！"，当你在巨蛋附近杀了一个感染者(他们看起来像僵尸)时，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: saw off a finger and bring it back! Just check out this prize chart! Who will win the mystery prize? It could be you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 锯掉一根手指带回来！看看这个奖品表吧！谁将获得神秘大奖？可能是你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also have a big bounty if that's more your style.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这是你的风格，我还有一大笔赏金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddNote BDPvtFingersBountyPrizes ;AddItemToLeveledList BDBoulderGhoulsDead BDGhoulFinger 1 1 100
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. That just makes me sad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦。这让我很难过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about the big bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说巨额赏金的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a dangerous psychopath on the loose wanted for the unprovoked murder of our beloved Sergeant Dullahan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个危险的精神病在逃，因为他无端谋杀了我们敬爱的杜拉尔罕中士而被通缉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bring back the ugly noggin of Private Firefly, and I'm authorized to award you with two-thousand freakin' caps! How awesome is that?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 把二等兵萤火虫那丑陋的脑袋带回来，我就有权奖励你两千瓶盖！这有多棒？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837EB]BDFingersBountyQuest) Pvt. Fingers Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.FFBounty to 1
{hopeful}A spotted cat! It really could be her! We should investigate the landfill.
ESP.TRADUIT: {hopeful}一只斑点猫！真的有可能是她！我们应该调查一下垃圾填埋场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.DoOnceGrant to 1 BDDPanRef.resetai SetObjectiveCompleted BDDPanLenoreQuest 25 1
I wanted to show you this interesting report about a mutant cat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想给你看一篇关于变种猫的有趣报道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {cautiously, fears getting hopes up}Friend...do you suppose that an animal could've experienced a similar reaction to radiation as I and the others had?
ESP.TRADUIT: {cautiously, fears getting hopes up}朋友...你认为动物会像我和其他人一样对辐射产生类似的反应吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanLenoreQuest.DoOnceGrant to 1
I wanted to show you this interesting report about a mutant cat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想给你看一篇关于变种猫的有趣报道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {crying out at sight of other ghoul cat, confused, hopeful}Lenore, is that--?! {sees cat, disappointed}That's not her!
ESP.TRADUIT: {crying out at sight of other ghoul cat, confused, hopeful}丽诺儿，这是...？！! {sees cat, disappointed}这不是她！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: BDDPanRef.Look LenoreBodyRef BDDPanRef.Say LenInspectMeat0
{horrified, sickened}Oh, my god! It was her! I recognize the ID tattoo!
ESP.TRADUIT: {horrified, sickened}噢，我的天啊！这是她！我认得这个ID纹身！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: BDDPanRef.StopLook BDDPanRef.RemoveScriptPackage BDDPanLenoreInspectPKG BDDPanRef.AddScriptPackage BDLenoreDecide
{points to other cat. Rage, choking up}My Lenore survived all this time only to be butchered by that--that--
ESP.TRADUIT: {points to other cat. Rage, choking up}我的丽诺儿活了这么久，却被那个...那个...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {heart melts with pity}poor starving creature!
ESP.TRADUIT: {heart melts with pity}可怜的饿死鬼给宰了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just calm down and talk it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静下来，把话说清楚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before midnight struck the world, Boulder teemed in the open sunlight with colorful reveries and non-murderous life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在午夜降临之前，博尔德开阔的阳光下充满了五彩缤纷的遐想和并不凶残的生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a deep blue Saturday morning when the sirens wailed. After so many drills, they were just another part of the soundscape, like cars or geese.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一个深蓝的星期六早晨，警报器鸣响。经过这么多次的演练，它们只是声景的另一部分，就像汽车或鹅一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: After the explosion, we ran, hoping to reach the Dome before it closed, but with our skin blowing like tattered flags, we had to settle for the cave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爆炸发生后，我们跑了起来，希望在巨蛋关闭之前到达那里，但我们的皮肤被吹得像破碎的旗帜，我们只能在山洞里栖身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: This cat will starve if you don't save it. You wouldn't let Lenore starve, would you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不救这只猫，它会饿死的。你不会让丽诺儿挨饿的，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {warms up to idea}You know...you're right. Lenore lives on in this cat, so, {happy, confident announcement}I shall call her...Lenore!
ESP.TRADUIT: {warms up to idea}你知道的...你说得对。丽诺儿活在这只猫身上，所以{happy, confident announcement}我应该叫她...丽诺儿！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 40 SetStage BDDPanLenoreQuest 10
If that's what you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这是你想要的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {disappointed, but agrees}Leaving her behind is probably for the best.
ESP.TRADUIT: {disappointed, but agrees}丢下她可能是最好的办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDDPanLenoreQuest 20
With all the danger we face, that cat will probably die horribly. You wouldn't want that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到我们面临的所有危险，这只猫可能会惨死。你不会希望那样的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {disappointed, but agrees}Leaving her behind is probably for the best.
ESP.TRADUIT: {disappointed, but agrees}丢下她可能是最好的办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 60 SetStage BDDPanLenoreQuest 20
Fine. But the second she gets in the way, I'm sending her home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。但她一碍事，我就送她回家。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lenore lives on in this cat, so, {happy, confident announcement}I shall call her...Lenore!
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽诺儿活在这只猫身上，所以，{happy, confident announcement}我要叫她...丽诺儿！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDDPanLenoreQuest 10
{wistful, a little sad}Gigi often spoke wistfully of bicycling through a park of red stones such as these. I wonder if it still exists.
ESP.TRADUIT: {wistful, a little sad}琪琪经常满怀惆怅地说起骑自行车穿过像这样的红石公园，我想知道它是否还存在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {in jest}Do I look pretty?
ESP.TRADUIT: {in jest}我看起来漂亮吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; reinstate if faction apparel is later allowed
{mildly enchanted, in jest}How marvelous. Perhaps we'll run into some talking caterpillars and cat heads.
ESP.TRADUIT: {mildly enchanted, in jest}太神奇了。也许我们会碰到会说话的毛毛虫和猫头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {confused, disappointed} Where are the windmills?
ESP.TRADUIT: {confused, disappointed}风车在哪里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {smitten with childlike wonder}What a magical place!
ESP.TRADUIT: {smitten with childlike wonder}多么神奇的地方！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {looking around}Did we step into a parallel universe, or is naming cities after rocks just that cliche?
ESP.TRADUIT: {looking around}我们是步入了一个平行宇宙，还是用石头命名城市是一种陈词滥调？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the problem with the band?
ESP.TRADUIT: 乐队有什么问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {beleaguered like a sitcom wife}I like to take my time and carefully construct a musical narrative based on classical tradition, while Mark...well, it's like our first date.
ESP.TRADUIT: {beleaguered like a sitcom wife}我喜欢慢慢来，仔细构建一个基于古典传统的音乐叙事，而马克...就像我们的第一次约会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mindy [01083744] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was content to hold hands and watch the leaves cascade, but he had to go sticking his tongue in my face, then BAM!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很满足于手牵着手，看着树叶飘落，但他恨不得把舌头伸到我脸上，然后砰！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mindy [01083744] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {recalls bomb}Yeah, there were some really hot fireworks alright...then I started spitting out pieces of his lips! Tasted like burnt {baloney}bologna. Ugh!
ESP.TRADUIT: {recalls bomb}是的，有一些激动的行为，好吧...然后我开始吐出他嘴唇的碎片！尝起来像烤焦的 {baloney}腊肠。啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mindy [01083744] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's Mark?
ESP.TRADUIT: 马克是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sighs with exasperation}Only the world's oldest nineteen-year-old. Likes to convulse with a guitar in his hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sighs with exasperation}世界上最古老的19岁，喜欢拿着吉他抽搐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mindy [01083744] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps I'm mistaken, but I thought he was a fat man in a cape who shook "it," causing much consternation amongst the elderly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我搞错了，但我认为他是一个穿着斗篷的胖子，他摇晃着“它”，引起了老年人的恐慌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: About those pencils...
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于那些铅笔...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kinds of books do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要什么样的书？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clean ones. The kind that still have words in them. Give me ten, and you can pick one of anything we've got, even the post-war stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干净的，还有文字的那种。给我十本，你就可以从我们有的东西里挑一个，甚至战后的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you need any more books?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还需要更多的书吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not now. I want to organize these first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在不要了，我想先把这些整理一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {thinking out loud}I think this time I'll put on a blindfold and spin around thirty...two times.
ESP.TRADUIT: {thinking out loud}我想这次我要戴上眼罩，以30的速度转体...两次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837F2]BDConnieQuest) book quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: stopquest BDConnieQuest
{low, ominous}You have crossed a line, {regret, almost sighing}and now I'm afraid that I must escort you to Hell. {slight sneer, almost hissing}Have a pleasant trip.
ESP.TRADUIT: {low, ominous}你已经越界了，{regret, almost sighing}现在恐怕我得送你下地狱了。{slight sneer, almost hissing}祝旅途愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: BDDPanRef.IgnoreCrime 0 BDDPanRef.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 0 SetEnemy BDDPanFaction PlayerFaction 0 0 SetEnemy BDBoulderUnderground PlayerFaction 0 0 Set BDDPanQuest.QuitPerm to 2
ShowMessage BDDPanMesgPerkRemove BDDPanRef.StartCombat player
I'm actually investigating the gremlin. Have you seen anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我其实是在调查小魔怪，你看到什么了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {tired}No, nothing yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: {tired}没有，什么都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to see if the rumors about the projector were true. It looks a bit dinged, {shrugs it off}but that's what you get when you let Jackie play with tools.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看关于投影仪的传言是不是真的。它看起来有点破旧，{shrugs it off}但这就是你让杰姬玩工具时得到的结果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw you tampering with the projector.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到你乱动投影仪了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to see if the rumors about the projector were true. It looks a bit dinged, {shrugs it off}but that's what you get when you let Jackie play with tools.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看关于投影仪的传言是不是真的。它看起来有点破旧，{shrugs it off}但这就是你让杰姬玩工具时得到的结果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you out here so late?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么这么晚还在外面？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {shrugs}Same reason as you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shrugs}和你的理由一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you guys are starving, why don't you just eat the mushrooms?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你们饿了，为什么不吃蘑菇？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those, you don't wanna eat...unless you like the runs...or the sound of the moon yelling at your toenails...and possible death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些，你不会想吃的...除非你喜欢跑步...或者是月亮对着你的脚趾甲大喊的声音...还有可能会死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nicky [0108374D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soda machine? That must've been tough to haul down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 汽水机？把那东西搬到这里肯定很不容易。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {almost laughing}Huh, what? Nah, nah, the Machine is my band with Mindy. {mystical}No, it's more like an experience.
ESP.TRADUIT: {almost laughing}嗯，什么？不不，机器是我和明迪的乐队。{mystical}不，这更像是一种体验。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mark [01083742] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.MarkBand to 1
Mindy said your band was called Blow Sheep something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明迪说你的乐队叫吹羊什么的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. I thought we'd talked it out. <blah blah>
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我以为我们已经谈妥了。<巴拉巴拉>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mark [01083742] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's Mindy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 明迪是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {excited}My girlfriend!
ESP.TRADUIT: {excited}我女朋友！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mark [01083742] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think. We just moved our beds together last week, so she must be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为是。我们上周才搬到一起，所以她肯定是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mark [01083742] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mark said your band was called the Asthmatic Steam Shovel or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马克说你的乐队叫哮喘蒸汽铲什么的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, that's why it's a stupid name! No one wants to remember it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，这就是为什么这是个愚蠢的名字！没有人想记住它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mindy [01083744] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's Deadpan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just about the nicest boy you'd ever meet. You should talk to him, maybe give him some ideas. He's always wearing his lucky straw hat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见过的最好的男孩。你应该跟他谈谈，给他点建议。他总是戴着他的幸运草帽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think Mark hears toenails.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为马克听到了脚趾甲的声音。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {amused, laughs} Nah. That's just him.
ESP.TRADUIT: {amused, laughs}不，那只是他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nicky [0108374D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {tired}It's getting late. I don't think the gremlin's coming tonight.
ESP.TRADUIT: {tired}时间不早了。我想小魔怪今晚不会来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivedisplayed BDBoulderGremlin 26 1 if getobjectivedisplayed BDBoulderGremlin 27 setobjectivecompleted BDBoulderGremlin 27 1 endif
Fine. I'll just tell Andre what I saw!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我去告诉安德烈我看到了什么！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {confident}Go ahead, and see what happens. I'll still be around when you're done, but the evidence won't.
ESP.TRADUIT: {confident}去吧，看看会发生什么。你结束的时候我还在，但证据不会了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {amused laughing}Don't look so surprised! The gremlin hears all, even the good officer praising the Stork for providing him a new bitch. That's you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {amused laughing}别这么惊讶！小魔怪听到了一切，连好心的警官都称赞鹳鸟给了他一个新母狗，那就是你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did he bother to mention all of her notes are encrypted? {as if wiggling fingers, trying to scare PC for comic effect}Dense stuff. Algorithms. Quadratic logarithm factorization...Wiggly lines!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有费心提过她所有的笔记都被加密了吗？{as if wiggling fingers, trying to scare PC for comic effect}难懂的东西，算法，二次对数分解...波动线！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderGremlin.Rant to 1 set BDBoulderGremlin.bConDecrypt to 1
I'm sorry sweetie. The eczema's burning like a damn salt-filled cheese grater today. I guess I'll just have to send you some thought hugs again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起亲爱的。湿疹今天灼烧得就像加了盐的奶酪刨丝器，我想我只能再给你一个贴心的拥抱了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837E6]BDGigiDialogue) Gigi's Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you know about "the Stork"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对"鹳鸟"了解多少？

ESP.ORIGINAL: One fly space lady, she came from above in a sweet, sweet space suit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一位太空女士，她从太空飞来，穿着非常非常可爱的宇航服！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mark [01083742] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: So...you think that the Stork is an alien.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你认为鹳鸟是外星人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! Nobody's an alien when we all share the same universe! You dig?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！当我们共享同一个宇宙时，没人是外星人！明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mark [01083742] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So...who are you again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你是谁来着？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {a little more composed. "LOO-shuh"}Lucia. I light the torches, and make sure that time keeps going. If it stops...{fearful whisper}people don't wake up.
ESP.TRADUIT: {a little more composed. "LOO-shuh"}露西娅。我点燃火炬，确保时间继续流逝。如果停了...{fearful whisper}人们就不会醒来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucia [01083751] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut up and lay off those shrooms, you freak!
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴，别再吃蘑菇了，你个怪胎！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you told Deadpan your dreams? Maybe they could give him ideas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你告诉过冷面你的梦想吗？也许他们能给点灵感。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think they would be a little hard to implement on stage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得在舞台上执行会有点困难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey [0108374C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {President dream. pleading}Please don't tell him that one! We'll end up with three sequels about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {President dream. pleading}请不要告诉他！我们最终会制作三部续集。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey [0108374C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you telling me your dreams?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要告诉我你的梦想？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dunno.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不晓得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey [0108374C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello. I'd like to play you all a little tune that I wrote. Hope you enjoy it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈喽，我想给大家放一段我写的曲子。希望你喜欢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mark [01083742] (mod) NPC : Mark [0108347C] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;set BDBoulderPerformances.MarkPerforming to 1
What's with the beard?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的胡子怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a symbol of the Emporium's commitment to quality: one-hundred-percent real, homegrown, and natural! Accept no substitutes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是商场对质量承诺的象征：百分之百真实，本土生产，天然！不接受任何替代品！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Curious Caroline [0108373D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you think I'm impressive, you should see my baby brother. Born with a beard longer than himself!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你觉得我很厉害，你应该看看我的小弟弟，天生就有比他自己还长的胡子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Curious Caroline [0108373D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's "the weird"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么是"有点怪"？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, that would be the wondrous contents of my Emporium. Behold!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀，那就是我的商场里奇妙的东西了。瞧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Curious Caroline [0108373D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: if BDCarolineEmporium.BoulderBarter == 1 && BDCarolineEmporium.BoulderDeal == 1 sbm 10 elseif BDCarolineEmporium.BoulderBarter == 0 && BDCarolineEmporium.BoulderDeal == 1 sbm elseif BDCarolineEmporium.BoulderDeal == 0 Showbartermenu -10 endif
Check 'em out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Curious Caroline [0108373D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E5]BDCarolineEmporium) Curious Caroline's Emporium EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: if BDCarolineEmporium.BoulderBarter == 1 && BDCarolineEmporium.BoulderDeal == 1 sbm 10 elseif BDCarolineEmporium.BoulderBarter == 0 && BDCarolineEmporium.BoulderDeal == 1 sbm elseif BDCarolineEmporium.BoulderDeal == 0 Showbartermenu -10 endif
I'd like see your wares.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看你的商品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any medical supplies I could buy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有我可以买的医疗物资吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, but I can't spare a thing. We never know when, or if, we'll ever get any more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我一点也抽不出。我们永远不知道什么时候，或者是否还会有更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say 'no' to a friend of Boulder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能对博尔德的朋友说“不”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
Why can't I just pay with supplies like before?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我不能像以前那样用物资付款？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because a stimpak won't buy clean food and clothes, unless the outside world decides it'd rather reach into a pocket full of needles than caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为治疗针买不到干净的食物和衣服，除非外界认为应该把手伸进装满针而不是瓶盖的口袋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Play violin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉小提琴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello. I'd like to play you all a little tune that I wrote. Hope you enjoy it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈喽，我想给大家放一段我写的曲子。希望你喜欢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mark [01083742] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; Dummy line so Mark has lipsync while TA is talking. ; Copy lip file from TA for this one, but leave a blank wav file ; so only TA is talking, but Mark's lips move.
Thanks for listening! Peace out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢收听！再见啦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mark [01083742] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; Dummy line so Mark has lipsync while TA is talking. ; Copy lip file from TA for this one, but leave a blank wav file ; so only TA is talking, but Mark's lips move.
{Realizes PC has overheard him, embarrassed}Why are you looking at me like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Realizes PC has overheard him, embarrassed}你为什么那样看着我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837F6]BDDPanFistoQuest) The Two-Hundred-Year-Old Virgin EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDpanFistoQuest.DPExcuse to 0
Never mind. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {flat, deflated, quickly brushing off player}Yes, yes, "onwards," and all that.
ESP.TRADUIT: {flat, deflated, quickly brushing off player}是的，是的，“前进”之类的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837F6]BDDPanFistoQuest) The Two-Hundred-Year-Old Virgin EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDDPanFistoQuest 255 BDDPanRef.RemoveScriptPackage BDDPanFistoPC set BDDPanRef.Waiting to 0 BDDPanRef.evp
Ha, ha. You afraid of a real whore?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，哈，你害怕一个真正的妓女？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {flustered, embarrassed}Well, it's kind of difficult when no one's ever wanted to, uh...oh, forget it!
ESP.TRADUIT: {flustered, embarrassed}嗯，这有点困难，因为没有人想要...噢，算了吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837F6]BDDPanFistoQuest) The Two-Hundred-Year-Old Virgin EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! Thank you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢！谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837F6]BDDPanFistoQuest) The Two-Hundred-Year-Old Virgin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 10 SetStage BDDPanFistoQuest 15 BDDPanRef.evp
Here's ten caps. You go have fun. I'll hang around here and play some slots for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是十个瓶盖，你去找点乐子吧。我要在这儿呆一会儿，玩会儿老虎机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! Thank you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢！谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837F6]BDDPanFistoQuest) The Two-Hundred-Year-Old Virgin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 20 set BDDPanFistoQuest.UsingRentedRoom to 1 SetStage BDDPanFistoQuest 15 BDDPanRef.evp
Here's twenty caps. Go rent yourself a room and I'll be around here playing some slots for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是二十瓶盖，去给自己租间房吧，我就在这玩一会儿老虎机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {awkwardly inquiring about sexbot, hushed}I, uh, heard you have a...robot. Is this robot, er, non-judgmental?
ESP.TRADUIT: {awkwardly inquiring about sexbot, hushed}我，呃，听说你有个...机器人，这个机器人，呃，不主观评判？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837F6]BDDPanFistoQuest) The Two-Hundred-Year-Old Virgin EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetQuestDelay BDDPanFistoQuest 0

BDDPanRef.RemoveScriptPackage BDDPanFistoExcuseMe BDDPanRef.RemoveScriptPackage BDDPanJames BDDPanRef.RemoveScriptPackage BDDPanFrancine BDDPanRef.AddScriptPackage BDDPanFistoPC ;SetStage BDDPanFistoQuest 10 -- setstage not working right
{going off with hooker, without knowing what sex really is}So...how does this work? Do I fetch a bottle of wine, or do you put on my clothes, or what?
ESP.TRADUIT: {going off with hooker, without knowing what sex really is}所以...是怎么干？是让我去拿瓶酒，还是你给我穿上衣服，还是怎样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837F6]BDDPanFistoQuest) The Two-Hundred-Year-Old Virgin EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: if BDDPanFistoQuest.UsingRentedRoom == 0 SetStage BDDPanFistoQuest 25 else SetStage BDDPanFistoQuest 20 endif
This reminds me of the old adage, "Do not drop your soap." It must be quite the rare commodity, since hardly anyone seems to use it these days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这让我想起了一句古老的谚语：“不要把肥皂掉在地上。”肥皂一定是一种非常稀有的商品，因为现在似乎几乎没有人用它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {appalled}Is somebody going to feed this cow? If its owner is {emph}that poor, why doesn't the slob just put it out of its misery and fry up a hamburger already?
ESP.TRADUIT: {appalled}有人喂这头牛吗？如果它的主人真的{emph}这么穷，那懒汉为什么不干脆让它从痛苦中解脱，去煎个汉堡包呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {a bit solemn}So, here's where you lost your first life. {like a toast}Here's to eight more.
ESP.TRADUIT: {a bit solemn}这就是你第一次失去生命的地方。{like a toast}为再来八次而干杯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {impressed}What magnificent costumes! Perhaps we should liberate a few for the wardrobe department.
ESP.TRADUIT: {impressed}多么华丽的服装！也许我们应该腾出一些给戏装部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {horror, disbelief}Crucifixion?! Really?! Crucifixion is back in vogue! {shaking head}And to think, people used to complain about clogs making a comeback.
ESP.TRADUIT: {horror, disbelief}钉在十字架上？！真的吗？！钉十字架又流行起来了！{shaking head}想想看，人们过去常常抱怨木屐卷土重来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {flatly}You should consider eating a gun instead. It would be less painful than having your intestines strewn about like confetti.
ESP.TRADUIT: {flatly}你应该考虑改吃枪子，这应该比让你的肠子像五彩纸屑一样散落要少些痛苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {panic}Okay, I am {emph}not kidding! We need to get the hell out of here, right NOW!
ESP.TRADUIT: {panic}好吧，我{emph}没开玩笑！我们得赶紧离开这里，马上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {in a "let me get this straight" tone}So, "zombie" is considered a slur, yet "ghoul," originally referring to people-eating monsters, is polite? {disbelief}That's just...just...{trying to think of better word, but can't}stupid!
ESP.TRADUIT: {in a "let me get this straight" tone}所以，“僵尸”一词被认为是侮辱，而“食尸鬼”这个原本指的是吃人怪物的词，是有礼貌的？{disbelief}这太...太...{trying to think of better word, but can't}蠢了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {bewildered, then amazed}So, here, there's no energy curfew? Why, I could run so wild, I'd eat frosting straight out of the can! {either deadpan or out-of-character excited-whichever is funnier:}Wahoo.
ESP.TRADUIT: {bewildered, then amazed}所以，这里没有能源宵禁？哎呀，我可以尽情地奔跑，我可以直接吃罐头里的糖霜！{either deadpan or out-of-character excited-whichever is funnier:}哇嗬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do the people around here complain about eczema?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么这里的人都在抱怨湿疹？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sighing}Because a long time ago, a committee got together and said we all had the "ultra {EC-zeh-ma}eczema."
ESP.TRADUIT: {sighing}因为很久以前，一个委员会聚在一起说我们都患有"超级{EC-zeh-ma}湿疹。"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Obviously, I had nothing to do with that, {sympathetic}but I keep my mouth shut since our super psoriasis is incurable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很明显，那事跟我无关，{sympathetic}但我没说，因为我们的超级牛皮癣是无法治愈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It does, but we seem to be doing okay despite it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，但尽管如此，我们看起来还不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That sucks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这糟透了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {frustrated} Hey, I don't know what kind of flying cars you topsiders drive, but we've been kind of living under a rock for the past two centuries!
ESP.TRADUIT: {frustrated}嘿，我不知道你们这些上层居民开的是什么飞车，但我们在过去的两个世纪里一直生活在岩石下！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Super psoriasis? Ultra eczema? Don't you know radionecrotic degradation when you smell it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 超级牛皮癣？超级湿疹？难道你闻起来就不知道这是放射性衰变吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. Andrea, Boulder's one and only doctor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安德里娅医生，博尔德唯一的医生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's it. Anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，就这样。还有别的事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {happy}We'll have that tail wagging again in no time!
ESP.TRADUIT: {happy}我们马上就能让它再次摇尾巴了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm all set for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在都准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {disappointed}If you change your mind and I'm asleep, you may have to give me a little kick; sometimes I fail to wake up on my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: {disappointed}如果你改变主意，而我睡着了，你可能得踢我一下，有时候我不能自己醒来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: BDDPanRef.EVP SparRef.Disable SparRef.Markfordelete
A squishy guy like you wouldn't stand a chance out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像你这样软弱的人在外面是没有机会的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {thinks he's going to impress PC}Oh, I think you'd be quite surprised! En garde!
ESP.TRADUIT: {thinks he's going to impress PC}哦，我想你会很惊讶的！预备！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) NPC : [00000007] (ID) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; Fix later and remove Player as subject
Set SparRef.Spar to 1 BDDPanRef.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 Player.AddToFaction BDDPanFaction 1 BDDPanRef.setAV Confidence 4 BDDPanRef.AddScriptPackage BDDPanSparPackage SetEssential BDDPan 1
{mild pride}Aside from writing, I'm a skilled swordsman, {bright-eyed}and my weapon is an exquisite antique sword cane...with a venomous bite!
ESP.TRADUIT: {mild pride}除了写作，我剑术精湛，{bright-eyed}我的武器是一把精致的古董剑杖...淬了毒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {much less enthusiastic}I also possess a small firearm, but the last time Dad took me to the shooting range, the Earth was still green.
ESP.TRADUIT: {much less enthusiastic}我也有一把小枪，但上次爸爸带我去射击场的时候，地球还是绿色的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can spare any stimpaks, powders, or doctor's bags, I know enough first aid to take care of myself. Antivenom should prove useful as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能给我一些治疗针、治疗粉或医疗包，我拥有足够的急救知识来照顾自己。抗毒血清也应该有用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of skills do you have?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么技能？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {gallant (although misdirected) defense}My "pal" is a perfectly reasonable specimen! Your obvious lack of taste leaves {emph}you looking like the one who {just paraphrasing, may not know what it means}"fucks" mothers.
ESP.TRADUIT: {gallant (although misdirected) defense}我的“朋友”是一个完全合理的标本！你明显缺乏品味，{emph}这让你看起来像是那种会{just paraphrasing, may not know what it means}"操"妈的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; response to "your pal is one ugly motherfucker" ; doesn't work
I'd like to trade with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想和你做笔交易。

ESP.ORIGINAL: BDDPanRef.SetPlayerTeammate 1 OpenTeammateContainer
BDDPanRef.SetPlayerTeammate 0
We really can't afford hookers right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们现在真的请不起妓女。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {saddened, as if no one will ever love him}I...understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: {saddened, as if no one will ever love him}我...理解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837F6]BDDPanFistoQuest) The Two-Hundred-Year-Old Virgin EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage BDDPanFistoQuest 255 BDDPanRef.RemoveScriptPackage BDDPanFistoPC set BDDPanRef.Waiting to 0 BDDPanRef.evp
{not offended at PC, but hoarse with pain}Don't ask!
ESP.TRADUIT: {not offended at PC, but hoarse with pain}别问了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837F6]BDDPanFistoQuest) The Two-Hundred-Year-Old Virgin EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: {satisfied}Good.
ESP.TRADUIT: {satisfied}很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you train Lenore?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能训练丽诺儿吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: With a few days and the appropriate supplies, I could help improve her attacks against whichever class of enemy you most despise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要有几天时间和适当的物资，我就可以帮助她提高对任何你最鄙视的敌人的攻击能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837ED]BDLenoreTrainQuest) Lenore Upgrade Training EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can, but I shall require a different set of supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以，但我需要一套不同的用品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837ED]BDLenoreTrainQuest) Lenore Upgrade Training EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I changed my mind. Can you train Lenore to fight another enemy type?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我改变主意了。你能训练丽诺儿对付其他类型的敌人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was looking for information about the Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找关于巨蛋的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It just so happens that a scientist passed through here not too long ago, and she left behind a big fat log book, filled out cover to cover.
ESP.TRADUIT: 碰巧前不久有个科学家路过这里，她留下了一本厚厚的日志簿，一页一页都填满了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {some disgust, doesn't get it}Everyone started calling her "the Stork," and now that she's gone, they practically worship her, like some kind of angel.
ESP.TRADUIT: {some disgust, doesn't get it}大家都叫她"鹳鸟"，现在她走了，大家都崇拜她，就像天使一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage BDBoulderCodesQuest 5
{flat}You could've at least waited until my back was turned before selling my dead father's heirloom for penci--{quick correction}I mean, peanuts.
ESP.TRADUIT: {flat}你至少可以等我转身之后再把我死去父亲的传家宝换成铅...{quick correction}我是说，花生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you need any storage space, you're welcome to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要存储空间，随时欢迎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please excuse me a moment. I need to, ah...{nervous}take care of something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅我失陪一会儿。我需要，啊...{nervous}处理一些事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837F6]BDDPanFistoQuest) The Two-Hundred-Year-Old Virgin EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetQuestDelay BDDPanFistoQuest .5 Set BDDPanFistoQuest.DoOnce1 to 1 set BDDpanFistoQuest.DPExcuse to 1 Set BDDPanRef.Waiting to 1 Set BDDPanRef.fTimerWait to (GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime)
if BDDPanFistoQuest.Garret == 1 BDDPanRef.AddScriptPackage BDDPanJames elseif BDDPanFistoQuest.Garret == 2 BDDPanRef.AddScriptPackage BDDPanFrancine endif
Do you know where the scientist went?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道科学家去哪儿了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back to the Dome, after doing absolutely nothing for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回巨蛋了，完全不为我们做任何事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.Where to 1
Back to the Dome, after doing absolutely nothing for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回巨蛋了，完全不为我们做任何事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.Where to 1 ;MoBurma 23/06/12 - Trigger for new code quest setstage BDBoulderCodesQuest 5
Can I see the book?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能看看这本书吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not so fast! We all have to work for our daily bread, and when you're in our town, you follow our rules, so I'll need you to do a job for us first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别这么快！我们每个人都得工作养家糊口，你来到我们镇上，你得遵守我们的规矩，所以我需要你先为我们做一件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.BookTalk to 1
What do you want for it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad to see a healthy respect for commerce. What I want is for you to help our town get back on its feet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴看到对商业健康的尊重。我想要的是你帮助我们的小镇重新振作起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.BookTalk to 1
I've got other things to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有别的事要做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {disgust}Then don't expect any help in return.
ESP.TRADUIT: {disgust}那就别指望有任何回报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {warning}By the way, as you stroll around our scenic town, between the hours of seven AM and eleven PM, you'll notice that there is no jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: {warning}顺便说一下，当你在我们风景优美的小镇闲逛时，在早上7点到晚上11点之间，你会注意到这里没有监狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {ominous threat}Cross us, and you'll wish for one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 背叛我们，你就会想要一个的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.ThreatBye to 1
{disgust}Then don't expect any help in return.
ESP.TRADUIT: {disgust}那就别指望有任何回报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want me to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想让我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure you've noticed that outside our cave, Boulder's become pretty damn dangerous between the monsters and invaders knocking on our door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信你已经注意到，在我们的洞穴外，博尔德已经变得非常危险，因为怪物和入侵者在敲门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's gotten so hard for our scouts to bring back enough food that we're down to one meal a day. I need you to ease the pressure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的侦察员很难带回足够的食物，我们每天只能吃一顿。我需要你来缓解压力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can do that by killing the monsters Fat Cat and Night Light, and bringing back twenty pounds of meat from each. Pretty simple, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以通过杀死怪物“肥猫”和“夜光”，并从每个怪物身上带回20磅肉来实现这一点。很简单，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.Want to 1 ;MoBurma 23/06/12 - Trigger for new code quest setstage BDBoulderCodesQuest 5
Good. I'll point out their usual haunts on your bracelet. {rolling eyes, since he's seen it before}Just don't get yourself killed for the sake of pride.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。我会在你的手镯上指出他们经常出没的地方，{rolling eyes, since he's seen it before}只是不要因为骄傲而送命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {firm command}If things get ugly, come straight back to the clinic and have my sister take a look at you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {firm command}如果情况不妙，直接回到诊所，让我妹妹给你检查一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveDisplayed BDMonsterQuest 10 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDMonsterQuest 20 1 MonsterCatRef.Enable MonsterFoxRef.Enable AndreRef.Sayto Player Goodbye
I'll kill the monsters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会杀了那些怪物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give 20 pounds of dog meat>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给20磅狗肉>

ESP.ORIGINAL: {mild pleasant surprise}Well, well. It looks like you held your own. Keep it up, and that book'll be yours in no time.
ESP.TRADUIT: {mild pleasant surprise}嗯，很好，看来你挺过来了。坚持下去，那本书很快就会是你的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837F8]BDMonsterQuest) Monster Hit EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted BDMonsterQuest 25 1 ;if BDMonsterQuest.FoxMeatType == 0 Player.RemoveItem BDMonsterFoxMeat 2 MonsterFoxRef.RemoveItem BDMonsterFoxMeat 1 ; 26/05/12 MoBurma - stop player from getting stuck with useless quest items ;elseif BDMonsterQuest.FoxMeatType == 1 ;Player.RemoveItem BDFoxMeat 10 ;Player.RemoveItem BDMonsterFoxMeat 1 ;elseif BDMonsterQuest.FoxMeatType == 2 ;Player.RemoveItem BDFoxMeat 20 ;endif set BDMonsterQuest.FoxMeat to 1 Player.Removeitem BDmeatweighttoken 2 1 ; Get rid of secret token that adds weight to player
You've proven your capabilities by doing a great service for Boulder, which is why I need your help with some internal issues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为博尔德做了出色的工作，证明了你的能力，所以我需要你帮我解决一些内部问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837F8]BDMonsterQuest) Monster Hit EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's bad enough that our other scout, Firefly's, refusal to leave the cave and seek food is endangering our people,
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的另一名侦察员，萤火虫，拒绝离开山洞寻找食物，这已经够糟糕的了，这危及到了我们的人民，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837F8]BDMonsterQuest) Monster Hit EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: but we've also been terrorized by a so-called gremlin. Think you're up to it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我们也被一个所谓的小魔怪吓坏了。你觉得你能行吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837F8]BDMonsterQuest) Monster Hit EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;if BDMonsterQuest.FoxMeatType == 0 Player.RemoveItem BDMonsterFoxMeat 2 MonsterFoxRef.RemoveItem BDMonsterFoxMeat 1 ; 26/05/12 MoBurma - stop player from getting stuck with useless quest items ;elseif BDMonsterQuest.FoxMeatType == 1 ;Player.RemoveItem BDFoxMeat 10 ;Player.RemoveItem BDMonsterFoxMeat 1 ;elseif BDMonsterQuest.FoxMeatType == 2 ;Player.RemoveItem BDFoxMeat 20 ;endif set BDMonsterQuest.FoxMeat to 1 SetStage BDMonsterQuest 100 Player.Removeitem BDmeatweighttoken 2 1 ; Get rid of secret token
<Give 30 pounds of dog meat>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给30磅狗肉>

ESP.ORIGINAL: {surprised, impressed at amount}Wow, you really went above and beyond! With this much food, we may be able to throw a party, just like the old days.
ESP.TRADUIT: {surprised, impressed at amount}哇，你真是太出色了！有了这么多食物，我们也许能像以前一样，办个派对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837F8]BDMonsterQuest) Monster Hit EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted BDMonsterQuest 25 1 Player.RemoveItem BDMonsterFoxMeat 3 ;Player.RemoveItem BDMonsterFoxMeatExtra 1 set BDMonsterQuest.FoxMeat to 1 set BDMonsterQuest.Extra to 1 Player.Removeitem BDmeatweighttoken 3 1 ; Get rid of secret token that adds weight to player
You've proven your capabilities by doing a great service for Boulder, which is why I need your help with some internal issues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为博尔德做了出色的工作，证明了你的能力，所以我需要你帮我解决一些内部问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837F8]BDMonsterQuest) Monster Hit EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's bad enough that our other scout, Firefly's, refusal to leave the cave and seek food is endangering our people,
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的另一名侦察员，萤火虫，拒绝离开山洞寻找食物，这已经够糟糕的了，这危及到了我们的人民，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837F8]BDMonsterQuest) Monster Hit EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: but we've also been terrorized by a so-called gremlin. Think you're up to it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我们也被一个所谓的小魔怪吓坏了。你觉得你能行吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837F8]BDMonsterQuest) Monster Hit EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem BDMonsterFoxMeat 3 ;Player.RemoveItem BDMonsterFoxMeatExtra 1 set BDMonsterQuest.Extra to 1 SetStage BDMonsterQuest 100 Player.Removeitem BDmeatweighttoken 3 1 ; Get rid of secret token that adds weight to player
<Give 20 pounds of cat meat>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给20磅猫肉>

ESP.ORIGINAL: {mild pleasant surprise}Well, well. It looks like you held your own. Keep it up, and that book'll be yours in no time.
ESP.TRADUIT: {mild pleasant surprise}嗯，很好，看来你挺过来了。坚持下去，那本书很快就会是你的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837F8]BDMonsterQuest) Monster Hit EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted BDMonsterQuest 15 1 Player.RemoveItem BDMonsterCatMeat 2 MonsterCatRef.RemoveItem BDMonsterCatMeat 1 ; 26/05/12 MoBurma - stop player from getting stuck with useless quest items set BDMonsterQuest.CatMeat to 1 Player.Removeitem BDmeatweighttoken 2 1 ; Get rid of secret token
You've proven your capabilities by doing a great service for Boulder, which is why I need your help with some internal issues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为博尔德做了出色的工作，证明了你的能力，所以我需要你帮我解决一些内部问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837F8]BDMonsterQuest) Monster Hit EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's bad enough that our other scout, Firefly's, refusal to leave the cave and seek food is endangering our people,
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的另一名侦察员，萤火虫，拒绝离开山洞寻找食物，这已经够糟糕的了，这危及到了我们的人民，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837F8]BDMonsterQuest) Monster Hit EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: but we've also been terrorized by a so-called gremlin. Think you're up to it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我们也被一个所谓的小魔怪吓坏了。你觉得你能行吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837F8]BDMonsterQuest) Monster Hit EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted BDMonsterQuest 15 1 Player.RemoveItem BDMonsterCatMeat 2 MonsterCatRef.RemoveItem BDMonsterCatMeat 1 ; 26/05/12 MoBurma - stop player from getting stuck with useless quest items set BDMonsterQuest.CatMeat to 1 SetStage BDMonsterQuest 100 Player.Removeitem BDmeatweighttoken 2 1 ; Get rid of secret token
<Give 30 pounds of cat meat>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给30磅猫肉>

ESP.ORIGINAL: {surprised, impressed at amount}Wow, you really went above and beyond! With this much food, we may be able to throw a party, just like the old days.
ESP.TRADUIT: {surprised, impressed at amount}哇，你真是太出色了！有了这么多食物，我们也许能像以前一样，办个派对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837F8]BDMonsterQuest) Monster Hit EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted BDMonsterQuest 15 1 Player.RemoveItem BDMonsterCatMeat 3 Player.RemoveItem BDMonsterCatMeatExtra 1 set BDMonsterQuest.CatMeat to 1 set BDMonsterQuest.Extra to 1 Player.Removeitem BDmeatweighttoken 3 1 ; Get rid of secret token that adds weight to player
You've proven your capabilities by doing a great service for Boulder, which is why I need your help with some internal issues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为博尔德做了出色的工作，证明了你的能力，所以我需要你帮我解决一些内部问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837F8]BDMonsterQuest) Monster Hit EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's bad enough that our other scout, Firefly's, refusal to leave the cave and seek food is endangering our people,
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的另一名侦察员，萤火虫，拒绝离开山洞寻找食物，这已经够糟糕的了，这危及到了我们的人民，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837F8]BDMonsterQuest) Monster Hit EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: but we've also been terrorized by a so-called gremlin. Think you're up to it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我们也被一个所谓的小魔怪吓坏了。你觉得你能行吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837F8]BDMonsterQuest) Monster Hit EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem BDMonsterCatMeat 3 Player.RemoveItem BDMonsterCatMeatExtra 1 set BDMonsterQuest.Extra to 1 SetStage BDMonsterQuest 100 Player.Removeitem BDmeatweighttoken 3 1 ; Get rid of secret token
I've got meat for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你准备了肉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Let's see it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。让我看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837F8]BDMonsterQuest) Monster Hit EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I seem to be short a few pounds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，我好像少了几磅。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {thinks PC is idiot}Then quit wasting time!
ESP.TRADUIT: {thinks PC is idiot}那就别浪费时间了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837F8]BDMonsterQuest) Monster Hit EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do I know that the book is real?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么知道这本书是真的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going to show you where it is, if that's what you're getting at, but you can {emph}try to ask the kids about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会告诉你它在哪里，如果这是你想知道的，但你可以{emph}试着问问孩子们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.Kids to 1
By "kids" do you mean a hundred years younger than you, or "kids" as in kids?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的"孩子"是指比你小一百岁的孩子，还是说"孩子"是指小孩？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {annoyed}I mean "kids" as in the useless freeloaders that {emph with disgust}woman dumped on our starving laps!
ESP.TRADUIT: {annoyed}我说的“孩子”是指那些没用的吃白食的人，那些可恶的女人把他们扔在我们饥饿的膝盖上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least tell me what kind of information is in the book.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少告诉我书里有什么信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {annoyed sigh}An important-looking code.
ESP.TRADUIT: {annoyed sigh}一个看起来很重要的密码。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.Code to 1
By "code" do you mean a password or a means of encryption?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的“密码”是指密码还是一种加密手段？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {pc INT >= 7}{caught off-guard, trying to cover his ass}This is top-secret intel you can't get anywhere else. Deciphering it should be cake for someone of your intellect. The kids may be able to help too.
ESP.TRADUIT: {pc INT >= 7}{caught off-guard, trying to cover his ass}这是你在其他地方绝对无法获得的绝密情报，破译它对你这样聪明的人来说应该是小菜一碟。孩子们或许也能帮上忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Andre [01083740] (mod) Quest : ([010837FD]BDBoulderEnterDome) Enter Dome Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderEnterDome.Kids to 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderCodesQuest 15 1
Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not like there's much else to do around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里又没有什么别的事可做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Harold is so excited. Would you believe he's been accepted as the chief scientist of a new state-of-the-art facility?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈罗德很兴奋，你能相信他被任命为一所新尖端设施的首席科学家吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sarah [01083754] (mod) Quest : ([01071539]abSarahTalkQ) 01071539 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're calling it The Boulder Dome. It reminds me of something from one of Harold's science-fiction movies!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们称之为博尔德巨蛋，这让我想起了哈罗德的一部科幻电影！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sarah [01083754] (mod) Quest : ([01071539]abSarahTalkQ) 01071539 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most importantly of all, it's also a Fallout shelter. The best one, I'm told. Harold and I should be safe there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最重要的是，这也是一个辐射庇护所，我听说是最好的一个。哈罗德和我在那里应该很安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sarah [01083754] (mod) Quest : ([01071539]abSarahTalkQ) 01071539 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've had the strangest day. I met an old Chinese doctor at the cafe.He says he's been an American all his life..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我经历了最奇怪的一天。我在咖啡馆遇到一位老中医，他说他一辈子都是美国人...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sarah [01083754] (mod) Quest : ([01071539]abSarahTalkQ) 01071539 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..but there's something not quite right about him. The way he approached me, I had the impression it was scripted in some way.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...但他有点不对劲。从他接近我的方式来看，我觉得这是有预谋的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sarah [01083754] (mod) Quest : ([01071539]abSarahTalkQ) 01071539 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps I'm just being overly suspicious, or rascist even. I doubt I'd have questioned him were he caucasion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是我太多疑了，甚至是有些种族歧视。如果他是白人，我肯定不会质疑他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sarah [01083754] (mod) Quest : ([01071539]abSarahTalkQ) 01071539 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All we did was share a pot of Chinese tea, after all. I'm sure he's quite harmless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟，我们只是一起喝了一壶中国茶。我相信他是无害的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sarah [01083754] (mod) Quest : ([01071539]abSarahTalkQ) 01071539 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've not felt myself this past week. I look at myself in the mirror, and I look so much older these days. I even found some gray hairs yesterday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一周我感觉不太舒服。我看着镜子里的自己，这些天我看起来老了很多，我昨天还发现了几根白头发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sarah [01083754] (mod) Quest : ([01071539]abSarahTalkQ) 01071539 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just feel tired lately. Maybe it's all this stress. Everyone is worried we could be going to war. I'm not so convinced myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是最近感觉很累，也许是因为压力太大。所有人都担心我们会开战，我自己也不太相信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sarah [01083754] (mod) Quest : ([01071539]abSarahTalkQ) 01071539 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something is very wrong with me. Harold is getting concerned. I've been vomiting non-stop for the past two days, and my skin..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有点不对劲，哈罗德开始担心了。这两天我一直在不停地呕吐，我的皮肤...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sarah [01083754] (mod) Quest : ([01071539]abSarahTalkQ) 01071539 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what's happening to my skin. It feels too soft. It doesn't feel right. It feels like it's going to come off. And the smell..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道我的皮肤怎么了，摸起来太软了。感觉不太对劲，感觉要脱落了。还有那味道...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sarah [01083754] (mod) Quest : ([01071539]abSarahTalkQ) 01071539 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I smell awful. What's happening to me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我身上很难闻。我到底怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sarah [01083754] (mod) Quest : ([01071539]abSarahTalkQ) 01071539 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've come to terms with the fact that I'm dieing. Harold just won't accept it. He's moving me into the Dome..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经接受了我即将死去的事实。哈罗德就是不肯接受，他要把我搬进巨蛋...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sarah [01083754] (mod) Quest : ([01071539]abSarahTalkQ) 01071539 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..before the security protocols are installed. I hope others can't catch what I've got. Harold seems fine though.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...在安全协议安装之前。我希望别人不会被我传染，不过哈罗德看起来似乎很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sarah [01083754] (mod) Quest : ([01071539]abSarahTalkQ) 01071539 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He says before I die, he's going to put me into the cold sleep. He says he will find a cure, no matter what it takes. He is a sweet, lovely man..
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说在我死之前，他要让我进入冷冻睡眠状态。他说他会找到治愈方法，不管付出什么代价。他是一个甜蜜，可爱的人...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sarah [01083754] (mod) Quest : ([01071539]abSarahTalkQ) 01071539 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ..but I don't share his optimism. I don't know why this has happened to me, but it has happened and now I have to just let go.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...但我不同意他的乐观态度。我不知道为什么这种事会发生在我身上，但已经发生了，现在我只能放手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sarah [01083754] (mod) Quest : ([01071539]abSarahTalkQ) 01071539 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {mortified}Are you {emph}trying to get me killed? {shocked at self}How in hell did you talk me into wearing this, and more importantly...{a bit suspicious}why?
ESP.TRADUIT: {mortified}你是{emph}想害死我吗？{shocked at self}你到底是怎么说服我穿这个的，更重要的是...{a bit suspicious}为什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {hearty with victory}Check and mate. Ha-ha, ha-ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: {hearty with victory}检查并配对。哈哈，哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {unbridled horror, disgust}My god! There must be a sink around here!
ESP.TRADUIT: {unbridled horror, disgust}我的天啊！这附近一定有个水池！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; doesn't work
{pointing at dino, excited}Look! It's Devon the rex! {Thinks of story. As if saluting}Ride! Ride him into space, Mr. Whiskers!
ESP.TRADUIT: {pointing at dino, excited}快看！是霸王龙德文！{Thinks of story. As if saluting}骑！骑着它去太空吧，胡须先生！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sarcastic, but try not to go too angry}At least if we get crucified, they'll be kind enough to use ropes instead of nails...
ESP.TRADUIT: {sarcastic, but try not to go too angry}至少如果我们被钉在十字架上，他们会很仁慈地用绳子而不是钉子...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {chastising, but somewhat sympathetic meows}*chastising meows*
ESP.TRADUIT: {chastising, but somewhat sympathetic meows}*责骂的喵*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know how you keep a straight face. {clears throat, goes back in char} "--will pounce upon me. If that happens, how can I ever hope to win my fifth cat-secutive term?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你怎么能板着脸。{clears throat, goes back in char} "...扑向我。如果那样的话，我怎么可能赢得我的第五个猫任期？"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {out char}Who cares that my never-ending campaign shits on the Constitution because {in char}"Hark! The tiny phone I have inside my ear," {out char}for some reason, {in char}"is ringing!
ESP.TRADUIT: {out char}谁会在乎我那无休止的竞选活动对宪法的践踏，因为{in char}"听！我耳朵里的小电话，" {out char}不知为何，{in char}"铃声响了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello? Yes? Yes? Hello? Yes? They have the Purrst Lady!? NOOOOOOO!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好？是的？喂？你好？喂？他们有呼噜女士！？不！！！！！！"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {"What's wrong?!"}*urgent meows*
ESP.TRADUIT: {"What's wrong?!"}*急切的喵*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Fear
