ESP.ORIGINAL: "No time to explain! I must make a purr-gent call! Op-purr-ator, patch me through to the Americat Em-pussy.
ESP.TRADUIT: “没时间解释了！我得打个电话！接线员喵，给我接通猫利坚妞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Which one? Why, the only one {huge}mewge enough to house an entire dinosaur cat-valry. That's right! I need you to call the center of the Purrth!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 哪一个？哎呀，唯一一个{huge}喵能容纳一整只恐龙的猫屋。没错！我要你打电话给呼噜中心！"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances Comment (NAM2) : Mr. Whiskers is agony!!! plz help! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meow?!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: "The Persian-Siamese peace treaty will be here when I return, but The Purrst Lady will not, unless we track down the kit-nappers
ESP.TRADUIT: “我回来的时候，波斯-暹罗和平条约会在这里，但呼噜女士不会，除非我们找到那些偷猎者，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: who had the yarn balls to {screw}mew over the Purresident of the Yarnited States of Americat!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁拿着毛线球{screw}喵对着猫利坚线球国的总统喵喵叫！"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837F4]BDBoulderPerformances) Boulder Perfomances EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderPerformances.Rehearsing to 0 If GameHour < 13 set BDBoulderPerformances.Break1 to 1 else set BDBoulderPerformances.Break2 to 1 endif BoxyRef.removescriptpackage BDBoxyAct WhiskersRef.removescriptpackage BDWhiskersAct WhiskersRef.SetRestrained 0 BoxyRef.SetRestrained 0 BoxyRef.EVP WhiskersRef.EVP
{excited}At last! This is what having a mustache is like! It's so...{excitement turns to horror}so...itchy! Get it off me! Get it off!
ESP.TRADUIT: {excited}终于！这就是长胡子的感觉！它是如此...{excitement turns to horror}如此...痒！把它拿开！把它弄掉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDDPanQuest.Mustache to 1
I have something I need you to decode.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有东西需要你解码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Such a simplistic excersise is hardly worth my time, though since it is aligned with the wishes of Elder Guile, I will comply. Hand it over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如此简单的练习几乎不值得我花时间，既然这符合盖尔长老的愿望，我将遵从。把它交出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: One more moment and it will be completed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再等一会儿，就完成了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Happy
NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: There.. it's done. Now that was easy, wasn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，搞定了。这很简单，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Field [010383F8] (mod) Quest : ([010383FB]abFieldTalkQ) 010383FB (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage BDDomeLogBookDecrypted AddNote BDClemNote1 AddNote BDClemNote2 AddNote BDClemNote3 AddNote BDBoulderDomeAccessCodes ;ShrineActRef.enable ;ShrineRef.disable 6 set BDBoulderCodesQuest.bHasCodes to 1 setstage BDBoulderCodesQuest 100 set abGuileTalkQ.abReadBook to 1
Not bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Faction : Boulder Residents (except DP) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {a little down}Could be better.
ESP.TRADUIT: {a little down}可以更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie All-Trades [01083748] (mod) NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Faction : Boulder Residents (except DP) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Faction : Boulder Residents (except DP) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was better the first fifty times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前五十次比现在好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Faction : Boulder Residents (except DP) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Same old, same old.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老样子，老样子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie All-Trades [01083748] (mod) NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Faction : Boulder Residents (except DP) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不确定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie All-Trades [01083748] (mod) NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Faction : Boulder Residents (except DP) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以后再说吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Faction : Boulder Residents (except DP) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, but this time, I get to choose!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，但这次，我来选！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Faction : Boulder Residents (except DP) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {friendly dismissal}Ahh, you'll just win again.
ESP.TRADUIT: {friendly dismissal}啊，你就又赢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Faction : Boulder Residents (except DP) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bacteria on your hands is a level 1 contamination. Please refrain from touching the terminal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你手上的细菌是一级污染，请不要触摸终端机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zax Terminal Point [010838E3] (mod) Quest : ([01063871]abLesterTalkQ) 01063871 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you fix my equipment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能帮我修理一下装备吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me take a looksee...Yikes-a-rooney! Do you shop on Mars? This is way too fancy for us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看...啊哟我去！你在火星上购物吗？这对我们来说太复杂了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie All-Trades [01083748] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What you need is more confidence! Take this and give it a whirl. I believe in you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要的是更多的自信！拿着这个试试。我相信你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie All-Trades [01083748] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddItem NVRepairKit 1 Set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.RepairKit to 1
Yes siree bob!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好嘞！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie All-Trades [01083748] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: JackieRef.ShowRepairMenu
How did you know my perscription?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么知道我的验光单？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {frustrated by constant complaint}Come back when you spring a leak.
ESP.TRADUIT: {frustrated by constant complaint}你漏水的时候再来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {mix of frustration, fear of own mortality, and reassurance}At this rate, not before you turn to dust.
ESP.TRADUIT: {mix of frustration, fear of own mortality, and reassurance}照这样下去，在你化为尘土之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {mix of frustration and sympathy}You'll just have to keep busy until it goes away, and when bedtime comes, stick your fingers in your ears and say, "la la la!" as loud as you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: {mix of frustration and sympathy}你只需要继续忙碌，直到它消失，当睡觉时间到来时，把你的手指放在耳朵里，尽可能大声地说：“啦啦啦！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837F5]BDBoulderDoctor) Andrea's Doctor Stuff EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: So...you like these "cat" things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你喜欢这些“猫”的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a cat that might be sick. Could you take a look at it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现了一只可能生病的猫，你能帮我看一下吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, god! You have to take me there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，天哪！你要带我去那儿！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL:
SetObjectiveCompleted BDDPanLenoreQuest 10 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDPanLenoreQuest 20 1 ;HIRE If BDDPanRef.bhired == 0 SetStage BDDpanQuest 20 SetStage BDDPanQuest 21 SetCellOwnership abiaBoulderIntDeadpan SparRef.Disable SparRef.Markfordelete BDDPanRef.ResetAI
if (BDDPanQuest.PencilQuest == 3) && (BDDPanRef.getitemcount BDDeadpanHat > 0) BDDPanRef.removeitem BDDeadpanHat 1 BDDPanRef.additem BDDeadpanHatPC 1 endif endif
{low int}Splendid...
ESP.TRADUIT: {low int}好极了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL:
SetObjectiveCompleted BDDPanLenoreQuest 10 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed BDDPanLenoreQuest 20 1 ;HIRE If BDDPanRef.bhired == 0 SetStage BDDpanQuest 20 SetStage BDDPanQuest 21 SetCellOwnership abiaBoulderIntDeadpan SparRef.Disable SparRef.Markfordelete BDDPanRef.ResetAI
if (BDDPanQuest.PencilQuest == 3) && (BDDPanRef.getitemcount BDDeadpanHat > 0) BDDPanRef.removeitem BDDeadpanHat 1 BDDPanRef.additem BDDeadpanHatPC 1 endif endif
You animal friend! You help little monster!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的动物朋友！你去帮小怪物！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid I've run out of stimpaks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕我的治疗针用完了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do we have any more super stimpaks?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还有超级治疗针吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could use more healing powder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要更多的治疗粉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm fresh out of antivenom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的抗毒血清用完了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There goes the last of my doctor's bags.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最后的医疗包也没了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you know about the gremlin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对小魔怪了解多少？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly, I think everyone's just looking for something to talk about. No one wants to accept that we lose or forget things as we age.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说实话，我觉得大家都在找话题聊。没有人愿意接受，随着年龄的增长，我们会失去或忘记一些事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gigi [0108373B] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;MoBurma 22/06/12 set BDBoulderGremlin.GigiGremtalk to 1
{fearful whisper}They're ghosts who punish you for your sins. I know it's hard to believe, but last Thursday, {horror}I awoke to find a candle burning on my desk!
ESP.TRADUIT: {fearful whisper}他们是惩罚你罪孽的鬼魂。我知道这很难相信，但上个星期四，{horror}我醒来发现我的桌子上有一支蜡烛在燃烧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucia [01083751] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {desperate}I keep trying to stay awake, so I can beg for forgiveness, but I can't keep my eyes open past two or four. That's when they come.
ESP.TRADUIT: {desperate}我一直努力保持清醒，这样我就可以乞求原谅，但过了两点或四点，我的眼睛就睁不开了。那就是他们来的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucia [01083751] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;MoBurma 24/06/12 set BDBoulderGremlin.luciaGremtalk to 1 SetObjectiveCompleted BDBoulderGremlin 15 1 if GetObjectivecompleted BDBoulderGremlin 10 SetStage BDBoulderGremlin 10 endif
That kooky critter must have big chompers! Gigi had us scope out the projector and it looked like something tried to crack it like a nut!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个古怪的生物咬合力一定很强！琪琪让我们仔细观察投影仪，看起来看起来像有什么东西想要像开坚果一样撬开它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie All-Trades [01083748] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderGremlin 20 1 set BDBoulderGremlin.JackieGremtalk to 1 if BDBoulderGremlin.NickyGremtalk == 1 || BDBoulderGremlin.CheckProj == 1 SetObjectiveCompleted BDBoulderGremlin 10 1 if GetObjectiveCompleted BDBoulderGremlin 15 SetStage BDBoulderGremlin 10 endif endif
I got hit last week. I dreamed that a gondolier punched my teeth out, and when I woke up, my pillow was full of rocks, and my hand was in a cup.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我上周被打了。我梦见一个船夫把我的牙齿打掉了，当我醒来的时候，我的枕头里全是石头，我的手在杯子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey [0108374C] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;MoBurma 22/06/12 set BDBoulderGremlin.PeteyGremtalk to 1
{slight frown as he recounts strange event}Roughly a fortnight ago, the first thirty pages of my manuscript went missing from my desk.
ESP.TRADUIT: {slight frown as he recounts strange event}大约两周前，我手稿的前三十页从我的书桌上消失了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: One morning, days later, {wistful}I discovered it glinting from its proper place--{frowning}completely rewritten in German, mimicking my own handwriting, no less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几天后的一天早上，{wistful}我发现它在原来的地方闪闪发光...{frowning}完全用德语改写了，完全模仿了我自己的笔迹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;MoBurma 22/06/12 set BDBoulderGremlin.DeadPanGremtalk to 1
I have a bad feeling that Movie Night's days are numbered. We kept that projector running this whole time, and only now has it started to falter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有种不祥的预感，电影之夜的日子不多了。我们一直在运行投影仪，直到现在才开始出现问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nicky [0108374D] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveDisplayed BDBoulderGremlin 20 1 set BDBoulderGremlin.NickyGremtalk to 1 if BDBoulderGremlin.JackieGremtalk == 1 || BDBoulderGremlin.CheckProj == 1 SetObjectiveCompleted BDBoulderGremlin 10 1 if GetObjectiveCompleted BDBoulderGremlin 15 SetStage BDBoulderGremlin 10 endif endif
{pissed}Most people just get their books dog-eared or whatever, but some scumbag decided to propose hot, sexy luvin's to Mark, {beat}in my handwriting!
ESP.TRADUIT: {pissed}大多数人只是把书弄得皱皱褶什么的，但有个混蛋居然向马克求婚，{beat}用我的笔迹！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mindy [01083744] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You try telling some slobbery puppy-faced fool it was a mistake! To add insult to injury, my violin was also stolen, so I can’t play.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去告诉那个满脸口水的小狗脸蠢蛋这是个错误！雪上加霜的是，我的小提琴也被偷了，所以我无法演奏了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mindy [01083744] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;MoBurma 22/06/12 set BDBoulderGremlin.MindyGremtalk to 1
<Writes something down>
ESP.TRADUIT: <写下一些东西>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boxy [01083747] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddItem BDBoxyGremlinNote 1 Set BDBoulderGremlin.BoxyBlock to 1 ;MoBurma 22/06/12 set BDBoulderGremlin.boxyGremtalk to 1
Firefly says that the zombie disease can make people go psycho at any minute, but these people seem okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 萤火虫说僵尸病会让人随时发疯，但这些人看起来还好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ingrid [01083739] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;MoBurma 22/06/12 set BDBoulderGremlin.IngridGremtalk to 1
One, or maybe more, of those people is starting to turn...
ESP.TRADUIT: 其中一个，或者更多的人，开始转变...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Firefly [01083737] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {pissed}You know who'd want to steal a pocket watch like mine? How about a freak who wears a watch chain with no watch!
ESP.TRADUIT: {pissed}你知道谁会想偷我的怀表吗？一个戴着表链却没有手表的怪胎怎么样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Magnificent Mr. Whiskers [01083746] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;MoBurma 22/06/12 set BDBoulderGremlin.WhiskersGremtalk to 1
{depressed}I once had a beer, until the gremlin took it and left it in the park for everyone else to enjoy.
ESP.TRADUIT: {depressed}有一次我喝了一杯啤酒，后来小魔怪把它拿走了，丢在公园里给大家喝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0108374A] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;MoBurma 22/06/12 set BDBoulderGremlin.JeffGremtalk to 1
The culprit has to be as squishy and mortal as any of us. It {pissed}defiled my dogs' photo, yet never tampers with my medical supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 罪魁祸首一定是和我们一样黏糊糊的凡人。它弄脏了我狗狗的照片，却从未动过我的医疗用品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Andrea [0108373F] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;MoBurma 22/06/12 set BDBoulderGremlin.DrAndreaGremtalk to 1
It's a highly eccentric creature. I was reorganizing my books by weight, when I noticed that each one was missing its thirty-seventh page!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一种非常古怪的生物。当我按重量重新整理我的书时，我发现每本书都少了三十七页！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;MoBurma 22/06/12 set BDBoulderGremlin.ConnieGremtalk to 1
I can't say that having my A and G strings switched didn't inspire me, but you just don't mess with an artist's gear, or his heart! Not cool!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能说我的A和G弦被调换没有激发我的灵感，但你不能破坏一个艺术家的设备，或者他的心！这不酷！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mark [01083742] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;MoBurma 22/06/12 set BDBoulderGremlin.MarkGremtalk to 1
{cold}Fucker's gonna be my next trophy.
ESP.TRADUIT: {cold}这家伙会是我的下一个战利品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam [0108373E] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;MoBurma 22/06/12 set BDBoulderGremlin.samGremtalk to 1
Aha! So, you're the crafty little gremlin who's brought the entire town to its knees!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哈！所以，你就是那个把整个镇子搞得鸡犬不宁的小魔怪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Connie [01083745] (mod) Quest : ([010837FC]BDBoulderGremlin) The Gremlin EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: If (BDDPanRef.bHired == 1) && (BDBoulderGremlin.DPPissed == 0) && (BDDPanRef.waiting == 0) BDDPanRef.AddScriptPackage BDDPanGremlinConfront Set BDBoulderGremlin.DPPissed to 1 endif

Set BDBoulderGremlin.ConnieReveal to 1 if getobjectivedisplayed BDBoulderGremlin 19 setobjectivecompleted BDBoulderGremlin 19 0 endif if getobjectivedisplayed BDBoulderGremlin 26 setobjectivecompleted BDBoulderGremlin 26 1 endif if getobjectivedisplayed BDBoulderGremlin 27 setobjectivecompleted BDBoulderGremlin 27 0 endif if getobjectivedisplayed BDBoulderGremlin 28 setobjectivecompleted BDBoulderGremlin 28 1 endif
What does the Gofer Gang do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 高飞帮是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Repairs, cleaning, planting, props...whatever we can to keep Boulder functioning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维修、清洁、种植、道具...尽我们所能维持博尔德的正常运转。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nicky [0108374D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.GoferGang to 1
What does the Gofer Gang do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 高飞帮是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {a little pride}One of the most important jobs in Boulder: keeping the place from falling apart. {lower, in case she's around}Also, stopping Jackie from coating everything in glitter.
ESP.TRADUIT: {a little pride}博尔德最重要的工作之一就是防止这个地方分崩离析。{lower, in case she's around}还有，阻止杰姬把所有东西都涂上闪光粉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey [0108374C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.GoferGang to 1
Could you fix my equipment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能帮我修理一下装备吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm...I'm not really familiar with the stuff you've got, but if you need the tools, you can have this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...我不太熟悉你的工具，但如果你需要工具，你可以用这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nicky [0108374D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddItem NVRepairKit 1 Set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.RepairKit to 1
Let me take a look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nicky [0108374D] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: NickyRef.ShowRepairMenu
Could you fix my equipment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能帮我修理一下装备吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sincere}Sorry, I've only been doing this a few months, but you're welcome to borrow some tools.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sincere}对不起，我干这行才几个月，不过欢迎你借一些工具。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey [0108374C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddItem NVRepairKit 1 Set BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric.RepairKit to 1
It looks a little bit trickier than painting cardboard, but I'll give it my best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来比画纸板要复杂一些，但我会尽力的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey [0108374C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: PeteyRef.ShowRepairMenu
Here. I found one of your journals lying around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，我在附近发现了一本你的日记。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {elated}Ooh, could an eager fan have taken this to gain a peek at my soul?
ESP.TRADUIT: {elated}噢，狂热的粉丝会不会用这个来窥探我的灵魂？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {drawn out with suspicion}Waaait a minute! {theatrical}It's sticky! This is the work of the gremlin! Damn you, gremlin!
ESP.TRADUIT: {drawn out with suspicion}等一下！！{theatrical}黏糊糊的！这是小魔怪的杰作！去你的，小魔怪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem BDDPanJournal1of5 1 Player.RemoveItem BDDPanJournal2of5 1 Player.RemoveItem BDDPanJournal3of5 1 Player.RemoveItem BDDPanJournal4of5 1 Player.RemoveItem BDDPanJournal5of5 1
{sad, but grateful}Well, at least I can count on you to give a damn. I really appreciate it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sad, but grateful}好吧，至少我可以指望你会关心我。我真的很感激。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem BDDPanJournal1of5 1 Player.RemoveItem BDDPanJournal2of5 1 Player.RemoveItem BDDPanJournal3of5 1 Player.RemoveItem BDDPanJournal4of5 1 Player.RemoveItem BDDPanJournal5of5 1
All consumables are strictly rationed by Andre. It's how he makes us work since money is worthless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有消耗品都由安德烈严格配给。这就是他让我们工作的方式，因为钱是没价值的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0108374A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I get some food?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能吃点东西吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {shrugs}Why not. It's something to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shrugs}为什么不，这是可以做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0108374A] (mod) Quest : ([010837E9]BDBoulderGhoulsGeneric) Generic Boulder Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
I fixed your economy. Now can I get some food?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我解决了你们的经济问题。现在我能吃点东西了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {shaking head}The last game ever, and the damn Romans had to win it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shaking head}最后一场比赛，该死的罗马人一定要赢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {casual "it’s a shame" tone}Poor fellow. I’m surprised they didn’t test cosmetics on him while they were at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {casual "it's a shame" tone}可怜的家伙。我很惊讶他们当时没有在他身上做化妆品测试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {dull sadness over past irony}My father was one of the County Commissioners. He had to work hard to clear us a {2 meanings, since they never made it}vacancy here.
ESP.TRADUIT: {dull sadness over past irony}我父亲是县委员之一，他得努力工作才能给我们{2 meanings, since they never made it}腾出一个空缺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {surprised, touched}So, it seems I wasn’t the only one to think of the animals!
ESP.TRADUIT: {surprised, touched}所以，似乎我不是唯一一个想到动物的人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: BDDPanRef.StopLook DomeKittyRef
{tongue-in-cheek excitement}Look at me! I’m walking right in the middle of the street!
ESP.TRADUIT: {tongue-in-cheek excitement}看着我！我正走在马路中间呢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {edgy, possibly just battled some}At least these...{unsure if they're people}things obviously can't reproduce...right?
ESP.TRADUIT: {edgy, possibly just battled some}至少这些...{unsure if they're people}东西显然是无法复制的...对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {nervous of heights}Whatever you do, don’t look d-- {realizes mistake, mad at self}aww, I might as well tell you not to think of pink elephants!
ESP.TRADUIT: {nervous of heights}不管你做什么，不要看...{realizes mistake, mad at self}哇，我还不如告诉你不要想粉色大象！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: BDDPanRef.setrestrained 1
BDDPanRef.setrestrained 0
{wistful}Oh, I wish you could’ve seen it as I had! Green mountains, bristling tulips, and all the bronze animals one could wish to climb!
ESP.TRADUIT: {wistful}噢，我真希望你能像我一样看到这一切！绿色的山，挺拔的郁金香，还有所有人们想攀登的青铜动物！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought Mr. House was famous. How can you not remember who he was?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为豪斯先生很有名，你怎么可能不记得他是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {recalls pleasant childhood}Sorry, but I was far more interested in how Space Dog Detective was going to bust the gang out of the cosmonaut's brig and close the time rift.
ESP.TRADUIT: {recalls pleasant childhood}对不起，但我对太空狗侦探如何将这帮人从宇航员的牢房中抓出来并关闭时间裂缝更感兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {flippant grumbling to self}It’s bad enough that the Commies killed my family, but they couldn’t just let me see the end of the episode!
ESP.TRADUIT: {flippant grumbling to self}共产党杀了我的家人已经够糟糕的了，他们还不让我看完这一集的结局！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. I was certain that I'd have to bribe her with a bit of meat, but it appears that the smell of me is good enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。我确信我必须用一点肉来贿赂她，但看来有我的气味已经足够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This thing ate your best friend! How can you pity it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这玩意吃了你最好的朋友！你怎么能可怜它？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {ridiculous fawning}Just look at that little face! It could fit in my hand!
ESP.TRADUIT: {ridiculous fawning}看看那张小脸！可以放在我的手上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010837E8]BDDPanLenoreQuest) Cat's in the Crater EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Legion must be pretty foolish if they cannot even pronounce Caesar correctly...unless we're...nah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果军团连恺撒的音都发不对，那他们一定很愚蠢...除非我们...不！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deadpan [0108373C] (mod) Quest : ([010837E3]BDDPanQuest) Deadpan Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: White Rabbit
ESP.TRADUIT: 大白兔

ESP.ORIGINAL: The young woman with piercing eyes has vanished and is nowhere to be found.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个眼神犀利的年轻女子已经消失了，再也找不到她了。

Investigate the Coordinates sent from Kate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查凯特发来的坐标。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find Another Route to the Factory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找另一条路去工厂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find and Investigate Nova Industries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到并调查新星工业。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to the Engineer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟工程师聊聊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fix the Generator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 修理发电机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find Parts to Fix the Generator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找零件修理发电机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fix the Generator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 修理发电机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reactivate the Generator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 重新启动发电机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Route power to the reactor so Renato can continue to Ghoulify his men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把电力输送到反应堆这样雷纳托就能继续把他的手下变成尸鬼了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Optional] Find a way to lock the terminal so Renato can no longer Ghoulify people against their will.
ESP.TRADUIT: [可选]想办法把终端机锁定，这样雷纳托就不能再违背人们的意愿将他们尸鬼化了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Sgt. Renato.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找雷纳托中士。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Free Kate from Captivity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把凯特从囚禁中释放出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the Factory with Kate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和凯特一起离开工厂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take the key to Kate's cell from Renato's corpse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从雷纳托的尸体上取下凯特囚室的钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Feral Trade
ESP.TRADUIT: 野性贸易

Investigate the missing ferals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查失踪的野性尸鬼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report back to Doctor Franko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找弗兰科博士。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with Cricket.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对付克里基特。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lead Cricket into Franko's trap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把克里基特带到弗兰科的陷阱里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inform Franko that Cricket has agreed to stop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通知弗兰科，克里基特已经同意停止了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inform Franko that Cricket is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通知弗兰科，克里基特已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Optional] Lure Franko into a deadly cave or kill him.
ESP.TRADUIT: [可选]把弗兰科引到一个致命的洞穴里，或者杀了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inform Cricket that Franko has been dealt with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通知克里基特，弗兰科已经被解决了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bring a ghoul companion to the Ranger Station, or talk your way in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带一个食尸鬼同伴到游骑兵站，或者通过谈话进入。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Franko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀了弗兰科。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Subject No. 1
ESP.TRADUIT: 一号主题

ESP.TRADUIT: [要不]杀了所有黑猩猩！

ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找莱斯特。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Open the exterior gate, so the chimps can leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打开外面的大门，这样黑猩猩就可以离开了。

ESP.TRADUIT: 退后，猩猩们要离开了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gain entry into The Boulder Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 获得进入博尔德巨蛋的权限。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with the Dome scientists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟巨蛋科学家聊聊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clear out all the Metalheads within the Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 消灭巨蛋内部所有的金属头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fix the Zax Supercomputer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 修理ZAX超级计算机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Doctor Savant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟萨万特博士聊聊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report back to Elder Guile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去报告盖尔长老。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eliminate the Death Squad troops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 消灭暗杀小队士兵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report to Elder Guile within the Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 向巨蛋内的盖尔长老报告。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Defeat Elder Guile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 击败盖尔长老。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Collect the Environmental Armor from Doctor Field.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从菲尔德博士那里收集环境装甲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Optional] Speak with Doctor Johnson about accessing the Zax.
ESP.TRADUIT: [可选]和约翰逊博士谈谈使用Zax的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait for back-up outside the Dome.

ESP.TRADUIT: 定位嫌疑人并找到证据。

ESP.TRADUIT: 返回博尔德，把卵藏在倾倒坑的桶里。

ESP.TRADUIT: 跟康妮聊聊。

ESP.TRADUIT: 跟保嘉聊聊。

ESP.TRADUIT: 把你的决定告诉伊莱和皮尔斯，关于保嘉的命运。

ESP.TRADUIT: [可选]去找中国士兵，核实保嘉的说法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow Pierce, to watch Baojia's execution.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟随皮尔斯，观看保嘉的行刑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Protect Eli and eliminate the Chinese troops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保护伊莱，消灭中国军队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Eli.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找伊莱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to Eli.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟伊莱聊聊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man Eater
ESP.TRADUIT: 人类杀手

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lenore's upgrade for humans, ghouls, supermutants
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽诺儿提高了对人类、食尸鬼和超级变种人的伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shadow Dancer
ESP.TRADUIT: 影舞者

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kate is a master locksmith and skilled hacker but carries an aura of gloom. You suffer -1 Charisma and -1 Luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯特是一个熟练的锁匠和黑客，但带着一种忧郁的气氛。你的魅力-1，运气-1。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cat Walk
ESP.TRADUIT: 猫步

ESP.ORIGINAL: While Lenore is a companion, your running speed is increased. If Deadpan is also a companion, they will each gain 25 points of health.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当丽诺儿是同伴时，你的奔跑速度会提高。如果冷面也是同伴，他们每个人将获得25点生命值。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Writer's Block
ESP.TRADUIT: 文思枯竭

ESP.ORIGINAL: While Deadpan is a companion, if your health reaches 25% or less, he will "take a bullet" for you to restore some of your health at the expense of his own. He can only do this once per fight and must be conscious and close by.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当冷面是一个同伴时，如果你的健康状况达到25%或更少，他将为你 "挡子弹"，以牺牲自己的健康为代价恢复你的部分健康。他在每场战斗中只能做一次，而且必须是清醒的，并在你身边。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bug Eater
ESP.TRADUIT: 食虫者

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lenore's upgrade for bugs
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽诺儿提高了对虫子的伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Animal Hunter
ESP.TRADUIT: 动物猎手

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lenore's upgrade for animals and mutant animals
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽诺儿提高了对动物和变种动物的伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Abomination Slayer
ESP.TRADUIT: 憎恶杀戮者

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lenore's upgrade for abominations
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽诺儿提高了对可增生物的伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can tear down the door with a Sledgehammer, Super Sledge, Chainsaw, Hatchet, or a Fire Axe. What would you like to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以用大锤、超级动力锤、电锯、斧头或消防斧把门拆掉。你想怎么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tear this door down!
ESP.TRADUIT: 把这扇门拆了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's tear this door down!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来把这扇门拆掉！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exit - I don't have the tools I need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 退出 - 我没有所需的工具。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This hallway door looks like it will provide access to the other side of the building, but it's jammed and cannot be opened. Perhaps if you had a Fire Axe or Sledgehammer you could break it down to allow you to get through this way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这扇走廊门看起来可以通向大楼的另一边，但它被卡住了，打不开。如果你有一把消防斧或大锤，你就可以把它砸开，这样你就可以从这里通过了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have investigated the crime scene, and gathered blood samples.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经调查了犯罪现场，并收集了血样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Evidence Gathered!
ESP.TRADUIT: 证据收集完毕！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have been fully healed! Any crippled limbs have been treated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经完全痊愈了！所有残废的肢体都已得到治疗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doctor Penny Anderson
ESP.TRADUIT: 佩妮·安德森医生

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doctor Penny is off-duty for the day. Come back tomorrow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 佩尼医生今天不上班，明天再来吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The power is currently offline.
ESP.TRADUIT: 电源当前离线。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elevator Control
ESP.TRADUIT: 电梯控制

ESP.ORIGINAL: The weapon appears to be glued to the table!
ESP.TRADUIT: 武器似乎被粘在了桌子上！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Animal Sedative Gas has been placed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 动物镇静气体已经放置。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've killed all the monkies, you dick!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把猴子都杀了，你个混蛋！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You saved the monkies, you Smurf!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你救了猴子们，你这个蓝精灵！

ESP.ORIGINAL: It appears that Harold Johnson was an android.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来哈罗德·约翰逊是个机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No disk found.
ESP.TRADUIT: 未找到磁盘。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Error!
ESP.TRADUIT: 错误！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Minor Virus has been uploaded to the server, causing data corruption to security protocol archives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小型病毒已被上传到服务器，导致安全协议档案的数据损坏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Operation Completed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 操作完成！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The door appears to be welded shut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 门似乎被焊死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The woman in cryostasis has vanished!
ESP.TRADUIT: 处于冷冻状态的女人已经消失了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your Gas Can has been filled!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的汽油罐已经装满了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have any empty Gas Cans!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有空的汽油罐！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The truck's gas tank has been filled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 货车的油箱已经加满了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have enough gasoline.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有足够的汽油。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have the ignition key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有点火钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few fibers of green fabric are caught on an edge, possibly from someone brushing against it. Perhaps someone who wears green is the culprit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有几根绿色织物的纤维夹在边缘上，可能是被人擦上去的。也许穿绿色衣服的人是罪魁祸首。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The screws are stripped and surrounded by scratches, indicating a struggle by someone acting in haste, probably due to being disturbed in the act. Freshly exposed metal glints through scratches in the rust, suggesting recent tampering. It's likely that the perpetrator will return to finish off their handiwork.
ESP.TRADUIT: 螺丝被剥落，周围有划痕，表明有人在匆忙中吃力的进行，可能是因为行动受到了干扰。新暴露的金属在锈蚀的划痕中闪闪发光，说明最近有人动过手脚。肇事者很可能会回来完成他们的工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a dingy old projector. Nothing strange about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一台破旧的投影仪，这没什么奇怪的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave it alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别去碰它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Examine the outer casing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检查外壳。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inspect its mechanics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检查其机械装置。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It looks like a frog with a flashlight taped to its head. (Perception 7 or higher required)
ESP.TRADUIT: 它看起来像一只头上绑着手电筒的青蛙。(感知7或以上)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without the skills to disassemble the projector, the best you can make out is that hitting it makes the light go on and off. (Repair 40 or higher required)
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果没有拆解投影仪的技术，你最多只能弄明白，敲击投影仪会让灯忽明忽暗。(需要修理40或以上)

ESP.ORIGINAL: These eggs are unusually large and rock when touched. Bringing a few back will add 35 pounds to your inventory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些卵异常大，摸起来像石头。带一些回去会让你的库存增加35磅。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave them alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别管了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Collect eggs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收集卵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks to hints from Ingrid, you manage to decipher a handful of words. However, since most of those words are "Dome,""the," and "potato," you're still stumped. With your new findings, you can now decipher the log book with only 50 Science.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多亏英格丽德的提示，你设法破译了一些单词。然而，由于这些词中的大多数是“巨蛋”、“这”和“土豆”，你还是被难住了。有了你的新发现，你现在只需50科学就可以破译日志。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Dome scientist's log book has been decoded. Inside, you discover a series of journal entries, but more importantly, the access codes to Boulder Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 巨蛋科学家的日志被破译了。在里面，你发现了一系列的日志记录，但更重要的是，进入博尔德巨蛋的密码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deadpan has died.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here lies pepperoni and cheese, sadly consumed by dysentery
ESP.TRADUIT:
这里躺着意大利香肠和奶酪，
不幸被痢疾吞噬了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Epitaph
ESP.TRADUIT: 墓志铭

ESP.ORIGINAL: You hear the sounds of feral ghouls and beeping.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听到野性尸鬼的声音和哔哔声。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lenore has gone to Deadpan's house.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽诺儿已经去了冷面的房子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Companion Message
ESP.TRADUIT: 同伴信息

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lenore has gone to the Lucky 38.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽诺儿已经去了幸运38。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lenore has gone to Jacobstown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽诺儿已经去了雅各布斯镇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lenore
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽诺儿

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deadpan and Lenore have returned to Jacobstown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面和丽诺儿已经回到了雅各布斯镇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deadpan and Lenore have returned to Boulder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面和丽诺儿已经回到了博尔德。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lenore has died.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽诺儿死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lenore has given you the Cat Walk perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽诺儿给你带来了猫步Perk。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost Lenore's Cat Walk perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你失去了丽诺儿的猫步Perk。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of this cat has been eaten. The remaining ear is marked with a series of blurry numbers, and what's left of the pelt has spots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只猫的大部分都被吃掉了。剩下的耳朵上有一系列模糊的数字标记，剩下的皮毛上有斑点。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
With care, a controlled detonation could destroy the shrine scaffold without causing a cave in.
[One C-4 Plastic Explosive charge and Explosives 30 or higher required]
ESP.TRADUIT:
只要小心，可控的爆炸可以摧毁神社的脚手架，而不会造成坍塌。
[需要一个C-4塑胶炸药和30或以上的爆破]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plant C-4.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安装C-4。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must have an Explosives skill of at least 30 to rig the C4 properly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须拥有至少30的爆破技能，才能正确操作C4。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need one pack of C-4 to blow up the shrine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要一包C-4炸毁神殿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player has seen Connie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩家看到了康妮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Dome scientist's log book is written in code, and you would need a far greater understanding of mathematics and cryptology to decipher it by yourself. (60 Science required).
ESP.TRADUIT: 巨蛋科学家的日志是用密码写成的，你需要对数学和密码学有更多的了解，才能自己破译它。(需要60科学)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deadpan has gone outside to wait for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面已经到外面去等你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deadpan has rejoined you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面重新加入了你的队伍。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alas! Deadpan has perished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唉！冷面已经丧生了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deadpan has returned to Boulder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面回到了博尔德。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deadpan has gone to the Lucky 38.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面已经去了幸运38。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deadpan has been searched for prohibited items.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面被搜查到了违禁物品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deadpan's items have been returned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面的物品已经归还。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deadpan has given you the Writer's Block perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面带给了你文思枯竭Perk。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost Deadpan's Writer's Block perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你失去了冷面的文思枯竭Perk。

ESP.TRADUIT: 新维加斯公鸭之友咖啡 版本 %.0f 测试模式的信息现在已经启用

ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面失去知觉。

ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面传送状态已取消。

ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面没有抗毒血清了！

ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面没有治疗粉了！

ESP.TRADUIT: 同伴信息

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Are you my mummy?"
ESP.TRADUIT: “你是我妈吗？”

ESP.ORIGINAL: Weird Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇怪的笔记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dedicated to Dr. Shirker, Who flew in from above, like a heavenly stork. We will care for your gifts, Your rays of hope, For mankind's brighter, healthier future, A miracle which war could neither crush nor deform.
Our thoughts are with you.
ESP.TRADUIT:
献给舍克博士。 他从空中飞来，像一只天上的鹳鸟。 我们将呵护你的礼物。 你的希望之光， 为了人类更光明健康的未来。 这是战争不能摧毁也不能破坏的奇迹。
我们的思想与你同在。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shrine of the Stork Dedication
ESP.TRADUIT: 鹳鸟神殿献礼

ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面没有治疗针了！

ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面没有超级治疗针了！

ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面传送计时器已经开启。

ESP.TRADUIT: 同伴信息

ESP.ORIGINAL: DP's sword has inflicted poison.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面的剑已经淬毒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lenore has gained the Abomination Slayer perk. She does 50 percent more damage when attacking abominations such as Centaurs, Nightstalkers, Cannibals, and Deathclaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽诺儿获得了 "憎恶杀戮者 "的Perk，在攻击多脚兽、夜行族、食人族和死亡爪等可憎生物时，她的伤害增加50%。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lenore has gained the Man Eater perk. She does 50 percent more damage when attacking Humans, Ghouls, and Super Mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽诺儿获得了 "人类杀手"Perk。她在攻击人类、食尸鬼和超级变种人时，伤害增加50%。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lenore has gained the Animal Hunter perk. She does 50 percent more damage when attacking normal and mutant animals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽诺儿获得了"动物猎手"Perk。在攻击正常和变异动物时，她的伤害增加50%。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lenore has gained the Bug Eater perk. She does 50 percent more damage when attacking insects and arachnids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 勒诺尔获得了 "食虫者"Perk。在攻击昆虫和蛛形纲动物时，她的伤害增加50%。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deadpan has gained the Show Must Go On perk. When performing Writer's Block, he now gives more health, while losing less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面获得了“演出必须继续”Perk。当执行“文思枯竭”时，他现在提供更多生命值，同时损失更少。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deadpan has gained the Sticks and Stones perk, which increases his damage resistance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面获得了 "棍棒和石头 "Perk，这增加了他的伤害抗性。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deadpan has sacrificed himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面牺牲了自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I've heard that blue is a calming color. I hope these help.
Happy Birthday,
Nicky
ESP.TRADUIT:
我听说，蓝色是一种平静的颜色，我希望这些能有所帮助。
生日快乐,
尼基

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deadpan has gone to Jacobstown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷面回到了雅各布斯镇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The animal sniffs your hand, but recoils in fear. Trying to leave makes it cry, and commands make it snort. Despite its skittishness, it seems too weak to leave the carcass it guards. If you had a better understanding of its species, maybe you could help it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 动物嗅着你的手，但因害怕而退缩。试图离开会让它哭泣，命令会让它哼哼。尽管它很容易受惊，但它似乎太弱了，无法离开它看守的尸体。如果你对它的种类有更好的了解，也许你可以帮助它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Little monster look sad but teeth scary! Find help for little monster!
ESP.TRADUIT: 小怪物看起来很伤心，但牙齿很可怕！为小怪物寻求帮助！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shh! This little monster sleep inside-out. Smart, stinky blanket!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘘！这个小怪物是反着睡的。聪明，臭毯子！

ESP.ORIGINAL: This notebook contains Connie's progress at forging other people's handwriting. The naughty drawings in the margins don't help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这本笔记本记载了康妮伪造别人笔迹的过程。空白处的涂鸦没用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Harold Johnson has gone feral!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈罗德·约翰逊已经野性化了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kate has returned to Old Mormon Fort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯特回到了旧摩门要塞。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost Kate's Shadow Dancer perk
ESP.TRADUIT: 你失去了凯特的影舞者Perk。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kate has gone to the Lucky 38.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯特去了幸运38。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kate gives you the Shadow Dancer perk! Kate helps you with Lockpick and Science skills but you suffer a penalty to your Charisma and Luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯特为你提供了影舞者Perk。凯特可以帮助你掌握开锁和科学技能，但你的魅力和运气会受到惩罚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kate has died!
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯特死了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kate has joined your party!
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯特加入了你的队伍！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Companion Message
ESP.TRADUIT: 同伴信息

ESP.ORIGINAL: While the inner workings of the generator are still a mystery to you, its use of modular components means you are able to swap out the obviously damaged parts and get it running again. The power generator is now restored to full working condition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然发电机的内部工作原理对你来说仍然是一个谜，但它使用模块化组件意味着你能够更换明显损坏的部分，并让它重新运行。这台发电机现在已恢复到完全工作状态。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Success!
ESP.TRADUIT: 成功！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Opening the generator box reveals a mass of wiring and burned circuit boards studded with valves and other components. Its workings are far beyond your comprehension. The one hope you have of repairing it lies with the fact that you notice many of the boards have a modular design and can be easily removed and replaced. (70 repair or 3 Generator Parts required)
ESP.TRADUIT:
打开发电机箱，你会看到一大堆电线和烧毁的电路板，上面布满了阀门和其他部件。它的工作原理远远超出你的理解范围。
修理它的唯一希望在于，你注意到许多板子都是模块化设计的，可以很容易地拆卸和更换。(需要70修理或3个发电机零件)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Despite the severity of damage, your expertise allows you to repair the components without finding new parts. The power generator is now restored to full working condition
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管损坏很严重，但你的专业知识让你可以在不需要新部件的情况下修复损坏的部件。发电机现在已经恢复到完全工作状态。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Success!
ESP.TRADUIT: 成功！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Despite what the engineer told you, there doesn't seem to be any parts here that would help fix the generator. However, you notice a promising looking Nova Industries Emergency Maintenance toolbox with step-by-step instructions inside for swapping out malfunctioning parts. The parts themselves are missing from the toolbox, but you notice space next to it for another three or so similar boxes. With luck these toolboxes and the parts they contain should still be in the area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管工程师告诉你什么，这里似乎没有任何零件可以帮助修理发电机。然而，你注意到一个看起来很有希望的新星工业应急维护工具箱，里面有逐步的说明，可以更换故障部件。工具箱里的部件都不见了，但你注意到工具箱旁边还有三个类似的盒子。幸运的话，这些工具箱和它们包含的部件应该还在这个区域。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Door does not open from the outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 门无法从外面打开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Notice!
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boulder Underground Infamy Gained!
ESP.TRADUIT: 博尔德地下 恶名昭彰！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boulder Underground Fame Gained!
ESP.TRADUIT: 博尔德地下 名声大噪！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Using your Science skills, you've decoded the Dome scientist's log book. Inside, you discover a series of journal entries, but more importantly, the access codes to Boulder Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 利用你的科学技能，你已经破译了巨蛋科学家的日志薄。在里面，你发现了一系列的日记条目，但更重要的是，发现了进入博尔德巨蛋的密码。

ESP.TRADUIT: 凯特已经传送。

ESP.TRADUIT: 凯特没有超级治疗针了！

ESP.TRADUIT: 同伴信息

ESP.TRADUIT: 凯特没有抗毒血清了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The risk is minor, but the rewards are great. Will pay in food and caps. To apply, report to Doctor Fabler, in the labs of the old Mobile Base Crawler in the Nellis Airplane Graveyard. Enter the graveyard through the drainage tunnels, and avoid the locals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 风险很小，但回报很大，会用食物和瓶盖支付。如需申请，请向法布勒博士报告，在内利斯飞机墓地的旧移动基地爬行器的实验室。通过排水隧道进入墓地，避开当地人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Weapons Tester Wanted!
ESP.TRADUIT: 招募武器测试员！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beyond Boulder Dome has been loaded. To begin, follow the new quest: Taking The Bait. Level 20 or above players recommended.
ESP.TRADUIT: 飞越博尔德巨蛋已经加载。要开始，请追随新任务，愿者上钩。推荐20级或以上的玩家。

ESP.TRADUIT: 飞越博尔德巨蛋
